0001.en: Chapter 1: The Hundred Lives Book
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 第1章 百世书

0001.en: Demonic Sect, Chu Sheng Sect.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 魔门，初圣宗。

0001.en: A vast sea of clouds surged like angry waves. Many mountain peaks stood like islands in the clouds, scattered like pieces on a chessboard.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 重重云海，波涛如怒，一座座景象万千的山峰就像是云海中的岛屿，星罗密布，仿佛棋盘上的棋子。

0001.en: On the edge of the board, there was a shorter mountain. It looked as if someone had cut off its peak, leaving a flat top. On that flat top, flying boats landed and took off, and the new in-name disciples were standing in a line.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而在棋盘的最外围，一座和其他山峰比起来明显矮了一截，仿佛被人凭空削去了山尖部分，只留下一片平地的山峰伫立着，而在山顶的平地上，飞舟起落，新入门的记名弟子此刻正排成一排。

0001.en: Lv Yang was one of them.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳，正是其中之一。

0001.en: He had just transmigrated and appeared here as soon as he opened his eyes. The lingering memories in his body told him that his current situation was not very good.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他刚穿越过来，一睁眼就出现在了这里，身体里的残留记忆则是告诉他，他如今的处境似乎不太妙。

0001.en: According to the body's original memories, the Chu Sheng Sect ruled over a state named "Chen."
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 根据原身的记忆，初圣宗治下有一国，名为“陈”。

0001.en: Every three years, the State of Chen sent a group of in-name disciples to the Chu Sheng Sect. In exchange, the sect ensured the state had good weather and a stable royal family.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 每隔三年，陈国都会给初圣宗送来一批记名弟子，而初圣宗则是保证陈国风调雨顺，皇室稳如泰山。

0001.en: At first, this sounded like a great opportunity to join a celestial sect and live forever.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 乍听之下，这好像还是拜入仙门，从此长生久视的天大机缘。

0001.en: However, in reality, no officials or nobles from the State of Chen wanted to come. Only poor people like Lv Yang were sent over as "blood offerings."
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 然而实际上，陈国的达官显贵却没有一个人愿意来，被当作“血奉”送过来的只有吕阳这样的贫民。

0001.en: After all, thousands of in-name disciples were sent to the Chu Sheng Sect every three years, but the number of formal disciples never really grew. The in-name disciples vanished without a trace, one after another. It was as if they were going to a bottomless abyss, not a holy land for cultivation.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 毕竟明明每三年都会有成千上万的记名弟子被送入初圣宗，可初圣宗的正式弟子却从未有过明显增长，唯有记名弟子一个接着一个渺无音信，仿佛去的不是什么修行圣地，而是一座无底深渊。

0001.en: Just thinking about it was enough to make one shiver in fear.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 光是想想，就足以让人不寒而栗。

0001.en: "No wonder I'm so weak. I feel like my body has been hollowed out."
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: “难怪这么虚弱，感觉身体被掏空.”

0001.en: Lv Yang squeezed his arm. It was all soft flesh, without any muscle. He felt even worse. When he tried to stand up, a sharp pain came from his chest.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳捏了捏自己的手臂，全是软肉，一块硬的都没有，更难受了，刚想起身，胸腔便传来一阵疼痛。

0001.en: "It seems the original owner of this body was sick, and this illness is... Fuck!"
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: “原身好像还有病，这个病是.艹！”

0001.en: Lv Yang cursed a few more times. This was no longer just about weakness; he was fatally ill and didn't seem to have much time left.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳又骂骂咧咧了几句，这都已经不是虚弱的问题了，完全是病入膏肓，眼看没有几天日子好活了。

0001.en: Just when Lv Yang had lost all hope, thinking he was about to die right after arriving.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在吕阳万念俱灰，觉得刚穿越就要速通的时候。

0001.en: A small dot of light suddenly appeared before his eyes. It grew quickly, visibly changing into a screen!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 只见他的眼前突然出现了一个细小的光点，随后迎风暴涨，竟是以肉眼可见的速度变成了一面屏幕！

0001.en: [Name: Lv Yang]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【姓名：吕阳】

0001.en: [Lifespan: 18]
0001.speaker: 旁白

0001.en: [Cultivation: None]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【修为：无】

0001.en: [Talent: None]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【天赋：无】

0001.en: [Technique: None]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【功法：无】

0001.en: [Abilities: None]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【神通：无】

0001.en: [Treasures: None]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【宝物：无】

0001.en: At that moment, Lv Yang looked at the system screen and almost wanted to cry. Hadn't he heard that heaven never closes all doors? As long as he wanted to go on, there would be a way!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这一刻，吕阳看着眼前的系统界面，突然有点想哭，岂不闻天无绝人之路，只要我想走，路就在脚下！

0001.en: System, give me some points!
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 系统，给我加点！

0001.en: Then, Lv Yang was stunned.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 然后，吕阳就傻眼了。

0001.en: He searched left and right, up and down, but couldn't find the plus sign he was hoping for in the skills section. There wasn't even a minus sign.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 因为他左找右找，上翻下看，就是没有在技能那一栏里看到他心心念念的加号，甚至连减号都没有。

0001.en: "Hey, System, where are my points?"
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: “不是啊系统，我加点呢？”

0001.en: After searching for a long time, Lv Yang had to accept a desperate fact: his personal panel didn't seem to have a point-adding function.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 找了半天，吕阳才不得不绝望地承认一个事实：那就是自己眼前的个人面板，好像没有加点的功能。

0001.en: In other words, he had to rely on his own efforts to improve.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 换而言之，想提升就得靠他自己努力。

0001.en: Lv Yang: "..."
0001.speaker: 旁白

0001.en: Damn it, you wanted me to work hard before I got a system. Now that I have one, you still want me to work hard? Then what was the point of getting a system?
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 日尼玛，我觉醒系统前，你要我努力，我都觉醒系统了，你还要我努力，那我系统不是白觉醒了吗？

0001.en: System, fuck your—
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 系统，你妈死——

0001.en: [Current pages remaining in The Hundred Lives Book: 100]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：100】

0001.en: [The Hundred Lives Book: After death, you can return to the initial time point and start a new life.]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【百世书：死后可以回到初始时间点，重开一世】

0001.en: [After restarting, you can choose to inherit one of the following from your previous life: treasures, cultivation, or lifespan. Alternatively, you can give up all gains from your past life to awaken a new talent.]
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 【重开后可以从前世的宝物，修为，寿命之中任选其一，或者放弃前世的所有收获，觉醒一门天赋。】

0001.en: Dad, I'm fine now.
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 爹，没事了。

0001.en: Lv Yang suddenly became excited. A hundred lives of reincarnation, what a huge fortune! If he could use it well, it could help him soar to the sky!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳忽然兴奋了起来，百世轮回，这是何等巨大的财富？只要能好好利用，完全可以助他一飞冲天！

0001.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0001.en: Just then, a black-robed Daoist with a grim expression appeared before them. He held a register in his hands, and a candlestick floated beside him.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 就在这时，一位手里捧着一本名册，身旁飘着一盏烛台，神情阴戾的黑衣道人出现在了众人的眼前。

0001.en: "Drop your blood into the life lamp next to me to ignite your life flame. From now on, you are in-name disciples of my Chu Sheng Sect."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “将血滴进我身旁的命灯里，点燃命火，往后你们就是我初圣宗的记名弟子了。”

0001.en: Hearing this, no one present looked happy.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 听到这番话，在场却没有人露出喜色。

0001.en: Most of the people sent here had heard of the Chu Sheng Sect's terrible reputation and knew that being a so-called in-name disciple was more of a curse than a blessing.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 只因能被送到这里的人，大部分也都听说过初圣宗的赫赫凶名，知道这个所谓的记名弟子是祸非福。

0001.en: But the black-robed Daoist ignored their thoughts and simply called out the names one by one.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 不过黑衣道人却没有理会众人的想法，只是一个个点名。

0001.en: "Chen Liang."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “陈良。”

0001.en: "Here!"
0001.speaker: 陈良

0001.en: The black-robed Daoist called a name, and a young boy with red lips and white teeth next to Lv Yang stood up and skipped over to the Daoist.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 黑衣道人叫出一个名字，吕阳身旁一个唇红齿白的小道童便站起身子，蹦蹦跳跳地走到了道人面前。

0001.en: The boy was very handsome, with bright, expressive eyes. Most importantly, he had a spiritual energy about him that even a mortal could see. From his expression and posture, he was clearly intelligent and mature for his age. In the mortal world, he would have been a prized student that all the academies would fight over.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这小道童生得十分好看，明亮的大眼睛像是会说话一样，最重要的是眉宇间有一股连凡人都能看出来的灵气，而且看其神色姿态，聪慧早熟，放在凡间定然是一位各大书院抢着要的读书种子。

0001.en: As expected, the black-robed Daoist's face lit up with surprise.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 果不其然，黑衣道人见状也露出了惊艳之色：

0001.en: "What a gifted child!"
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “好一个天生灵童！”

0001.en: "You praise me too much, Daoist brother." The young boy bowed respectfully, his childish voice making people naturally like him.
0001.speaker: 陈良
0001.cn: “道长哥哥谬赞了。”小道童恭恭敬敬地行了个礼，配上那幼嫩的孩童音，让人情不自禁生出好感。

0001.en: The black-robed Daoist's smile grew wider.
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: 黑衣道人顿时笑得更欢畅了。

0001.en: "Excellent, excellent. The Chu Sheng Sect needs talented people like you!"
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “不错不错，我初圣宗就需要你这样的人材！”

0001.en: As he spoke, the black-robed Daoist took his brush and lightly crossed out Chen Liang's name in the register.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 话音落下，黑衣道人便提笔在名册上轻轻一划，划掉了【陈良】的名字。

0001.en: Thud!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 噗通！

0001.en: The next second, without any warning, the spirited young boy's eyes rolled back, and he fell to the ground, silent.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 下一秒，没有任何征兆，本来还灵气十足的小道童顿时双眼向上一翻，扑倒在地，竟直接没了声息。

0001.en: After doing this, the black-robed Daoist casually ordered:
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 做完这一切，黑衣道人才随口吩咐道：

0001.en: "Send the blood and skin to the Pill Refining Hall, the bones and soul to the Treasure Refining Hall, and the organs to the Beast Taming Hall. Don't let such an outstanding talent go to waste."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “血液皮肉送去炼丹殿，骨头魂魄送去炼宝殿，五脏六腑送去御兽殿，不要埋没了如此优秀的人材。”

0001.en: His words left the other in-name disciples speechless.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 三言两语，听得一众记名弟子目瞪口呆。

0001.en: The black-robed Daoist chuckled darkly. "Junior Brothers, don't misunderstand."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: 黑衣道人见状桀桀一笑：“诸位师弟不要误会。”

0001.en: "The sect has always valued 'worth.' Therefore, a disciple's excellence is measured only by whether he can create enough value for the sect."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “圣宗向来看重‘价值’，因此衡量一个弟子的优秀与否，只在于他能否为圣宗创造出足够的价值。”

0001.en: "That Junior Brother just now was a gifted child with a strong body. He could only create the greatest value for the sect after death, which is why he died."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “刚刚那位师弟，天生灵童，筋骨强健，只有死后才能为圣宗创造出最大的价值，所以他才会死了。”

0001.en: "As for you, Junior Brothers, your talents are ordinary. You can create value for the sect while you are alive, so you don't have to worry about this."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “而诸位师弟，资质平庸，活着才能为圣宗创造价值，自然不用担心这些。”

0001.en: "Next."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “下一个。”

0001.en: The black-robed Daoist continued to call names. The people below were terrified, but they had to obey, afraid of suffering the same fate as the young boy.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 黑衣道人继续点名，台下众人一脸惊惧，却又不得不遵从，生怕步了小道童的后尘，也被划去性命。

0001.en: "Lv Yang."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “吕阳。”

0001.en: "Here."
0001.speaker: 吕阳

0001.en: Lv Yang stepped forward with a respectful expression.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳应声走出，神色恭敬。

0001.en: The black-robed Daoist's eyes first landed on Lv Yang's handsome face with a hint of pleasure, but then he examined his physique.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 黑衣道人的视线第一时间落在了吕阳那清秀俊逸的脸庞上，先是面露喜色，随后又查看起他的筋骨。

0001.en: Soon, however, he shook his head in disappointment.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 不过很快，他就失望地摇了摇头。

0001.en: Clearly, in his eyes, Lv Yang was useless except for his good looks.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 很显然，在他看来吕阳除了帅，一无是处。

0001.en: "Go to the Joyful Union Hall."
0001.speaker: 黑衣道人
0001.cn: “去合欢殿吧。”

0001.en: Lv Yang didn't dare to ask questions and quickly replied, "Yes."
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 吕阳不敢多问，赶紧道：“是。”

0001.en: After the assignments, Lv Yang received a nearly transparent jade token with his name carved on it. A flame seemed to be sealed inside.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 分配结束后，吕阳领了一块玉牌，玉牌几乎透明，牌上刻着他的名字，里面仿佛还封印了一团火焰。

0001.en: He also received a technique manual.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 除此之外，他还分到了一本功法。

0001.en: The manual was called the "Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra," the technique of the Joyful Union Hall where he was assigned. It was said to allow one to cultivate true qi and enter the Qi Refining realm.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 功法名为《阴阳大乐赋》，正是吕阳被分配到的合欢殿的功法，据说可以让人修出真气，踏入炼气境。

0001.en: The old servant leading the way said casually, "The flame inside the life token is your life flame. Remember to carry it with you at all times. The sect's formations, spiritual plants, and spiritual beasts recognize tokens, not people. If you forget to bring it one day and die in the sect, don't blame me for not telling you."
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 负责领路的老杂役一边带路，一边随口说道：“命牌里面的就是你们的命火了，记得随身携带，圣宗的阵法，灵植灵兽可都是认牌不认人的，哪天出门要是忘记带了，死在圣宗可别怪我没说。”

0001.en: Soon, the group was led to a hall.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 不一会儿，一行人就被带到了一座殿宇前。

0001.en: In front of the hall stood a beautiful, curvaceous woman in a long dress with a slit up to her thigh. Her every glance was full of charm.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 殿宇前，赫然站着一位身穿长裙，裙摆开叉到了大腿腿根，顾盼间活色生香，千娇百媚的丰腴美妇。

0001.en: Gulp.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: “咕噜.”

0001.en: Lv Yang clearly heard someone next to him swallow hard.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳清楚地听到身边有人传来了咽口水的声音。

0001.en: Seeing everyone looking at her, the beautiful woman was not shy. Instead, she giggled, covering her mouth, and lifted the side of her skirt with one hand.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 眼见众人看来，美妇非但不羞涩，反而一边掩嘴轻笑，一边秀手轻撩，将侧腰的一边裙摆撩了起来。

0001.en: Under the skirt, a jade token dangled, swinging in front of a soft, white area.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 裙摆之下，赫然吊着一块玉牌，在一团白花花，软绵绵前摇摇晃晃。

0001.en: The name on the token read: Yu Suzhen.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 牌上名姓：玉素真。

0001.en: "This is the Joyful Union Hall. I am Yu Suzhen, and I suppose I am your Senior Sister."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “此处便是合欢殿，小女子玉素真，也算是各位的师姐了。”

0001.en: The next moment, Lv Yang noticed the beautiful woman's eyes light up as her gaze fell on him, direct and undisguised.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 下一秒，吕阳就发现名为玉素真的美妇眼眸微亮，视线落在了自己身上，直勾勾的，没有丝毫掩饰。

0001.en: "This Junior Brother is so handsome. He must be a disciple of our Joyful Union Hall."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “这位师弟如此俊俏，肯定是我合欢殿的弟子了。”

0001.en: Yu Suzhen chuckled, then twisted her slender waist, her skirt swaying as she walked step by step towards Lv Yang. The sight of her made him dizzy.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 玉素真轻笑一声，随后便水蛇腰轻扭，裙摆交错，一步一步走到了吕阳面前，白花花晃得吕阳头晕。

0001.en: "I think you look quite good. Come with me, and I'll tell you about the Joyful Union Hall."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “我看你长得不错，随我来吧，我为你介绍一下合欢殿的情况。”

0001.en: Lv Yang quickly cupped his hands. "Thank you, Senior Sister Yu."
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: 吕阳赶忙拱手：“多谢玉师姐。”

0001.en: "Why be so polite?"
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “那么客气作甚？”

0001.en: Yu Suzhen gave Lv Yang a charming glance, then turned and swayed her hips as she walked away, arousing the passion of the surrounding men.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 玉素真娇媚地白了吕阳一眼，随后转过身子，扭着蛇腰，丰腴肉臀左右摇晃，看得周围人心火大盛。

0001.en: Lv Yang, however, did not dare to look too much and quietly followed.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳却不敢多看，默默跟上。

0001.en: "Our sect's disciples are divided into inner and outer. The Four Outer Halls—Treasure Refining, Pill Refining, Beast Taming, and Joyful Union—are where you in-name disciples go."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “我圣宗弟子，有内外之分，外门四殿，炼宝，炼丹，御兽，合欢，就是你们这些记名弟子的去处。”

0001.en: "Only by passing the trials of the Four Outer Halls can you enter the inner peaks, receive true teachings, and become a formal disciple."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “只有通过了外门四殿的考验，才能进入内门，得授真传，成为正式弟子。”

0001.en: "You are lucky to have entered my Joyful Union Hall. You won't have to suffer like the other three halls, as our trial is much easier."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “你运气不错，入了我合欢殿，不用像其他三殿那样吃苦受罪，毕竟我合欢殿的考验可要轻松多了”

0001.en: At this point, Yu Suzhen suddenly leaned close to Lv Yang.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 说到这里，玉素真突然凑到了吕阳的身边。

0001.en: "Do you want to know what it is?"
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “你想知道是什么吗？”

0001.en: The next moment, Lv Yang felt a breath of hot air on his ear, and a sweet fragrance filled his nose. When he turned to look, an exquisite, pretty face was right in front of him.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 下一秒，吕阳只感觉一口热气喷到耳根上，鼻尖也缭绕着芳香，回头看去，一张精致俏脸近在眼前。

0001.en: "Please enlighten me, Senior Sister." Lv Yang said, looking up.
0001.speaker: 吕阳
0001.cn: “还请师姐指点。”吕阳抬起头道。

0001.en: "That would be dual cultivation."
0001.speaker: 玉素真
0001.cn: “那就是双修。”

0001.en: The delicate voice whispered in his ear like a lover's murmur. Before she finished speaking, a slender hand was already on Lv Yang's head.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 娇滴滴的声音在耳边倾诉，像是情人在低声细语，话音未落，一只纤纤玉手已经搭在了吕阳的头上。

0001.en: A gentle grasp.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 盈盈一握

0001.en: Lv Yang gasped.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 吕阳顿时倒抽了一口凉气。

0002.en: Chapter 2: Following Heaven is Easy, Defying it is Hard
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 第2章 顺天易，逆天难

0002.en: To go ahead or not, that was a troubling question.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 上，还是不上，这是一个令人纠结的问题。

0002.en: However, Lü Yang did not struggle with the question for long.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 不过很快，吕阳就不纠结了。

0002.en: Because he had no power to refuse. In broad daylight, Yu Suzhen simply went for it, tore off his clothes, and took a bite.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 因为他根本没有拒绝的权力，光天化日，朗朗乾坤，玉素真竟然直接上手，扒了他的衣服就是一口。

0002.en: "Hiss!" Lü Yang's teeth chattered as he struggled. "Senior Sister, wait! At least let's change location..."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “嘶！”吕阳牙齿发颤，挣扎道：“师姐，等等至少换个地方”

0002.en: "No need. We'll do it right here!"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “不用，就在这里！”

0002.en: Seeing he couldn't refuse, and remembering he had The Hundred Lives Book as a safety net, Lü Yang simply lay back and stopped resisting.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吕阳眼根本无法拒绝，再想到还有百世书兜底，也就干脆躺平，不再反抗了。

0002.en: In an instant, a fierce battle began.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 霎时间，好一场恶战。

0002.en: One was a true demoness of the Demonic Sect, the other a transmigrator with a cheat ability.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这个是魔宗真妖女，那个是穿越狗挂逼。

0002.en: After the time it takes for an incense stick to burn.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一炷香后。

0002.en: Yu Suzhen, however, frowned in dissatisfaction.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 玉素真却是不满地皱起了眉：

0002.en: "That's it?"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “就这？”

0002.en: "What a waste."
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “真是废物。”

0002.en: Yu Suzhen cursed angrily, "You have such a handsome face, but so little vitality. You're already spent so quickly."
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: 玉素真见状没好气地骂道：“明明长了一张这么好看的脸，结果元阳都没有多少，这么快就不行了。”

0002.en: "All show and no substance, just a pretty-faced nobody!"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “中看不中用的杂鱼，杂鱼！”

0002.en: Almost at the same time, Lü Yang's face turned pale.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 几乎同时，吕阳脸色一白。

0002.en: He then realized that what little vital energy he had left was flowing into Yu Suzhen, and his already frail body became even more withered.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 紧接着，他便发现自己所剩无几的元气全部流入了玉素真体内，本就瘦弱的躯体更是变得愈发干枯。

0002.en: "The Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra?"
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “阴阳大乐赋？”

0002.en: The cultivation method assigned to him flashed in his mind, and Lü Yang came to a sudden realization. The so-called test of the Joyful Union Hall was to make the In-name Disciples use the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra to drain each other, like raising venomous creatures in a jar. Only the last one standing could become a Formal Disciple.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 脑海里闪过分配时下发的功法，吕阳心中顿时生出了明悟：恐怕所谓合欢殿的考验，其实就是让记名弟子通过阴阳大乐赋互相采补，犹如养蛊一般，只有活到最后的人才能晋升成为正式弟子。

0002.en: At that moment, several other In-name Disciples approached with fawning looks.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: “恭喜玉师姐！”

0002.en: "Congratulations, Senior Sister Yu! After draining this last one, you should be able to reach the Qi Refining stage."
0002.speaker: 陌生男1
0002.cn: 与此同时，就见周围几个记名弟子走了过来，一脸谄媚：“采补了这最后一人，师姐应该能炼气了。”

0002.en: "Once you reach Qi Refining, you are no longer a mortal!"
0002.speaker: 陌生男2
0002.cn: “一朝炼气，再非凡人！”

0002.en: "Please take care of us in the future, Senior Sister. We are willing to serve you."
0002.speaker: 陌生男3
0002.cn: “还请师姐以后多多照顾，我等愿意为师姐鞍前马后.”

0002.en: Watching this scene, Lü Yang suddenly laughed.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 看着这一幕，吕阳突然笑了。

0002.en: "Hehe."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “呵呵.”

0002.en: A useless husk, drained of his essence, suddenly laughing drew everyone's attention. Yu Suzhen glanced at Lü Yang and said coolly,
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一个被榨干的药渣废人突然发笑，立刻就引来了众人的注意，玉素真更是瞥了吕阳一眼，随后淡淡道：

0002.en: "Why are you laughing, Junior Brother?"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “师弟为何发笑啊？”

0002.en: "I'm laughing for you, Senior Sister," Lü Yang said sincerely. "I was worried about your health, but it seems my worries were for nothing."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “我是为师姐而笑的。”吕阳由衷道：“我本来还担心师姐的身体，不过现在看来是我杞人忧天了。”

0002.en: "Worried about my health?" Yu Suzhen was taken aback.
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “担心我的身体？”玉素真一愣。

0002.en: "That's right." At this point, Lü Yang sighed with emotion. "Before joining the sect, I spent a lot of time in brothels and caught a venereal disease. You were in such a hurry just now, I didn't have time to tell you. But since you're about to reach Qi Refining, I'm sure a small disease like this won't be a problem for you."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “是啊。”说到这里，吕阳一脸感叹：“师弟我入门前流连教坊司，患上了花柳病，刚刚师姐上手太急，我还没来得及说。不过既然师姐即将炼气，想来区区花柳病，对师姐来说肯定没问题吧。”

0002.en: Yu Suzhen was speechless.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 玉素真：“.”

0002.en: [The enraged Yu Suzhen beat you to death.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【气急败坏的玉素真把你打死了。】

0002.en: [Current pages remaining in The Hundred Lives Book: 99]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：99】

0002.en: [Starting a new life, you can choose one of the following gains from your previous life:]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【重开一世，你可以从前世的以下收获中选择一项：

0002.en: [One: Treasures.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一：宝物。

0002.en: [Two: Cultivation Level.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 二：修为。

0002.en: [Three: Lifespan.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 三：寿命。

0002.en: [Four: Give up all gains and awaken a random talent based on your past life's experience.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 四：放弃所有收获，根据前世经历随机觉醒一门天赋】

0002.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0002.speaker: 黑衣道人
0002.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0002.en: Lü Yang opened his eyes and saw the Black-Robed Daoist on the stage. He realized he was back in the square where he had first entered the Chu Sheng Sect, being assigned to his hall.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吕阳睁开双眼，看着台上的黑衣道人，这才发现自己又回到了刚进入初圣宗时，点名分配的广场上。

0002.en: The recent experience had been so real, the taste of the demoness still vivid in his memory, yet now he was starting all over again. The past events felt like a dream. The stark contrast left Lü Yang stunned for a moment before he came back to his senses, feeling both emotional and secretly joyful. His Hundred Lives Book was truly a wondrous treasure!
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 明明刚刚的经历真实不虚，妖女的滋味还历历在目，如今却是从头再来，往事种种宛若幻梦，如此巨大的反差让吕阳愣了好一会儿才回过神，感慨之余也窃喜，自己的百世书果然是一件奇宝！

0002.en: Calming himself, Lü Yang looked down at the options in The Hundred Lives Book.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 稳住心神，吕阳低头看向百世书的选项。

0002.en: He skipped the first three options. After all, he had been drained to death by Yu Suzhen before he even started cultivating. The only real choice was the fourth one.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 前三个选项直接跳过，毕竟他还没开始正式修炼就被玉素真采补致死了，能选的其实也只有第四个。

0002.en: [Calculating your previous life's experience...]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【正在为你结算前世经历.】

0002.en: [After absorbing you, Yu Suzhen broke through to the Qi Refining realm. Unfortunately, she was afflicted with a venereal disease, and the true qi could not be purged. She was bedridden for several months and eventually died from her illness.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【玉素真在采补了你之后已经突破炼气境，奈何身患花柳，真气难除，卧床数个月，最后病重而亡。】

0002.en: [Since ancient times, it is easy to follow the heavens, but difficult to defy them.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【自古以来，顺天易，逆天难。】

0002.en: [Mortal skills cannot compare to divine abilities. The gap between a mortal and a cultivator is vaster than heaven and earth.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【武功不敌神通，凡人与修士之间的差距犹胜天地之别。】

0002.en: [However, you entered the game and skillfully used the dual cultivation method. As a mortal, you slew a cultivator. This is a heaven-defying act!]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【然而你却以身入局，巧用双修之法，以凡人之躯斩杀修士，堪称胜天半子，逆天之举也不过如此！】

0002.en: [You have awakened the White Talent: Dual Cultivation Prodigy.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【你觉醒了白色天赋·双修奇才。】

0002.en: [Dual Cultivation Prodigy: Your understanding of dual cultivation techniques is extremely high. No cultivator of the same realm can drain you. Forcing it will only result in a backlash against them.]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【双修奇才：你在双修功法上的领悟力极高，同境界修士没有人能采补你，强行采补只会被你反噬。】

0002.en: Then, the glowing text on the panel changed again.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 紧接着，面板上的光影文字又出现了变化。

0002.en: [Name: Lv Yang]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【姓名：吕阳】

0002.en: [Cultivation: None]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【修为：无】

0002.en: [Talent: Dual Cultivation Prodigy (White)]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【天赋：双修奇才（白色）】

0002.en: [Technique: Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra (Entry)]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【功法：阴阳大乐赋（入门）】

0002.en: [Abilities: None]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【神通：无】

0002.en: [Treasures: None]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【宝物：无】

0002.en: [Hundred Lives Book Pages: 99]
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 【百世书页数：99】

0002.en: Lü Yang took a deep breath, feeling a surge of energy rush to his dantian. In an instant, his strength was restored, and he felt vigorous. His once weak body gradually recovered.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吕阳深深吐气，只觉得一股气血直冲丹田，瞬间气力完备，龙精虎猛，原本孱弱的身体也逐步恢复。

0002.en: "The venereal disease... doesn't seem to be cured, but I can last longer."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “花柳.好像还没有好，只是能撑更久了。”

0002.en: Lü Yang carefully assessed his condition.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吕阳细细感悟着自己的状态。

0002.en: Besides the physical recovery from the talent, Lü Yang also had a much deeper understanding of the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra given by the Joyful Union Hall.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 除了天赋带来的身体恢复之外，吕阳对于合欢殿下发的双修功法《阴阳大乐赋》也有了不少的感悟。

0002.en: After all, practical experience is more important than pure theory, not to mention the talent's bonus.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 毕竟比起纯理论，实战经验更加重要，何况还有天赋加成。

0002.en: After that, everything unfolded as before.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 此后，一切发展都没有变。

0002.en: Because of his handsome face, Lü Yang was still assigned to the Joyful Union Hall. He still met Yu Suzhen at the entrance, and she still took a fancy to him at first sight.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 因为一张天生的俊脸，吕阳还是被分到了合欢殿，也依旧在门口遇到了玉素真，并被对方一眼相中。

0002.en: "What a formidable Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra!"
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “好一门阴阳大乐赋！”

0002.en: This wicked draining technique could not only absorb a person's primordial yin and yang but could also absorb knowledge and experience from techniques and abilities!
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这门采补邪功除了能采补人的元阳元阴之外，居然还可以采补知识，功法神通的经验都能采补过来！

0002.en: Thinking of this, Lü Yang became even more enthusiastic.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 念及此处，吕阳顿时更加卖力了起来。

0002.en: One day, two days, three days...
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一日，二日，三日

0002.en: As time went on, Yu Suzhen's expression slowly changed from enjoyment to terror, and her once-flat belly began to swell...
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 随着时间推移，玉素真的表情渐渐从享受变成了惊恐，原本平坦的小腹更是渐渐鼓了起来

0002.en: "Enough, enough! Stop for a moment!"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “够，够了！先停一下！”

0002.en: "I... I've had enough... no, ah!"
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “我，我已经别，啊！”

0002.en: "I'm sorry, I was wrong, wait..."
0002.speaker: 玉素真
0002.cn: “对不起，是我错了，等一等.”

0002.en: Ignoring Yu Suzhen's pleas, Lü Yang relentlessly operated the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra, completely immersed in the pleasure of cultivation.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 对玉素真的求饶充耳不闻，吕阳一个劲地运转阴阳大乐赋，心神完全沉浸在了修行带来的快乐之中。

0002.en: And in this process, he felt the existence of "Qi" for the first time.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 而在这个过程中，他头一次感觉到了“炁”的存在。

0002.en: This strand of "Qi" was inside Yu Suzhen's body. If they weren't so close at this moment, Lü Yang might not have been able to sense its presence.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这一道“炁”就在玉素真的体内，若非两人此刻离得近，吕阳还真不一定能感应到它的存在。

0002.en: "This thing should be mine!"
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “此物合该为我所用！”

0002.en: Thinking this, Lü Yang didn't hesitate. He immediately activated the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra and forcibly extracted all the "Qi" from Yu Suzhen's body.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 想到这里，吕阳没有任何犹豫，当即运转阴阳大乐赋，强行将玉素真体内的“炁”全部抽取了出来。

0002.en: Almost at the same time, Yu Suzhen let out a piercing scream, and then her head tilted to one side.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 几乎同时，玉素真也发出了一声惨叫，随后头一歪。

0002.en: The next moment, Lü Yang felt his own essence merge with that strand of Qi, and with a sudden jolt, it was as if an invisible door had been opened.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 下一秒，吕阳只觉得自己的精气神和那一道炁相合，最后轰然一震，就像是洞开了一扇无形的大门。

0002.en: Lü Yang had a flash of insight: "I've broken through!"
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: 吕阳瞬间福至心灵：“我突破了！”

0002.en: The union of spirit and energy is called "Qi Refining"!
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 神与气合，谓之“炼气”！

0002.en: As a senior In-name Disciple of the Joyful Union Hall, Yu Suzhen was only one step away from Qi Refining.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 玉素真作为合欢殿的老牌记名弟子，距离炼气只差一步。

0002.en: In the last life, she drained him, completed the final step, and successfully reached Qi Refining. In this life, she was drained by him instead, and all her accumulation had benefited him.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 上一世她采补自己，补全了最后一步，成功炼气。这一世她却被自己反采补，一身积累便宜了自己。

0002.en: From this day on, he was a cultivator at the first layer of Qi Refining!
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 从今日起，自己就是一位炼气一层的修士了！

0002.en: To break through in one day and be promoted to a Formal Disciple was a huge leap in status. It seemed simple, but for countless years, it had stopped countless In-name Disciples.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 一朝突破，晋升正式弟子，地位堪称一步登天。看似简单，无数年来却不知道拦住了多少记名弟子。

0002.en: "How delightful. Senior Sister Yu, I will probably never forget you for the rest of my life."
0002.speaker: 吕阳
0002.cn: “令人愉悦，玉师姐，我大概一生都不会忘了你吧。”

0002.en: Lü Yang stood up and looked at the lifeless Yu Suzhen on the ground, unable to hold back a sigh.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 吕阳站起身，看着地上已经没了声息的玉素真，忍不住感慨。

0003.en: Chapter 3: The Demonic Sect's Way
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 第3章 魔门作风

0003.en: When Lv Yang walked out of the quiet room, he discovered that someone was already waiting outside the door.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 当吕阳走出静室的时候，却发现门外居然早已有人等候了。

0003.en: Lv Yang's heart jumped in alarm. The person was dressed in a black Daoist robe with a sinister expression. It was the same Black-Robed Daoist who had assigned him to the Joyful Union Hall!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 吕阳顿时心中一惊，只见来人一身黑色道袍，神色阴戾，赫然是之前将他分配到合欢殿的黑衣道人！

0003.en: "Greetings, Senior Brother." Lv Yang quickly bowed.
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: “见过师兄。”吕阳赶忙行礼。

0003.en: "You're very good. A real talent."
0003.speaker: 黑衣道人
0003.cn: “你很不错，是个人才。”

0003.en: The Black-Robed Daoist said with a smile, "I heard that Yu Suzhen brought a very capable young man into her room, and that he was on the verge of breaking through to Qi Refining."
0003.speaker: 黑衣道人
0003.cn: 黑衣道人笑眯眯地说道：“我本来是听说玉素真拐了一个很能干的小伙子进屋，突破炼气指日可待.”

0003.en: "But I didn't expect that venomous woman to fail."
0003.speaker: 黑衣道人
0003.cn: “结果没有想到那毒妇居然失手了。”

0003.en: As he said this, the Black-Robed Daoist looked at Lv Yang with a very strange expression.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 说到这里，黑衣道人看向吕阳的眼神满是古怪。

0003.en: Three days, a whole three days!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 三日啊，整整三日！

0003.en: Yu Suzhen's cries could be heard even outside the quiet room. Even though the Black-Robed Daoist considered himself experienced, he couldn't help but feel a bit of admiration at this moment.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 玉素真的叫声甚至在静室外面都能听到，哪怕黑衣道人自问见多识广，此刻也难免生出了几分敬佩。

0003.en: If this boy doesn't die, he will surely become a pillar of the sect in the future!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 此子不死，未来必为圣宗栋梁！

0003.en: "Follow me."
0003.speaker: 黑衣道人
0003.cn: “随我来吧。”

0003.en: The Black-Robed Daoist's name was Liu Xin. He was a Formal Disciple from Sky Mending Peak, one of the Four Inner Peaks, and was responsible for guiding newly promoted In-name Disciples and explaining sect matters.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 黑衣道人叫刘信，是内门四峰，补天峰的一位正式弟子，负责接引晋升的记名弟子，交代宗门事宜。

0003.en: "The Four Outer Halls and the Four Inner Peaks correspond to each other."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “外门四殿，内门四峰，彼此都是互相对应的。”

0003.en: On the way, Liu Xin explained to Lv Yang with interest, "Besides the Sacred Fire Cliff where the Sect Master resides, our sect is mainly centered around the Four Inner Peaks."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: 路上，刘信饶有兴致地对吕阳介绍道：“除了掌教所在的圣火崖之外，我圣宗便是以内门四峰为主。”

0003.en: "You came from the Joyful Union Hall, so naturally, you will join my Sky Mending Peak. I'll take you to update the register first."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “你是合欢殿出来的，自然要入我补天峰，我现在先带你去改录名册。”

0003.en: With someone to guide him, Lv Yang was more than happy. "Thank you, Senior Brother Liu."
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: 有人指引，吕阳自然求之不得：“多谢刘师兄。”

0003.en: "It's just my duty."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “分内之事罢了。”

0003.en: Liu Xin said calmly, "After updating the register, I'll take you to the other three halls. The benefits for Formal Disciples are quite good; consider it a perk from the sect."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: 刘信淡然道：“改录完名册后，我再带你去其他三殿，正式弟子的好处可不少，算是圣宗发的福利。”

0003.en: "According to the rules, each Formal Disciple can only receive these benefits once." At this point, Liu Xin's expression turned a bit wistful. "After you enter the inner sect, if you want to get items of the same level, you'll have to complete tasks issued by the sect and earn Contribution Points to exchange for them."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “按照规矩，每一位正式弟子只能领取一次。”说到这里，刘信的神色有些怅然：“等你进入内门之后，如果还想要拿到同层次的东西，就必须要完成圣宗发布的任务，赚取贡献点才能兑换了。”

0003.en: Lv Yang frowned, "Contribution Points?"
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: 吕阳皱眉道：“贡献点？”

0003.en: "It's the currency issued by the sect," Liu Xin explained. "After you update the register, you should be able to see it on your disciple token."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “就是由圣宗发放的货币。”刘信解释道：“师弟你改录名册之后，应该也可以通过弟子令牌看到的。”

0003.en: Curious, Lv Yang followed Liu Xin to update the register.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 吕阳心生好奇，当即跟着刘信前往改录名册。

0003.en: The process was very simple. It just involved moving the Life Lamp he had lit when he first joined from the outer sect area to the inner sect area.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 过程也非常简单，其实就是将他当初入门时点燃的命灯换一个位置摆放，从外门区域摆进内门区域。

0003.en: Then, Lv Yang channeled a strand of true qi into the token at his waist, and a line of text immediately appeared on it:
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 随后吕阳将一缕真气输入腰间令牌，令牌上立刻浮现出了一行字迹：

0003.en: "Formal Disciple, Lv Yang."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “正式弟子，吕阳。”

0003.en: "As a Formal Disciple, the sect has gifted you 50 Contribution Points. Contribution Points can be used to exchange for spirit stones, techniques, magical artifacts, cultivation caves, etc."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “作为正式弟子，圣宗免费赠送你50贡献点，贡献点可用于兑换灵石，功法，法器，修炼洞府等。”

0003.en: "After entering the inner sect, you need to pay Contribution Points to rent a cultivation cave. The rent is 30 Contribution Points per month. Of course, you can also choose to buy a cultivation cave. As a newly promoted inner sect disciple, you can enjoy a 20% down payment discount if you purchase one within ten years."
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: “进入内门后，你需要支付贡献点租住修炼洞府，租金为每月30贡献点。当然，你也可以选择购买修炼洞府，作为新晋内门弟子，你在十年之内购买修炼洞府，可以享受首付20%的优惠。”

0003.en: —There were more than a dozen pages of such introductions.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: ——诸如此类的介绍，足足有十几页。

0003.en: After reading it all carefully, Lv Yang came to a conclusion: "This inner sect is all about money!"
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: 吕阳认真看完后，得出了结论：“这内门，只看钱啊！”

0003.en: With Contribution Points, you could have anything in the world—techniques, pills, and treasures were all available. Without them, you couldn't even afford a place to live.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 有贡献点就是走遍天下，功法，丹药，法宝应有尽有，没有贡献点就是寸步难行，连洞府都住不起。

0003.en: At the same time, Lv Yang also learned what the "benefits" Liu Xin mentioned were.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 与此同时，吕阳也知道了刘信口中的福利是什么。

0003.en: After being promoted, every In-name Disciple could use their disciple token to select one magical artifact, one pill, one companion spirit beast, and one dual cultivation partner from the Treasure Refining Hall, Pill Refining Hall, Beast Taming Hall, and Joyful Union Hall, respectively, without paying any Contribution Points.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 每一位记名弟子在晋升正式弟子之后，都可以持弟子令牌从炼宝殿，炼丹殿，御兽殿，合欢殿之中分别挑选一件法宝，一枚丹药，一头伴生灵兽和一个双修鼎炉，而且不需要支付任何贡献点。

0003.en: "Looking at it this way, it really is a benefit."
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: “这么看，还真是福利。”

0003.en: With a thought, Lv Yang used his disciple token to open the list of exchangeable items, and lines of text appeared.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 吕阳心念一动，通过弟子令牌打开贡献点的可兑换物品列表，上面顿时浮现出了一行行相应的字迹。

0003.en: Techniques, artifacts, pills, spirit beasts, and cultivation partners—the cheapest all required 100 Contribution Points.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 功法，法器，丹药，灵兽，鼎炉最便宜的都需要100贡献点。

0003.en: In contrast, the rewards for sect tasks were pitifully small, mostly in the single digits, with very few reaching double digits.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而与之对应的，圣宗内的任务报酬却一个个少得可怜，全都是个位数的贡献点，极少有上两位数的。

0003.en: From this, it was clear that the free four-item set for promotion was worth at least 400 Contribution Points, a huge sum even for a Formal Disciple.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 由此可见，晋升正式弟子后的免费四件套至少等于400贡献点，对正式弟子而言也算是一笔巨款了。

0003.en: While thinking, Lv Yang had already followed Liu Xin to the Treasure Refining Hall.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 思索间，吕阳已经跟着刘信来到了炼宝殿。

0003.en: The person who received them was named Chen Hao, a deacon of the Treasure Refining Hall. He was said to be a Formal Disciple, and being a deacon was his task.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 负责接待他们的人叫陈皓，是炼宝殿的执事，据说也是一位正式弟子，而炼宝殿执事就是他的任务。

0003.en: According to Liu Xin, this kind of fixed position was the most profitable in the inner sect. Not only did it offer a lot of Contribution Points, enough to support a Formal Disciple, but it was also stable—a true iron rice bowl. Unfortunately, there were too many monks and not enough porridge; you couldn't get such a task without connections.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 根据刘信的说法，这种固定岗位的任务在内门是最赚的，不仅贡献点很多，往往一个任务就能供养一位正式弟子，而且胜在稳定，堪称铁饭碗。可惜僧多肉少，没点关系根本拿不到这种任务。

0003.en: "Senior Brother Liu? It's been a while."
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: “刘师兄？许久不见了啊。”

0003.en: Walking into the Treasure Refining Hall, Lv Yang noticed that Chen Hao first glanced at him before turning to Liu Xin and saying warmly, "Bringing a new disciple over again?"
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: 走进炼宝殿，吕阳发现陈皓先是打量了自己一眼，随后才看向刘信，热情道：“又带新弟子过来了？”

0003.en: "That's right."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “是啊。”

0003.en: Liu Xin grinned, his words hinting at something more. "Since you know, why don't you hurry up and bring out the best artifacts in the Treasure Refining Hall for Junior Brother Lv to see?"
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: 刘信咧嘴一笑，言语间似有所指道：“知道还不快点将炼宝殿里最上乘的法器拿出来给吕师弟过目？”

0003.en: "You got it!"
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: “得嘞！”

0003.en: Chen Hao nodded eagerly and led them into the inner courtyard of the Treasure Refining Hall. But as they walked, Lv Yang frowned in surprise.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 陈皓殷勤地点了点头，随后便领着众人进了炼宝殿的内院，然而走着走着，吕阳却讶异地皱起了眉：

0003.en: "This... is a disciple's cultivation room, isn't it?"
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: “这里.是弟子的修炼静室吧？”

0003.en: Shouldn't they go to a warehouse or somewhere similar to get an artifact?
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 取法器，不应该去仓库之类的地方吗？

0003.en: Chen Hao first looked confused, then it dawned on him and he laughed loudly, "Junior Brother Lv, you may not know, but the best artifacts are all in here."
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: 陈皓闻言先是面露不解，随后又恍然大悟，大笑道：“吕师弟有所不知，上好的法器可都在这里呢。”

0003.en: Before he finished speaking, the three of them stopped in front of a cultivation room.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 话音未落，三人便在一间修炼房前停下。

0003.en: "The junior brother in this room has been here for a long time. He was an In-name Disciple in the outer sect for three years. Unfortunately, he was a bit stubborn and went down the wrong path in his cultivation..."
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: “这间房里的师弟资历很老，在外门当了三年的记名弟子，可惜有点死脑筋，修炼功法走上了歧路”

0003.en: After saying this, Chen Hao pushed the door open directly.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 说完，陈皓便直接推开了房门。

0003.en: Lv Yang then saw a Daoist on a cushion in the center of the room, his eyes tightly closed, muttering to himself as if in a dream.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 然后吕阳就看到房间正中央的蒲团上，一个道人正双眸紧闭，口中喃喃自语，似乎陷入了梦呓之中。

0003.en: "I've succeeded... I'm about to succeed..."
0003.speaker: 陌生男1
0003.cn: “成了.我要成了”

0003.en: Then, Chen Hao formed a hand seal, and the Daoist in the room suddenly opened his eyes. His previously dull face was now filled with ecstasy.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 紧接着，只见陈皓一掐法决，房间里的道人猛地睁开双眼，原本呆滞的脸庞旋即浮现出了一抹狂喜：

0003.en: "Haha! I, your Daoist master, have succeeded!"
0003.speaker: 陌生男1
0003.cn: “哈哈！道爷我成啦！”

0003.en: Boom!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 轰！

0003.en: Before he could finish, his entire body exploded, sending flesh and blood flying everywhere. Then, it all flowed back, merging into the skeleton left behind.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 话音未落，他整个人就轰然炸开，漫天血肉飞散，接着又倒卷而回，尽数融入了留在原地的骷髅中。

0003.en: In a short while, a living person had vanished.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 不一会儿，一个大活人就此消失。

0003.en: In his place, a "bone sword," as brilliant as jade and perfectly formed, landed gently on the cushion, glowing with the dazzling light of a magical artifact.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 取而代之的则是一口晶莹如玉，节节有序的“骨剑”轻轻落在了蒲团上，还洋溢着夺目的法器灵光。

0003.en: Chen Hao walked forward, picked up the "bone sword," and handed it to Lv Yang, saying with satisfaction, "The artifact 'Bone Jade Sword' is considered a superior item in the 'True Cave Hundred Treasures Book'. This junior brother was indeed a talent. After so many years of hard cultivation, his power was exquisite, otherwise the artifact's spiritual light wouldn't be so pure."
0003.speaker: 陈皓
0003.cn: 陈皓走上前，将“骨剑”拿起递给了吕阳，随后满意道：“法器‘骨玉剑’，在《洞真百宝书》里也算上乘，这位师弟确实是一个人材，苦修这么多年，功力精湛，否则法器灵光不会这么精纯。”

0003.en: Lv Yang: "..."
0003.speaker: 吕阳

0003.en: Looking at the Bone Jade Sword in Chen Hao's hand and thinking of his own past life, Lv Yang felt a chill to his bones and understood the ways of the Chu Sheng Sect even better.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 看着陈皓手中的骨玉剑，再联想到前世的遭遇，吕阳只觉得彻骨冰凉，对初圣宗的作风也愈发了解。

0003.en: It could be summarized in eight words: the weak are prey to the strong, and everything is used to its fullest!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 总结下来无非八个字：弱肉强食，物尽其用！

0003.en: The sect spends resources to cultivate you In-name Disciples, so you must create value for the sect. If you can't create value, the sect will help you create it!
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 宗门耗费资源培养你们这些记名弟子，那你们就要为宗门创造价值，创造不出价值，宗门帮你创造！

0003.en: If you break through and become a Formal Disciple, everyone is happy.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 突破了，晋升正式弟子，那自然皆大欢喜。

0003.en: If you can't break through, the sect won't support you for a lifetime. Naturally, it will recover the resources it spent on you to ensure it doesn't lose out.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 突破不了，宗门也不可能白养你一辈子，自然要在你身上把付出的资源捞回来，确保宗门不会亏本。

0003.en: Therefore, in the eyes of the Chu Sheng Sect, some disciples are like clouds, and some are like water. They just do different things. They are all "talents," and there are no "useless" people.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 因此在初圣宗看来，门中弟子有些是云，有些是水，所做的事情不同而已，都是人材，没有废柴。

0003.en: "This is truly... a sect that lives up to its name."
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: “这还真是.宗如其名。”

0003.en: Lv Yang closed his eyes and let out a long breath. Thinking about the Hundred Lives Book he had as a backup, he had already regained his composure when he opened his eyes again.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 吕阳闭上双眼，深深吐出一口浊气，再想到自己还有百世书兜底，再睁开眼时已经重新恢复了镇定。

0003.en: "Junior Brother has a good disposition, truly a man of great talent!"
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “师弟好心性啊，果然是一表人才！”

0003.en: On the other side, seeing Lv Yang calm down so quickly, Liu Xin's eyes first flashed with surprise, and then the smile on his face grew wider.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 而另一边，见吕阳这么快就平复了情绪，刘信眼中先是闪过一抹惊异，随后脸上的笑容更加灿烂了。

0003.en: Next, Lv Yang followed Liu Xin to the Pill Refining Hall and the Beast Taming Hall, where he received a "Qi Supplementing Pill" and a "Human-Faced Owl." The former could nourish his true qi when consumed, and the latter was like a carrier pigeon, used by Formal Disciples to send messages to each other.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 紧接着，吕阳又跟着刘信依次去了炼丹殿和御兽殿，分别领了一枚“补气丸”和一头“人面鸮”，前者吞服以后可以滋补真气，后者则是如同信鸽，正式弟子之间一般都是通过它来传递讯息的。

0003.en: Only when it came to the last item, the cultivation partner, did Liu Xin have a problem.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 直到最后一个鼎炉，刘信才犯了难。

0003.en: "Junior Brother, you broke through too quickly."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “师弟你突破得太快了。”

0003.en: Liu Xin shook his head and said, "You just joined the outer sect and reached Qi Refining in one day. The speed is too fast. The cultivation partners reserved by the Joyful Union Hall haven't arrived yet."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: 刘信摇了摇头，道：“这才刚加入外门，一天炼气，速度太快，合欢殿预定的鼎炉都还没有到位呢。”

0003.en: "How about you wait a few days, Junior Brother?"
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: “不如师弟稍等几天？”

0003.en: Lv Yang, of course, didn't care about any cultivation partner. He immediately cupped his hands and said, "I will follow Senior Brother's arrangements."
0003.speaker: 吕阳
0003.cn: 什么鼎炉，吕阳当然是不在意的，当即拱手道：“全听师兄安排。”

0003.en: Liu Xin laughed heartily, then took out a jade slip and stuffed it into Lv Yang's hand. "This is the secret true art of our Sky Mending Peak. Take it back and cultivate it well."
0003.speaker: 刘信
0003.cn: 刘信顿时大笑，随后又取出一枚玉简塞给了吕阳：“这是我补天峰的秘传真决，你拿回去好好修炼。”

0003.en: Lv Yang took the jade slip and immediately used his spiritual sense to check it.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 吕阳接过玉简，当即运转灵识查看。

0003.en: In the next second, an incredibly complex technique appeared in his mind.
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 下一秒，一门繁复到极致的功法就映入了他的脑海。

0003.en: 《Innate Dao Scripture》
0003.speaker: 旁白
0003.cn: 《先天道书》

0004.en: Chapter 4: Impossible to Guard Against
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 第4章 防不胜防

0004.en: "The body is formed from Innate True Qi. Refining qi is refining oneself. Purify yourself, return to your innate state, and you can achieve a perfect form and spirit."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: “夫人者，先天一炁所成，炼气便是炼己，纯化自身，逆反先天，可炼就形神俱妙的先天一炁正果.”

0004.en: After a long time, Lv Yang opened his eyes, his face showing his joy.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 良久过后，吕阳睁开眼，面露喜色。

0004.en: Compared to the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra, the Innate Dao Scripture actually looked like a complete cultivation manual.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 和《阴阳大乐赋》相比，《先天道书》才真有几分完整传承该有的模样。

0004.en: The entire scripture started from the basics. It began with a set of exercises to strengthen the body, and even included a matching martial art called the Innate Great Grappling Hand.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 整部道书，从凡人开始，入门先练一套锤锻体魄的先天功，甚至还有配套的武功，名为先天大擒拿。

0004.en: Once the body was fully developed, the cultivator would begin to "reverse to the innate." They would first transform their organs, then their flesh and bones, until finally their physical form dissolved into a stream of Innate True Qi. From then on, they could appear and disappear at will, be resistant to magical attacks, and hold an unbeatable advantage in battles.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 等体魄大成之后，修炼者便要开始“逆反先天”，先化五脏六腑，再化皮肉筋骨，直到最后彻底化去形体，将身体炼为一道先天真炁，从此聚散无常，道法难伤，与人斗法先天立于不败之地。

0004.en: In addition, the scripture also described many spells that worked with Innate True Qi.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 除此之外，道书内还记载着许多可以和先天真炁配合的法术。

0004.en: The sheer number and variety of spells, like the Heavenly Net Dust Smoke, the Single-Minded Qi Sword, and the Spirit-Absorbing Technique, were a real eye-opener for Lv Yang.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 诸如天罗弥尘烟，一意真气剑，灵息纳气术法术种类之齐全，功能之多样让吕阳感觉大开眼界。

0004.en: However, just as he was completely absorbed in reading, Lv Yang suddenly paused.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 然而就在这时，原本看得如痴如醉的吕阳突然一愣：

0004.en: "...Why did it stop?"
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “.怎么没了？”

0004.en: Lv Yang instinctively looked up at Liu Xin and realized the 'Innate Dao Scripture' in his hands was only the first half. The content stopped suddenly.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳下意识地抬起头看向刘信，这才发现手中的《先天道书》居然只有上半部，内容也戛然而止了。

0004.en: "Junior Brother, techniques are not given out freely."
0004.speaker: 刘信
0004.cn: “师弟，法不轻授啊。”

0004.en: Liu Xin chuckled. "The second half of the Innate Dao Scripture contains the secrets to Foundation Establishment. It's not included in the sect's benefits. You need to exchange contribution points for it."
0004.speaker: 刘信
0004.cn: 刘信轻笑一声：“《先天道书》的下半部事关筑基之秘，可没有算在宗门福利里，要用贡献点兑换的。”

0004.en: Hearing this, Lv Yang shook his head with a sense of helplessness. "I see. I lost my composure."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: 吕阳闻言无奈摇头：“原来如此，是师弟失态了。”

0004.en: "Don't worry, half of the scripture is enough for your cultivation."
0004.speaker: 刘信
0004.cn: “无妨，半部道书也够师弟你修炼了。”

0004.en: Liu Xin patted Lv Yang's shoulder in a friendly way. "Let's go. I'll take you to Sky Mending Peak to choose a cave residence. Pick a good place so we can visit each other often in the future."
0004.speaker: 刘信
0004.cn: 刘信亲切地拍了拍吕阳的肩膀：“走，我带你去补天峰挑选洞府，选个好地方，以后也好多多走动。”

0004.en: Lv Yang nodded. "Thank you, Senior Brother."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: 吕阳点头：“多谢师兄。”

0004.en: An hour later, at Sky Mending Peak.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 半个时辰后，补天峰。

0004.en: In a remote cave residence at the foot of the mountain, Lv Yang officially settled in. The original furniture inside was cleared out like trash.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 山脚处的一座偏僻洞府，吕阳正式安家落户，而洞府内原本的家具器物则是被当作垃圾清扫了出去。

0004.en: Watching this, Lv Yang's mind was filled with thoughts.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 看着这一幕，吕阳心中思绪万千。

0004.en: "It seems being a Formal Disciple isn't easy either..."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “正式弟子貌似也不好混啊”

0004.en: Sky Mending Peak wasn't very large. The Chu Sheng Sect took in so many in-name disciples every year that even with a one-in-ten-thousand promotion rate, there should be enough to fill the peak.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 补天峰并不大，初圣宗每年都有那么多记名弟子，哪怕晋升机率只有万分之一也足以塞满补天峰了。

0004.en: But what was the reality?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 可实际上呢？

0004.en: As Lv Yang walked, he saw that Sky Mending Peak was far from crowded. It was actually a bit empty. Many cave residences were vacant, with no disciples living in them.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳一路走来，补天峰别说是人满为患了，甚至有点空，许多洞府都处于闲置状态，没有弟子入住。

0004.en: Where did all the formal disciples go? Surely they could afford to rent a cave residence?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 那些正式弟子都去哪儿了？总不会是租不起洞府吧？

0004.en: Lv Yang shook his head and didn't think about it further. He took out a cushion, sat down with his legs crossed, and began his first cultivation session in the cave residence.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头，没有深究，而是取来一张蒲团坐下，接着五心朝天，开始了在洞府内的第一次修行。

0004.en: He hadn't noticed before, but once he started cultivating, Lv Yang felt a surge of spiritual energy, almost double that of the outer sect, rush into his body. It flowed into his dantian, circulated through his meridians, and gradually seeped into his organs, flesh, and bones.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这不修行还好，一修行，吕阳顿时感觉比外门多出近一倍的天地灵气蜂拥而来，尽数涌入了他的丹田，随后通过经脉流转他的全身上下，最后由外及内，一步步融入五脏六腑，皮肉筋骨之中。

0004.en: The efficiency was so high that it surprised Lv Yang.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 效率之高，让吕阳都一脸惊异。

0004.en: With the same technique, the amount of true qi he could refine in one day in the outer sect could be achieved in just two hours here in the inner sect cave.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 同样的时间，同样的功法，他在外门修炼一天才能炼出的真气，在内门洞府却只需要修炼一个时辰。

0004.en: "No wonder you have to pay to rent a cave in the inner sect."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “怪不得内门洞府要花钱才能租住。”

0004.en: It's easy to go from a simple life to a luxurious one, but hard to go back. Once you experience the speed of cultivating in a cave residence, it's difficult to tolerate cultivating anywhere else.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 由俭入奢易，由奢入俭难，只要体验过一次在洞府里修炼的速度，就很难再忍受在其他地方修炼了。

0004.en: The next day, Lv Yang stayed in his cave, cultivating and reading the Innate Dao Scripture.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 翌日，吕阳没有出门，而是窝在洞府里一边修炼，一边翻阅先天道书。

0004.en: "In this world, cultivation depends on talent, but there's no concept of 'spirit roots.' Basically, anyone can start cultivating if they want to."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “此世的修行虽然也看天赋，但是并没有灵根一说，基本上只要有心，任何人都可以踏入修行之路。”

0004.en: Even so, cultivation wasn't much easier.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 话虽如此，修行却并没有因此而容易多少。

0004.en: Although mortals didn't need spirit roots to start cultivating, the quality of the true qi they refined still determined their future potential.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 因为凡人入道修行虽然没有灵根的限制，但是炼成的真气品阶却依旧可以决定修士未来的最高成就。

0004.en: This was the importance of the "technique."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这就是“法”的作用。

0004.en: The better the technique, the higher the quality of the true qi, and the greater the chance of reaching a higher realm. The opposite was also true, making it more likely to hit a bottleneck.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 功法越高级，提炼出来的真气品阶越高，未来就越有可能达到更高境界，反之也越有可能遇到瓶颈。

0004.en: True qi was divided into nine grades and thirty-six ranks. The lower the grade, the better, and the higher the rank, the stronger.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 真气九品三十六阶，品数越低越上乘，阶级越高越强大。

0004.en: Generally, with true qi below the seventh grade, one could not reach Foundation Establishment. Below the third grade, it was difficult to form a Golden Core. And trying to reach Nascent Soul without first-grade qi was almost certainly fatal.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 一般来说，真气在七品以下就无缘筑基，三品以下则难成金丹，非一品想要凝炼元婴更是十死无生。

0004.en: "It's tough to be a rogue cultivator."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “散修真是没活路啊。”

0004.en: Lv Yang couldn't help but sigh. Compared to large sects with complete teachings, rogue cultivators had no choice in their techniques; they had to practice whatever they could find.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳忍不住感慨，和传承完备的大宗门比起来，散修哪里有挑选功法的余地，还不是有什么练什么。

0004.en: In this situation, even the most talented people were at a disadvantage from the start and would live with regret.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这种处境之下，哪怕天赋悟性再高也输在了起跑线上，最后只能抱憾终生。

0004.en: The difficulty of cultivation was clear to see.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 修仙之难，可见一斑。

0004.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's brow gradually furrowed.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 想到这里，吕阳渐渐皱起了眉头。

0004.en: "The 'Innate True Qi' from the 'Innate Dao Scripture' is sixth-grade, first-rank. A cultivator has a chance to reach Foundation Establishment. Strictly speaking, that's not weak."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “《先天道书》提炼出的‘先天真炁’位列六品第一阶，修炼者有望筑基，严格来说已经不算弱了。”

0004.en: But it still didn't meet his expectations.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 但是，依旧不达他的预期。

0004.en: If he were just an ordinary cultivator, it would be fine.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 如果他只是一个普通修士，也就罢了。

0004.en: But he possessed the miraculous Hundred Lives Book. His future was promising, so a technique that stopped at Foundation Establishment could no longer satisfy him.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 可他如今身怀【百世书】这等奇宝，堪称未来可期，一本止步筑基的功法已经无法满足他的追求了。

0004.en: "If only I could get a supreme first-grade technique..."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “如果能有那种位列一品的无上真传”

0004.en: Lv Yang imagined it for a moment, then sighed. "Forget it. I have to take things one step at a time. If I take too big a step, I might trip."
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: 吕阳幻想了一下，随后叹息一声：“算了，路还是得一步一步走，步子迈的太大，咔，容易扯着蛋。”

0004.en: "First, I'll practice the Innate Dao Scripture and become a Foundation Establishment master."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: “先修炼先天道书，成为筑基大修再说.”

0004.en: Once he established his foundation, he would live for three hundred years, almost as long as a mortal dynasty. In the cultivation world, he could be called a "master."
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 道基一筑，从此长生驻世三百载，几乎等同于凡人的一个朝代，放在修仙界也称得上一声“大修”。

0004.en: Once he was strong enough, he would seek a higher-level technique. As soon as he got it, he would start over.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 等有了实力，再去谋取更高的传承，到手后立刻重开。

0004.en: By repeating this cycle, his dream would eventually come true.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 如此循环往复，总有梦想成真的一天。

0004.en: As long as he was patient and didn't rush, time would always be his friend. This was the confidence the Hundred Lives Book gave him.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 只要他有耐心，不冒进，时间永远都是站在他这一边的好朋友，这就是【百世书】带给吕阳的自信。

0004.en: Ten days later, in Lv Yang's cave residence.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 十日之后，吕阳洞府。

0004.en: A white vapor rose and swirled, sometimes turning into black smoke, sometimes into an invisible qi sword, and finally into the graceful figure of a person.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 只见一道白炁蒸腾氤氲，忽而化作滚滚黑烟，忽而化作无形气剑，最后又化作一道飘逸似仙的人影。

0004.en: "I did it!"
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “我成了！”

0004.en: Although the Innate Dao Scripture was profound, it wasn't difficult to practice. In just ten days, Lv Yang had successfully dissolved his physical form and refined his body into a stream of true qi.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 先天道书虽然玄妙，但是却并不难练，短短十日吕阳就已经成功化去形体，将身体炼成了一道真炁。

0004.en: [Name: Lv Yang]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【姓名：吕阳】

0004.en: [Lifespan: 18]
0004.speaker: 旁白

0004.en: [Cultivation: Qi Refining, Level 1]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【修为：炼气一层】

0004.en: [Talent: Dual Cultivation Prodigy (White)]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【天赋：双修奇才（白色）】

0004.en: [Techniques: Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra (Mastered), Innate Qi Refining and Body Transformation Art (Mastered)]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【功法：阴阳大乐赋（圆满），先天炼气蜕形决（圆满）】

0004.en: [Abilities: None]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【神通：无】

0004.en: [Treasures: None]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【宝物：无】

0004.en: [Hundred Lives Book Pages: 99]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【百世书页数：99】

0004.en: Looking at the updated information on the Hundred Lives Book, Lv Yang stepped into the air, feeling better than ever. Even the venereal disease from his original body was gone.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 看着百世书上更新的信息，吕阳凭虚踏空，感觉状态好到了极点，就连原身的花柳病也不药而愈了。

0004.en: "Hm?"
0004.speaker: 吕阳

0004.en: Suddenly, the pleased expression on Lv Yang's face disappeared. He frowned, stopped, and looked at the Hundred Lives Book again, lost in thought.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 突然，正志得意满的吕阳眉头一皱，猛地停下了动作，随后再度看向【百世书】，陷入了莫名沉思。

0004.en: "...Something's wrong."
0004.speaker: 吕阳

0004.en: He felt like he had missed something.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 好像有什么地方被自己忽略了。

0004.en: Lv Yang began to recall the events of this life. He had become a formal disciple without any trouble and had easily received the Innate Dao Scripture...
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳下意识地回忆了起来，自己这一世没有遇到什么困难，顺利成为正式弟子，顺利得传先天道书

0004.en: In the next second, Lv Yang finally realized what he had missed.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 下一秒，吕阳终于发现自己忽略了什么。

0004.en: [After absorbing your essence, Yu Suzhen broke through to the Qi Refining realm. Unfortunately, the venereal disease was deeply rooted, and she couldn't get rid of it with her true qi. She was bedridden for several months and eventually died from the illness.]
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 【玉素真在采补了你之后已经突破炼气境，奈何花柳深种，真气难除，卧床数个月，最后病重而亡。】

0004.en: In the last life, why did Senior Sister Yu die?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 上一世，为什么玉师姐会死？

0004.en: Since she was a formal disciple, she must have also received the Innate Dao Scripture. As long as she successfully cultivated it and transformed her body, how could she have died from a venereal disease?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 既然是正式弟子，她肯定也得传了先天道书，只要顺利炼成，蜕形化炁，怎么可能因为花柳病而死？

0004.en: She didn't master it?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 她没练成？

0004.en: "Impossible!" Lv Yang shook his head.
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “不可能！”吕阳摇头。

0004.en: The Innate Dao Scripture wasn't that hard to practice. Since Yu Suzhen was able to break through to the Qi Refining realm, she couldn't have been so untalented that she failed to master it in a few months.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 先天道书并不算难练，玉素真既然有能力突破到炼气境，那就算资质再差也不可能几个月都练不成。

0004.en: "Unless... she wasn't practicing the Innate Dao Scripture at all!"
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “除非，她练的就不是先天道书！”

0004.en: At that moment, Lv Yang felt a chill run down his spine.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这一瞬间，吕阳如坠冰窟。

0004.en: The sound of his heartbeat was clearer than ever, his breathing became rapid, and the excitement quickly faded from his face.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 心脏跳动的声音从未如此清晰，呼吸也变得急促了起来，原本兴奋的神情也飞快从吕阳的脸上淡去：

0004.en: "Was the Innate Dao Scripture... prepared specifically for me by Liu Xin?"
0004.speaker: 吕阳
0004.cn: “先天道书.是刘信专门给我准备的？”

0004.en: Lv Yang remembered the scene he had witnessed at the Treasure Refining Hall.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 吕阳想到了之前在炼宝殿看到的场景。

0004.en: The in-name disciple from the hall thought he had achieved enlightenment, but he was actually walking to his doom. Instead of breaking through, he had refined himself into a magic treasure.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 那个炼宝殿的记名弟子自以为大道功成，结果却是自寻死路，非但没突破，反而把自己炼成了法宝。

0004.en: Was his current situation just like that one?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 彼时彼刻，恰如此时此刻？

0004.en: Just then, a familiar and friendly voice called from outside his cave.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 就在这时，洞府外突然传来了一声熟悉而亲切的呼唤：

0004.en: "Junior Brother Lv, are you there?"
0004.speaker: 刘信
0004.cn: “吕师弟，在吗？”

0005.en: Chapter 5: I Will Remember This Grudge
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 第5章 这个仇我记下了

0005.en: "Senior Brother Liu? He has come for me!?"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “刘师兄？他找上门了！？”

0005.en: Hearing the voice outside his cave, Lü Yang's pupils shrank and his face turned grim. He did not reply, and instead concealed his aura.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 听着洞府外传来的声音，吕阳瞳孔骤缩，脸色瞬间阴沉到了极致，不仅没有回应，反而收敛了气机。

0005.en: ".Junior Brother?"
0005.speaker: 刘信

0005.en: The voice came again, but Lü Yang still did not answer. Although he had no proof, he was certain there was a problem with the Innate Dao Scripture he was practicing!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 声音再次传来，吕阳依旧没有回应，虽然没有证据，但他已经笃定自己修炼的先天道书内容有问题！

0005.en: "I was too inexperienced. I can't believe I didn't suspect anything before."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “我还是吃了经验的亏，之前居然没有怀疑。”

0005.en: "The Joyful Union Hall and Sky Mending Peak are closely related, so the cultivation method should be related to dual cultivation. However, the Innate Dao Scripture has nothing to do with it."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “合欢殿和补天峰关系密切，功法内容应该也要和双修有关才对，然而先天道书却和双修毫无关系。”

0005.en: "He tricked me!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “被他骗了！”

0005.en: "But why would he harm me? Although the Chu Sheng Sect is a demonic sect, it still has rules. Private fighting between formal disciples is strictly forbidden. Once discovered..."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “可是为什么他要害我？虽然初圣宗是魔道，但也是有门规的，正式弟子之间严禁私斗，一经发现.”

0005.en: Thinking of this, Lü Yang slapped his forehead.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 想到这里，吕阳猛地一拍脑袋。

0005.en: "How could I have trusted a demonic sect!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “我怎么会信了魔门的邪！”

0005.en: "Once discovered... once discovered... If it's not discovered, then it doesn't count as a private fight?"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “一经发现，一经发现.没被发现，就不算私斗？”

0005.en: The more Lü Yang thought about it, the uglier his expression became. It was all because of his old habits. Liu Xin's every word and action before had fulfilled the duties of a guide for new disciples.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 吕阳越想，神色就越难看，归根结底还是惯性使然，刘信之前的一言一行都履行了接引弟子的职责。

0005.en: He had explained the situation of the inner peaks, the benefits for inner disciples, magical artifacts, pills, and spirit beasts. He had been so helpful and held nothing back, making sure I got everything I was entitled to. Especially at the Treasure Refining Hall, he even told the deacon there to give me the best items.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 除了介绍内门的情况之外，还有内门弟子该有的福利，法宝，丹药，灵兽等等，他都堪称是尽心尽力，毫不藏私，一个没有少自己的，尤其是在炼宝殿，他还吩咐那里的执事给自己拿最好的

0005.en: But it was all a lie!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 结果全都是假象！

0005.en: Everything he did before was just to make me lower my guard, to make me completely trust his goodwill before he handed me the "Innate Dao Scripture"!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 前面的一切，都是为了最后递给自己《先天道书》的那一步，让自己放下警惕，彻底相信他的好意！

0005.en: "Thinking about it now, he probably intended to take everything for himself."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “现在想想，他搞不好还存了私吞的念头。”

0005.en: "After all, if he killed me, all the artifacts, pills, and spirit beasts I received would become his... No wonder he specifically asked for the best!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “毕竟把我弄死了，我拿到的那些法器，丹药，灵兽自然也就全归他了.难怪他特地说要最好的！”

0005.en: That animal!
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: 畜生啊！

0005.en: Just then, the voice from outside the cave was heard again.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就在这时，洞府外却是再度传来了声音。

0005.en: In the next second, with a "crack," the protective formation around Lü Yang's cave exploded, and the door was torn open by a slash of sword light!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 下一秒，只听“咔擦”一声响，吕阳所在的洞府阵法竟轰然爆开，大门更是被一道剑光硬生生撕裂！

0005.en: The door burst open, and Liu Xin, his robes fluttering, strode inside.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 大门洞开，刘信衣袂飘飞，踱步而入。

0005.en: Upon seeing Lü Yang, Liu Xin's face showed a joyful expression, like a farmer seeing a good harvest. He nodded in satisfaction: "Junior Brother, you truly are a talent."
0005.speaker: 刘信
0005.cn: 看到吕阳后，刘信的脸上更是浮现出了一抹丰收般的喜悦，满意地点了点头：“师弟果然是个人才.”

0005.en: Boom!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 轰隆！

0005.en: Before Liu Xin could finish his sentence, Lü Yang exploded!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 刘信话音未落，吕阳便直接炸开！

0005.en: A massive wave of Innate True Qi, carrying the Bone Jade Sword, transformed into a sharp ray of sword light and slashed towards Liu Xin with unstoppable force.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 滔天的先天真炁裹挟着法器骨玉剑，最后化作一道锐利剑光，以所向无前的气势朝着刘信劈斩而去。

0005.en: However, in the next second, the sword light stopped dead.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 然而下一秒，剑光戛然而止。

0005.en: ".A desperate struggle."
0005.speaker: 刘信
0005.cn: “.垂死挣扎。”

0005.en: Liu Xin did not dodge. He simply formed a hand seal, and Lü Yang instantly lost control of his body, as if he had become someone else's puppet!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只见刘信不闪不避，只是掐了个法决，吕阳的身体就瞬间失去了控制，仿佛沦为了别人的傀儡一般！

0005.en: "This Innate Dao Scripture is a wonderful thing." Seeing this, Liu Xin couldn't help but laugh. "A cultivator can transform their body and spirit into a single strand of Innate Qi. It can be used in pills, for refining treasures, or even to increase one's own cultivation. With this treasure, I should be able to reach the late stage of Qi Refining!"
0005.speaker: 刘信
0005.cn: “这先天道书可是好东西啊。”见到这一幕，刘信忍不住大笑：“修炼者将肉身元神化作一道先天之炁，既能入药，也能炼宝，甚至还可以用于增长修为，我得此奇宝，炼气后期想来是有望了！”

0005.en: "You can die content, knowing you helped me break through, Junior Brother."
0005.speaker: 刘信
0005.cn: “能助我突破，师弟你也算死得其所。”

0005.en: As he spoke, Liu Xin began to change his hand seals. Lü Yang felt his consciousness start to fade, as if it was being forcibly erased!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 话音落下，刘信当即开始变化法决，吕阳顿时发现自己的意识开始渐渐消散，似乎正在被强行抹去！

0005.en: At that moment, Lü Yang had a sudden realization:
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 这一刻，吕阳福至心灵：

0005.en: "This is the second half of the Innate Dao Scripture!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “这就是先天道书的下半部！”

0005.en: "The first half is a trap for people to cultivate, and the second half is the real method. It's designed for someone to cultivate the first half and prepare a gift for another!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “上半部是给人修炼的陷阱，下半部才是真正的法门，只等别人修炼了上半部，然后给自己做嫁衣！”

0005.en: This wasn't a cultivation technique, but a method for refining a treasure.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 与其说这是修行功法，不如说是一门炼器之术。

0005.en: But instead of refining an object, it refined a person. It even made the person refine themselves, while the true cultivator hid in the shadows, saving time and effort.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只不过并非以物炼器，而是以人炼器，还是让人自己炼自己，真正的修炼者躲在暗处，省事还省力。

0005.en: It was called a Dao Scripture, but it was truly a demonic art!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 名为道书，实为魔功！

0005.en: "You're clever. I'll give you this life."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “算你厉害，这一世给你了。”

0005.en: Thinking this, Lü Yang stopped resisting and let his consciousness fade. After the initial shock and anger, he had become calm and indifferent.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 想到这里，吕阳干脆也不再反抗，任由意识消散，甚至在惊怒过后，此刻的他反而恢复了冷静淡然。

0005.en: "I've learned my lesson. You can trick me once, but I have countless more chances."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “吃一堑，长一智，你能骗我一次，但是我还有无数次。”

0005.en: "I'll remember this grudge!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “这个仇我记下了！”

0005.en: In the next second, Lü Yang's consciousness fell into darkness.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 下一秒，吕阳的意识就陷入了黑暗。

0005.en: In the void, only the rustling sound of pages turning could be heard.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 虚无之中，只剩下了书页翻动的声音，沙沙作响。

0005.en: [You were killed by Liu Xin, your consciousness erased and transformed into a strand of Innate True Qi. You are dead.]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 【你被刘信炼去意识，彻底化为一道先天真炁，死了】

0005.en: [Current pages remaining in the Hundred Lives Book: 98]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：98】

0005.en: [Starting a new life, you can choose one of the following rewards from your previous life:]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 【重开一世，你可以从前世的以下收获中选择一项：

0005.en: [1: A treasure.]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 一：宝物。

0005.en: [2: Your cultivation level.]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 二：修为。

0005.en: [3: Your lifespan.]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 三：寿命。

0005.en: [4: Give up all rewards and awaken a random talent based on your previous life's experience.]
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 四：放弃所有收获，根据前世经历随机觉醒一门天赋】

0005.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0005.speaker: 刘信
0005.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0005.en: The familiar voice came from the stage. Lü Yang clenched his jaw to control his emotions. He did not look up, but focused his thoughts on the panel in front of him.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 熟悉的声音从台上传来，吕阳咬紧牙关才克制住情绪，没有抬头，而是将思绪放在了眼前的面板上。

0005.en: Treasure, cultivation, lifespan.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 宝物，修为，寿命。

0005.en: If he could, Lü Yang would choose cultivation. But he worried that others would notice, and he wouldn't be able to explain where his cultivation came from.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 如果可以，吕阳当然是想要选修为的，可他又担心被人看出来，到时候无法解释自己修为哪里来的。

0005.en: As for lifespan, he skipped it immediately.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 至于寿命，直接跳过。

0005.en: "Is my only choice the treasure?"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “只能选宝物了么.”

0005.en: Lü Yang frowned. The only treasure he had was the Bone Jade Sword, but without cultivation, he couldn't use it.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 吕阳眉头紧皱，要说宝物，他也就一口骨玉剑勉强拿得出手，可没有修为，空有法器也没办法催动。

0005.en: Just then, Lü Yang's eyes widened.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就在这时，吕阳突然目光一顿。

0005.en: The Hundred Lives Book had just given him a notification.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 因为就在刚刚，百世书突然给了他一道反馈。

0005.en: "This... can also be considered a treasure?"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “这个.也能算宝物？”

0005.en: Lü Yang was first shocked, then thoughtful. Finally, he gritted his teeth and made a decision: Choose one, and keep a treasure from his previous life.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 吕阳先是惊愕，紧接着面露思索之色，最后才一咬牙做出了决定：选一，保留前世获得的一件宝物。

0005.en: In the next moment, something strange happened!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 下一秒，异变突生！

0005.en: Without alerting anyone, the strange event was confined within Lü Yang's dantian. The source of it was a swirling white gas.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 没有惊动任何人，所有异变全部被局限在吕阳的丹田之内，究其源头，赫然是一道氤氲蒸腾的白炁。

0005.en: Innate True Qi!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 先天真炁！

0005.en: The Innate True Qi that Lü Yang had created by refining his organs, flesh, and bones in his past life was also considered a treasure, and he had now exchanged for it!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 前世吕阳化去五脏六腑，皮肉筋骨，最后炼就的先天真炁，居然也算是宝物，如今被他兑换了出来！

0005.en: "Incredible..." Lü Yang lowered his eyes to hide the joy in them.
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “不可思议”吕阳低垂眼睑，遮住了眼中的惊喜。

0005.en: He realized that not only could he control this ball of Innate True Qi as if it were his own arm, but he could also use it to cast the spells from his previous life!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只因他发现，自己不仅可以如臂使指般操纵这一团先天真炁，甚至还可以通过它施展出前世的法术！

0005.en: "Normally, this should be impossible."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “正常情况下，这应该是不可能的。”

0005.en: "To control Innate True Qi, you need the secret method from the second half of the scripture. But I am different, because this Innate True Qi is me!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “因为想要操纵先天真炁，必须通过下半部的秘法。可我不同，因为这道先天真炁就是我自己！”

0005.en: The two were one and the same. For Lü Yang, it was like having a clone at the first level of Qi Refining.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 两者本是一体，对吕阳来说就相当于多了一个炼气一层的分身。

0005.en: "And before I died in my past life, I heard Liu Xin say this Innate True Qi can be used in pills to help break through cultivation realms... This strand of True Qi will be very useful in the future!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “而且前世我死之前，还听刘信说这先天真炁入药后能辅助突破境界.这一道真炁日后还有大用！”

0005.en: After reviewing his gains, Lü Yang began his actions for this life.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 整理完收获之后，吕阳就开始了这一世的行动。

0005.en: First, he was assigned to the Joyful Union Hall again.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 首先依旧是被分到合欢殿。

0005.en: Then, he killed Yu Suzhen.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 然后超死玉素真。

0005.en: But this time, to avoid drawing attention, Lü Yang did not use Senior Sister Yu's primordial yin to break through to the Qi Refining realm. Instead, he fed it all to the Innate True Qi.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 不过这一次，为免引人注目，吕阳并没有用玉师姐的元阴来突破炼气境，而是全部喂给了先天真炁。

0005.en: "This life, I will be cautious and not reckless!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “这一世我要苟住，不浪！”

0005.en: As expected, when Liu Xin, who was waiting outside the door, saw that Lü Yang had not broken through after absorbing Yu Suzhen, he immediately lost interest in him.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 果不其然，守在门外的刘信看到吕阳在采补了玉素真之后居然没有突破，顿时就对吕阳失去了兴趣。

0005.en: Then, Lü Yang waited patiently.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 紧接着，吕阳便耐心地等待了起来，

0005.en: More than ten days later, a disciple from the Joyful Union Hall named "Qin Yu" broke through. Lü Yang watched as Liu Xin came excitedly to take him away.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 十几天后，合欢殿一位叫“秦宇”的弟子突破，吕阳看到刘信闻讯赶来后，兴高采烈地将其带走了。

0005.en: A few days later, Liu Xin announced he was entering seclusion, and a different senior brother took over the duty of guiding new disciples.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 又过了几日，刘信宣布闭关，负责接引弟子的师兄也换了一位。

0005.en: But Lü Yang still did not show himself.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 但是吕阳依旧没有露头。

0005.en: "Who knows what this new senior brother is like. What if he's the same as Liu Xin... Hmm, it's better if I don't stand out."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “天知道这个新来的师兄是个什么样的人，万一也和刘信一样.嗯，我还是别去当出头鸟比较好。”

0005.en: "To be safe, I'll wait another month."
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “稳妥起见，再等一个月。”

0005.en: Another half a month passed. Only after another outer disciple broke through to Qi Refining and was promoted to the inner peak without any issues did Lü Yang choose to break through.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就这样又过了小半个月，直到又有外门弟子突破炼气晋升内门，而且安然无恙后，吕阳才选择突破。

0005.en: With the help of the Innate True Qi, Lü Yang could have broken through without dual cultivation.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 有先天真炁加持，吕阳其实不需要双修也可以突破。

0005.en: However, to hide his secret, he still randomly chose a few outer disciples to absorb yin from.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 不过为了掩人耳目，他还是随便找了几个外门弟子采补。

0005.en: This time, the formal disciple who guided him was much more careless and not as enthusiastic as Liu Xin. He even looked at Lü Yang with some disgust.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 而这一次，负责接引他的正式弟子就要敷衍多了，全然没有刘信那般热情，神色间甚至还有点嫌弃。

0005.en: "This is the Library Pavilion."
0005.speaker: 陌生男1
0005.cn: “这里就是藏书阁了。”

0005.en: After receiving his benefits, the disciple led him to a pavilion and said casually, "Take this token and go inside. Use your contribution points to exchange for whatever cultivation method you want."
0005.speaker: 陌生男1
0005.cn: 领完福利后，对方将他带到了一座阁楼前，随口道：“拿着令牌进去，想要什么功法自己用贡献点换。”

0005.en: After saying that, the disciple left.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 说完，对方便直接扬长而去。

0005.en: Lü Yang, however, felt a sense of relief. There were advantages to being a nobody. The fact that this person looked down on him was exactly what he wanted.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 然而吕阳见状却是倍感安心，小人物也有小人物的好处，来人不将他放在眼里，其实也是正合他意。

0005.en: Thinking of this, Lü Yang turned to look at Sky Mending Peak in the distance.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 想到这里，吕阳又转身看向远处的补天峰。

0005.en: "Liu Xin... hmph!"
0005.speaker: 吕阳
0005.cn: “刘信.哼！”

0005.en: A few days ago, Liu Xin came out of seclusion and successfully broke through to the late stage of Qi Refining. He even became a personal disciple of the Sky Mending Peak's master and was currently enjoying his success.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 数日前，刘信出关，正式突破炼气后期，还一举成为了补天峰峰主的亲传弟子，如今正是春风得意。

0005.en: Lü Yang snorted coldly, looked away, and strode into the Library Pavilion.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 吕阳冷哼一声，收回视线，大步走进了藏书阁。

0005.en: Although he wanted revenge, he was too weak now. Without power, the most urgent task was to cultivate diligently. Everything else could wait until he was strong.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 虽然有心报复，但是他现在太弱了，没有力量，所以当务之急还是努力修炼，一切等强大之后再说。

0005.en: A gentleman's revenge is not too late even after ten years.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 君子报仇，十年不晚。

0005.en: It was just a temporary measure, there was no rush!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 权宜之计，不急一时！

0006.en: Chapter 6: The Demonic Sect's Cultivation Method
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第6章 魔门的修炼方式

0006.en: As he walked into the Library Pavilion, he saw an old man, about sixty years old, lying lazily on a rocking chair. He was enjoying the sun and carefully reading a Daoist book.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 走进藏书阁，迎面就见一个花甲老人正百无聊赖地躺在摇椅上，晒着太阳，拿着一本道书认真翻阅。

0006.en: The moment Lv Yang entered, the old man looked over.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳刚一进门，他就看了过来。

0006.en: "Another new disciple?"
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: “又是新入门的？”

0006.en: The old man said calmly, "Go inside and choose for yourself. Remember to follow the rules written there. If you die, don't blame me for not warning you."
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: 老人淡淡道：“自己去里面挑选吧，记住，按照里面写的规矩来，否则死了可不要怪我没有提醒你。”

0006.en: "Thank you for your guidance, Senior."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “多谢前辈指点。”

0006.en: Lv Yang clasped his hands and walked towards the bookshelves.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳拱了拱手，随后便朝着书架方向走去。

0006.en: Sure enough, as he got closer, the disciple token on his waist seemed to sense something. A faint light appeared and then turned into lines of text in the air.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 果然，他一靠近，腰间的弟子令牌便似乎感应到了什么，微光浮现，而后化作一行行字迹跃然空中。

0006.en: "Lv Yang, disciple of Sky Mending Peak."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “吕阳，补天峰弟子。”

0006.en: "You can receive the secret technique of Sky Mending Peak, the 'Dragon-Tiger Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra,' for free. Also, for your first technique exchange, you can use a loan with no down payment."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “可免费领取补天峰秘传功法《龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋》，同时首次兑换功法，可以免首付贷款兑换。”

0006.en: Lv Yang accepted it without hesitation.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳没有犹豫，直接领取。

0006.en: In the next second, the content of the technique appeared on his disciple token. Lv Yang's mind was soon absorbed in it, and it took a long time for him to come back to his senses.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 下一秒，弟子令牌上就浮现出了功法的内容，吕阳的心神很快就沉浸在其中，许久过后才回过神来。

0006.en: "Why is this technique, like the Innate Dao Scripture, also split into two parts?" Remembering the outcome of his past life, Lv Yang's expression turned ugly. "The Dragon-Tiger Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra... when perfected, it can create a Yin-Yang Dragon-Tiger Qi, ranking as a fifth-grade technique. In theory, it leads directly to Foundation Establishment."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “这功法，怎么和先天道书一样也分了上下两部？”回想起前世的结局，吕阳的脸色有些难看：“龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋，圆满可炼就一道阴阳龙虎炁，位列五品，理论上也是直指筑基的功法”

0006.en: "But they only gave me the Qi Refining part!"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “但是，给我的只有炼气篇！”

0006.en: With the lesson from his previous life, Lv Yang was extremely wary of this kind of incomplete technique. He even thought about giving up on cultivating it.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 有了前世的教训，吕阳对于这种写到一半就太监的功法无比忌惮，甚至一度生出了放弃修炼的念头。

0006.en: But after thinking for a long time, he sighed. "I still have to practice it!"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 不过沉思许久后，他又叹息一声：“还是得练！”

0006.en: If he practiced, there might be hidden dangers in the future.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 练了，未来或许有隐患。

0006.en: If he didn't, he might not even have a future!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 不练，未来都不一定有！

0006.en: Moreover, this "Dragon-Tiger Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra" was truly profound. It could not only absorb a target's vital energy but also their knowledge!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而且这门《龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋》确实玄奥非常，不仅可以采补目标的元气，还能采补对方的知识！

0006.en: Techniques, divine abilities, experience—he could absorb them all!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 功法，神通，经验，他都可以采补！
