0006.en: "Besides that, a cultivator who has been drained by this technique will gradually have their thoughts controlled by the user. They will become devoted and unable to break free, eventually becoming a puppet willing to die for the user. It is a truly bizarre and extreme demonic art."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “除此之外，被这门功法采补过的修士，还会被修炼者渐渐控制思想，从而对修炼者死心塌地，无法自拔，到最后沦为修炼者的傀儡，甚至甘愿为修炼者去死，实在是一门诡谲到极点的魔功.”

0006.en: Lv Yang studied the technique, silently understanding its principles.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳研读功法，默默体悟。

0006.en: After another half hour, he tried to circulate his power. Two streams of True Qi flowed at his fingertips, forming a dragon and a tiger, about to merge into a new True Qi.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 就这样又过了半个时辰，他才尝试运功，指尖两道真炁流转，构筑龙虎，隐隐要化为一道全新真气

0006.en: "Ugh!"
0006.speaker: 吕阳

0006.en: The next second, Lv Yang's face turned pale, and the True Qi at his fingertips disappeared.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 下一秒，吕阳面色一白，指尖真气消散。

0006.en: "It failed? That makes sense. Although I've mastered the theory, I haven't practiced it with someone yet. A dual cultivation technique isn't meant for one person to practice alone."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “失败了？也对，虽然我已经掌握理论了，但是还没有实战过.双修功法毕竟不是给一个人练的。”

0006.en: Lv Yang was not discouraged and turned to look at the dazzling array of bookshelves before him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳也不气馁，转而看向了眼前琳琅满目的书架。

0006.en: According to the rules of the Library Pavilion, as a new formal disciple, he had one more chance to get a technique or divine ability with a zero-down-payment loan.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 按照藏书阁的规矩，作为新入门的正式弟子，他还有一次可以免首付贷款兑换一门功法神通的机会。

0006.en: To Lv Yang's surprise, the Library Pavilion contained more than just demonic techniques.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而让吕阳意外的是，藏书阁内居然不止有魔功。

0006.en: There were also many techniques that were clearly from orthodox righteous sects, covering a wide range of fields like divination, sword arts, and five-element magic. It had everything.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 还有很多明显出自正道名门的功法，而且涉及领域极为广泛，卜卦，剑诀，五行法，堪称应有尽有。

0006.en: "Lesser Heaven Interception Art, Supreme Taiyi Five Elements Righteous Method, True Explanation of Long Life, Divine Empyrean Sword Art..."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “小截天术，上方太乙五行正法，长生真解，神霄御剑真决”

0006.en: Lv Yang browsed for a long time before finally making his choice.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳挑了半天，最后做出了选择。

0006.en: "Divine Empyrean Sword Art, Price: 1000 Contribution Points."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “《神霄御剑真决》，价格：1000贡献点。”

0006.en: "It is detected that this is your first exchange. You can take out a loan with no down payment, with an annual interest rate of thirty-six percent, to be paid off in ten years. Do you wish to exchange?"
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “检测到您是初次兑换，可免首付贷款，每年百分之三十六的利息，分十年还清，请问是否要兑换。”

0006.en: "How much???"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 多少？？？

0006.en: Lv Yang almost cursed out loud. An annual interest rate of 36% meant he had to repay 460 contribution points each year. In ten years, that would be 4,600 points!
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 吕阳差点破口大骂，年利率36%，意味着本金加利息他每年都要还460贡献点，十年就是4600点！

0006.en: A loan of 1,000, but a repayment of 4,600?
0006.speaker: 吕阳

0006.en: This is pure exploitation!
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 敲骨吸髓啊！

0006.en: "Wait... I'm different!"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “等等.我不一样啊！”

0006.en: Lv Yang's eyes suddenly lit up. A high-interest loan with no down payment might be a huge trap for others, but it meant nothing to him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳的眼神陡然一亮，免首付的高利贷，对别人来说或许是一个天坑，但是对他来说却根本无所谓。

0006.en: If things go wrong, I can just restart. What does a loan from a past life have to do with me?
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 大不了重开，前世的贷款和我有什么关系？

0006.en: So, if he wanted, he could get all the techniques and divine abilities in the Library Pavilion for free!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 所以只要他想，完全可以白嫖藏书阁里的功法神通！

0006.en: Since he had no intention of repaying, Lv Yang became much calmer. He immediately waved his hand and bought the "Divine Empyrean Sword Art" without batting an eye.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 既然没打算还，吕阳也淡定了许多，当即大手一挥，连眼睛都没眨一下就贷款买下《神霄御剑真决》。

0006.en: Then, something unexpected happened.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 然后让吕阳意外的事情发生了。

0006.en: When he got the "Dragon-Tiger Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra," the technique's content was given directly. This time, however, Lv Yang only received a message:
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 之前获得《龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋》，是直接给出功法内容，然而这一次，吕阳却只得到了一段消息：

0006.en: "The technique is being delivered and is expected to arrive at your cave residence within three days."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “功法正在派送中，预计三日之内送到你的洞府上。”

0006.en: "Please wait patiently."
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: “请耐心等候。”

0006.en: Looking at the message on his disciple token, Lv Yang was a little confused. What did it mean that the technique was being delivered? Was this technique an original copy that hadn't been duplicated?
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 看着弟子令牌上的消息，吕阳有些疑惑，什么叫功法正在派送中，这功法难道还是孤本，没有抄录的？

0006.en: Despite his thoughts, Lv Yang believed the Chu Sheng Sect wouldn't just take his technique.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 话虽如此，吕阳相信初圣宗还不至于就这样吞了自己的功法。

0006.en: Before leaving, he approached the old man at the entrance of the Library Pavilion again.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 临走前，他又找上了藏书阁门口的那位老人。

0006.en: "This Senior..."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “这位前辈.”

0006.en: As soon as Lv Yang bowed, the old man on the rocking chair spoke: "You don't have to call me Senior. I'm also a disciple in the sect, just a bit older than you."
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: 吕阳刚一行礼，摇椅上的老人就开口道：“算不上前辈，我也是门内弟子，只是比你大了一点而已。”

0006.en: Lv Yang was stunned for a moment, then corrected himself: "This Senior Brother, do you know if the sect provides cultivation partners for us to practice dual cultivation techniques with?"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 吕阳闻言一愣，随后改口道：“这位师兄，你可知道门中是否有适合我们修炼双修功法的鼎炉领取？”

0006.en: Being in a demonic sect, Lv Yang naturally had no intention of staying pure and unstained. He wouldn't shy away from dual cultivation. He would use anything that could make him stronger.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 身处魔门，吕阳当然不会有什么濯清涟而不妖的念头，更不会忌讳双修，一切能让他强大起来的东西他都要利用。

0006.en: "A cultivation partner, huh..."
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: “鼎炉啊”

0006.en: The old man glanced at Lv Yang and suddenly asked, "Did you take out a loan to buy a technique?"
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: 老人闻言瞥了一眼吕阳，突然道：“你贷款购买功法了吗？”

0006.en: Lv Yang paused for a moment, then nodded.
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 吕阳愣了愣，随后点头。

0006.en: "Then you don't need to worry about that."
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: “那你就不需要担心这件事了。”

0006.en: At this point, a curious smile appeared on the old man's face. "This technique loan is annoying, but it's not without its benefits..."
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: 说到这里，老人脸上露出了几分耐人寻味的笑意：“这功法贷虽然令人恼恨，但也不是没有福利的.”

0006.en: "Go back and wait!"
0006.speaker: 老人
0006.cn: “回去等着吧！”

0006.en: Lv Yang returned to his cave residence, completely confused.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳一头雾水地返回了洞府。

0006.en: But he soon understood why the "Divine Empyrean Sword Art" needed time to be delivered and what the "benefit" the old man was talking about really was.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 不过很快，他就明白“神霄御剑真决”为何需要时间派送，以及老人口中的“福利”究竟是什么了。

0006.en: Three days later, a box was delivered to the entrance of Lv Yang's cave residence.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 三日之后，一个箱子被送到了吕阳的洞府门口。

0006.en: Lv Yang carried the box into the cave and opened it.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳将箱子搬进洞府，打开。

0006.en: Then he saw a heroic woman with a curvy figure and sharp phoenix eyes. Her hands and feet were tied, and she was stuffed inside the box.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 然后他就看到了一个身材凹凸有致，一双凤目锐意凛然的英武女子，被绑缚了手脚，塞在箱子正中。

0006.en: Although the woman was not a national beauty, she was naturally attractive.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 女子虽然说不上国色天香，却也是天生丽质。

0006.en: Her plain face, without any makeup, gave her a refined and elegant look.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 一张素颜不染胭脂，反而显出几分出尘的清雅。

0006.en: And because she had been in the stuffy box for too long, her body was covered in shiny beads of sweat, which trickled down her fair neck and into her collar.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而且因为在闷热的箱子里待得太久，她身上此时还挂着晶莹的汗珠，一滴滴顺着白皙的脖颈滚入胸襟。

0006.en: "Demonic Path!"
0006.speaker: 陌生女1
0006.cn: “魔道！”

0006.en: The woman looked at Lv Yang, her eyes filled with a hatred so intense she wanted to cut him into a thousand pieces. At the same time, she seemed to realize her fate, and despair appeared on her beautiful face.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 女子看着吕阳，眼神恨不得将他千刀万剐，同时似乎也联想到了自己的命运，俏脸随之浮现出绝望。

0006.en: Lv Yang frowned at the sight. "Are you... a disciple of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion?"
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: 吕阳见状眉头一皱：“你是.玉枢剑阁的弟子？”

0006.en: "So what if I am?" The woman closed her beautiful eyes, and two lines of clear tears streamed down her fair cheeks. "Just kill me!"
0006.speaker: 陌生女1
0006.cn: “是又如何？”女子闭上美眸，白皙脸颊上缓缓淌落两行清泪：“你杀了我吧！”

0006.en: Lv Yang finally understood.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 吕阳这才恍然大悟。

0006.en: The "Divine Empyrean Sword Art" was the secret divine ability of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion, the leader of the righteous path in the south. He had been wondering where the Chu Sheng Sect got it from.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 《神霄御剑真决》乃是南方正道魁首，玉枢剑阁的秘传神通，之前他还在好奇初圣宗是哪里弄来的。

0006.en: Now he understood.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 现在他明白了。

0006.en: The Dragon-Tiger Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra could absorb a target's knowledge and experience, and the Chu Sheng Sect had directly provided him with a formal disciple from the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋可以采补目标的知识经验，而初圣宗直接给他弄来了一个玉枢剑阁的正式弟子。

0006.en: In other words, if he wanted the "Divine Empyrean Sword Art," he just had to absorb it from her.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 换而言之，他如果想要《神霄御剑真决》，只要采补对方即可。

0006.en: "This way, the technique is passed on, and the disciple's need for a cultivation partner is solved. It's killing two birds with one stone, maximizing the value..."
0006.speaker: 吕阳
0006.cn: “如此一来既传授了功法，又解决了弟子修炼需要鼎炉的问题，一举两得，简直是利用价值最大化”

0006.en: Making the most of everything. This was truly the style of the Saint Sect.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 物尽其用，果然是圣宗作风。

0006.en: Compared to the hard cultivation of the righteous sects, who train through winter's cold and summer's heat, this was the true cultivation method of the demonic path.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 比起名门正道冬练三九，夏练三伏的苦修，这才是魔门的修炼方式。

0007.en: Chapter 7: Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 第7章 神霄御剑真决

0007.en: A few days later.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 数日之后。

0007.en: Inside the cave residence, Lv Yang sat on a cushion, forming a hand seal with his right hand. A speck of spiritual light gathered at his fingertip, finally transforming into a white bone flying sword as thin as a cicada's wing.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 洞府内，吕阳端坐在蒲团上，右手掐诀，指尖处一点灵光凝聚，最后化作一口薄如蝉翼的白骨飞剑。

0007.en: The sword was pale-white and hummed with the sound of thunder when it moved.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 剑呈青白，鸣动时响彻雷音。

0007.en: "Go!"
0007.speaker: 吕阳

0007.en: With a flick of his finger, Lv Yang sent the white bone sword flying out. It transformed into a magnificent streak of light several meters long, its whistling sound like thunder rolling through the sky.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 吕阳屈指一弹，白骨飞剑顿时化作了一道数丈长的恢弘匹练飞纵而出，剑光呼啸好似天雷滚空而过！

0007.en: "What a great sword art!"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: “好剑诀！”

0007.en: Seeing this, a look of joy appeared on Lv Yang's face. He then changed the hand seal, and the white bone sword immediately split into two in mid-air.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 见到这一幕，吕阳脸上顿时浮现出了几分喜色，随后他又转换剑诀，白骨飞剑当即在空中一分为二。

0007.en: In the next second, Lv Yang's figure vanished from his spot, as if teleporting, and reappeared where one of the sword lights was. As he changed the sword seal in his hand, his body moved like a bolt of lightning, darting freely between the two sword lights.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 下一秒，吕阳的身影就消失在了原地，仿佛瞬移一般，直接出现在了其中一道剑光所在的地方，而随着吕阳手中剑诀变化，他的身影就仿佛是化作了一道霹雳电光，在两道剑光之间肆意腾挪。

0007.en: After a long while, Lv Yang stopped, his face filled with excitement.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 就这样过了许久，吕阳才停下动作，一脸兴奋。

0007.en: "Excellent! What an amazing Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art!"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: “好！好一个神霄御剑真决！”

0007.en: This sword art was actually very simple. After mastering it, a cultivator could create multiple sword lights and then instantly move to any of them.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这门剑诀其实很简单，修炼者将其练成之后可以分化出剑光，然后再瞬间移动到分化出的剑光之中。

0007.en: The higher the magic power, the farther the distance of movement.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 法力越高，移动距离越远。

0007.en: If the head of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion were to use it, he could sit in the pavilion and teleport thousands of miles with a single sword strike, taking an enemy's head while chatting and laughing.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 如果是玉枢剑阁的掌教亲自出手，甚至可以端坐在玉枢剑阁，一剑瞬移万里，谈笑间轻取敌人首级。

0007.en: And this was just the basic use of the sword art.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这甚至还只是剑诀的初级变化。

0007.en: It was said that at higher levels, the sword light could manifest the might of divine thunder, but that part of the technique was beyond Lv Yang's reach.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 再往上据说还可以真正将剑光显化出神霄雷霆之威，可惜那部分的功法内容就不是吕阳能染指的了。

0007.en: It wasn't that he couldn't obtain it through cultivation plundering, but that Yun Miaoqing didn't know it herself.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 倒不是他采补不到，而是云妙清自己也不会。

0007.en: But that was normal. After all, a complete "Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art" could not be bought for a mere 1,000 contribution points; 10,000 would be more like it.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 不过这也正常，毕竟如果是完整的《神霄御剑真决》，区区1000贡献点肯定是买不到的，10000点还差不多。

0007.en: "Hmph, how stupid!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “哼，愚笨不堪！”

0007.en: A cold sneer came from behind him. Lv Yang turned to see the woman from the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion looking at him with disgust, disdain, and contempt.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 冷笑声从身后传来，吕阳回过头，却见那位来自玉枢剑阁的女子正一脸厌恶，嫌弃，不屑地看着他。

0007.en: After spending many days together, Lv Yang had gotten to know her quite well.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 多日相处下来，吕阳对其也有了比较深入的了解。

0007.en: The woman's name was Yun Miaoqing, an inner disciple of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion. She studied under Master Shenxiao and specialized in the Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art. She once had a cultivation level of the sixth layer of Qi Refining.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 女子名叫云妙清，玉枢剑阁的内门弟子，师从神霄真人，主修神霄御剑真决，曾经有炼气六层修为。

0007.en: Lv Yang looked at Yun Miaoqing and asked curiously, "Did I use the sword art incorrectly?"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: 吕阳看向云妙清，好奇道：“我的剑诀使错了？”

0007.en: Yun Miaoqing turned her head away. "Do you think I would tell you? Demon, even if you stole my sword art, you're just copying it poorly!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: 云妙清闻言撇过头：“你以为我会告诉你吗？魔头，你就算偷学了我的剑诀，也只是照猫画虎罢了！”

0007.en: "Why must you be like this?"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: “何必呢？”

0007.en: Lv Yang shook his head, walked up to Yun Miaoqing, and said helplessly, "Are you sure you won't tell me? Or are you going to force me to use *that* again?"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头，走到云妙清面前，一脸无奈：“你确定不打算告诉我？还是说你又要逼我用那个吗？”

0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “那个.”

0007.en: A blush appeared on Yun Miaoqing's delicate face, and her beautiful eyes became hazy for a moment. She quickly came to her senses and stared at Lv Yang with deep hatred.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 云妙清精致的俏脸上顿时泛起一抹娇红，美眸迷离了瞬间，旋即清醒过来，带着痛恨死死盯着吕阳。

0007.en: "It's just that demonic technique. Do you think I would yield?"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “不就是那门魔功么，你以为我会屈服吗？”

0007.en: "Even though you say that... you've already yielded once." Lv Yang pointed to the emblem on Yun Miaoqing's chest and said, "You haven't forgotten, have you?"
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: “虽然你这么说.但你已经屈服过一次了哦。”吕阳指了指云妙清胸口的纹章，道：“你不会忘了吧？”

0007.en: "You're lying!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “你胡说！”

0007.en: Looking at the mark on her body, Yun Miaoqing bit her lip in humiliation. "That was only because you took advantage of me when I was weak!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: 看着自己身上的印记，云妙清屈辱地抿起了嘴唇：“那一次只是你趁虚而入罢了！”

0007.en: After speaking, she gripped the pendant around her neck.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 说完，她便握紧了自己脖颈间的吊坠。

0007.en: It was a delicately crafted small sword of white jade, a magic sword that only disciples of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion could possess. It served the same purpose as Lv Yang's disciple token.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 那是一口构造精致的白玉小剑，是只有玉枢剑阁弟子才能拥有的法剑，作用和吕阳的弟子令牌一样。

0007.en: "I am a disciple of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion, and I will never stand with the demonic path. That will never change!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “我是玉枢剑阁的弟子，和魔道不共戴天，这一点绝不会变！”

0007.en: "No matter how powerful your demonic art is, a person's heart cannot be swayed by such evil ways."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “哪怕你的魔功再怎么强大人心是不会因为这些邪魔歪道的蛊惑而改变的。”

0007.en: "My loyalty to the Pavilion will never waver."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “我对剑阁的忠诚也是绝对不会动摇的。”

0007.en: "I swear it on my magic sword!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “我向我的法剑起誓！”

0007.en: As her voice fell, Yun Miaoqing clenched her teeth and looked at Lv Yang with determination, like a pure lotus flower trapped in mud but remaining unstained.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 话音落下，云妙清便咬紧银牙，目光坚定地看向了吕阳，仿佛一朵深陷淤泥却纤尘不染的纯净莲花。

0007.en: Another day later.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 又是一日后。

0007.en: Inside the cave residence, Lv Yang sat on the cushion, with his five centers facing heaven.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 洞府内，吕阳盘坐在蒲团上，五心朝天。

0007.en: After a long time, Lv Yang let out a heavy breath. At the same time, Yun Miaoqing lifted her swan-like white neck and let out a long sigh.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 良久过后，吕阳才重重地吐出一口浊气，同时云妙清也扬起天鹅般白皙的脖颈，发出一声悠然叹息。

0007.en: "You've actually mastered the Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art quite well. There are no major issues. If there are any, they are with external things..."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “神霄御剑真决你其实已经掌握得很熟练了，并没有什么太大的问题，就算有问题，也是在外物上.”

0007.en: Yun Miaoqing's face was red as she spoke weakly.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 云妙清脸色殷红，有气无力地说道。

0007.en: Under Lv Yang's harsh interrogation, she finally gave in. When Lv Yang asked her again, she just snorted coldly and obediently explained:
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在吕阳的严刑拷打之下，她最后还是求饶了，吕阳再问她时，她只是冷哼一声，然后便顺从地说道：

0007.en: "As soon as we disciples of the Sword Pavilion enter the Qi Refining realm, we use a secret method of the sect to forge a Sword Core from precious metals and various external medicines. All the sword techniques in the Pavilion require the aid of a Sword Core to unleash their full power. The higher the quality of the Sword Core, the greater the power of the sword technique."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “我们剑阁的弟子，只要进入炼气境就会用门内秘法，取金精之物，辅以各种外药祭炼出一枚剑丸。剑阁中的所有剑法都需要剑丸的辅助才能发挥全力，剑丸的品质越高，剑法的威力就越大。”

0007.en: After Yun Miaoqing's explanation, Lv Yang finally understood.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 经过云妙清的解释，吕阳这才明白。

0007.en: Currently, when he practiced the Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art, he could only create two sword lights, and their effect was limited to teleportation. His speed had increased, but his attack power was lacking.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 他如今修炼神霄御剑真决，只能分化出两道剑光，而且效果也仅限于瞬移，速度是快了，攻击却不足。

0007.en: However, with the help of a Sword Core, the number of sword lights Lv Yang could create would at least double.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 然而一旦有了剑丸的加持，吕阳分化出的剑光数量起码翻倍。

0007.en: He could also merge his body with the Sword Core, allowing him to unleash astonishing slashes while moving within the sword light. This would give him a great advantage in fights.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 同时他还可以身合剑丸，在剑光之中腾挪的同时爆发出惊人的斩击，凭此与人斗法可谓是占尽上风。

0007.en: In a direct confrontation, Lv Yang would only need to control the Sword Core and create sword lights around him. An opponent surrounded by the sword lights would be trapped.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 正面厮杀中，吕阳只需要驾驭剑丸，然后往四周分化剑光，对方被剑光包围就如同落入了他的瓮中。

0007.en: After that, no matter what methods the opponent used, he could easily dodge them and attack from another direction, leaving them struggling to defend. After a few rounds of this, the opponent would naturally reveal a fatal weakness. Then, with a final, powerful strike, their fate would be sealed.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 此后无论对方施展什么手段，他都可以轻松避开，再从另一个方向杀来，让其疲于招架，如此拉扯上几个回合，对方自然而然会露出致命破绽，到时候他再倾力一斩，对方基本也就在劫难逃了。

0007.en: "That's why the disciples of my Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion are the best fighters in Jiangnan!"
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “所以我玉枢剑阁弟子，斗法乃是江南第一！”

0007.en: Speaking of this, a proud expression appeared on Yun Miaoqing's face.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 说到这里，云妙清的脸上顿时浮现出了傲然之色。

0007.en: However, in the next second, as Lv Yang moved forcefully, the pride on her face vanished, replaced by a blush, and she couldn't help but let out a soft moan.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 然而下一秒，随着吕阳使劲一动，她脸上的傲然之色顿时消散，红晕浮现，忍不住发出了一声鼻音。

0007.en: Yun Miaoqing's eyes were tightly shut. She waited for a moment, but when she realized Lv Yang had stopped moving, she shifted restlessly and opened her eyes.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 云妙清美眸紧闭，默默等待了片刻，却发现吕阳又不动了，有些不安分地扭了扭，随后又睁开双眼：

0007.en: "Demon, you..."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: “魔头，你.”

0007.en: Lv Yang stood up and got dressed. "So the difference was the Sword Core. I also know the forging method now... Well, I'm done with you. You can go rest."
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: 吕阳站起身子，换好衣服：“原来是差在剑丸上，祭炼之法我也知道了.嗯，没你事了，你去休息吧。”

0007.en: Yun Miaoqing: "???"
0007.speaker: 云妙清

0007.en: Suddenly separated, the only emotion left on Yun Miaoqing's face was confusion.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 突然分开，残留在云妙清脸上的情绪就只剩下了茫然。

0007.en: Is he kidding? It's over already?
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: 骗人的吧？这就结束了？

0007.en: What about the plundering?
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: 采补呢？

0007.en: The next second, she snapped back to her senses and subconsciously gripped the magic sword around her neck. "No, this is good... I am a disciple of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion..."
0007.speaker: 云妙清
0007.cn: 下一秒，她又猛然回过神，下意识握紧了脖颈间的法剑：“不，这样就好.我可是玉枢剑阁的弟子”

0007.en: "I need to make some money."
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: “得赚钱了啊。”

0007.en: Walking out of the cave residence, Lv Yang began to think about the future.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 走出洞府，吕阳开始思考未来。

0007.en: "I only have 50 contribution points left. After deducting 30 points for this month's rent for the cave, if I don't earn more, I'll have to move back to the Joyful Union Hall next month."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “我现在只有50贡献点，这个月的洞府房租扣掉30点，再不赚钱，下个月我就得搬回合欢殿住了。”

0007.en: In the Chu Sheng Sect, there were many ways to earn contribution points.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在初圣宗，赚取贡献点的方法有很多。

0007.en: These included, but were not limited to, salaries from holding positions within the sect, selling personal items, rewards from bounties, and sect missions.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 包括且不限于担任宗门内的各级职务薪酬，售卖个人物品，完成悬赏后的报酬，以及宗门任务等等。

0007.en: "But for a disciple like me with no backing, no wealth, and no power, I have no connections for sect positions, most of my personal items are worthless, and I'm not strong enough to complete high-reward bounties. My only option is to take on sect missions and work for the sect just to get by..."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: “可是像我这种无靠山，无财产，无实力的三无弟子，宗门职务没门路介绍，个人物品大部分都不值钱，高价的悬赏也没能力完成，也只有选择宗门任务，给宗门打打工，才能勉强维持生活”

0007.en: The more Lv Yang thought about it, the angrier he became.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 吕阳越想越气。

0007.en: I'm already a cultivator, and I still have to work?
0007.speaker: 吕阳
0007.cn: 我都修仙了，还要打工？

0008.en: Chapter 8: A Slave's Tale of Cultivation
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 第8章 牛马修仙传

0008.en: "If I have to be a worker, so be it!"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “打工就打工吧！”

0008.en: Lv Yang quickly adjusted his mood.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳很快就调整好了情绪。

0008.en: "Strictly speaking, I could commit suicide and restart right now, but the Hundred Lives Book has a limited number of pages. It would be too much of a loss to restart just like this."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “严格来讲，其实我现在就可以自杀重开不过百世书的页数有限，就这样直接重开未免太亏了。”

0008.en: Although he was now a formal disciple, Lv Yang still knew very little about the Chu Sheng Sect, and his knowledge of the cultivation world was limited to what he had read in books. He had already thought about restarting, but to gain an advantage for his next life, he needed to live longer in this one.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 虽然如今成为了正式弟子，但吕阳对初圣宗依旧没有什么了解，对于整个修仙界也仅限于书本上的知识，虽然已经有了重开的念头，但为了下一世能积攒优势，这一世还是应该活久一点。

0008.en: There were countless cave residences on Sky Mending Peak, but only two places stood out. One was the Peak Master's residence, and the other was a tall building.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 补天峰内洞府无数，然而最醒目的地方却只有两处，一处自然是峰主的洞府，另一处则是一座高楼。

0008.en: The building had nine floors and was called the Hall of Merit.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 楼有九层，名为“善功”。

0008.en: Most formal disciples came to the Hall of Merit to trade, post bounties, and accept sect missions, all under the protection of the sect.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 正式弟子之间互相交易，发布悬赏，乃至接取宗门任务大多都会在善功楼进行，可以得到圣宗庇护。

0008.en: Lv Yang walked into the Hall of Merit and approached a counter.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳走进善功，来到了一处柜台前。

0008.en: "Senior Brother, can I accept sect missions here?"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “这位师兄，不知宗门任务可是在这里领取？”

0008.en: "Of course, you... Hmm?"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “废话，你.嗯？”

0008.en: The young Daoist behind the counter glanced at Lv Yang carelessly at first, but his eyes lit up when he saw his handsome face.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 话音落下，只见柜台前的年轻道人先是漫不经心地看了吕阳一眼，看到他的俊俏容貌后又目光一亮。

0008.en: In the next second, a friendly smile appeared on the young Daoist's face.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 下一秒，年轻道人脸上就浮现出了亲切的笑容。

0008.en: "No need to call me Senior Brother. My name is Zhao Xuhe, a deacon disciple at the Hall of Merit. You must be a new disciple, Junior Brother, right? I haven't seen you before."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “叫什么师兄，我叫赵旭河，善功殿执事弟子，这位师弟你应该是新入门的吧？我之前没有见过你。”

0008.en: "I am Lv Yang. Greetings, Senior Brother."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “在下吕阳，见过师兄。”

0008.en: Lv Yang quickly bowed and activated his disciple token to verify his identity.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳赶忙行礼，同时激活弟子令牌验明正身。

0008.en: After looking at the token, Zhao Xuhe's expression softened, and his smile grew even wider. "Not bad, not bad. Junior Brother Lv, you have a fine appearance. Very impressive."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河看了令牌，神情愈发柔和，笑容也愈发灿烂：“不错，不错，吕师弟一表人才，非常不错啊。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe sized him up with a look that made Lv Yang uncomfortable, then suddenly said, "Junior Brother Lv, since you're looking for a sect mission, I have one right here. Or rather, it's a great fortune I can offer you. If you succeed, I guarantee your future in cultivation will be bright."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 只见赵旭河便用一种让吕阳很不自在的目光打量着他，随后突然道：“吕师弟，你既然想要宗门任务，我这里正好有一个任务，或者说是一场富贵可以送给你，如果成了，保你日后仙途广大.”

0008.en: "Really?"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “真的吗？”

0008.en: On the surface, Lv Yang looked interested, but inwardly, he became alert.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳表面露出意动之色，心中却是警惕了起来。

0008.en: "I guarantee it! It couldn't be more real!"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “保真！不能再真了！”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe grinned, pointed towards the top of Sky Mending Peak, and said, "The current Peak Master is looking for a husband for his daughter, and I think you have a fine appearance..."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河咧嘴一笑，对着补天峰顶指了指，道：“当今峰主有意为自家的千金招婿，我看你相貌堂堂.”

0008.en: Lv Yang: "???"
0008.speaker: 吕阳

0008.en: I came here for a sect mission, hoping to earn resources with my own two hands through hard work. And now you want me to be a kept man?
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 我来找宗门任务，是想要靠着自己的一双手，用勤奋和努力来赚取钱财，你现在居然想要我吃软饭？

0008.en: "What, you're not interested?"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “怎么，不乐意？”

0008.en: Seeing Lv Yang's stiff expression, Zhao Xuhe tried to persuade him even more eagerly. "This is a huge opportunity! If you can get into the Peak Master's residence, you'll become a Foundation Establishment disciple. Contribution points, techniques, resources—you'll have everything. This one step will save you sixty years of hard work."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 见吕阳表情僵硬，赵旭河更加积极地劝说道：“这可是泼天的富贵啊，你要是能入了峰主洞府，从此以后那就是筑基弟子，贡献点，功法，资源应有尽有，这一步走对了，能少走六十年弯路.”

0008.en: Despite Zhao Xuhe's extravagant promises, Lv Yang remained unmoved.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 尽管赵旭河说得天花乱坠，吕阳依旧不为所动。

0008.en: In truth, if it was really just about being a kept man, Lv Yang wouldn't have minded.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 其实如果真是吃软饭，吕阳倒也不介意。

0008.en: But what was this place? The Chu Sheng Sect! An orthodox Demonic Sect! With the cautionary tale of Liu Xin fresh in his mind, how could he believe Zhao Xuhe's talk about marriage?
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 可这里是哪儿？初圣宗！魔道正统！有刘信的前车之鉴在，他怎么可能相信赵旭河所谓的招婿之言？

0008.en: There's definitely a catch!
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 肯定有问题！

0008.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang sighed and said, "Senior Brother Zhao, it's not that I don't want to marry in, but I have a problem that is hard to talk about."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 想到这里，吕阳干脆叹了口气，道：“赵师兄，其实不是我不想当赘婿，可我实在是有难言之隐啊。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe was stunned. "A problem that is hard to talk about?"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河闻言一愣：“难言之隐？”

0008.en: "To be honest," Lv Yang said with a look of shame, "I suffer from a venereal disease."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “实不相瞒。”吕阳一脸羞于启齿：“在下身怀花柳之症”

0008.en: As soon as he said this, the warmth on Zhao Xuhe's face instantly cooled.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 此言一出，赵旭河脸上的殷切顿时冷淡了下来。

0008.en: A venereal disease wasn't a big deal; he had ways to cure it. The real issue was why he had it in the first place. The reason behind it was the key.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 花柳病其实不算什么，他都有办法治好，问题在于为什么会得花柳病？这背后的原因才是关键。

0008.en: "Sigh, what a pity."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “欸，可惜了。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe shook his head. No matter how handsome Lv Yang was, the Peak Master would never allow his daughter to become cultivation partners with a man who could get himself sick like that.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 赵旭河摇了摇头，哪怕吕阳容貌再端正，峰主也不可能允许女儿和一个能把自己弄出病来的男人结为道侣的。

0008.en: Lv Yang said respectfully, "Thank you for your concern, Senior Brother."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 吕阳恭敬道：“让师兄费心了。”

0008.en: No one gets angry at a smiling face. Seeing Lv Yang's respectful attitude, Zhao Xuhe's expression softened a little. "In that case, I'll pick a good mission for you."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 伸手不打笑脸人，吕阳如此恭敬，赵旭河面色也好看了几分，道：“既然如此，我给你挑个好任务。”

0008.en: "What kind of mission are you looking for?"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “你想要什么样的任务？”

0008.en: Lv Yang said, "One with high contribution points and is relatively safe."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 吕阳道：“贡献点高，相对比较安全的。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe's smile didn't change, as he had expected this. After all, every new disciple wanted this kind of mission. "I happen to have one right here."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河笑容不变，显然早有预料，毕竟只要是新入门的弟子都想要这种任务：“我这里还真有一个。”

0008.en: With that, he handed Lv Yang a jade slip.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 说完，他便递给吕阳一个玉简。

0008.en: "The Yin-Yang Immortal Flower. It needs to be nurtured with the blood and essence of a Qi Refining cultivator to survive. Sky Mending Peak buys them at the highest price, 150 contribution points per flower."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “阴阳仙葩，需要炼气境修士用精血真气喂养才能成活，补天峰以最高价收购，一朵150贡献点。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe said kindly, "This is a mission issued by the Peak Master himself, with no quantity limit. He'll buy as many as you can grow. And you don't need any special planting skills, Junior Brother. The Yin-Yang Immortal Flower is very resilient. As long as you plant it in your cave residence, it won't wither easily."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河亲切道：“这可是峰主他老人家发布的任务，不限数量，你种出多少就收多少，而且不需要师弟你有相应的灵植手艺，阴阳仙葩适应力极强，只要将它种在洞府里，它就不会轻易枯萎。”

0008.en: Lv Yang was tempted at first, but he soon shook his head again.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳闻言一开始还有些心动，可很快又摇了摇头。

0008.en: Seeing this, Zhao Xuhe frowned. "What's wrong?"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河见状皱眉道：“怎么了？”

0008.en: "Thank you for the guidance, Senior Brother, but..." Lv Yang said with a bitter expression, "I still have to pay next month's rent for my cave residence. I can't afford to buy the Immortal Flower seeds."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “多谢师兄指点，只是”吕阳一脸苦涩：“我还要付下个月的洞府租金，实在无力购置仙葩种子。”

0008.en: "I see."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “原来如此。”

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe also sighed. "I've been through this stage too, Junior Brother. I know it's not easy for you... Fine, I'll help you out."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河同样叹息一声：“师兄我也是从这个阶段走过来的，知道你的不容易.也罢，我来助你好了。”

0008.en: Then, Zhao Xuhe held out his hand. "Give me your disciple token."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 随后就见赵旭河伸出手：“把你的弟子令牌给我。”

0008.en: Lv Yang obediently handed it over. A moment later, he was surprised to find that 500 contribution points had appeared on his token!
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳乖乖递上，片刻后，他就惊讶地发现令牌上居然凭空多出了500贡献点！

0008.en: Zhao Xuhe smiled slightly. "These are your reserve contribution points from the Three Rivers Association. You can use them whenever you need them. Go and buy the Immortal Flower seeds."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 赵旭河微微一笑：“这是你在三河会的备用贡献点，以后需要的时候随用随取，拿去买仙葩种子吧。”

0008.en: Lv Yang frowned. "Senior Brother, isn't this the same as a technique loan? I'm afraid..."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 吕阳眉头紧皱：“师兄，这不是和功法贷一样吗？我怕.”

0008.en: "The Three Rivers Association is a major power in the sect's inner circle. New disciples can even enjoy a 30-day interest-free period on their loans. It's much cheaper than the sect's technique loans."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “三河会是圣宗内门的大势力，新弟子借款还可以享受三十天的免息，可比圣宗的功法贷便宜多了。”

0008.en: "Besides, don't you want to buy Immortal Flower seeds?" Zhao Xuhe's tone was gentle and kind. "A senior brother in our Three Rivers Association specializes in selling them. Since you've taken a loan from us, I'll put in a good word for you so he can sell them to you at cost."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “而且你不是想要购买仙葩种子么？”赵旭河语气和蔼，亲切道：“我三河会就有一位师兄专门卖这个，你既然从我们三河会贷了款，我再帮你说几句，可以让他以成本价将仙葩种子卖给你”

0008.en: "Is there really such a good deal?" Lv Yang's face lit up with pleasant surprise.
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “还有这样的好事？”吕阳一脸惊喜。

0008.en: "It's because I feel a connection with you, Junior Brother." Zhao Xuhe also laughed heartily. "If not for that, I wouldn't tell just anyone about this opportunity!"
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: “那不是看在我和师弟你有眼缘嘛。”赵旭河同样大笑：“若非如此，这等机会一般人我都不告诉他！”

0008.en: After speaking, Zhao Xuhe took out another jade slip and handed it to Lv Yang. "This is that senior brother's communication slip. I wish you a speedy fortune, Junior Brother."
0008.speaker: 赵旭河
0008.cn: 说完，赵旭河又取出一枚玉简递给吕阳，道：“这就是那位师兄的通讯玉简，祝师弟你早日发财啊。”

0008.en: "Thank you, Senior Brother!"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “多谢师兄！”

0008.en: Lv Yang left, thanking him profusely.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳千恩万谢地离开了。

0008.en: Watching his retreating back, a cold smile appeared on Zhao Xuhe's lips before he started looking for his next target in the Hall of Merit.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 而看着他的背影，赵旭河则是嘴角一勾，露出一抹冷笑，紧接着又在善功楼内寻找起了下一个猎物。

0008.en: Lv Yang didn't rush to find the "reliable senior brother" Zhao Xuhe had recommended. Instead, he returned to his cave residence and did some calculations.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 吕阳并没有着急去找赵旭河介绍的“可靠师兄”购买阴阳仙葩，而是先返回洞府，然后算了一笔账。

0008.en: "A loan of 500 contribution points can buy ten Immortal Flower seeds. The annual interest rate is 36%, same as the technique loan."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “贷款500贡献点，可以买十枚仙葩种子，年利率和功法贷一样都是36%。”

0008.en: "Waking up early and working late, watering them with blood essence and spiritual energy, it will probably take a year for them to mature and earn 1500 contribution points."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “每天起早贪黑，用精血浇灌，灵气喂养，预计也需要一年时间才能全部长熟，赚到1500贡献点。”

0008.en: "After paying the rent, I'll only have 1140 contribution points left."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “付完房租，只剩下1140贡献点了。”

0008.en: "The technique loan's principal and interest will be another 460, leaving me with 680. Then the 500 for the flower seeds plus 180 in interest is due..."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “功法贷本金加利息再付460，还剩下680贡献点了，然后购买仙葩的本金500加利息180到期了.”

0008.en: "It's all gone!?"
0008.speaker: 吕阳

0008.en: Where's my money?
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 我的钱呢？

0008.en: With this question in mind, Lv Yang calculated again. He stared at his hands blankly for a long time before coming to his senses, then laughed in anger.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 带着这个疑惑，吕阳又算了一遍，随后一脸茫然地看着自己的双手，许久过后才回过神，顿时气笑了。

0008.en: What a scheme. They didn't even leave me money for food!
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 好家伙，这是都算好了，就连吃饭的钱都不给我留啊！

0008.en: Truly worthy of the Chu Sheng Sect!
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: 不愧是初圣宗！

0008.en: As a sect disciple, you start with debt, then the sect stretches your finances to the limit. The points you earn from missions are just enough to cover expenses.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 作为圣宗弟子，开局先背债，然后就是被圣宗在资金链上极限拉扯，接任务赚来的贡献点只够开销。

0008.en: If you want to earn more and save up, you have to work overtime and take on more missions.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 想要多赚，攒钱，就得多加班，接任务。

0008.en: Otherwise, with the slightest mistake, your financial chain will break, and the huge loans on your back will be the final straw that breaks the camel's back.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 否则稍有不慎，资金链断裂了，他身上背着的几个巨额贷款就会瞬间成为压死骆驼的最后一根稻草。

0008.en: As long as you are willing to endure hardship, you will have endless hardship to endure.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 只要你肯吃苦，你就会有吃不完的苦。

0008.en: To put it bluntly, they use the basic needs of the lower-level disciples to force them to work desperately, all to contribute to the glory of the Chu Sheng Sect.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 说白了，就是拿硬性需求吊着底层弟子，逼迫底层弟子玩命去工作，从而为初圣宗的辉煌添砖加瓦。

0008.en: "Bastards!"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “畜生啊！”

0008.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang couldn't help but curse, then comforted himself:
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 想到这里，吕阳忍不住破口大骂，随后又安慰自己：

0008.en: "I work for the sect, the sect gives me contribution points. The loans and the cave residence take back contribution points. It's a closed loop for the sect, and I get to enjoy the benefits in the middle!"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “我给圣宗打工，圣宗发贡献点，贷款和洞府收贡献点，等于是圣宗自产自销，我在中间坐享其成！”

0008.en: Then, Lv Yang thought of the friendly and attentive Zhao Xuhe and looked at the 500-point loan on his disciple token with a cold sneer.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 紧接着，吕阳又想起了之前亲切殷勤的赵旭河，再看向手中弟子令牌上多出的500贡献点贷款，心中冷笑。

0008.en: "And since you are not kind, don't blame me for not being righteous."
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “而且既然你不仁，就别怪我不义了。”

0008.en: "High-interest loans? I'll just default!"
0008.speaker: 吕阳
0008.cn: “高利贷？我老赖！”

0008.en: Despite saying this, the slave-like situation of the sect disciples still made Lv Yang feel suffocated. The more he thought about it, the worse he felt, and a nameless fire rose within him.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 话虽如此，圣宗弟子的牛马处境还是让吕阳觉得心头憋闷，越想越不是滋味，一股无名火直往上窜。

0008.en: "...Demon?"
0008.speaker: 云妙清

0008.en: Just then, the curtain was lifted. It turned out that Yun Miaoqing had heard Lv Yang's cursing, so she got out of bed to check on the situation.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 就在这时，帘幕掀开，原来是云妙清听到了吕阳破口大骂的声响，这才起身下了床，过来看看情况。

0009.en: Chapter 9: Riches Move the Heart of Men
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 第9章 财帛动人心

0009.en: "Demon, are you in a bad mood?"
0009.speaker: 云妙清
0009.cn: “魔头.你心情不好？”

0009.en: Yun Miaoqing spoke as she looked up at Lv Yang, who was resting with his eyes closed.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 云妙清一边说，一边抬头看向闭目养神的吕阳。

0009.en: "A little."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “是有一点。”

0009.en: Lv Yang sighed and casually explained the difficult situation he was in.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳叹了口气，将自己遇到的窘境随口说了一遍。

0009.en: "This is a demonic sect. It treats its disciples like disposable materials, without any humanity," Yun Miaoqing said softly.
0009.speaker: 云妙清
0009.cn: “这就是魔宗，将门中弟子当作耗材，毫无人性可言。”云妙清轻启朱唇。

0009.en: "Demon... Fellow Daoist Lv, you have good talent and a fine character. Why must you compromise in this demonic sect?" Yun Miaoqing said. "If you remove the restrictions on me and help me escape, I can introduce you to become a disciple of my Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion."
0009.speaker: 云妙清
0009.cn: “魔头.吕道友你天赋不错，心性上佳，又何必在这魔宗委曲求全？”云妙清说道：“只要你解了我身上的禁制，助我逃离魔宗，我可以代为引荐，让你成为我玉枢剑阁弟子”

0009.en: Yun Miaoqing was looking for death, but he had no interest in joining her.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 云妙清想要找死，他可没兴趣奉陪。

0009.en: When poor, one should focus on improving oneself. The urgent task was still how to raise his own strength.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 穷则独善其身，当务之急还是如何提升自己。

0009.en: After careful consideration, Lv Yang did not buy the Yin-Yang Immortal Flower. Instead, he spent all his money on ten Great Yuanqi Pills that could increase his cultivation.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 斟酌再三之后，吕阳没有去买什么阴阳仙葩，而是倾家荡产购入了10枚可以增长修为的元气大丹。

0009.en: "This life has basically reached a dead end."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “这一世基本已经走到死局了。”

0009.en: "After all, I don't plan to repay the loan, nor am I willing to waste decades as a workhorse. When the loan is due, I will surely die without a burial place."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “毕竟我既不打算还贷款，也不愿意浪费几十年时光当牛马，等贷款时间一到肯定是死无葬身之地。”

0009.en: "So I must use this time to improve myself as quickly as possible!"
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “所以我必须趁着这段时间，尽快提升自己！”

0009.en: Lv Yang had already made up his mind. When he reincarnated into his next life, he would choose to keep his cultivation. To do that, he had to raise his strength to a higher level as soon as possible.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳已然打定主意，下一世重开时他要选择修为，而为此他必须尽快将自己的实力提升到更高层次。

0009.en: "If my cultivation is too low, Liu Xin, who was present at the time, might see through it. So I must at least reach the same realm as he was." Lv Yang thought to himself, "I need to reach the mid-stage of Qi Refining at least, and use a breath-concealing technique. Only then can I possibly deceive him."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “如果修为太低，说不定会被当时在场的刘信给看出来，所以最起码也要提升到和当时的他相同的境界。”吕阳在心中思忖：“至少得是炼气中期，再搭配一门敛息法决，这样才有可能瞒过他。”

0009.en: Lv Yang dared to think this way because he was confident.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳敢这么想，自然是有把握的。

0009.en: The Qi Refining realm has ten layers, divided into early, middle, late, and peak stages. Within these smaller stages, there are basically no bottlenecks. One can break through simply by accumulating enough energy.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 因为炼气境共十层，有初，中，后，圆满之分，小境界之内基本没有瓶颈，只需要堆量就可以突破。

0009.en: What truly trapped many Qi Refining cultivators were the bottlenecks between the smaller stages.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 真正困住一众炼气修士的是突破小境界的瓶颈。

0009.en: From the early to middle stage, middle to late stage, and late to peak stage, the difficulty increased exponentially, preventing countless cultivators from advancing.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 从炼气初期到中期，从中期到后期，从后期到大圆满，难度几乎是成倍叠加，让无数修士寸进不得。

0009.en: "According to my calculations, ten Great Yuanqi Pills plus the spiritual energy from my cave residence are enough for me to break through to the third layer of Qi Refining. In fact, this is the cultivation level of most disciples in the sect. They improve by spending a lot of time and gaining seniority, only to get stuck at the bottleneck of the early Qi Refining stage and become workhorses for the sect."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “按照我的计算，10枚元气大丹加上洞府灵脉，足够让我突破到炼气三层了。事实上这也是门内大部分弟子的修为，靠着熬时间和熬资历提升，最后卡在炼气初期的瓶颈，沦为圣宗的牛马”

0009.en: If nothing unexpected happened, Lv Yang would be one of them.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 如果不出意外，吕阳也会是其中之一。

0009.en: But in this life, he held an unknown variable in his hands.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 然而这一世，他的手里却有一个变数。

0009.en: With a thought, a wisp of steaming white Qi appeared in Lv Yang's hand. It moved like an extension of his arm, sometimes taking the shape of a sword, other times turning into thick smoke.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳心念一动，手里顿时浮现出了一道氤氲蒸腾的白炁，如臂使指般时而变作剑形，时而化作浓烟。

0009.en: Innate True Qi!
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 先天一炁！

0009.en: "According to Liu Xin, the greatest use of Innate True Qi is to help people break through bottlenecks. His own breakthrough to the late stage of Qi Refining was definitely thanks to it."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “按照刘信的说法，先天一炁最大的作用其实是帮人突破瓶颈，他能突破炼气后期肯定有它的功劳。”

0009.en: Liu Xin could use it to break through to the late stage of Qi Refining.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 刘信能用它突破炼气后期。

0009.en: It shouldn't be a problem for me to use it to break through to the mid-stage.
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: 我用它突破炼气中期，不是问题。

0009.en: "As long as I break through to the mid-stage of Qi Refining, this life won't be a waste. At worst, I can just reincarnate immediately. With a higher cultivation in the next life, my starting point will be better!"
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “只要突破炼气中期，这一世就不算白来，大不了立刻重开，下一世修为更高，我的起点也能更好！”

0009.en: A moment later, a voice came from outside his cave residence.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 片刻过后，洞府外传来了声音。

0009.en: His Great Yuanqi Pills had arrived.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 他的元气大丹送到了。

0009.en: Lv Yang pushed the door open and saw a woman standing outside. She was dressed in simple clothes, with a beauty that matched Yun Miaoqing's, and a figure that was even more voluptuous.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳推门而出，却见洞府外站着一位身穿素衣，容颜不下于云妙清，身材丰腴甚至更胜一筹的女子。

0009.en: "I am Qingchen. Greetings, Junior Brother Lv." The woman curtsied and then smiled softly. Her laugh seemed to have a magical quality that captivated the heart, making one feel favorable towards her. "I have been ordered to deliver the Great Yuanqi Pills you purchased. Please take out your token for verification."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “妾身清尘，见过吕师弟。”女子万福一礼，而后轻声一笑，笑声仿佛具有魔力一般沁人心脾，让人情不自禁对她生出好感：“奉命押送师弟你购买的元气大丹，还请师弟将令牌拿出来验收。”

0009.en: Lv Yang knew the process and did as he was told.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳知道流程，当即照办。

0009.en: As they completed the transaction, Fairy Qingchen probed gently, "Junior Brother, you were able to buy so many pills. Did you come into a fortune somewhere?"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 两人交接之余，这位清尘仙子还在轻声试探：“师弟此番能购买这么多丹药，莫非是在哪里发了财？”

0009.en: "What are you talking about, Senior Sister?"
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “师姐说的哪里话。”

0009.en: Lv Yang shook his head with a bitter look. "I just took out several loans. I was thinking of improving my cultivation so I could take on some high-paying missions."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头，一脸苦相：“只是借了好几笔贷款，正想着提升修为，也好去接一些报酬高的任务。”

0009.en: "I see."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “原来如此。”

0009.en: Fairy Qingchen nodded with a look of concern. "Junior Brother, you don't have to be so modest. Which of us formal disciples doesn't have a few loans?"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 清尘仙子点了点头，一脸关切：“师弟也不必妄自菲薄，我们这些正式弟子哪个身上没有几笔贷款？”

0009.en: "But... if you don't mind me being direct, Junior Brother, you still don't know how to be flexible."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “不过.恕清尘直言，师弟你还是不懂得变通。”

0009.en: "Oh?"
0009.speaker: 吕阳

0009.en: Seeing that Lv Yang was interested, Fairy Qingchen smiled faintly. "There are only so many sect missions. How could you possibly repay so many loans just by doing missions?"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 见吕阳来了兴趣，清尘仙子微微一笑：“宗门任务就那么多，光靠任务怎么可能还得清那么多贷款？”

0009.en: "In the Holy Sect, you'll never get rich by following the usual path," Fairy Qingchen said softly. "I thought you had found a cave residence left by a senior brother and received his inheritance, which is why you made a fortune. That's why I was bold enough to ask, but it seems that's not the case."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “在圣宗，如果只知道走寻常路是不可能发财的。”清尘仙子柔声道：“妾身之前还以为师弟你是探寻到了哪一位师兄留下的洞府，收了遗泽才大赚一笔，这才厚颜开口询问，没想到并非如此。”

0009.en: "A cave residence..."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “洞府.”

0009.en: Lv Yang's eyes lowered, his expression unreadable, but his tone sounded intrigued. "I am slow-witted. Could Senior Sister please explain in detail?"
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: 吕阳眼睑低垂，眼神古井无波，语气却是做出了一副心动的模样：“在下愚钝，还请师姐详细说说。”

0009.en: "Does Junior Brother know that the Holy Sect was established in the 'Cloud Sea of Reaching Heaven'?"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “师弟可知，圣宗乃是在‘接天云海’立派。”

0009.en: Fairy Qingchen said calmly, "Within the Cloud Sea, besides the Four Inner Peaks, there are many other peaks established by former true disciples and elders."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 清尘仙子淡淡道：“云海之内，除了内门四峰之外，还有许多山峰，都是昔日真传弟子和长老所立。”

0009.en: "However, the path of cultivation is long, and many have fallen over the years. But after they fall, their cave residences are not removed. They remain in the Cloud Sea. Although there are some risks, each one is an opportunity. Any small find can be exchanged for a large number of contribution points!"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “然而仙途漫长，多年来总有人陨落。然而他们陨落后，山峰洞府却不会被撤销，而是就此留在了云海内，虽然有一定的风险，但有一座算一座都是机缘。随便一点收获都能换取大量贡献点！”

0009.en: "If you are interested, Junior Brother, I recently discovered a relatively safe cave residence..."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “师弟你若是有兴趣，妾身最近正好发现了一座相对安全的洞府”

0009.en: Really? I don't believe it!
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: 真的吗？我不信！

0009.en: Lv Yang sneered inwardly. Fairy Qingchen's persuasive manner was just like Liu Xin from his previous life, who tricked him into cultivating the Innate Dao Scripture.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 吕阳心中冷笑，只因清尘仙子这循循善诱的模样，实在是像极了上一师骗自己修炼先天道书的刘信。

0009.en: This is a trap!
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 这是在钓鱼啊！

0009.en: What cave residence opportunity? It's just bait.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 什么洞府机缘，鱼饵罢了。

0009.en: It seems I've revealed my wealth. Seeing a new disciple like me buy so many spirit pills, she wants to trick me into going out so she can kill me and take them for herself.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 看来是露富了，见我一个刚入门的弟子购买了这么多灵丹，想要把我骗出去宰了，将灵丹据为己有？

0009.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang showed a look of interest. "I need to think about it."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: 想到这里，吕阳面露心动之色：“在下需要考虑一下。”

0009.en: "There's no hurry," Fairy Qingchen nodded. "The verification is complete. You can contact me after you've considered it."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “此事不急。”清尘仙子闻言点了点头：“验收手续已经办好了，师弟你回去考虑好之后可以联系我”

0009.en: "I've thought about it. I'm not going."
0009.speaker: 吕阳
0009.cn: “考虑好了，不去。”

0009.en: Seeing the transaction was complete, Lv Yang picked up the bottle of pills without another word and returned to his cave, leaving Fairy Qingchen standing alone.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 眼见手续办完，吕阳二话不说拿起装着灵丹的瓶子就返回了洞府，只留下清尘仙子一个人站在原地。

0009.en: A moment later, the recovering Fairy Qingchen nearly ground her teeth to dust, her pretty face filled with killing intent. "This Lv Yang... how dare he trick me!"
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 片刻过后，反应过来的清尘仙子差点咬碎银牙，一张俏脸更是煞气毕露：“这个吕阳.竟然敢耍我！”

0009.en: Turning to leave, Fairy Qingchen soon arrived at another cave residence.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 转身离去，清尘仙子很快又来到了另一处洞府。

0009.en: Inside the cave, a young Daoist in fine robes had been waiting. Seeing Qingchen's unpleasant expression, he frowned as well.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而在洞府里，一位身穿华服的青年道人早已等候多时，见清尘仙子脸色难看，顿时一同皱起了眉头：

0009.en: "You didn't succeed?"
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “没成功？”

0009.en: Fairy Qingchen shook her head. "This person... is a bit too cautious."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 清尘仙子摇了摇头：“此人.有些过于谨慎了。”

0009.en: "And Senior Brother Zhao, he borrowed money but didn't buy the Yin-Yang Immortal Flower. Instead, he bought pills. I suspect he never intended to repay the money at all."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “而且赵师兄，此人借了钱却没有去买阴阳仙葩，反而买丹药，我怀疑他恐怕根本就没有想过还钱。”

0009.en: "He wants to default on his debt? In his next life!"
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “想赖账？下辈子吧！”

0009.en: Zhao Xuhe sneered and shook his head. "Did you know that the sect secretly puts a price on every new disciple?"
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: 赵旭河闻言冷笑着摇了摇头：“你可知道，每一个新入门的弟子，圣宗早就在暗中为他标好了价格。”

0009.en: "And the amount a disciple can borrow from the sect will never exceed his price. This is to ensure that the sect can recover its costs no matter what happens. Flesh and blood, organs, soul... these are all valuable things, more than enough to repay the debt."
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “而一个弟子能在圣宗内借贷到的款项，绝对不会超过他的价格，为的就是确保无论发生什么情况圣宗都能收回成本。骨肉，五脏，魂魄.这些可都是值钱的好东西，用来还钱绰绰有余了。”

0009.en: "He wants to improve his cultivation? Let him."
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “他想要提升修为？让他提升好了。”

0009.en: "As long as he's still here, a higher cultivation level makes him even more valuable."
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “只要人还在，修为更高反而更值钱。”

0009.en: Zhao Xuhe grinned, a bloody taste seeming to flow between his teeth. "At that time, not only will we not lose, we might even make a profit."
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: 赵旭河咧嘴一笑，唇齿间似乎都流淌着血腥味：“到时候我们非但不亏，说不定还可以赚上一笔呢。”

0009.en: "Besides, he may have the money to buy these pills, but he might not have the life to use them, right?"
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: “何况这灵丹他有钱买，却不一定有命用，不是吗？”

0009.en: "Senior Brother, you mean..."
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: “师兄的意思是”

0009.en: Zhao Xuhe nodded slightly and said meaningfully, "Many things are fine as long as they are not discovered."
0009.speaker: 赵旭河
0009.cn: 赵旭河微微点头，意有所指道：“很多事情，只要不被发现就行了。”

0009.en: Upon hearing this, Fairy Qingchen's beautiful eyes lit up.
0009.speaker: 清尘
0009.cn: 此言一出，清尘仙子顿时美眸微亮。

0010.en: Chapter 10: A Dark Night for Murder
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 第10章 月黑杀人夜

0010.en: Inside the cave residence, in a quiet room.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 洞府内，一间静室。

0010.en: Lv Yang sat cross-legged and began to break through to the next level.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳盘膝而坐，开始冲关。

0010.en: With the spirit pill in his stomach, and after constantly absorbing energy from Yun Miaoqing for the past half-month, his cultivation level quickly reached its limit.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 灵丹入肚，再加上这小半个月来他不断采补云妙清，他的修为很快就抵达了某个趋近于极限的状态。

0010.en: "Boom!"
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: “轰隆！”

0010.en: The next moment, as if stepping up to a new level, Lv Yang felt a powerful True Qi roar inside him like a rushing river, greatly boosting his spirits.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 下一秒，仿佛走上了一层台阶，吕阳只觉得一股磅礴真气在体内呼啸，奔腾如江河，让他精神大振。

0010.en: Second level of Qi Refining!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 炼气二层！

0010.en: "There are no bottlenecks before the fourth level of Qi Refining. As long as I have enough resources, I can reach it with time. But it seems I'm out of time now."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “炼气四层以前没有瓶颈，只要资源足够，磨时间也能达到不过目前看来，我恐怕没有时间了。”

0010.en: The existence of Fairy Qingchen gave Lv Yang a sense of crisis.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 清尘仙子的存在激起了吕阳的危机感。

0010.en: He couldn't forget that in his previous life, Liu Xin had openly charged into his cave. If Liu Xin could do it, why couldn't Fairy Qingchen?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 他不会忘记，上一世刘信可是光明正大地杀进了自己的洞府，刘信能做到，清尘仙子难道就不行吗？

0010.en: Even the cave residence isn't safe!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 洞府也不可靠！

0010.en: "The only thing I can truly rely on is my own cultivation and strength!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “真正可靠的还是自身的修为和实力！”

0010.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang gritted his teeth, took out all his remaining spirit pills, and swallowed them all at once. Then, he called for Yun Miaoqing again.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 想到这里，吕阳干脆一咬牙，直接取出剩下的所有灵丹囫囵吞枣般全部咽下，然后又叫来了云妙清。

0010.en: Although this was wasteful, and at least thirty percent of the pills' effects were lost, it was the fastest way to increase his cultivation. In Lv Yang's view, as long as he could break through to the third level, the pills were well worth it.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 虽然这么做有些暴殄天物，灵丹至少三成的药效都被浪费掉了，但同时这样也能让他以最快的速度提升修为。而在吕阳看来，只要可以突破炼气三层，这些灵丹就算是物尽其用，没有白买了。

0010.en: Time flew by, and three days and nights passed in a flash.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 时光飞逝，眨眼就是三天三夜。

0010.en: During this time, Lv Yang didn't eat or drink. He absorbed so much energy from Yun Miaoqing that she became as limp as mud. Finally, he felt himself break through a thin barrier.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这期间，吕阳不吃不喝，更是几乎将云妙清采得瘫软如泥，终于是感觉自己冲开了一层薄薄的屏障。

0010.en: "...I did it!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳

0010.en: Lv Yang looked inside his body and felt a vast True Qi, like a great river, flowing through his meridians. It seemed immense, but he knew he couldn't advance any further.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳内视全身，只觉得奇筋百脉间流淌着江河一般的庞大真气，看似浩瀚，实则再无法有丝毫进步。

0010.en: At first glance, it seemed his cultivation had reached a state of perfection.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 乍看之下，仿佛修行至此已经圆满。

0010.en: "So this is the bottleneck..."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “这就是瓶颈”

0010.en: One step further was the fourth level of Qi Refining, a leap from the early stage to the middle stage. In the Chu Sheng Sect, disciples at this level could hold positions of responsibility.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 再往上一步，就是炼气四层，实现初期到中期的跨越，放在圣宗也是可以担任一定职位的优秀弟子。

0010.en: Lv Yang didn't stop or dare to relax. He directly took out the strand of Innate True Qi.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳没有停歇，更不敢放松，直接取出了先天一炁。

0010.en: "Continue!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “继续！”

0010.en: He activated the Innate True Qi, then controlled his own True Qi to swallow it whole. He watched as his True Qi surged, flowing into his Dantian like a hundred rivers returning to the sea.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 先天一炁运转，随后吕阳便操纵自身真气将其一口吞没，而后坐视真气暴涨，百川归海般涌入丹田。

0010.en: As the Innate True Qi was consumed, Lv Yang felt the bottleneck that had trapped him, once as immovable as a mountain, slowly weaken. When the Innate True Qi was completely used up, the invisible barrier melted like ice and snow, collapsing in an instant!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 随着先天一炁的不断消耗，吕阳很快就感觉到原本已经将自己卡死，如山岳一般难以逾越的瓶颈被一点点削弱，直到先天一炁彻底耗尽，那一道无形的瓶颈更是如冰雪消融，顷刻间土崩瓦解！

0010.en: In the dim, quiet room, Lv Yang suddenly opened his eyes.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 昏暗的静室内，吕阳陡然睁开双眼。

0010.en: His gaze was as sharp as a torch, and the dark room seemed to brighten.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 目光如炬，虚室生白。

0010.en: Another day and night had passed in the blink of an eye. From this moment on, Lv Yang's strength was worlds apart from what it had been just a few days ago!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 眼睛一闭一睁，就又是一个日夜，然而从这一刻起，吕阳的实力已然和几天前的自己有了天壤之别！

0010.en: "The middle stage of Qi Refining is completely different from the early stage." Lv Yang felt the changes in his body with a look of joy. "If the True Qi in the early stage was a small river, then the middle stage is a vast sea! It's more than ten times stronger! Only at this point can I be considered a true cultivator..."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “炼气中期，和初期简直不像是一个境界。”吕阳感受着体内变化，面露喜色：“如果说初期的真气是一条小河，那中期就是一座江海！简直翻了十几倍不止！到了这一步，才算是真正的修士”

0010.en: In the early stage of Qi Refining, True Qi was limited, and every magical art had to be used sparingly.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 炼气初期时，真气有限，什么法术神通都得省着用。

0010.en: But after advancing to the middle stage, he no longer had to worry about that. He could use common magical arts at will, and the consumed True Qi could be restored in just a few breaths.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而晋升炼气中期后，基本就不需要再担心这些，寻常法术信手拈来，消耗的真气几个呼吸就能补上。

0010.en: "Excellent! Excellent!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “不错！不错！”

0010.en: Lv Yang walked out of the quiet room and took out a Bone Jade Sword. With a thought, the sword instantly split into ten beams of light, enveloping the entire cave.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳走出静室，取出一口白骨飞剑，心念一动，飞剑瞬间分化出了十道剑光，将整个洞府笼罩在内。

0010.en: Whoosh—!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 哗哗——！

0010.en: The sword lights whistled sharply. Lv Yang performed the Divine Firmament Sword Control Art, his body merging with the light. He felt an incredible sense of freedom and satisfaction.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 霎时间，只见剑光呼啸凌厉，吕阳施展神霄御剑真决，身合剑光，一时间只觉得神舒意畅到了极致。

0010.en: "I really have to thank Liu Xin!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “还要多亏了刘信！”

0010.en: "Without this strand of 'Innate True Qi' that was perfectly compatible with me, I would have never been able to break through. I would have been stuck at the third level of Qi Refining for years!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “如果没有这一道和我完美适配的‘先天一炁’，我根本不可能突破，至少要在炼气三层停滞数年！”

0010.en: "No wonder Liu Xin gave up the Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra to practice that Innate Dao Scripture."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “怪不得刘信会放弃阴阳大乐赋，去修炼那先天道书。”

0010.en: "Unfortunately, his intentions were corrupt. He used people as medicine. Who knows how many he killed after obtaining it? It was all because of the Innate Dao Scripture."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “可惜立意不正，以人为药，刘信拿到它之后不知道造成了多少杀孽，一切都是因为先天道书而起。”

0010.en: "Such a邪功 should be mine to use!"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “如此邪功，合该为我所用啊！”

0010.en: A sudden greed emerged in Lv Yang's heart.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳心中陡然浮现出了一股贪念。

0010.en: "No rush, be patient... Maybe in the next life, there's still plenty of time..."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “不急，再忍忍.下辈子再说，来日方长”

0010.en: As Lv Yang was thinking, his eyebrows suddenly raised. He looked toward the entrance of the cave because one of his sword lights had just been triggered.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 就在吕阳思索之际，突然，他眉毛一扬，看向了洞府大门，只因他分出的一道剑光刚刚被人触动了。

0010.en: "Someone's here?"
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “有人？”

0010.en: A cold glint flashed in Lv Yang's eyes. He felt a bit of relief that he had made the decisive choice to break through quickly, even if it meant wasting resources.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳眼中顿时闪过了一抹寒光，同时也有几分庆幸，还好他当机立断，宁愿浪费也要尽快突破修为。

0010.en: If he hadn't, he would still be in seclusion, completely unaware of the outside world. Wouldn't that have been certain death?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 若非如此，他现在正值闭关，对外界毫无察觉，岂不是必死无疑？

0010.en: "I must take this as a warning."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “当引以为戒啊.”

0010.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang quickly concealed his newly advanced aura. The killing intent in his heart grew stronger, like a hunter waiting for his prey.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 想到这里，吕阳迅速收敛了刚突破的气机，心中杀意则是愈演愈烈，仿佛一位猎手在静等猎物上门。

0010.en: "Click."
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: “咔擦。”

0010.en: With a soft sound, the cave door was silently pried open. Three figures slipped in one after another.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 伴随着一声轻响，洞府大门被悄无声息地撬开，紧接着，就见三道身影前后从洞府外偷偷溜了进来。

0010.en: The three were dressed in black and wore masks, their True Qi completely hidden. Hiding in the dark, Lv Yang was impressed. If he hadn't broken through and reached a higher cultivation level, he might not have seen through their disguise and would have thought they were just three ordinary people. Their skill in concealing their aura was truly remarkable.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 三人身穿黑衣，还带了面具，一身真气分毫不露，吕阳躲在暗处看得啧啧称奇，若非他已经突破，修为更高，恐怕都看不出他们的底细，还以为只是三个普通人，这份敛息的本事称得上精妙。

0010.en: The leader of the three men in black gave a hand signal without speaking. The others understood and quickly spread out to search the cave.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 三人中为首的黑衣人比了个手势，没有说话，其他人也是心领神会，迅速散开，就要在洞府内搜寻

0010.en: "Whoosh!"
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: “哗哗！”

0010.en: The next moment, the man in black at the front saw a blur, and a brilliant sword light, whistling loudly, appeared right before his eyes!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 下一秒，走在最前面的黑衣人只觉得眼前一花，随后一道璀璨的剑光就带着呼啸剑鸣来到了他眼前！

0010.en: "Not good!"
0010.speaker: 陌生男1
0010.cn: “不好！”

0010.en: The man's face changed drastically. He had no time to defend himself and could only roll to the side to dodge. But no matter how fast a person is, how can they be faster than a flying sword?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 黑衣人瞬间面色大变，根本来不及防御，只能侧身翻滚试图躲避，可人在快，又怎么可能快过飞剑？

0010.en: Swish—!
0010.speaker: 旁白

0010.en: The sword light flashed, and a pillar of blood shot into the air!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 剑光一闪，血柱冲天！

0010.en: "Middle stage of Qi Refining!?"
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: “炼气中期！？”

0010.en: The leader of the men in black was clearly experienced. He immediately identified Lv Yang's cultivation level from the power and quality of the sword light and cried out in shock.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 为首的黑衣人显然是个有眼力的，从剑光的威力和成色上立刻就看出了吕阳的修为，当场惊叫出声。

0010.en: At the same time, he was cursing inwardly.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 同时更是在心中破口大骂。

0010.en: Damn you, Qingchen!
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: 恁特娘的清尘！

0010.en: This is a newly-admitted disciple? An easy target?
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: 这特么是新入门的弟子？好捏的软柿子？

0010.en: And this Lv Yang, who could have easily crushed the three of them with his middle-stage cultivation, resorted to deception and a sneak attack?
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: 还有这个吕阳明明炼气中期完全可以正面碾压他们三个初期了，结果居然还来骗，来偷袭他们？

0010.en: What a dog!
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: 有狗啊！

0010.en: Seeing the sword light approach, the leader formed a hand seal to create a protective barrier of light while yelling, "A misunderstanding! This is all a misunderstanding..."
0010.speaker: 陌生男2
0010.cn: 眼看剑光飞来，黑衣人一边掐诀放出一道玄光护持己身，一边赶紧大声道：“误会！这都是误会.”

0010.en: "Boom!"
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: “轰隆！”

0010.en: Lv Yang paid him no mind. The sword light slashed horizontally, nearly shattering the man's protective barrier. At the same time, a wave of True Qi roared out from the darkness, like a tidal wave, finally forming a giant hand with clear palm lines that grabbed another man in black.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吕阳充耳不闻，剑光横斩，瞬间将黑衣人的护体玄光劈得濒临破碎，同时黑暗之中又有一团真气呼啸铺开，宛若惊涛骇浪，最后化作一只掌纹清晰，数丈大小的大手直接捉住了另一个黑衣人。

0010.en: Splat!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 噗嗤！

0010.en: The next moment, the giant hand squeezed hard, crushing the second man in black. His bones snapped, and a mix of red and white splattered everywhere.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 下一秒，大手便猛然发力，直接将第二位黑衣人捏得爆裂开来，筋断骨折，红的白的溅得到处都是。

0010.en: Seeing such a brutal scene, the leader's eyes widened in fury and disbelief.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 如此凶残的一幕，看得为首黑衣人目眦欲裂。

0010.en: Meanwhile, Lv Yang looked on with a satisfied expression.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 另一边，吕阳却是一脸满意。

0010.en: "This Innate True Qi Great Hand Seal is quite good. It's not very powerful against someone at the same level, but it's perfect for crushing those at a lower level."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “这先天一炁大手印还真是不错，虽然同境界显现不出多少威力，但用来打低境界却是一拿一个准。”

0010.en: As he thought, the sword lights did not stop.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 思索之余，剑光也是不停。

0010.en: More than ten sword lights whistled through the cave, and the Bone Jade Sword teleported between them, giving the leader no chance to breathe.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 只见十余道剑光在洞府内呼啸，白骨飞剑则是在剑光之中瞬移穿梭，根本不给为首黑衣人喘息之机。

0010.en: After a few breaths, the leader was exhausted. Lv Yang found an opening and, with a slash of his sword, another pillar of blood shot into the sky.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 几个呼吸下去，为首黑衣人已然力竭，被吕阳抓到空隙，御剑一斩，顿时又是一道血柱冲天而起。

0010.en: "Whew! That was dangerous..."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “呼！真是危险.”

0010.en: After finishing, Lv Yang finally let out a sigh of relief. Looking at the corpses and flesh on the ground, he felt a lingering fear as he recalled the fight.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 做完这一切后，吕阳才终于松了口气，看着满地的尸体和碎肉，回想起刚刚的战斗甚至还有些后怕。

0010.en: Strictly speaking, this was the first time he had killed someone.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 严格来说，这是他第一次杀人。

0010.en: Although he had practiced the smooth combo of a sneak attack countless times in private, this was the first time he had used it in a real battle.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 虽然躲在暗处偷袭的那一套丝滑连招，他已经在私底下演练了无数遍，但终归是第一次拿出来实战。

0010.en: "Honestly, my combat experience is far worse than these three. At the same level, I couldn't even beat one of them, let alone three. But by using a sneak attack to gain the upper hand and force them into a contest of pure power, I could easily suppress them with my higher cultivation."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “平心而论，我的战斗经验其实远远不如这三个人，同境界别说三个了，一个都不一定能打过，不过只要设法偷袭，抢占先机逼他们和我比拼力量，我还是能凭借更高的境界将他们轻松压制。”

0010.en: "This shows that fighting with raw power is worse than fighting with techniques, and fighting with techniques is worse than fighting with cultivation level..."
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: “这就是斗法力不如斗神通，斗神通不如斗道行啊.”

0010.en: Lv Yang reviewed and summarized the valuable experience of this battle, thinking about how he could improve, certain that it would be useful in his next life.
0010.speaker: 吕阳
0010.cn: 吕阳一边复盘总结这一次越级挑战的宝贵经验，一边思考可以优化的地方，相信必可活用于下一世。

0011.en: Chapter 11: The Life-Killing Curse
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 第11章 杀生咒

0011.en: The next day, Lv Yang waited in his cave-dwelling for the entire day.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 翌日，吕阳在洞府里等待了一整天。

0011.en: No one came.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 没人来。

0011.en: It was as if the three men in black were not disciples of the Chu Sheng Sect at all. Their deaths caused no stir, and no one even came to check on the situation.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 三个黑衣人仿佛根本不是初圣宗的弟子一样，没有掀起半点波澜，甚至都没有人过来查看一下情况。

0011.en: Lv Yang sighed again. He didn't doubt that the sect, which possessed the life lamps of all its disciples, was unaware of the three men's deaths. Thinking about it now, he feared that "mutual killing among disciples" was an unwritten rule. As long as it wasn't made a huge, public incident, no one would investigate.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳再次感叹，他可不会怀疑拥有所有弟子命灯的圣宗会没有发现三人的死，现在想来恐怕“弟子之间的互相厮杀”本就是约定俗成的规矩，只要不闹大，闹得人尽皆知，就不会有人来细查。

0011.en: After all, the ways of the Demonic Sect were treacherous and hard to predict.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 毕竟魔门风云诡谲，难以揣度。

0011.en: Someone died. Maybe it was to silence them, maybe for profit, or maybe they knew something they shouldn't have. What if an investigation actually uncovered something?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 死人了，或许是灭口，或许是求财，又或许是知道了什么不该知道的事情万一真查出点什么呢？

0011.en: So, it was better not to investigate.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 所以还是不查的好。

0011.en: "As expected of the sect."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “不愧是圣宗”

0011.en: After sighing, Lv Yang relaxed and began to collect his spoils of war.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳感叹过后，也就放下心来，开始收缴战利品。

0011.en: First were the disciple tokens. To Lv Yang's shock, the tokens of the three men in black contained a total of 400 contribution points, an unusually large amount.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 首先是弟子令牌，让吕阳震惊的是三个黑衣人的弟子令牌里居然有整整400贡献点，多的超出常理。

0011.en: "So they were repeat offenders."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “感情还是三个惯犯。”

0011.en: Lv Yang frowned and searched again. Besides some miscellaneous items, only a secret manual called "Qi-Concealing Art" caught his interest.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳眉头紧皱，又翻找了一通，结果除了杂物之外，只有一本名为《敛气决》的密册让他最为动心。

0011.en: In Lv Yang's view, these three men were very skilled at concealing their true qi. If he hadn't broken through in his cultivation, with his true qi and spiritual sense making a huge leap, he probably wouldn't have noticed them sneaking in. This showed how powerful the "Qi-Concealing Art" was; it must have been their hidden trump card.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 毕竟在吕阳看来，这三个黑衣人非常擅长收敛真气，如果不是自己修为突破，真气和灵识都得到了质的飞跃，恐怕还发现不了他们的潜入，可见这门《敛气决》的厉害，算是压箱底的本事了。

0011.en: "More importantly, this has nothing to do with the sect!"
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “更重要的是，这和圣宗无关！”

0011.en: Sect techniques were only recorded on disciple tokens, but the "Qi-Concealing Art" was a physical manual. This meant it was likely the three men's own fortunate discovery.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 圣宗功法只会记录在弟子令牌上，《敛气决》却是一本密册，可见这应该是三个黑衣人自己的机缘。

0011.en: Therefore, he didn't have to worry about the sect having a way to counter it.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 因此不用担心圣宗有破解手段。

0011.en: "It's like getting a pillow just when you're sleepy. What a good death!"
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “真是瞌睡来了有枕头，死的好啊！”

0011.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang sincerely prepared their bodies for burial, dug a pit, and buried them, giving them a final resting place.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 想到这里，吕阳真心实意地给三人收殓了尸体，然后挖了个坑埋了进去，也算是让他们入土为安了。

0011.en: Then, a thought suddenly crossed his mind:
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 随后他突然转念一想：

0011.en: "This 'Qi-Concealing Art' is so clever and not from the sect. Where did they get it? Could there be an even greater opportunity behind it?"
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “这《敛气决》如此精妙，又不是圣宗所传，他们从哪里弄来的？莫非这背后还有一桩更大的机缘？”

0011.en: Instantly, Lv Yang's mind started racing.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 瞬间，吕阳的心思活泛开来。

0011.en: But he quickly restrained his greed, and his eyes became calm again. "No rush, no rush. Maybe I can befriend these three in the next life."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: 不过很快他又克制住了贪欲，眼神恢复冷静：“不急，不急，这三个人下一世或许可以交个朋友。”

0011.en: There will always be a chance!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 总有机会的！

0011.en: After laying the three to rest, Lv Yang took out his disciple token and began to look up the materials needed to refine a Sword Pellet, which Yun Miaoqing had told him about earlier.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 帮三人入土为安后，吕阳又取出弟子令牌，开始查看之前云妙清告诉他的有关祭炼剑丸所需的材料。

0011.en: "To refine a Sword Pellet, one needs to gather three taels of Gold Essence, three taels of Jade Marrow, two taels of Cinnabar, and two taels of Sword Qi, for a total of ten taels. Then, using True Fire and Divine Water for forging and cooling to remove impurities, one must slowly refine it with a secret sword art, allowing it to merge with the refiner's essence, qi, and spirit. Only then can it be truly completed."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “祭炼剑丸，需集齐金精三两，玉髓三两，丹砂二两，剑气二两，共计十两，然后辅以真火，神水煅烧冷却，祛除杂质，再用剑诀秘法慢慢熬炼，使其与祭炼之人精气神相合，方能真正炼成。”

0011.en: As Lv Yang recalled the method for refining the Sword Pellet, he browsed the item catalog.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳一边回忆祭炼剑丸之法，一边翻看物品目录。

0011.en: But the more he looked, the uglier his expression became.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 结果越看，他的脸色越难看。

0011.en: "Gold Essence, Jade Marrow, Cinnabar, and Sword Qi are all priced at 100 contribution points per tael. True Water is 500 contribution points for a gourd, and True Fire is 500 contribution points for a single strand."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “金精玉髓，丹砂剑气，统一价100贡献点一两，真水500贡献点一葫，真火500贡献点一道.”

0011.en: "2000 contribution points!?"
0011.speaker: 吕阳

0011.en: Lv Yang clenched his teeth. He had heard from Yun Miaoqing that disciples of the Yushu Sword Pavilion received a Sword Pellet from their masters after breaking through to Qi Refining.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳钢牙紧咬，他可是听云妙清说过的，玉枢剑阁的弟子突破炼气后都能得到一枚师长赐下的剑丸。

0011.en: But here in the Chu Sheng Sect, it cost 2000 contribution points?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 结果放在初圣宗，居然要2000贡献点？

0011.en: A normal disciple would have to work like an animal for the sect for twenty years, without eating or drinking, just to gather that many points!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 普通弟子不吃不喝，给圣宗做牛做马二十年才有可能集齐这么多贡献点！

0011.en: Damn this Demonic Sect!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 该死的魔门！

0011.en: This outrageous price instantly extinguished the pride Lv Yang felt from his small windfall, reminding him once again that he was a poor man.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 如此天价，瞬间就打灭了吕阳刚刚发了一笔小财的得意，让他再度意识到了自己是个穷光蛋的现实。

0011.en: "In that case, these 400 contribution points are a bit useless."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “这样一来，400贡献点就有点鸡肋了。”

0011.en: According to Lv Yang's plan, he would choose to inherit his cultivation level in his next life, so he couldn't take any items with him from this one.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 按照吕阳的规划，下一世重开后他就会选择修为，所以这一世不管得到什么东西都是不可能带走的。

0011.en: Therefore, no matter what good things he bought with these 400 contribution points, they would be meaningless to him.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 因此这400贡献点不管买到什么好东西，对他来说都没有意义。

0011.en: As for his cultivation, the middle stage of Qi Refining was completely different from the initial stage. Even if he spent all 400 points, it wouldn't be enough to break through to the fifth layer of Qi Refining.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 至于修为，炼气中期和初期截然不同，就算把400贡献点全都用掉，也不可能让他突破到炼气五层。

0011.en: "It seems I can only exchange them for techniques."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “看来只能拿去换功法了。”

0011.en: After all, unlike treasures, techniques and abilities were knowledge that could be carried into the next life. Thinking of this, Lv Yang immediately left his cave-dwelling and headed for the Library Pavilion.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 毕竟比起宝物，功法神通作为知识是能被带到下一世的，想到这里，吕阳当即离开洞府前往藏书阁。

0011.en: "Oh, it's you, kid?"
0011.speaker: 老人
0011.cn: “哟，是你小子？”

0011.en: The old man at the entrance of the Library Pavilion actually remembered Lv Yang and looked surprised. "Are you here to exchange for another technique? Looks like you've struck it rich."
0011.speaker: 老人
0011.cn: 藏书阁门口的老人竟然还记得吕阳，面露惊讶之色：“你这是又来兑换功法？看样子是发财了啊。”

0011.en: "I hope your words bring me luck, Senior Brother."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “承师兄吉言。”

0011.en: Lv Yang cupped his hands and walked into the Library Pavilion. This time, his goal was clear: to find a powerful, life-risking ability.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳拱了拱手，随后走进了藏书阁，这次他意图明确，就是要找一门威力大，专门用来搏命的神通。

0011.en: Soon, Lv Yang locked onto his target.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 很快，吕阳就锁定了目标。

0011.en: "Life-Killing Curse: 300 contribution points."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “《杀生咒》：300贡献点。”

0011.en: This ability was very special, similar to a Buddhist vow of silence. It required the cultivator to nurture a breath of killing intent in their chest, refining it day and night with their true qi until it was bound to their life.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 这门神通非常特别，酷似佛门闭口禅，要求修炼者养一口杀气在胸，日夜用真气祭炼，与性命相交。

0011.en: When not in use, one could speak normally. But when used, one would open their mouth and utter "Kill!". The full force of the killing intent, along with one's life force, would erupt in an instant, shattering souls and spirits. But once the killing intent was spent, the user would also die. It was a technique to perish together with the enemy.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 平时不用，可以正常说话，一到用时，口一开，道一声“杀！”，满腔杀气瞬间裹挟一身性命爆发而出，喝魂荡魄，无往不利，不过等这一口杀气宣泄完了，人也死了，可谓是与敌皆亡的手段。

0011.en: "Excellent. It can kill enemies and also kill myself. It's perfect for me!"
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “不错，既能杀人，还能自杀，正好适合我！”

0011.en: With The Hundred Lives Book, what Lv Yang feared most was not death, but being unable to die. The book could not be activated manually; it only worked when he died.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 身怀百世书，吕阳最怕的其实不是死，而是死不了，因为百世书无法主动激活，只有他死了才能用。

0011.en: Therefore, he desperately needed a way to kill himself.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 因此他非常需要一门自杀神通。

0011.en: After exchanging the technique from the Library Pavilion, Lv Yang immediately sat cross-legged and began to comprehend the art.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 从藏书阁兑换了功法之后，吕阳立刻盘膝而坐，开始参悟法决。

0011.en: "The Life-Killing Curse stores killing intent in the chest. The most important thing is this breath of killing intent. The higher its quality, the greater the power of the curse when unleashed."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “杀生咒，藏气于胸，最重要的就是这一口杀气，杀气的品质越高，杀生咒爆发时的威力也就越大。”

0011.en: "It is said that when Heaven unleashes its killing intent, the stars shift. When the Earth unleashes its killing intent, dragons and snakes rise from the ground. When a person unleashes their killing intent, Heaven and Earth are overturned. Therefore, there are three types of killing intent: Heavenly, Earthly, and Human. Heavenly and Earthly killing intent are seen once in a century. Only Human killing intent is common, with the aura from weapons being the best."
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “所谓天发杀机，移星易宿，地发杀机，龙蛇起陆，人发杀机，天地翻覆。因此天下杀气分三类，天杀，地杀，人杀。其中天杀和地杀百年难遇，唯有人杀随处可见，又以刀兵之气为最上乘”

0011.en: Inside the Library Pavilion, Lv Yang began to refine his killing intent.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 藏书阁内，吕阳开始着手祭炼杀气。

0011.en: "Good thing I have the materials ready..."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “还好材料就有现成的”

0011.en: The so-called human killing intent was mostly taken from weapons used by those with murderous intent. As it happened, he still had the weapons from the three men in black.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 所谓人杀之气，大多取自身怀杀意之人用过的刀兵，好巧不巧，三个黑衣人手里的兵器他都还留着。

0011.en: Lv Yang directly extracted the killing intent from them, refining it into his body bit by bit.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳直接从中抽取杀气，一点点炼入体内。，

0011.en: Instantly, Lv Yang felt as if a thousand knives were scraping his bones and cutting his flesh from inside his chest. The pain was unbearable, but he kept his lips tightly sealed, not daring to open his mouth.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 霎时间，吕阳只感觉胸口仿佛有千把刀在刮骨割肉，剧痛难忍，但他还是闭紧唇齿，不敢张开嘴巴。

0011.en: This was the critical moment of refinement. If he opened his mouth now, the intent would leak, and he would die instantly!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 因为此刻正是祭炼的关键时候，一旦张口，气泄了，必然直接暴毙！

0011.en: After a long time, Lv Yang finally felt the killing intent in his chest stabilize and connect completely with his true qi. With a single thought, it would erupt.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 就这样过了许久，吕阳才感觉胸口的杀气渐渐平稳，和自身真气彻底相连，心念一动就会爆发而出。

0011.en: "I wonder how powerful it is."
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: “也不知道有多厉害.”

0011.en: Thinking of this, a look of anticipation appeared on Lv Yang's face. He decided he had to use the Life-Killing Curse once before he died in this life to see its power.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 想到这里，吕阳的脸上顿时浮现一丝期待，决定这一世死之前一定要用一次杀生咒，看看威力如何。

0011.en: When he returned to the entrance of the Library Pavilion, Lv Yang was surprised to find the old man cursing loudly.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 回到藏书阁门口，吕阳却意外发现门口的老人正在破口大骂。

0011.en: "Damn it, that lucky bastard..."
0011.speaker: 老人
0011.cn: “狗日的，走了狗屎运的东西.”

0011.en: The old man held his disciple token, his wrinkled hands trembling uncontrollably. His old face was twisted with an unreadable emotion.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 只见老人拿着弟子令牌，皱纹密布的双手止不住地颤抖，一张老脸扭曲，竟说不清究竟是什么情绪。

0011.en: Lv Yang walked over and asked curiously, "Senior Brother? What happened?"
0011.speaker: 吕阳
0011.cn: 吕阳走上前好奇道：“师兄？发生什么事了？”
