0011.en: "What happened?" The old man's eyes widened with rage. He threw the disciple token on the ground and sneered, "Everyone is talking about it. See for yourself."
0011.speaker: 老人
0011.cn: “什么事？”老人闻言怒目圆睁，狠狠将弟子令牌摔在了地上，冷笑道：“都传开了，你自己看吧。”

0011.en: As soon as he finished speaking, the old man lay back down in his rocking chair, sulking.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 话音未落，老人便重新躺回摇椅，一副生闷气的模样。

0011.en: Lv Yang was confused until he also opened his disciple token and saw the latest news. Only then did he understand what had happened.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 吕阳看得一头雾水，直到他也打开弟子令牌，正好看到了最近的新闻，这才明白究竟发生了什么事。

0011.en: "The Merit Pool lottery finally has a winner!"
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “功德池大奖终现赢家！”

0011.en: "The Colorful Merit Fish was won by a new disciple, Xiao Shiye. A Perfected Being publicly awarded him the grand prize of one billion. After receiving the prize, Xiao Shiye went into seclusion and his whereabouts are unknown!"
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: “彩色功德鱼由新入门的弟子萧石叶抽中，真人当众授予十亿大奖，萧石叶领奖之后闭关不知去向！”

0012.en: Chapter 12: Merit Lottery and the Death-Substitute Puppet
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 第12章 功德博彩，替死阴傀

0012.en: "The Rainbow Merit Fish, a one-billion-point grand prize."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: “彩色功德鱼，十亿大奖.”

0012.en: Because related news was already flying everywhere and everyone was discussing it, Lv Yang easily figured out the whole story.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 由于相关消息早就已经传得满天飞，大家都在讨论，所以吕阳没费什么力气就搞清楚了事情的原委。

0012.en: It turned out there was a permanent special task in the Chu Sheng Sect called "Accumulating Merit."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 原来初圣宗内有一个常驻的特殊任务，名为“积功德”。

0012.en: The location was a blessed place called the "Merit Pool," deep within the Sea of Clouds below the Sacred Fire Cliff. In the pool lived a special spirit beast known as the "Merit Fish."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 地点就在圣火崖下方，云海深处，一座名为“功德池”的宝地，池中有一异种灵兽，名为“功德鱼”。

0012.en: The fish came in five colors: white, blue, purple, gold, and rainbow.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 鱼分五色：白，蓝，紫，金，彩。

0012.en: The closer to rainbow, the richer the Merit Fish's essence. Consuming it would not only improve the quality of one's True Qi but could even help break through cultivation bottlenecks.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而越是接近彩色，功德鱼的精气就越足，食用后不仅可以提升真气质量，甚至还有突破瓶颈的功效。

0012.en: This was how the "Accumulating Merit" task came to be.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 所谓的“积功德”任务也是由此而生。

0012.en: Each person could accept this task once a month. You would first blindly pick a number, then pay 10 Contribution Points to receive the Merit Fish corresponding to that number.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这个任务每人每月限领一次，先盲选一个数字，然后再支付10贡献点就能带出数字对应的功德鱼。

0012.en: However, the 10 Contribution Points paid by cultivators were not collected by the sect. Instead, they were added to the Merit Pool's account. A high-ranking sect official had made a special announcement: anyone who managed to pick the only Rainbow Merit Fish would win all the Contribution Points in the pool!
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 然而修士支付的10贡献点却不会被圣宗回收，而是就这样记在了功德池账上，圣宗有高层专门对此做过说明：只要有人能选中功德池中唯一的彩色功德鱼，就能得到功德池内所有的贡献点！

0012.en: Nearly a hundred years had passed since the task was first created.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而这个任务发布至今，已然过去了近百年。

0012.en: But in a hundred years, no one had ever picked the Rainbow Merit Fish. As a result, the Contribution Points in the pool kept growing until it reached an astronomical number.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可百年来却没有一个人选中彩色功德鱼，结果就是池子里的贡献点越积越多，已然成为了天文数字。

0012.en: "One billion! One billion!"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “十个亿啊！十个亿！”

0012.en: On his rocking chair, the old man was still muttering, his voice filled with envy, jealousy, and hatred.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 摇椅上，老人还在低声念叨，语气里满是羡慕嫉妒恨。

0012.en: Just yesterday, the grand prize of this "Merit Lottery" was finally won. The disciple who won it had joined the sect less than ten days ago.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 就在昨天，这个“功德博彩”的超级大奖终于是有结果了，而得到它的弟子甚至刚入门还不到十天。

0012.en: A prize pool built over a hundred years was claimed by a newcomer of less than ten days!
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 百年奖池，被一个入门不到十天的新人拿了！

0012.en: No wonder the old man from the Library Pavilion felt it was unfair. After all, a portion of the one-billion-point prize came from his own contributions over the years.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 也难怪藏书阁老人会心理不平衡了，毕竟这十亿大奖里面也有他这么多年来参加功德池任务的一份。

0012.en: What's more, that disciple, Xiao Shiye, not only won the one-billion-point prize but also received the precious Rainbow Merit Fish. After consuming it, he broke through from the first level of Qi Refining to the peak of Qi Refining overnight. He had already been accepted as a disciple by a sect Elder and was now in seclusion, preparing to reach the Foundation Establishment realm.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 更别说那位萧石叶在得到功德池内十亿大奖的同时，还得到了最珍贵的彩色功德鱼，食用后在一夜之间就从炼气一层突破到了炼气圆满，如今已经被门中真人收为弟子，闭关准备冲击筑基了。

0012.en: Even Lv Yang couldn't help but feel a hint of envy at such a turn of fortune.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 如此境遇，就连吕阳都忍不住露出了羡慕之色。

0012.en: But his expression quickly changed. The lucky winner, Xiao Shiye, had not hidden the number he picked to win the Rainbow Merit Fish.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不过很快他的眼神就变了.因为那个幸运儿，萧石叶并没有隐瞒他抽中彩色功德鱼时选择的数字。

0012.en: Looking at the number, Lv Yang couldn't help but gulp.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 看着这个数字，吕阳忍不住咽了咽口水。

0012.en: Just as Lv Yang committed the number to memory, planning to use it in his next life, an elegant figure suddenly appeared outside the Library Pavilion.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 就在吕阳将这一串数字牢牢记在了心里，准备活用于下一世的时候，藏书阁外却突然走进一道倩影。

0012.en: "Junior Brother Lv?"
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “吕师弟？”

0012.en: Lv Yang looked up and immediately recognized her. It was Fairy Qingchen. She seemed surprised too, a hint of pleasure at the unexpected meeting on her pretty face.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 吕阳应声抬头，立刻认出了对方，赫然是清尘仙子，她似乎也很意外，俏脸上带着几分偶遇的惊喜。

0012.en: "Oh, it's Qingchen. Is it time?"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “哦，是清尘啊，时间到了？”

0012.en: The old man from the Library Pavilion also saw Fairy Qingchen. His bored expression instantly turned serious as he stood up and said, "Then let's leave at once."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 藏书阁老人也看到了清尘仙子，本来还百无聊赖的表情瞬间正色起来，起身道：“那我们赶紧出发。”

0012.en: "Senior Brother, you're also going to explore the immortal's abode?" Lv Yang asked curiously.
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: “师兄你也要去探寻洞府？”吕阳好奇道。

0012.en: "What else?" the old man said irritably. "I just lost a lot of money. If I don't find some side work, I'll have nothing to eat!"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “不然呢？”藏书阁老人没好气地说道：“刚刚亏了一大笔钱，再不找点外快做，就要喝西北风了！”

0012.en: "Lost a lot of money?"
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: “亏了一大笔钱？”

0012.en: "Sigh, it was a moment of carelessness," the old man sighed. "Some time ago, the Sect had a great battle with the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion from Jiangnan."
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “哎，说来也是我一时大意。”藏书阁老人叹息一声：“前段时间，圣宗和江南的玉枢剑阁大战一场。”

0012.en: "The Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion came prepared. They managed to steal one of the Sect's Mass Corpse Pits in the south."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: “玉枢剑阁有备而来，硬生生抢了圣宗在南方的一座万人坑。”

0012.en: "The 'Death-Substituting Yin Skeletons' produced in that pit are very precious treasures. Once the pit was taken, their price in the Sect shot up."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: “那座万人坑里出产的‘替死阴骸’可是很珍贵的奇宝，万人坑被夺，它在圣宗内的价格立刻飞涨。”

0012.en: "At first, everyone was hoarding them. I was cautious and just watched for a while."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: “一开始大家都在囤货，我出于谨慎，先是观望了一阵。”

0012.en: "Later, I saw the price was only going up, and I felt the opportunity was slipping away, so I bought a batch at a high price from someone else."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: “后来我发现价格确实是只涨不跌，觉得机会转瞬即逝，这才出手从别人那里高价囤了一批货进来。”

0012.en: At this point, the old man from the Library Pavilion was full of regret, slapping his thigh. "Who would have thought, right after I stocked up, news came that the Sect launched a counterattack and retook the Mass Corpse Pit. The price, which had just risen, instantly plummeted to less than its original value!"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: 说到这里，藏书阁老人那叫一个痛心疾首，悔恨地直拍大腿：“谁曾想，我前脚刚囤完，后脚就传来消息，说圣宗发起了反攻，万人坑已经夺回，结果刚涨上去的价格瞬间暴跌，还不如原价了！”

0012.en: Lv Yang was speechless.
0012.speaker: 吕阳

0012.en: "But thankfully, there's Qingchen." The old man sighed for a moment, then cheered up again, saying, "Qingchen is such a good person."
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “不过还好有清尘。”藏书阁老人叹息了一会儿，旋即又重新振作起来，感叹道：“清尘可是好人啊。”

0012.en: Fairy Qingchen smiled shyly, "Senior Brother, you praise me too much."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: 清尘仙子含羞一笑：“师兄谬赞了。”

0012.en: "It's from the bottom of my heart," the old man said sincerely. "If you hadn't recommended Senior Brother Zhao to me, I'm afraid I wouldn't have even gotten my investment back."
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “真是肺腑之言。”藏书阁老人由衷道：“若不是你向我推荐了赵师兄，我怕是连本钱都拿不回来了。”

0012.en: "It was just a small effort," Fairy Qingchen said humbly. "It just so happened that Senior Brother Zhao needed a batch of Death-Substituting Yin Skeletons, and you had some in stock. I was just in the right place at the right time. I only hope that when we explore the immortal's abode, you can help me if I find something I like."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “举手之劳而已。”清尘仙子谦虚道：“赵师兄正好缺一批替死阴骸，师兄你手里又囤了一批货，清尘也只是恰逢其会罢了，只望此后去探寻洞府，清尘若有看中之物，师兄能助清尘一二就好。”

0012.en: Senior Brother Zhao... Zhao Xuhe? Lv Yang's heart skipped a beat.
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: 赵师兄.赵旭河？吕阳心中微动。

0012.en: "By the way, Junior Brother Lv."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “对了，吕师弟。”

0012.en: Only then did Fairy Qingchen seem to remember Lv Yang, turning to look at him. "About this exploration of the immortal's abode, are you really not planning to come with us?"
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: 直到这时，清尘仙子才似乎想起了吕阳，转过头看了过来：“此番探寻洞府，师弟真的不打算同行？”

0012.en: "...I'm sorry to disappoint you, Senior Sister."
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: “.让师姐见笑了。”

0012.en: Lv Yang shook his head. "I'm new to the sect and not very strong. I just want to focus on my cultivation. Exploring the abode is too dangerous, and I don't have the strength for it."
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: 吕阳摇头道：“师弟刚入门不久，势小力微，只想专注于修行，探寻洞府太过危险，实在有心无力。”

0012.en: "Kid, I don't like hearing that."
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “小子，你这话我就不爱听了。”

0012.en: The old man from the Library Pavilion shook his head. "Focus on cultivation? For ordinary disciples like us with no money or power, there's no future in just quietly cultivating."
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: 藏书阁老人摇了摇头：“专注修行？像我们这样没钱没势的普通弟子，只知道闷头修行是没仙途的。”

0012.en: "Cultivation itself is an act of defying heaven. Without taking risks, how can your cultivation improve rapidly?"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “修仙本就是逆天而行，不冒险，修为怎么突飞猛进？”

0012.en: "When everyone else is scared and wants to retreat, that's when you should be brave enough to try and seize the opportunity!"
0012.speaker: 藏书阁老人
0012.cn: “当所有人都感到害怕，想要退缩的时候，你才更应该勇敢地去尝试，去争取，这样才能抓住机会！”

0012.en: 'Be greedy when others are fearful.' No wonder you went bankrupt.
0012.speaker: 吕阳
0012.cn: 别人恐惧你贪婪，怪不得你会破产啊。

0012.en: No matter how persuasively the old man from the Library Pavilion spoke, Lv Yang politely refused, which angered the man so much that he left, muttering, "Useless wood cannot be carved."
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 任凭藏书阁老人说得天花乱坠，吕阳都是委婉拒绝，气得人丢下一句“朽木不可雕”就转身离去了。

0012.en: Seeing this, Fairy Qingchen didn't press the matter further. She gave Lv Yang a deep look, then turned and left with the old man. They went to a hidden cave on Sky Mending Peak. She had the old man wait in the outer court, then walked into the inner court and stood before a quiet room.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 清尘仙子见状也不好再说，只是深深地看了吕阳一眼，随后也转身离开，和藏书阁老人一同来到补天峰的一处隐蔽洞府，又让藏书阁老人先在外院等候，随后才走进内院，来到了一间静室前。

0012.en: Soon, the door to the quiet room opened, and Zhao Xuhe walked out.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不一会儿，静室大门打开，赵旭河踱步而出。

0012.en: "Failed again? He still didn't agree?"
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “又失败了？他还是没答应？”

0012.en: Zhao Xuhe's brows furrowed as he listened to Fairy Qingchen's report. "He really is determined in his Dao path. Well, it doesn't matter much if he's not there."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: 赵旭河听着清尘仙子的讲述，眉头渐渐皱起：“还真是个道心坚定的，也罢，少了此人也无伤大雅。”

0012.en: "Senior Brother, I think there's something wrong with him."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “师兄，我觉得此人有问题。”

0012.en: Fairy Qingchen bit her lip. "The life lamps of my three lovers have gone out. I sent them to kill that guy last night... It seems they failed."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: 清尘仙子银牙轻咬：“我那三个姘头的命灯熄了，昨晚我让他们去杀了那家伙如今看来是失手了。”

0012.en: "Senior Brother, you know my three lovers were all at the third level of Qi Refining. For Lv Yang to kill them... could he already be at the middle stage of cultivation?"
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “师兄你也知道的，我那三个姘头可都是炼气三层，吕阳能杀了他们.会不会已经是中期的修为了？”

0012.en: "Impossible! Absolutely impossible!"
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “不可能！绝对不可能！”

0012.en: Zhao Xuhe shook his head without hesitation. "Breaking through a bottleneck is not so easy. In just a few days, the most he could have reached is the third level of Qi Refining. It's impossible for him to have reached the middle stage."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: 赵旭河毫不犹豫地摇头：“突破瓶颈谈何容易，短短几天他最多突破到炼气三层，不可能突破中期。”

0012.en: "You don't need to be so suspicious. I've checked his purchase history."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “你也不必疑神疑鬼，我查过他的购买记录了。”

0012.en: "He bought so many Qi Pills. If he took them without caring about the cost, reaching the third level of Qi Refining wouldn't be surprising. As for your three lovers..."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “他买了那么多的元气大丹，如果不计代价地服用，达到炼气三层也不算意外，至于你那三个姘头.”

0012.en: "He took out a cultivation loan to buy a divine skill, the Divine Firmament Sword Control Art from the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion." Zhao Xuhe analyzed the situation carefully. "If he has a special talent for the sword and can master the technique quickly, it wouldn't be surprising if he could kill your three lovers."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “他用功法贷买了一门神通，乃是玉枢剑阁的神霄御剑真决。”赵旭河抽丝剥茧，认真分析道：“如果他天赋异禀，在剑道上有悟性，能够快速掌握剑诀，那斩杀你的三个姘头倒也不算稀奇。”

0012.en: "That... Senior Brother is right."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “这师兄说得对。”

0012.en: Fairy Qingchen thought for a moment and felt that Zhao Xuhe's analysis was more reasonable. After all, she knew from experience how difficult the middle-stage bottleneck was.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 清尘仙子思索片刻，觉得还是赵旭河的分析更合理，毕竟中期瓶颈有多难，她当年可是深有体会的。

0012.en: It had taken her nearly ten years to barely break through.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她用了近十年，才勉强突破。

0012.en: To say that a new disciple broke through in less than a month was completely unbelievable, unless he was a reincarnated Elder.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 现在说一个刚入门的弟子，不到一个月就突破了，除非他是真人转世重修，否则根本就是天方夜谈。

0012.en: "Alright, we'll talk about this later."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “行了，此事以后再说。”

0012.en: Zhao Xuhe waved his hand, his eyes glinting coldly. "First, let's handle the 'immortal's abode' matter. Have you gathered everyone?"
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: 赵旭河摆了摆手，目露寒光：“先处理好‘洞府’的事情，人都找齐了么？”

0012.en: "They're all here," Fairy Qingchen nodded. "Especially Wang Bairong from the Library Pavilion. Since you bought his Death-Substituting Yin Skeletons, he trusts us a lot now."
0012.speaker: 清尘仙子
0012.cn: “齐了。”清尘仙子点头道：“尤其是藏书阁的王柏荣，师兄买了他的替死阴骸，他现在很信任我们。”

0012.en: "Good."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: “那就好。”

0012.en: Zhao Xuhe smiled coldly. "Our sect has always been full of talented people. Whether I can make a fortune this time depends entirely on these junior and senior brothers of mine..."
0012.speaker: 赵旭河
0012.cn: 赵旭河冷然一笑：“我圣宗向来是人材辈出，此番能否借此机会大赚一笔，就全靠我这些师兄弟了”

0013.en: Chapter 13: The Mantis Stalks the Cicada, Unaware of the Oriole Behind
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第13章 螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后

0013.en: Outside Sky Mending Peak, more than ten formal disciples gathered together. The leaders were Zhao Xuhe, Fairy Qingchen, and the old man from the Library Pavilion, Wang Borong.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 补天峰外，十多个正式弟子汇聚在一起，为首者赫然是赵旭河，清尘仙子，还有藏书阁老人王柏荣。

0013.en: Among them, only these three had reached the mid-stage of Qi Refining.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 众人之中，唯有他们三人是炼气中期修为。

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe stood at the very front and spoke in a resonant voice, "I am deeply honored that all you fellow brothers could accept my invitation. I thank you in advance."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: 赵旭河站在最前列，声音洪亮：“此番诸位师兄弟能应赵某之邀，赵某深感荣幸，在此先行谢过了。”

0013.en: After saying this, he bowed to everyone.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 说完，他便对着众人行了一礼。

0013.en: "To tell you the truth, I found a cave residence left behind by a predecessor outside Sky Mending Peak. Unfortunately, it is protected by a formation, and I am not strong enough to break it."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “实不相瞒，师兄在补天峰外发现了一座前人留下的洞府，奈何外围有阵法守护，实在是无力攻破。”

0013.en: Fairy Qingchen spoke at the right time, her gentle voice making people feel numb. "That's why I came to you, my fellow brothers. We can break the formation together and split the treasures inside the cave residence. Brother Zhao is a member of the Three Rivers Association, and everyone knows he is trustworthy. He definitely won't let you suffer a loss."
0013.speaker: 清尘仙子
0013.cn: 清尘仙子适时开口，柔声细语听得人酥酥麻麻：“所以清尘才找上了诸位师兄弟，大家合力破阵，平分洞府里的收获，赵师兄乃是三河会的成员，信誉大家都非常清楚，肯定不会让大家吃亏。”

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe was clearly a man of some means.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河显然还是有点手段的。

0013.en: He and Fairy Qingchen worked together, with Wang Borong, the old man from the Library Pavilion, playing a supporting role. Soon, they united the disorganized group.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 他和清尘仙子互相配合，藏书阁老人王柏荣则是顺势捧哏，很快就将一盘散沙的众人拧成了一股绳。

0013.en: Then, the group rode their escape lights and left Sky Mending Peak.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 紧接着，众人便驾遁光离开了补天峰。

0013.en: The "Cloud Sea Touching the Sky," where the Chu Sheng Sect was located, was vast and seemingly endless. After flying for a quarter of an hour, the group stopped over a part of the cloud sea.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 初圣宗所在“接天云海”占地广袤，几乎望不到头，众人遁光飞行了一刻钟才在一处云海停了下来。

0013.en: "This is the place."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “就是此处了。”

0013.en: With a thought, Zhao Xuhe used his true qi to part the clouds, revealing a magnificent mountain peak with excellent feng shui. At first glance, it looked like an old dragon coiled up.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河心念一动，真气拨开云海，赫然显露出了一座风水极佳的恢弘山峰，乍看之下好似老龙盘卧。

0013.en: "This place is called Panlong Island," Zhao Xuhe explained. "I have investigated it. This was the cave residence of Perfected Master Panlong, a true disciple of our sect. The feng shui formation outside was once a Foundation Establishment-level formation, but over many years, the earth veins it relied on have dried up, and its power is less than one-tenth of what it was."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “此地名为盘龙岛。”赵旭河主动介绍道：“我调查过，乃是昔日门中真传，盘龙真人的洞府，外围的风水大阵曾经还是筑基大阵，不过多年下来阵法依仗的地脉已经干涸，威力也十不存一了。”

0013.en: "Everyone, please follow me to break the formation."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “诸位，请随我破阵。”

0013.en: As soon as he finished speaking, Zhao Xuhe led the way and was the first to enter Panlong Island. The others saw this and did not dare to fall behind, flying in one by one.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 话音落下，赵旭河首当其冲，第一个进入了盘龙岛，其他人见状自然不敢落后，也一个个飞入其中。

0013.en: After a moment, a figure quietly appeared.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 就这样过了片刻，一道身影悄然浮现。

0013.en: "Interesting."
0013.speaker: 吕阳
0013.cn: “有意思.”

0013.en: Lv Yang looked down at Panlong Island but had no intention of entering. Instead, he took out four black banners and began to set them up outside the island.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 吕阳看着下方的盘龙岛，却全然没有进入其中的想法，而是取出了四面黑幡，开始在岛外布置起来。

0013.en: "The repayment deadline is approaching anyway. There's not much time left in this life."
0013.speaker: 吕阳
0013.cn: “反正还款期限将近，这一世的时间已经所剩无几。”

0013.en: "Might as well go for a big score!"
0013.speaker: 吕阳
0013.cn: “不如干一票！”

0013.en: "But this Panlong Island is treacherous, and Zhao Xuhe has a large group. I'm alone and have no chance of winning if I go in to compete with them for opportunities."
0013.speaker: 吕阳
0013.cn: “不过这盘龙岛诡谲莫测，赵旭河这边人多势众，我一个人独木难支，进去和他们抢机缘毫无胜算。”

0013.en: After thinking it over, Lv Yang came up with a good plan.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 思前想后，吕阳想到了一个好办法。

0013.en: First, he didn't believe for a second that there were good people in a demonic sect. He was certain that Zhao Xuhe's plan to bring people to the cave residence was ill-intentioned.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 首先，魔宗之内也有好人的说法他是狗屁不信，所以他笃定赵旭河谋划拉人闯洞府，绝对不怀好意。

0013.en: However, with so many people here, including the old man from the Library Pavilion, Wang Borong, even if Zhao Xuhe could defeat them all, he would surely suffer some losses and not escape unharmed. That being the case, he could set up a formation outside the island first, wait for the exhausted, and ambush whoever came out.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 然而此番来了这么多人，还有一个藏书阁老人王柏荣，就算赵旭河能吃得下，也必然要崩掉几颗牙，不可能安然无恙。既然如此，自己大可先在岛外布下阵法，以逸待劳，专门偷袭出来的人。

0013.en: Isn't that a much better deal than exploring inside?
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这不比进去探险合算多了？

0013.en: For this reason, Lv Yang even spent his last 100 contribution points on a Bewildering Formation set.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 为此，吕阳还用最后的100贡献点换来了一套迷踪阵。

0013.en: The four "Bewildering Banners" could lock down the area and confuse directions. Although they had no offensive power, they could trap people inside, making it difficult to escape in a short time.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 四面“迷踪幡”困锁天地，颠倒方向，虽然没有攻伐之威，却能将人困在其中，短时间内难以逃出。

0013.en: "Now, all I have to do is wait quietly... No rush, patience is a virtue."
0013.speaker: 吕阳
0013.cn: “接下来就是静静等待了.不急，事缓则圆嘛.”

0013.en: Lv Yang patiently lay in ambush.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 吕阳耐心地埋伏了起来。

0013.en: "Zhao Xuhe! What is the meaning of this!?"
0013.speaker: 陌生男1
0013.cn: “赵旭河！你这是什么意思！？”

0013.en: "If you kill us, our life lamps will go out, and the sect will not spare you!"
0013.speaker: 陌生男2
0013.cn: “你杀了我们，命灯熄灭，圣宗不会饶过你的！”

0013.en: Inside Panlong Island, blood was already flowing like a river.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 盘龙岛内，此刻已是血流成河。

0013.en: The group of formal disciples, who had been working together just moments ago, were now fighting for themselves, screaming as a bloody light harvested their lives one by one.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 只见刚刚还同心协力的一众正式弟子，此刻却是各自为战，惨叫连连，不断被一道血光收割着性命。

0013.en: Far from the crowd, Zhao Xuhe and Fairy Qingchen stood side by side.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 而在远离人群的地方，赵旭河和清尘仙子并肩而立。

0013.en: Their expressions were mocking and arrogant, revealing a sinister evil. Their behavior was completely different from the sincere manner they had when inviting everyone.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 两人神色戏谑，眉宇张扬，透出森森邪气，言行举止和刚刚那诚恳邀请众人的模样简直是判若两人。

0013.en: Facing the angry accusations, Zhao Xuhe sneered and said in a chilling tone, "Stop struggling. I have carefully arranged this place. This 'Blood Demon Soul-Slaying Blade' cost me a full 3,000 contribution points. None of you will escape Panlong Island today!"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: 面对众人的怒斥，赵旭河更是面带冷笑，语气森然道：“不必挣扎了，此处可是我精心布置的，这一口‘血魔戮魂刀’更是花费了我足足3000贡献点，今日你们一个人也别想逃出这盘龙岛！”

0013.en: As he spoke, several more people were killed.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 言语间，又有几人被收了性命。

0013.en: The bloody light flashed through the air, instantly sucking their flesh and blood dry, then revealing its form: a crimson flying dagger.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 只见空中那道血光一闪而过，当即将他们的血肉吸了个干净，而后显露形体，赫然是一口殷红飞刀。

0013.en: "You! Bastard!"
0013.speaker: 王柏荣
0013.cn: “你！混账！”

0013.en: In the crowd, the only one who could still resist was the old man from the Library Pavilion, Wang Borong. However, Zhao Xuhe was not in a hurry to kill him, but just kept wearing him down.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 人群里，唯一还能抵抗的就是藏书阁老人王柏荣了，奈何赵旭日也不急着杀他，只是不断地消耗他。

0013.en: While wearing him down, Zhao Xuhe sneered, "Old man Wang, did you really think you could spend the money you took from me? The reason I bought your Death-Substitue Yin Skeletons was for today! Otherwise, if you had a pile of them, it wouldn't be easy for me to take you down."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: 消耗之余，赵旭河还在冷笑嘲讽：“姓王的，你真以为拿了我的钱，还有命花吗？当初之所以买下你手里的替死阴骸，就是为了今天！否则你要是手里有一堆替死阴骸，我想拿下你还不容易。”

0013.en: "Now, I've bought all of your Death-Substitue Yin Skeletons."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “现在你的替死阴骸都被我买走了。”

0013.en: "After I kill you, I can take back the contribution points I gave you. It's like I got a pile of Death-Substitue Yin Skeletons for free."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “等我杀了你，当初给你的贡献点我照样可以再拿回来，相当于我一分不花就弄到了一堆替死阴骸。”

0013.en: "So it seems I have to thank you!"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “如此看来，我还得谢谢你啊！”

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe's heart-piercing words made Wang Borong almost spit blood from anger. Zhao Xuhe seized the opportunity, and with a flash of the dagger, it plunged into his chest.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河的诛心之言气得王柏荣几乎吐血，反而被赵旭河抓住机会，飞刀一闪，当即便没入他的胸口。

0013.en: Thud!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 噗通！

0013.en: Wang Borong's lips moved, his face full of unwillingness, but before he could say a word, the flying dagger sucked his lifeblood dry, and he fell to the ground.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 王柏荣嘴唇微动，一脸不甘，却连半句话都没能说出口，就被飞刀吸干了一身气血，最后颓然倒地。

0013.en: With Wang Borong defeated, the dust settled.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 解决了王柏荣，尘埃落定。

0013.en: A moment later, the screams gradually stopped.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 又过了片刻，哀嚎声才渐渐止息。

0013.en: "Congratulations, Senior Brother!"
0013.speaker: 清尘仙子
0013.cn: “恭喜师兄！”

0013.en: Fairy Qingchen was also drenched in sweat. The Blood Demon Soul-Slaying Blade consumed a great deal of energy, and she had played a part in Zhao Xuhe's ability to kill so many people.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 清尘仙子此刻同样香汗淋漓，血魔戮魂刀消耗极大，赵旭河能斩杀这么多人自然也有她的一份功劳。

0013.en: "I must thank you too, Junior Sister."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “还要多谢师妹啊。”

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe smiled slightly, took back the Blood Demon Soul-Slaying Blade, and asked, "How is it? With its current power, can it break that restriction?"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: 赵旭河微微一笑，将血魔戮魂刀收回手中，询问道：“如何？以它如今的威力，能否破开那禁制了？”

0013.en: Fairy Qingchen examined it for a moment, her brow furrowed slightly, "It seems to be a little bit short..."
0013.speaker: 清尘仙子
0013.cn: 清尘仙子打量了片刻，秀眉微蹙：“好像还差一点.”

0013.en: Swish—!
0013.speaker: 旁白

0013.en: The blade went in and out. Fairy Qingchen's pretty face was blank, her eyes staring lifelessly at the crimson dagger that had entered her abdomen. In an instant, she too was sucked into a dried corpse.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 刀入刀出，清尘仙子俏脸茫然，目光呆滞地看着没入自己小腹的殷红飞刀，一眨眼也被吸成了干尸。

0013.en: "Not anymore."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “现在不差了。”

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe looked at the Blood Demon Soul-Slaying Blade in his hand and nodded in satisfaction. He then walked to a tightly closed quiet room in the depths of Panlong Island.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河看着手里的血魔戮魂刀，这才满意地点了点头，随后来到盘龙岛深处一座门户紧闭的静室前。

0013.en: Without a word, he raised the blade and struck.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 二话不说，举刀就斩。

0013.en: "BOOM!"
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “轰隆！”

0013.en: With a sound like the shaking of the earth, the door to the quiet room shattered, revealing what was inside. There was a jade box.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 只听一声地动山摇般的巨响，静室大门应声破碎，露出了其中模样，却见里面赫然摆放着一只玉匣。

0013.en: Zhao Xuhe walked over with a look of ecstasy and opened the jade box. Inside were two volumes of a Daoist scripture.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河一脸狂喜地走了上去，打开玉匣，却见里面赫然放着一本两册的道书。

0013.en: The first volume was titled "Nine Transformations Dragon Art".
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 上册名为《九变化龙决》。

0013.en: The second volume was titled "Ten Thousand Vehicles Imperial Dragon Ascension Treasure Scroll".
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 下册名为《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》。

0013.en: Looking at the two Daoist scriptures in the jade box, Zhao Xuhe's hands trembled with excitement. "A third-grade true technique! It really is a third-grade true technique that points directly to the Golden Core Grand Dao!"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: 看着玉匣里的两本道书，赵旭河激动的手都在颤抖：“三品真功！果然是直指金丹大道的三品真功！”

0013.en: "Master truly did not lie to me."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “师尊当真没有骗我。”

0013.en: "Master said that I have cultivated bitterly for three lifetimes, accumulating merit for Perfected Master Panlong. In this life, my merits are finally complete, and Perfected Master Panlong's legacy is my opportunity."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “师尊说我三世苦修，为盘龙真人积攒功德，这一世终于功德圆满，盘龙真人的传承便是我的机缘。”

0013.en: "From today on, as long as I cultivate diligently, refine 'True Dragon Qi,' and build the 'Ten Thousand Vehicles Imperial Dragon' Dao foundation, I will surely be able to find my true self and completely return from my reincarnation. With a third-grade true technique, not only will the path to Foundation Establishment be smooth, but the Golden Core Grand Dao will also be within reach!"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “今日之后，只要我潜心修炼，炼“真龙炁”，筑“万乘御龙”道基，未来必能重新寻回真我，彻底转劫归来，而且有了三品真功，未来不仅筑基之路一片坦途，金丹大道同样指日可待！”

0013.en: The more Zhao Xuhe thought about it, the more excited he became. He immediately put away the Daoist scriptures.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 赵旭河越想越激动，当即收起道书。

0013.en: "Changing techniques requires dissipating my current power. There's no time to lose. I must immediately return to my cave residence for secluded cultivation. When I emerge, I can formally become Master's disciple..."
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “转修功法需要散功，事不宜迟，我必须立刻返回洞府闭关，待我出关，就能正式拜入师尊门下了.”

0013.en: Filled with hope for the future, Zhao Xuhe rode his escape light and flew quickly out of Panlong Island.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 怀揣着对未来的期冀，赵旭河驾起遁光迅速飞出了盘龙岛。

0013.en: However, in the next second, Zhao Xuhe's expression changed dramatically.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 然而下一秒，赵旭河突然表情剧变。

0013.en: "Who's there—"
0013.speaker: 赵旭河
0013.cn: “什么人”

0013.en: "BOOM!"
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “轰隆！”

0013.en: At that moment, Zhao Xuhe's eyes widened, but all he could see was a magnificent sword light, striking like a thunderbolt, instantly reaching him!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这一刻，赵旭河瞪大双眼，然而入目所见只剩下了一道恢弘剑光，势如霹雳，瞬间斩到了他的眼前！

0014.en: Chapter 14: Dog Eat Dog!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 第14章 黑吃黑！

0014.en: A flash of sword light, a roar of thunder.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 剑光一闪，惊雷轰鸣。

0014.en: In an instant, the sword light took Zhao Xuhe's head. But before his head could hit the ground, his body suddenly exploded into a pile of bones.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 霎时间，赵旭河就被剑光取了项上头颅，然而不等头颅落地，他的身体就陡然炸开，化作满地骸骨。

0014.en: "I wonder which fellow disciple is waiting for me here?"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “不知是何方同门，在此等候赵某？”

0014.en: After the bones shattered, a dark energy flew out and reformed into Zhao Xuhe's shape a hundred meters away, his face still showing fear.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 骸骨破碎后，一道阴气飞掠而出，最后在百米开外重新化出赵旭河的模样，脸上还残留着几分惊惶。

0014.en: But before he could finish speaking, the sword light followed him like a shadow.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 然而不等他话音落下，剑光如影随形而至。

0014.en: Swoosh—!
0014.speaker: 旁白

0014.en: The next second, Zhao Xuhe's head flew up again, only to turn back into scattered bones. The dark energy retreated another hundred meters and his figure reappeared.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 下一秒，赵旭河的头颅再度冲天而起，却又变成了漫天骸骨，阴气再退百米，将他的身影显化而出。

0014.en: Boom!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 轰隆！

0014.en: "You—"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河

0014.en: Crack!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 咔擦！

0014.en: "Enough!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “够了！”

0014.en: After dozens of sword lights filled the space and killed Zhao Xuhe more than ten times, he finally managed to regroup and seize a chance to dodge the attack.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 数十道剑光密布空间，先后斩杀了赵旭河十多次后，赵旭河才终于重整旗鼓，抓住机会躲开了剑光。

0014.en: It was only a brief moment, but Zhao Xuhe grasped it precisely. He flicked his wide sleeve, and a cloud of blood-red dust instantly rolled out to protect him. Then, he swallowed several pills to recover his injuries and True Qi before looking around.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 虽然只有短短一瞬，但还是被赵旭河精准把握，随后就见他大袖一扬，漫天血色烟尘瞬间翻滚而出，将他全身护在正中，接着又连吞了几枚丹药恢复伤势和真气，这才分出心神看向四面八方。

0014.en: "Lv Yang, it's you!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “吕阳，是你！”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe's gaze was sharp. He recognized the sword light that had killed him over ten times as the Divine Firmament Sword Control Art and immediately called out Lv Yang's identity.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河目光如炬，一眼就看出了连杀自己十几次的剑光乃是神霄御剑真决，当即叫破了吕阳的身份。

0014.en: Even so, he was shocked beyond words.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 然而即便如此，他的心中也是震惊难言。

0014.en: He had personally experienced the power of the sword light and knew it was not something an early-stage Qi Refining cultivator could do. In just a few days, Lv Yang had actually reached the middle-stage of Qi Refining.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 因为那剑光上的威力他有切身体会，不是炼气初期能做到的，短短数日，吕阳居然已经炼气中期了。

0014.en: "This person must have a great opportunity!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “此人身上，必有机缘！”

0014.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe's anger faded, replaced by a strange joy. "Good, good, good. Today is truly a day of double happiness. I'll take this opportunity for myself!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河收敛了怒容，心中惊喜莫名：“好好好，今日真是双喜临门，这机缘我就收下了！”

0014.en: Outside the bewildering formation, Lv Yang's expression was serious.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 迷踪阵外，吕阳则是神色凝重。

0014.en: "How troublesome..."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “真是棘手啊”

0014.en: He thought he had been ruthless enough, but Zhao Xuhe still found a sliver of hope and survived his initial attack.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他自问下手已经足够狠辣了，结果却还是被赵旭河抓住了一线生机，没能一套连招就直接将他弄死。

0014.en: He had even been identified.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 甚至还被他看出了身份。

0014.en: But with the bewildering formation confusing his enemy, his real body was hidden. He was attacking from a distance with his flying sword. If they really fought, his chances of winning were higher.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 不过此刻有迷踪阵混淆八方，他真身躲在暗处，只用飞剑遥攻，真打起来还是他这边胜算更大一分。

0014.en: At the same time, Zhao Xuhe also discovered the bewildering formation. It was only a crude trap, and he could break it with a little time. But with Lv Yang interfering and his own True Qi at less than half its peak, he was helpless for the moment.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 与此同时，赵旭河也发现了四周迷踪阵的存在，虽然只是粗浅的困阵，给他一点时间推演就能轻松破开，但有吕阳在旁边干扰，加上他此刻真气不足全盛时期的五成，一时间竟对其无可奈何。

0014.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe's eyes darted, and he suddenly spoke:
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河眼珠子一转，突然开口：

0014.en: "Brother Lv, we don't really have any hatred between us."
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “吕兄，说来你我其实并无什么仇恨.”

0014.en: "Go!"
0014.speaker: 吕阳

0014.en: Strike while the iron is hot. Lv Yang would not chat with Zhao Xuhe and give him a chance to heal. He immediately formed a sword seal and continued his attack.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 趁你病，要你命，吕阳当然不会和赵旭河叙旧，给他疗伤恢复的机会，当即掐动剑诀继续攻向对方。

0014.en: "Tsk! You're doing this the hard way!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “啧！敬酒不吃吃罚酒！”

0014.en: Seeing this, Zhao Xuhe's gaze turned cold. He gave up on stalling and formed a seal, summoning a metal seal into the air.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河见状目光森冷，旋即也放弃了拖时间的念头，转而掐动法决，将一枚金铁印玺祭在了半空中。

0014.en: This item was called the "Prime Magnetism Gold Seal." It could attract all metal objects and was a specific counter to flying swords. It was Zhao Xuhe's secret treasure, which he had planned to use on the battlefield against disciples of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion. He had taken it out early to counter Lv Yang's sword light.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 此物名为“元磁金印”，可以吸摄天下金铁之物，专克飞剑，乃是赵旭河压箱底的秘宝，准备日后前往正魔大战的战场，用来对付玉枢剑阁弟子的，如今却提前拿了出来，打算克制吕阳的剑光。

0014.en: "Freeze!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe activated the seal, precisely catching a slashing sword light. The seal fell and instantly subdued the sword light, making it unable to move.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河催动宝印，精准抓住一道劈斩而来的剑光，一印盖落，瞬间就将那剑光制服，再难动弹挪转。

0014.en: Lv Yang, however, looked calm.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 吕阳见状却是神色如常。

0014.en: He was still at his peak, while Zhao Xuhe was weak. This battle of attrition was in his favor, so he wasn't worried.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他尚处于巅峰状态，赵旭河却是正值低谷，这种消耗真气的拉锯战反而对他有力，所以他根本不慌。

0014.en: "My biggest advantage now is that I'm hidden by the formation. Zhao Xuhe can't find me. Even if he has a trump card, it's useless if he can't see me. As long as I keep wearing him down, I will be the one who wins."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “我现在最大的优势就是躲在暗处，有阵法掩饰，赵旭河找不到我的位置，这样就算他有什么能够反败为胜的手段，只要我不现身，照样无用武之地，只要继续消耗下去，获胜的人肯定是我。”

0014.en: So Lv Yang decided he would not show himself.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 所以吕阳打定主意，我就不现身。

0014.en: My flying sword? I don't need it.
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 飞剑？不要了！

0014.en: You can't refine my flying sword anytime soon, and you have to waste True Qi to suppress it. That's exactly what I want. Let's see how long you can last!
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 反正一时半会儿你也炼化不了我的飞剑，还得消耗真气来镇压它，那样正合我意，看你能坚持多久！

0014.en: "Rumble!"
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: “轰隆隆！”

0014.en: Lv Yang stood outside the formation and channeled his True Qi. A white mist rose from his head and formed a handprint several meters wide, which he sent flying into the formation.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 吕阳站在阵外，将真气运化，自顶上飘出一道氤氲白炁，化作一方数丈大小的手印凌空拍进了阵里。

0014.en: This technique wasn't special; it was pure brute force.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这手段没什么厉害的，纯粹是以力压人。

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe's face darkened. He knew Lv Yang had seen through his plan.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河见状顿时面色一黑，知道自己的谋划已经被吕阳看穿了。

0014.en: "You bastard!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “狗东西！”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe cursed silently. They were both in the middle-stage of Qi Refining, yet his opponent was so cautious. How could he turn the tables?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河忍不住在心中怒骂，明明和自己一样也是炼气中期，却如此小心谨慎，这让他如何反败为胜？

0014.en: He still had the strength for a final, desperate fight. But even if he killed Lv Yang, he himself would not survive. How could he accept that, after finally getting such a great opportunity?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 虽然他还有余力搏命，但就算杀了吕阳，他自己也难以活命，这让好不容易得了机缘的赵旭河如何甘心？

0014.en: Seeing his True Qi draining away, Zhao Xuhe finally couldn't take it anymore and shouted, "Brother Lv, do you know what opportunity I found on this Panlong Island? A third-grade true technique that leads directly to the Golden Core path! If you stop now, I am willing to share it with you!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: 眼看真气消耗越来越多，赵旭河终于按耐不住，高声道：“.吕兄，你可知我此番在这盘龙岛内得到了什么机缘？一本直指金丹大道的三品真功！吕兄若是就此罢手，赵某愿意与你分享功法！”

0014.en: "A third-grade true technique?"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “三品真功？”

0014.en: Outside the formation, Lv Yang stood up abruptly. Cultivation techniques had nine grades and thirty-six ranks. Below the seventh grade, there was no hope for Foundation Establishment. Below the third grade, there was no path to the Golden Core.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 迷踪阵外，吕阳闻言陡然站起了身子，真气九品三十六阶，七品之下筑基无路，三品之下金丹无门。

0014.en: And now, Zhao Xuhe was offering a technique that could cultivate third-grade True Qi and lead to the Golden Core realm!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而现在，赵旭河居然抛出了一本可以让人炼就三品真气，未来金丹有望的功法！

0014.en: What a great opportunity!
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 好大的机缘！

0014.en: "No, wait."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “不，等等.”

0014.en: Lv Yang took a deep breath, suppressed his greed, and sat back down. "He's offering a great reward to lure me out. If I go out, I'll fall into his trap."
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 吕阳深吸一口气，压下贪念又坐回了原位：“此人许以重利，还是想要诱我出去，出去我就中计了。”

0014.en: "How about it, Brother Lv? Can we make a deal?"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “如何？吕兄，可以和解吗？”

0014.en: Inside the formation, Zhao Xuhe was still trying to persuade him when a voice suddenly came from all directions: "Fool. If I kill you, the technique will be mine anyway!"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 迷踪阵内，赵旭河还试图劝说，却听一道声音陡然从四面八方传来：“糊涂，杀了你功法也是我的！”

0014.en: "You are mistaken, Brother Lv." Zhao Xuhe shook his head and smiled. "Opportunities are destined by fate. I earned this third-grade technique through three lifetimes of hard cultivation. It is not fated for you. Even if you kill me, the technique will just fly away. You will not be able to get it."
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “吕兄此言差矣。”赵旭河摇了摇头，笑道：“所谓机缘天定，这三品真功乃是赵某苦修三世，这才用功德换来的机缘，和吕兄你却是无缘，就算你杀了我，功法也只会飞走，不会为你所得的。”

0014.en: "What?"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “什么？”

0014.en: Lv Yang was stunned, his expression flickering. An opportunity destined by fate? Not fated for him, so it would fly away?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 吕阳闻言顿时一愣，随后面色就变得阴晴不定了起来，机缘天定，和功法无缘，得了也会自动飞走？

0014.en: But he quickly recovered and sneered, "If that's the case, why should I make a deal with you for it?"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 不过很快吕阳就反应过来，冷笑道：“既然如此，那我又何必为了这功法与你和解？”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe quickly explained, "You were not fated to have the technique, but if I willingly share it with you, then your fate will change."
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: 赵旭河赶忙解释道：“吕兄你和功法本来无缘，但是如果我主动与吕兄分享，那无缘也变成有缘了。”

0014.en: "...Fine."
0014.speaker: 吕阳

0014.en: After a moment of silence, Lv Yang said, "Make a copy of the technique for me, and I'll let you out."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 吕阳沉默片刻后，道：“你把功法给我抄录一份，我就放你出来。”

0014.en: "It's a deal." Zhao Xuhe agreed immediately. He took out a jade box, opened it, and revealed two volumes of a Daoist scripture inside.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: “就这么办。”赵旭河果断答应，随后他便取出玉匣，主动打开，露出了里面放着的上下两册道书。

0014.en: "The first volume is the 'Nine Transformations Dragonization Art,' a Qi Refining technique that lets you cultivate a 'True Dragon Aura,' making you a top fighter at your level. The second volume is the 'Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding Ascension Scroll,' a Foundation Establishment technique that lets you build a 'Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding' Dao foundation, with the hope of reaching the Golden Core path in the future."
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “上册《九变化龙决》，乃是炼气境功法，可以炼就一道‘真龙煞’，战力在同境界内可称翘楚。下册《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》乃是筑基境功法，可以炼就‘万乘御龙’道基，未来有望金丹大道。”

0014.en: After introducing the technique, Zhao Xuhe's tone suddenly changed:
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河介绍完功法，突然话锋一转：

0014.en: "But Brother Lv, I am injured and my True Qi is weak. What if I give you the technique and you go back on your word and kill me?"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “不过吕兄，我如今有伤在身，真气微弱，若是就这样把功法给了你，你翻脸不认人，毁诺怎么办？”

0014.en: "...That's simple."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “.这个简单。”

0014.en: Lv Yang's eyes darted as he suggested, "You can give me the 'Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding Ascension Scroll' first and keep the 'Nine Transformations Dragonization Art' for yourself."
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: 吕阳眼珠一转，主动提议道：“你可以先把《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》给我，《九变化龙决》你自己留下。”

0014.en: "I'm only in the Qi Refining realm, so I can't practice the Foundation Establishment technique even if I have it. You don't have to worry about me going back on my word and harming you." Lv Yang said with a sincere expression. "After I let you out, you can give me the 'Nine Transformations Dragonization Art.' How about that?"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “我现在只是炼气境，就算有了筑基功法也没办法修炼，你也不用担心我会翻脸不认人，害你性命。”说到这里，吕阳的脸上写满了诚恳：“等我放你出去后，你再将《九变化龙决》给我，如何？”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe thought about it and felt that Lv Yang's words made a lot of sense.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河想了想，觉得吕阳说得很有道理。

0014.en: "A deal is a deal!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “一言为定！”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe took out the "Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding Ascension Scroll" from the jade box. Lv Yang still did not show himself but instead formed a large hand of True Qi to grab it from a distance.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河将《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》从玉匣中取出，吕阳则是依旧不现身，而是凝聚真气大手隔空抓来。

0014.en: Seeing this, Zhao Xuhe could only sigh, giving up his last bit of hope. He obediently handed the technique to Lv Yang.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河见状也只能暗叹一声，压下了最后一丝想法，乖乖将功法交给了吕阳。

0014.en: Lv Yang took the technique and memorized it word by word, then grinned.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 吕阳接过功法，逐字逐句牢记心中，随后咧嘴一笑。

0014.en: "Goodbye!"
0014.speaker: 吕阳
0014.cn: “再见！”

0014.en: The next second, Lv Yang gathered his Qi and activated the Life-Ending Curse, blowing himself up!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 下一秒，吕阳气沉丹田，直接催动杀生咒，悍然自爆！

0014.en: Boom!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 轰隆！

0014.en: A moment later, the dust and smoke cleared, revealing Zhao Xuhe's stunned face.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 片刻后，漫天烟尘消散，露出了赵旭河那张写满了茫然的脸庞。

0014.en: "My technique... is gone?"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “我的功法.没了？”

0014.en: Why did he self-destruct?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 为什么要自爆？

0014.en: And why did he wait until after he got the technique to do it? I haven't even had a chance to read it myself!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 自爆也算了，为什么早不爆晚不爆，就等着拿到了功法之后再自爆那功法我自己都还没来得及看啊！

0014.en: "Lv Yang..."
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “吕阳.”

0014.en: Zhao Xuhe stood in the wind, staring at the ashes of the "Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding Ascension Scroll." As he chanted Lv Yang's name, his expression gradually twisted.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赵旭河站在风中，看着已经变成了飞灰的《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》，念着吕阳的名字，表情渐渐扭曲：

0014.en: "You animal!"
0014.speaker: 赵旭河
0014.cn: “畜生啊！”

0015.en: Chapter 15: Fishing
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 第15章 钓鱼

0015.en: "Who made a deal with you? Maybe in the next life!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “谁和你一言为定？下辈子再说吧！”

0015.en: "With The Hundred Lives Book, I'll just take the 'Ten Thousand Chariots Dragon Riding Ascension Scroll' in this life, and get the 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art' in the next. They will both be mine!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “有百世书在，大不了这一世只要《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》，下一世再要《九变化龙决》照样都是我的！”

0015.en: From the very beginning, Lv Yang had never trusted Zhao Xuhe.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 从一开始，吕阳就没有相信过赵旭河。

0015.en: Sharing the Dao scripture was just a temporary measure. Lv Yang was certain that as soon as Zhao Xuhe escaped, he would find a way to kill him.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 什么分享道书，无非是权宜之计，吕阳笃定只要赵旭河逃出生天，他一定会想办法弄死自己。

0015.en: However, Zhao Xuhe was stronger, and Lv Yang wasn't confident he could kill him to eliminate the threat for good. If they fought to the death, Lv Yang himself might be the one to die.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 偏偏赵旭河实力更强，吕阳没有绝对把握将其击杀，永绝后患，甚至真拼命，死的还有可能是他。

0015.en: Furthermore, his loan was about to be due, and he had no way to repay it. There was little time left in this life. So, as soon as he got the Dao scripture, Lv Yang decisively self-destructed.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 再加上贷款即将到期，他又不可能还，这一世的时间已然所剩无几，所以道书刚一到手，吕阳就干脆利落地自爆了。

0015.en: [You brazenly self-destructed and died.]
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 【你悍然自爆，死了。】

0015.en: [Current remaining pages in The Hundred Lives Book: 97]
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：97】

0015.en: [Restarting a new life, you can choose one of the following gains from your previous life:]
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 【重开一世，你可以从前世的以下收获中选择一项：

0015.en: 1. Treasures.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 一：宝物。

0015.en: 2. Cultivation.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 二：修为。

0015.en: 3. Lifespan.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 三：寿命。

0015.en: 4. Give up all gains and awaken a random talent based on your previous life's experiences.]
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 四：放弃所有收获，根据前世经历随机觉醒一门天赋】

0015.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0015.speaker: 刘信
0015.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0015.en: His consciousness cleared. Liu Xin's familiar and hateful voice sounded from the stage. Lv Yang ignored it and said in his heart, "I choose cultivation."
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 意识恢复清晰，刘信那熟悉可憎的声音在台上响起，吕阳充耳不闻，在心中说道：“我选择修为。”

0015.en: Boom!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 轰隆！

0015.en: In the next second, Lv Yang felt a surge of True Qi erupt from his dantian and quickly flow through his limbs, frantically transforming his essence, energy, and spirit. But he clenched his teeth and activated the Qi-concealing art he had obtained from the three black-robed men, containing all the commotion beneath his skin.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 下一秒，吕阳只觉得一股真气自丹田涌出，随后迅速流向四肢百骸，开始疯狂改造他的精气神，不过他咬紧牙关，运转从三个黑衣人那里得来的敛气决，将所有动静全部都收束在了皮肉之下。

0015.en: A moment later, Lv Yang let out a long, deep breath of turbid air.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 片刻后，吕阳才深深吐出一口浊气。

0015.en: "I'm back again!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “我又回来了！”

0015.en: Fourth level of Qi Refining, mid-stage!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 炼气四层，中期！

0015.en: Lifting his head to look at Liu Xin on the stage, Lv Yang no longer felt the fear he had on their first meeting. At this moment, Liu Xin was only at the sixth level of Qi Refining!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 抬起头，再看向台上的刘信，吕阳已经没有了初见时的恐惧，这时候的刘信也不过是炼气六层罢了！

0015.en: Only after Liu Xin selected an in-name disciple and refined them into Innate True Qi could he break through his bottleneck to the late stage of Qi Refining. Only then would he have a chance of seeing through Lv Yang's Qi-concealing art. Before that, even if Lv Yang stood right in front of him, he would only see him as an ordinary person.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 等他选中一个记名弟子，将其炼成先天一炁之后才能冲开瓶颈，突破炼气后期，到时候他才有可能看穿自己的敛气决，而在那之前，自己哪怕站在他的眼前，他也只会把自己当成一个普通人。

0015.en: "But there's also a pleasant surprise."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “不过也有意外惊喜.”

0015.en: Lv Yang looked inside his dantian and saw a swirling white Qi. It was the Innate True Qi from his previous life. It was still here in this life!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳内视丹田，却见其中赫然飘荡着一道氤氲白炁，赫然是上一世的先天一炁，这一世它居然还在！

0015.en: "I understand now. The Hundred Lives Book doesn't return to the original anchor point, but to my previous life!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “我明白了.百世书回溯的不是最初的锚点，而是我的上一世！”

0015.en: This was undoubtedly a good thing.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这无疑是一件好事。

0015.en: It meant that the treasures, cultivation, and even lifespan he chose in each life could be carried over to the next, so he wouldn't have to start from scratch every time.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 因为它意味着自己每一世选择的宝物，修为，乃至寿命都可以保留到下一世，不用每次都从头开始。

0015.en: Next, Lv Yang's actions were the same as before.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 接下来吕阳的行动一如既往。

0015.en: Go on stage, get assigned, Joyful Union Hall.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 上台，分配，合欢殿。

0015.en: Overcome Yu Suzhen.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 超死玉素真。

0015.en: He lay low, broke through after three months, and became a formal disciple without attracting any attention.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 默默蛰伏，三个月后突破，默默无闻地成为正式弟子。

0015.en: "According to my plan for this life, besides the remaining 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art', there are two other major things worth trying."
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “这一世按照我的规划，除了剩下的那一卷《九变化龙决》之外，还有两件大事也值得去尝试一番。”

0015.en: The first was naturally the "Merit Lottery".
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 第一个自然是“功德博彩”。

0015.en: Lv Yang stayed in his grotto for a few days, then went to the Merit Hall to accept the "Accumulate Merit" mission. Afterward, he rushed straight to the Merit Pool.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳在洞府里待了几天，随后便前往善功楼，领了“积功德”的任务，紧接着马不停蹄直奔功德池。

0015.en: Standing in the crowd around the Merit Pool, Lv Yang coolly combed his hair and began to imagine how he would spend the grand prize from the Merit Pool.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 站在功德池周围的人群里，吕阳帅气地梳了个头发，开始构想自己抽中功德池大奖之后应该怎么花。

0015.en: "A billion, a billion, enough to last a lifetime~!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 十个亿啊十个亿，一生一世花不完~！

0015.en: Goodbye, poverty. I will miss you.
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 再见了，贫穷，我会想念你的

0015.en: In the next second, a commotion erupted in the crowd. Countless people looked at Lv Yang in surprise, and at the Merit Fish that had been drawn with the number he chose.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 下一秒，人群中顿时响起了一阵喧哗，无数人惊讶地看向了吕阳，还有被他选中数字抽出的功德鱼。

0015.en: "Brother, you've got good luck."
0015.speaker: 陌生男1
0015.cn: “兄弟，运气不错啊。”

0015.en: Someone approached Lv Yang, his tone envious. "A purple Merit Fish. Although it's only a little better than white and blue, it's still a rare sight."
0015.speaker: 陌生男1
0015.cn: 有人凑到了吕阳身边，语气羡慕：“紫色功德鱼，虽然只比白色和蓝色好一点，但也算难得一遇了。”

0015.en: "...What?"
0015.speaker: 吕阳

0015.en: Lv Yang tilted his head, a question mark appearing above it.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳头一歪，脑袋上浮现一行问号。

0015.en: A purple Merit Fish?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 紫色功德鱼？

0015.en: Not a rainbow one?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 不是彩色？

0015.en: Lv Yang quickly looked at the Merit Fish he had drawn. It was glowing with a purple light. He checked the number he had chosen; it was 2025113, that was correct.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳赶紧看向自己抽出的功德鱼，赫然泛着一行蓝光，再去看自己选的数字，是2025113也没有错啊。

0015.en: Why didn't I win!?
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 为什么没中！？

0015.en: Could that lucky person from his past life, Xiao Shiye, have been lying? But he couldn't have known someone could restart their life, so he had no reason to lie.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 难道前世那个幸运儿，萧石叶说谎了？可是他又不可能知道有人可以重开一世，根本没理由说谎啊。

0015.en: In that case...
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 如此说来

0015.en: "This is rigged!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “有黑幕啊！”

0015.en: Lv Yang's hands trembled with anger, his face flushed red. He finally understood: what lucky person? That Xiao Shiye was clearly a plant!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳气得手都在抖，脸色憋得通红，这才明白过来：什么幸运儿，那个萧石叶分明就是内定的狗托！

0015.en: "Forget it, at least it's a Merit Fish." Lv Yang could only comfort himself this way. Purple was still rare, second only to gold and rainbow. Although he missed the billion-point prize, eating the purple Merit Fish could probably help his cultivation reach the fifth level of Qi Refining quickly.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “算了，好歹也是一条功德鱼”吕阳只能这么安慰自己，紫色也算是稀有了，仅次于金色和彩色，虽然和十亿大奖无缘，但把紫色功德鱼吃了，估计也能让自己的修为快速达到炼气五层。

0015.en: Thinking this, Lv Yang felt much better.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这么一想，吕阳感觉好多了。

0015.en: Then, just in case, he didn't take the Merit Fish back to his grotto. He ate it on the spot in front of everyone and then began to meditate to refine its energy.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 随后以防万一，他没有带着功德鱼返回洞府，而是当着所有人就地食用，接着便开始调息运功炼化。

0015.en: After he finished, Lv Yang clearly felt several gazes on him disappear.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 做完一切后，吕阳明显感觉落在自己身上的几道视线散去了。

0015.en: The result was as he expected. The essence of the purple Merit Fish allowed him to smoothly break through to the fifth level of Qi Refining, and he even touched the threshold of the sixth level.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 结果也不出他所料，紫色功德鱼的精气让他顺利突破了炼气五层，甚至让他摸到了炼气六层的门槛。

0015.en: "And this is just purple. If it were rainbow..."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “这还只是紫色，如果是彩色.”

0015.en: Lv Yang was lost in thought for a moment. After all, when Xiao Shiye ate the rainbow Merit Fish in his past life, he went from the first level of Qi Refining straight to the peak overnight.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳一阵心驰神往，毕竟前世那个萧石叶食用彩色功德鱼后，一夜之间就从炼气一层直升大圆满了。

0015.en: "Forget it, I can't force it."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “算了，不强求。”

0015.en: Lv Yang quickly calmed down. The first matter was a failure, but there was still a chance for the second: the "Death Substitute Yin Puppet Price Bubble Incident".
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳很快恢复平静，第一件事算是告吹了，但第二件事还有机会，那就是“替死阴傀价格泡沫事件”。

0015.en: The old man in the Library Pavilion, Wang Bairong, had nearly lost his fortune because of it, and was then tricked by Zhao Xuhe into becoming cannon fodder for Dragon Coil Island. But in the end, it was because Wang Bairong had entered the market too late. He was different; he knew exactly when this price bubble would change.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 藏书阁老人王柏荣因为这个几乎输了个倾家荡产，结果被赵旭河趁机蒙骗，成为了盘龙岛的炮灰。不过说到底，这还是因为王柏荣入场太晚，而他不一样，他很清楚这场价格泡沫的变动时间。

0015.en: "The price is actually already starting to rise."
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: “现在其实已经有上涨趋势了。”

0015.en: Lv Yang opened his disciple token and checked the price of the Death Substitute Yin Puppet. He saw that it had indeed fluctuated slightly. It was clear that insiders were manipulating it.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳打开弟子令牌，查看替死阴傀的价格，发现果然有了些许浮动，显然是有知情人在内幕操作了。

0015.en: "To enter the market, I still need a large enough amount of capital..."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “想要入场，我现在还缺一笔够份额的本金.”

0015.en: Lv Yang thought for a moment and turned to go to the Merit Hall.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳想了想，转身前往了善功楼。

0015.en: As expected, in the eyes of the older disciples, a new disciple like him was a lamb ready for slaughter. Before long, Zhao Xuhe approached him.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 不出所料，他这个新入门的弟子在老弟子眼中就是待宰的小肥羊，没过多久赵旭河就主动走了过来。

0015.en: "Junior Brother, you don't look so good. Are you having some kind of trouble?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “这位师弟，你脸色不太好，是遇到了什么困难吗？”

0015.en: Lv Yang looked up and gave a bitter smile. "What trouble could it be? Just a lack of money. Do you know of any missions to earn Contribution Points, Senior Brother?"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 吕阳闻言抬起头，苦笑一声：“能有什么困难，还不是缺钱，不知师兄可有什么能赚贡献点的任务？”

0015.en: "So it's about money... I understand. I've been there. When I was your age, I was also worried about Contribution Points, stressed every day. My cultivation partner even left me...唉, endless missions, it felt like there was no hope."
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “原来是缺钱啊.也是，师兄我是过来人，在你这个年纪的时候也在为贡献点发愁，每天焦头烂额，道侣还嫌弃我，和我分手了.哎，每天都是做不完的任务，感觉日子一点盼头都没有。”

0015.en: Zhao Xuhe sighed, acting as if he and Lv Yang were in the same boat.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 赵旭河语气唏嘘，一副和吕阳同病相怜的模样。

0015.en: After speaking, he patted Lv Yang's shoulder and said, "Senior Brother, I've wasted half my life to finally learn a universal truth."
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: 说完，他又拍了拍吕阳的肩膀，道：“师兄我蹉跎半生，最后才总结出一个放之四海而皆准的道理。”

0015.en: "And that is, money is static."
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “那就是，钱是死的。”

0015.en: "So you have to make money make money, use Contribution Points to earn more Contribution Points. Only then can you escape being a slave to the sect and escape this fate of being livestock!"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “所以要让钱生钱，用贡献点去赚贡献点，才不会成为圣宗的奴隶，才能摆脱这种牛马一般的命运！”

0015.en: Lv Yang's face showed admiration. "Listening to you, Senior Brother, is better than ten years of studying!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 吕阳闻言顿时面露佩服之色：“听君一席话，胜读十年书啊！”

0015.en: But soon, Lv Yang lowered his head in disappointment. "But Senior Brother, I don't even have any Contribution Points now. How can I earn more?"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 不过很快，吕阳又失落地低下了头：“可是师兄，我现在就连贡献点都没有，又拿什么去赚贡献点？”

0015.en: "Too small! Your thinking is too small!"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “小了！格局小了！”

0015.en: Zhao Xuhe's expression became even friendlier as he smiled, showing his teeth. "You may not have money now, but you can borrow it. Just pay it back after you've earned more, right?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: 赵旭河的表情愈发亲切，露齿一笑：“你现在虽然没有钱，但是你可以借啊，赚到钱再还不就行了？”

0015.en: "But..." Lv Yang still looked hesitant.
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “可是.”吕阳还是一脸犹豫。

0015.en: Seeing a new business opportunity, Zhao Xuhe was not about to let it go. He quickly said, "How about this? I feel a connection with you, Junior Brother. I'll lend you some!"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: 赵旭河眼看业绩来了，哪里肯放过，赶紧道：“这样吧，我看小师弟你和我有缘，我借你一笔好了！”

0015.en: Lv Yang's eyes lit up. "Really?"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 吕阳顿时目光一亮：“真的吗？”

0015.en: Seeing his eager expression, Zhao Xuhe was certain the fish was hooked!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 看着他那垂涎若渴的模样，赵旭河当即笃定，鱼儿上钩了！

0015.en: "Of course it's true!"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “当然是真的！”

0015.en: Zhao Xuhe patted his chest to guarantee it, while also mentioning the reputation of his Three Rivers Association. Then he asked Lv Yang, "How much are you planning to borrow, Junior Brother?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: 赵旭河一边拍着胸脯保证，一边又拿出了所谓三河会的招牌，随后才问吕阳：“师弟你准备贷多少？”

0015.en: Lv Yang was silent for a moment, then held up two fingers.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 吕阳沉默片刻后，竖起了两根手指。

0015.en: "Two hundred?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: “两百？”

0015.en: "Two thousand!"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “两千！”

0015.en: Lv Yang had a determined look on his face. "To be honest, I haven't used my technique loan yet, which is worth 1000 Contribution Points. I also have my newcomer benefits: the White Bone Flying Sword, the Qi and Blood Pills, the Human-Faced Owl... I'll use these as collateral. Senior Brother Zhao, can you lend me 2000 Contribution Points?"
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 吕阳一脸决绝：“实不相瞒，我的功法贷还没有用，功法贷相当于1000贡献点，还有我的新人福利，白骨飞剑，气血丸，人面枭.我用这些作为抵押，赵师兄，你能给我贷2000贡献点吗？”

0015.en: Zhao Xuhe was stunned.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 赵旭河愣住了。

0015.en: Are young people these days all so reckless?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 现在的年轻人，做事都这么虎的吗？

0015.en: I've only just said a few words, and you're already going all in?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 我这才忽悠几句呢，你就直接梭哈了？

0015.en: Before Zhao Xuhe could react, Lv Yang said something even more shocking. "Senior Brother Zhao, I plan to buy Death Substitute Yin Puppets with everything I have."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: 还没有等赵旭河反应过来，吕阳就说出了让他更加震惊的话：“赵师兄，我打算全仓买入替死阴傀。”

0015.en: "What!?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河

0015.en: Zhao Xuhe was shocked at first, but then, as if he had thought of something, he quickly lowered his voice. "Junior Brother... don't tell me you have some inside information?"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河
0015.cn: 赵旭河先是震惊，随后又仿佛想到了什么，迅速压低声音：“师弟.你该不会是知道了什么内幕吧？”

0015.en: "Senior Brother is wise." Lv Yang also lowered his voice. "I was choosing a technique in the Library Pavilion earlier and overheard Senior Brother Wang Bairong at the door. It seems the war in the south is not going well, and the Myriad-Corpse Pit that produces the Death Substitute Yin Puppets has fallen. The sect is just keeping the news secret..."
0015.speaker: 吕阳
0015.cn: “师兄明鉴。”吕阳同样低声道：“我之前在藏书阁选功法的时候，偷听到了门口的王柏荣王师兄说的话，好像是南方战况不利，产出替死阴傀的万人坑失陷了，只是圣宗秘密封锁了相关消息.”

0015.en: "Hiss!"
0015.speaker: 赵旭河

0015.en: Hearing this, Zhao Xuhe gasped. His eyes filled with intense greed, as he clearly smelled a business opportunity.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 此言一出，赵旭河顿时倒抽一口凉气，紧接着他的双眼就浮现出了浓烈的贪婪，显然也嗅到了商机。

0015.en: If this news was true, then a chance to get rich had arrived!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 如果消息为真，那发财的机会可就来了！

0015.en: Looking at the excited Zhao Xuhe, Lv Yang sneered inwardly.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 看着激动难耐的赵旭河，吕阳心中冷笑。

0015.en: The fish is hooked!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 鱼儿上钩了！

0015.en: Is anyone even reading this? It feels like I'm playing a single-player game.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 感觉一直在单机有人不。

0016.en: Chapter 16: The Frenzied Bubble
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 第16章 疯狂的泡沫

0016.en: With Zhao Xuhe's guarantee, Lv Yang successfully borrowed 2,000 contribution points from the "Three Rivers Society" behind him and bought Death-Substitute Yin Puppets with all of it.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 有了赵旭河的担保，吕阳顺利从他背后的“三河会”贷到了2000贡献点，然后全仓买入替死阴傀。

0016.en: Meanwhile, Zhao Xuhe was pacing excitedly in his cave residence.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而另一边，赵旭河也在洞府里兴奋地踱步。

0016.en: "The news is actually true!"
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “消息居然是真的！”

0016.en: After receiving the news from his master, he was incredibly excited. "The Sect's Mass Grave in Jiangnan was actually captured by the Yushu Sword Pavilion."
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: 接到师尊传来的消息之后，他顿时激动不已：“圣宗在江南的那座万人坑居然真被玉枢剑阁攻下了。”

0016.en: "The attacker was the Third Elder of the Yushu Sword Pavilion, that peerless sword cultivator known as the 'Demon-Purging Master'."
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “出手者乃是玉枢剑阁的三长老，那位号称‘荡魔真人’的绝世剑修。”

0016.en: "It will be impossible to recapture it in the short term."
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “短时间内，夺回是不可能了。”

0016.en: "With the Mass Grave lost, the price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets is bound to rise. This is a great opportunity for us to speculate and hoard them!"
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “万人坑失守，替死阴傀短时间内的价格上涨已经注定，正是我们投机倒把，囤积居奇的大好机会！”

0016.en: "I'm going to be rich!"
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “我要发财了！”

0016.en: As a deacon disciple at the Merit Hall in the Chu Sheng Sect, Zhao Xuhe certainly didn't lack background, connections, foresight, or greed. As soon as he confirmed Lv Yang's news was true, he immediately started raising money and invested all his available funds into Death-Substitute Yin Puppets.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 能在圣宗混到一个善功楼执事弟子的身份，赵旭河当然不会缺背景和人脉，更不会缺眼力和贪婪，因此一确定吕阳的消息为真，他立刻就开始凑钱，然后将手里的现金全部重仓买入替死阴傀。

0016.en: And events unfolded just as he expected.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而事情的发展也正如他所料。

0016.en: As news of the Jiangnan Mass Grave incident spread, more and more people who "sensed a business opportunity" began to buy up Death-Substitute Yin Puppets from the market at high prices.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 随着江南万人坑的事件传开，越来越多“察觉到商机”的人开始在市面上扫货，高价购买替死阴傀。

0016.en: Just like in any speculative bubble, the first people to enter the market made a lot of money.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 就像是所有投机泡沫一样，最先入场的人都赚了不少钱。

0016.en: However, as the situation developed, everyone discovered that the price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets showed no signs of decreasing. The buying price was high, and the selling price was even higher.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 然而随着事件的发酵，大家发现替死阴傀的价格完全没有降低的趋势，买的时候高，卖的时候更高。

0016.en: Making money suddenly became easy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赚钱突然变得容易起来了。

0016.en: Just by buying and selling, one could easily earn contribution points that would have previously required completing several, or even dozens, of sect missions.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 只要买进来，再卖出去，就能轻松赚到以前需要完成几个，甚至几十个宗门任务才能赚到的贡献点。

0016.en: And so, more people went into a frenzy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 于是，疯狂的人更多了。

0016.en: More and more people began to invest their savings, hoping to make money. And they did, which stimulated the market even further.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 越来越多的人开始拿出自己的积蓄入场，希望以此赚钱，然后他们也确实赚到了，更加刺激了市场。

0016.en: Even the more cautious people felt upset when they saw fellow disciples they usually looked down on earning more money than them simply by buying something, waiting a few days, and selling it. So, they naturally joined the wave too.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 哪怕是比较谨慎的人，再发现平日里自己看不起的同门只是把东西买回来，等了几天又卖出去，就赚到了比自己更多的钱，心理自然不平衡了起来，于是他们也理所当然地加入了这场浪潮中。

0016.en: In this wave, the price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets soared.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 在如此浪潮下，替死阴傀的价格可谓是节节攀升。

0016.en: From the initial 200 contribution points, it climbed to 300. A fifty percent price increase drove countless speculators into a greater frenzy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 从最开始的200贡献点，一路攀升到了300贡献点，百分之五十的价格让无数投机者更加癫狂起来。

0016.en: After all, its price didn't stop; it was still rising.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 毕竟它的价格并未停滞，还在上涨。

0016.en: It's rising today, so it will definitely rise tomorrow. If it rises tomorrow, why wouldn't it keep rising the day after? Not buying now is a loss!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 它今天在涨，明天肯定还会涨，明天涨了，后天又有什么理由不会继续涨？这个时候不买就是亏啊！

0016.en: So, more and more people rushed to get in on the action.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 于是越来越多的人闻风而动。

0016.en: 300, 400, 500... Finally, when the price soared to 500 contribution points, people's reason returned, and they felt it was about enough.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 300，400，500终于，当价格飙到500贡献点的时候，人们的理智有所恢复，觉得好像差不多了。

0016.en: "Time to sell!"
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “可以卖了！”

0016.en: Zhao Xuhe was the first to seize this delicate moment. He began secretly selling off the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets he had hoarded in batches, preparing to cash out and exit the market.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 赵旭河最先抓住了这个微妙的节点，开始暗中分批抛售自己之前囤积的替死阴傀，准备变现离场了。

0016.en: At the same time, the price in the entire Death-Substitute Yin Puppet market began to fall.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 与此同时，整个替死阴傀市场的价格也开始回落。

0016.en: After all, Zhao Xuhe wasn't the only smart person in the world. Others also keenly noticed the downward trend and began to gradually sell off their stock.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 毕竟这世上不止赵旭河一个聪明人，也有人敏锐看出了下跌的趋势，开始逐步抛售自己手里的货物。

0016.en: If things had continued this way, the price would have crashed completely and returned to normal within a few days.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 如果照这样发展，不用几天，价格就会彻底雪崩，然后回归正轨。

0016.en: However, just as this wave was about to subside, a piece of news suddenly spread throughout the entire Chu Sheng Sect overnight from the upper echelons.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 然而就是在这么一个浪潮即将平息的时候，突然，一个消息从初圣宗的高层，一夜之间传遍了全宗。

0016.en: "The Sect is preparing to counterattack!"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “圣宗要准备反扑了！”

0016.en: "The loss of the Mass Grave in Jiangnan has angered a True Master, who has decided to personally take action, gather disciples, and fight the Yushu Sword Pavilion!"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “江南万人坑失守导致门内一位真人大怒，决定亲自出手，抽调门中弟子反攻，和玉枢剑阁斗一场！”

0016.en: "A great war is coming!"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “大战将至！”

0016.en: In times of war, the prices of all war-related supplies were bound to rise.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 战争时期，所有对战争有利的物资都要涨价。

0016.en: And how important was a Death-Substitute Yin Puppet, an item that could save a life at a critical moment, in the bloody and brutal righteous-demonic war to come?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而替死阴傀，一个可以在关键时刻救命的道具，在血腥残酷，即将到来的正魔大战之中又有多重要？

0016.en: It was like a second life!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 无异于第二条命！

0016.en: Without a doubt, on the very night this news spread, the price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets, which had already begun to fall, experienced a second surge!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 毫无疑问，就在这个消息传开的当天晚上，本来已经开始回落的替死阴傀价格就迎来了第二次暴涨！

0016.en: Not only did it instantly return to its peak of 500 contribution points, but it was still climbing!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 不仅瞬间回到了巅峰时的500贡献点，而且还在攀升！

0016.en: By the next morning, 500 contribution points had become 1,000, a fivefold increase from the original price of 200!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 等到第二天早上，500贡献点已经变成了1000贡献点，对比200贡献点的原价竟然足足翻了五倍！

0016.en: "Hahahahaha!"
0016.speaker: 王柏荣
0016.cn: “哈哈哈哈哈！”

0016.en: In the Library Pavilion, Wang Borong stood on his precious rocking chair, dancing with excitement, his old face flushed with a feverish enthusiasm.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 藏书阁，只见王柏荣站在他那张宝贝摇椅上，兴奋地手舞足蹈，一张老脸充斥着激动的血色和狂热。

0016.en: "Rise! Keep rising for me!"
0016.speaker: 王柏荣
0016.cn: “涨！给我继续涨！”

0016.en: "No, I have to buy more. Selling what I have now won't make much. I need to hoard more, and I'll have enough for a cave residence!"
0016.speaker: 王柏荣
0016.cn: “不行，我得再买点，现在这么点卖出去了也赚不到多少钱再囤点，一座洞府的贡献点可就有了！”

0016.en: At this moment, a carnival for ordinary disciples erupted throughout the entire Sect.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 这一刻，整个圣宗都迎来了普通弟子的狂欢。

0016.en: These ordinary disciples lacked foresight, connections, and information channels, so they were still buying when others were secretly selling.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 这些普通弟子没什么眼力，也没什么人脉和消息渠道，所以当别人暗中抛售的时候，他们还在买入。

0016.en: And now, they had struck it rich.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而现在，他们发了。

0016.en: Countless ordinary disciples saw their wealth double overnight, earning more than the total assets of some senior disciples with backgrounds and connections.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 不知道多少普通弟子一夜间身价翻倍，赚的钱甚至超过了一些有背景有后台的资深弟子的全部资产。

0016.en: For a time, countless unbelievable stories spread throughout the Sect.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 一时间，无数个天方夜谭的故事传遍了圣宗。

0016.en: For example, a poor boy, publicly shamed by his fiancée who broke off their engagement, furiously broke it off with her after his wealth doubled, leaving behind the words, "Don't bully a young man for being poor..."
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 比如某个穷困潦倒，被未婚妻当众退婚的穷小子，在身家翻倍后怒休未婚妻，留下一句莫欺少年穷

0016.en: Or a little girl who had to live under someone else's roof after her father died and her mother remarried. Before buying the puppets, she was beaten and scolded by her stepmother daily and couldn't even protect her father's inheritance. Now, with her wealth doubled, she immediately bought a high-class cave residence in full.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 再比如某个由于父亲身死，母亲改嫁，不得不寄人篱下的小女孩，在买替死阴傀之前还过着每天都被继母随意打骂，连父亲遗产都保不住的生活，如今身价翻倍，立刻全款买下一栋高级洞府

0016.en: Do you have a dream? Do you want to achieve it?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 你有梦想吗？想实现梦想吗？

0016.en: Come and buy Death-Substitute Yin Puppets!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 来买替死阴傀吧！

0016.en: This frenzy, where everyone was involved, reached its absolute peak one day when a disciple at the peak of Qi Refinement suddenly broke through and successfully achieved Foundation Establishment.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 这种人人投入其中的疯狂在某一天，一位炼气圆满的弟子突然突破，成功筑基之后彻底达到了巅峰。

0016.en: Because that disciple publicly admitted that his breakthrough was entirely due to earning enough contribution points by trading Death-Substitute Yin Puppets to buy a Foundation Establishment Pill. He had to thank the puppets; without them, he could never have changed his destiny...
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 因为那位成功筑基的弟子当众坦言，他之所以能突破，完全是通过买卖替死阴傀赚到了足够的贡献点，然后全款买了一枚筑基丹，所以他要感谢替死阴傀，如果不是它，自己不可能逆天改命

0016.en: Complete madness.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 彻底疯了。

0016.en: 1,000, 2,000, 3,000... The price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets skyrocketed, and as the price soared, some were happy, while others were naturally sad.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 1000，2000，3000替死阴傀的价格一骑绝尘，而看着飞涨的价格，有人高兴，自然也有人伤心。

0016.en: Among the happy ones was Lv Yang.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 高兴的人，比如吕阳。

0016.en: He didn't hesitate, choosing to sell decisively when the price hit 2,000.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他不谈，在价格飙到2000的时候果断选择了抛售。

0016.en: After all, buying 10 for 200 contribution points each and selling them for 2,000 was a tenfold profit, bringing in 20,000 contribution points!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 毕竟原价200贡献点买回来10个，2000贡献点卖出去，一来一回就是十倍利润，两万贡献点进账！

0016.en: Among the sad ones was Zhao Xuhe.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 伤心的人，比如赵旭河。

0016.en: When he saw the price rebound, he was green with regret, especially after seeing Wang Borong, whom he had previously looked down on and even planned to swindle.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 当看到价格回升时，他悔得肠子都青了，尤其是在看到他以前瞧不起，甚至打算坑害的王柏荣之后。

0016.en: As far as he knew, Wang Borong, a man who had been mediocre for decades and was halfway to the grave, had hoarded more than 20 Death-Substitute Yin Puppets, all bought at high prices during this period. When he was secretly selling his own, he had mocked Wang Borong as a leek waiting to be harvested.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 据他所知，王柏荣这个庸碌了几十年，半截身子都快要埋进土里的家伙足足囤了20多个替死阴傀，全都是这段时间内高价买进来的，之前自己偷偷抛售的时候，还暗自嘲笑他是待割的韭菜。

0016.en: But now, that damn guy was about to earn 100,000 contribution points!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 可是现在，他特么都快要赚到10万贡献点了！

0016.en: If it were just that he himself hadn't earned it, that would have been one thing.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 如果只是自己没赚到，那也就罢了。

0016.en: But seeing Wang Borong earn so many contribution points, grinning from ear to ear every day, felt even worse than losing money himself!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 可是当赵旭河看到王柏荣赚了这么多贡献点，每天乐得合不拢嘴，那感觉真的是被他亏了还要难受！

0016.en: And after watching the price of the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets rise relentlessly without stopping, Zhao Xuhe thought it over and hesitated for a whole night.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而在看到替死阴傀的价格一路上涨，毫不停歇的趋势后，赵旭河更是思前想后，犹豫了整整一晚上。

0016.en: Finally, he re-entered the market.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 最后，他二次入场了。

0016.en: He threw the contribution points he had earned from cashing out earlier back into the Death-Substitute Yin Puppet market.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 此前离场赚到的贡献点被他又扔回了替死阴傀的市场。

0016.en: At first, he remained cautious and didn't invest all his points, but as he watched the price keep rising, he felt like he was losing out with every point it went up.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 一开始他还保持谨慎，没有投入全部贡献点，可眼看价格一直涨，每涨一点他就感觉自己亏了一点。

0016.en: "Opportunity knocks but once. I've already missed it once, how can I miss it a second time?"
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “机不可失，失不再来，我已经错过了一次，怎么能错过第二次？”

0016.en: "It will keep rising. Buying now is better than buying later."
0016.speaker: 赵旭河
0016.cn: “它还会涨的，现在买总比以后买好了.”

0016.en: There were many others who thought the same as Zhao Xuhe.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 和赵旭日想法相同的人还有很多。

0016.en: And when this group of people, who had been the first to cash out, re-entered the market, it stimulated the price of Death-Substitute Yin Puppets to rise even further, strengthening people's confidence.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而当这么一批最早变现离场的人又重新返场，再度刺激了替死阴傀上涨，也更加坚定了人们的信心。

0017.en: Chapter 17: Others are Fearful, I'm Buying More
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 第17章 别人恐惧我加仓

0017.en: Actually, Zhao Xuhe also knew that the Death Substitute Puppet had become a complete bubble, ready to burst and crash at any moment.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 其实赵旭河也清楚，事到如今替死阴傀已经完全变成了一个泡沫，随时都可能爆炸，然后彻底崩盘。

0017.en: But he believed that with his sharp senses, he could definitely exit the market in time.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 但是他觉得以自己的敏锐，肯定能及时离场。

0017.en: So when Lv Yang contacted him, saying he had already sold his puppets and wanted to repay the 2000 Contribution Point loan, Zhao Xuhe felt it was a pity.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 因此当吕阳联系上他，说是已经离场，想要还之前借的2000贡献点贷款时候，赵旭河还替他可惜。

0017.en: "Reckless, Junior Brother, you are too reckless!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “草率，师弟你太草率了啊！”

0017.en: "Haven't you seen that the price of the Death Substitute Puppet is still rising? The war hasn't even started yet. When it really begins, the demand will truly be greater than the supply!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “你没有看到替死阴傀的价格还在涨吗？这还是没开战呢，等真正开战了，那时才是真的供不应求！”

0017.en: "While the price hasn't risen too much, I suggest you buy them back quickly."
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “趁现在还没涨的太过分，我建议你赶紧买回来。”

0017.en: Faced with Zhao Xuhe's strong persuasion, Lv Yang remained rational.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 面对赵旭河的力劝，吕阳却保持了理智。

0017.en: Although he was also envious of the soaring price of the puppets and even regretted selling so early, he understood Zhao Xuhe's real reason for persuading him.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 虽然他也对暴涨的替死阴傀很眼红，甚至后悔那么早抛售，但是他更清楚赵旭河此刻劝自己的理由。

0017.en: "Caring about me?"
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: 关心自己？

0017.en: "Don't be foolish. He wants to pull more people into the market!"
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: 别傻了，他是想要拉人入场！

0017.en: After all, the more people who entered the market, the better his chances were to cash out and leave.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 毕竟越多一个人入场，他就越有机会变现离场。

0017.en: "I need to hold back. I'm not in a hurry."
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: “忍住，我不急。”

0017.en: "In this life, I'll observe the situation first and confirm the highest price point. In the next life, I will repeat the process. That will be my real chance to make a fortune."
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: “这一世先看看情况，确认好价格最高点，等下一世我再重复操作一遍，到时候才是我大赚的良机.”

0017.en: "With the 'Hundred Lives Book', I will only profit and never lose!"
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: 有【百世书】在，我只会赚，永远不会亏！

0017.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's mood instantly calmed down. He directly settled the loan with Zhao Xuhe and then went into seclusion, ignoring the outside world.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 想到这里，吕阳的心情瞬间平衡多了，直接和赵旭河结清了贷款，然后便直接闭关，不再理会外界。

0017.en: While Lv Yang was in seclusion, the price of the Death Substitute Puppet continued to soar.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 就在吕阳闭关的同时，替死阴傀的价格还在飞涨。

0017.en: Because the Chu Sheng Sect had really started preparing for war!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 因为初圣宗真的做出了备战的动作！

0017.en: A large number of disciples received orders and left the sect one after another, their destinations unknown. In this situation, the price of the puppets naturally couldn't fall at all.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 大批弟子收到了调令，陆续离宗，不知去向.这种情况下，替死阴傀的价格自然不可能有丝毫下跌。

0017.en: No matter how expensive, those who were about to go to the great war between sects had to grit their teeth and buy them.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 哪怕再贵，那些即将奔赴正魔大战的人也只能咬着牙买下。

0017.en: After all, money could be earned again, but they only had one life.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 毕竟钱还可以再赚，命只有一条。

0017.en: Under these circumstances, more and more people chose to enter the market. Most of them were not ordinary disciples, but disciples from prominent families.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 而在这种情况下，越来越多的人选择了入场，其中大部分甚至不是普通弟子，而是真正的世家子弟。

0017.en: Compared to ordinary disciples, these family disciples came from wealthy backgrounds. Their elders were at least at the Foundation Establishment realm, so they had far more Contribution Points to use. After they entered the market, the price of the puppets, which had been slowing down, took off again.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 比起普通弟子，这些世家弟子出身豪门，长辈最差也是一位筑基真人，可以动用的贡献点无疑比那些普通弟子要强出许多。因此在他们入场后，本来还有放缓趋势的替死阴傀价格再度起飞了。

0017.en: Three thousand, four thousand, five thousand...
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 三千，四千，五千

0017.en: Clearly, this price was no longer on the same level as the puppet's actual value. Some people even began to leave the market out of fear.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 很显然，这个价格已经和替死阴傀的价值不是一个层面了，甚至已经有些人出于恐惧，开始离场了。

0017.en: In this situation, the price of the Death Substitute Puppet naturally began to fall.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这种情况下，替死阴傀的价格自然出现了下跌。

0017.en: A similar panic gradually spread, but many people, especially those who had experienced the first dip, remained full of confidence.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 类似的恐慌也渐渐弥漫开来，然而却有更多的人，尤其是经历过第一次下跌的人却依旧充满了信心。

0017.en: "Don't panic, this is just a technical correction!"
0017.speaker: 陌生男1
0017.cn: “不要慌，这只是技术性调整！”

0017.en: "Selling off? It's still too early!"
0017.speaker: 陌生男2
0017.cn: “抛售？还早的很呢！”

0017.en: This time, Zhao Xuhe felt he had learned his lesson.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这一次，赵旭河觉得自己吸取了教训。

0017.en: He had left the market early before, and when he re-entered, he not only didn't make a profit but also suffered a small loss. How could he make the same mistake twice?
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 之前他就是因为提早离场，结果二次入场不仅没赚，还小亏了一笔，同样的亏他怎么可能吃第二次？

0017.en: "The war between sects hasn't started yet, and the supply of puppets in the market is still plentiful, so it seems like the price has peaked. But once the war begins, the puppets will be consumed in large numbers, and there are no replacements. Everyone will have to come back and buy them!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
