0017.cn: “正魔大战还没开始打呢，市面上的替死阴傀量还很足，所以现在乍看上去价格好像已经到头了。可是一旦开打，替死阴傀必然大量消耗，又没有其他同质品代替，到时候大家还是要回来买！”

0017.en: "At that time, the price will surely see a third surge!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “到了那时，价格必然迎来第三次暴涨！”

0017.en: "What's a mere five thousand Contribution Points? Seven thousand, or even ten thousand is possible! It will be a seller's market. It's a matter of life and death, so everyone will sell everything they have to buy one!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “区区五千贡献点算什么？七千，甚至一万都有可能！有价无市，事关性命，大家砸锅卖铁也得买！”

0017.en: Zhao Xuhe felt his analysis was absolutely flawless.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 赵旭河觉得自己的分析简直天衣无缝。

0017.en: "So, while those fools are selling out of fear... I'm going to buy more!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “所以趁着那些蠢货因为恐惧而抛售.我要加仓！”

0017.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe not only invested all his savings, but he also took out a large loan based on the reputation of the Three Rivers Association.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河不仅将所有积蓄都投入了进去，甚至还去借贷，靠着三河会的信誉借了一大笔款。

0017.en: He went all in.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 他梭哈了。

0017.en: Of course, Zhao Xuhe wasn't the only "smart one." Others made the same judgment and began to buy up everything on the market.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 赵旭河当然不是唯一的“聪明人”，也有人和他做出了相同的判断，也开始趁机大肆在市场上扫货。

0017.en: Influenced by this, the price, which had just fallen, began to rise again.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 受此影响，刚下跌不久的价格又开始了回升。

0017.en: Seeing this, Zhao Xuhe, who had been a little uncertain, felt reassured, thinking his decision to go all in was truly wise.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 见到这一幕，本来心里还有点没底的赵旭河顿时仿佛吃了一颗定心丸，觉得自己选择梭哈实在睿智。

0017.en: Then, early the next morning.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 然后，第二天清早。

0017.en: A voice came directly from the Holy Fire Cliff, instantly spreading throughout the Chu Sheng Sect.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 一道声音直接从圣火崖，瞬间传遍了初圣宗内外。

0017.en: "Recently, the Sect Master personally made arrangements. On the surface, he gathered disciples in a posture of war, but secretly, he sent people to raid the Jiangnan Mass Grave."
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: “近日，本宗掌教真君亲自布置，明面上调集弟子，做出备战姿态，暗地里派人突袭了江南万人坑。”

0017.en: "Therefore, I am pleased to announce to all disciples."
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: “因此很高兴向所有弟子宣布。”

0017.en: "As of yesterday, the Jiangnan Mass Grave has been reclaimed by the Sect Master himself. At the same time, the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion has contacted the Sect Master, willing to negotiate for peace with our sect."
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: “就在昨日，江南万人坑已经由掌教真君亲自夺回，同时玉枢剑阁已经联系掌教，愿意与圣宗和谈。”

0017.en: It exploded.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 炸了。

0017.en: Literally. The moment the news spread, an explosion was heard from a certain disciple's cave, as if someone had self-destructed from a cultivation deviation.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 字面意义上的，就在消息传开的瞬间，某一座洞府内传出了爆炸的声音，似乎有人走火入魔自爆了。

0017.en: Then, there was complete silence.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 紧接着，万籁俱寂。

0017.en: The vast Chu Sheng Sect, which was full of life and ambition yesterday, was now filled with a terrifying, suffocating silence.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 偌大的初圣宗，昨天还是一片勃勃生机，万物竞发的景象，如今却只剩下了令人恐惧到窒息的死寂。

0017.en: Because everyone understood that retaking the Jiangnan Mass Grave meant the shortage of Death Substitute Puppets was over. The Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion's offer of peace talks meant the great war between sects was a long way off. More importantly, this news was released through the disciple tokens, making it an official announcement.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 因为所有人都明白，江南万人坑被夺回，意味着替死阴傀的货量不再短缺，玉枢剑阁主动和谈，意味着正魔大战遥遥无期更重要的是，这一则消息是通过弟子令牌发布的，相当于官方发声。

0017.en: So it could not be false.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 所以它不可能是假的。

0017.en: The bubble named Death Substitute Puppet burst at this moment. As a result, its price plummeted from a peak of seven thousand.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 名为替死阴傀的泡沫在这一刻轰然炸裂，结果就是它的价格从最高点的七千，开始了跳楼式的暴跌。

0017.en: Five thousand, three thousand, one thousand, two hundred.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 五千，三千，一千，两百。

0017.en: The price, which had taken more than a month to rise, now crashed back to its original value in just a quarter of an hour, and it was still falling!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 之前用了一个多月才涨上去的价格，如今却在短短一刻钟之内就暴跌回了原价，甚至还在继续下跌！

0017.en: Everyone wanted to sell, but no one was willing to buy.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 所有人都想卖，却没有人愿意买了。

0017.en: Especially those who had hoarded a large number of puppets could only watch as the price dropped below rock bottom, their wealth evaporating.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 尤其是囤了大量替死阴傀的人，如今更是只能眼睁睁看着价格跌破谷底，看着他们的财富不断蒸发。

0017.en: Bang! Bang! Bang!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 砰！砰！砰！

0017.en: That night, deafening explosions echoed through the Chu Sheng Sect from time to time. It was unknown how many people's Dao hearts were shattered because of this.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 当晚，初圣宗内几乎每隔一段时间就会传出一道振聋发聩的爆炸声，不知道有多少人因此道心破碎。

0017.en: In his cave, Zhao Xuhe had already fainted.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 洞府内，赵旭河早就晕过去了。

0017.en: When he opened his eyes again, he still looked dazed, as if in a dream: "What a terrible dream. I actually dreamed that the price of the Death Substitute Puppet crashed... hahaha."
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: 等到他睁开双眼，神色还有些茫然，如在梦中：“真是可怕，我居然梦到替死阴傀价格跌了哈哈哈.”

0017.en: Then he glanced at the price of the Death Substitute Puppet again.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 然后他又看了一眼替死阴傀的价格。

0017.en: 100 Contribution Points each.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 100贡献点一具。

0017.en: "...I must have seen it wrong."
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “.肯定是看错了。”

0017.en: After a moment of silence, Zhao Xuhe closed the disciple token, took a deep breath, and opened it again with a trembling hand to check the price.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 沉默片刻后，赵旭河关掉了弟子令牌，深吸一口气，然后颤抖着手再度打开，查看替死阴傀的价格。

0017.en: 50 Contribution Points each.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 50贡献点一具。

0017.en: "Pfft!!!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河

0017.en: Zhao Xuhe spat out a mouthful of old blood on the spot. His face turned livid, and his aura dropped to rock bottom, just like the price of the puppets.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 赵旭河当场一口老血喷出，脸庞直接涨成了猪肝色，气机更是和替死阴傀的价格一样瞬间跌落谷底。

0017.en: "I hate this...!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河

0017.en: Zhao Xuhe didn't have time to think. He desperately suppressed the rampaging thoughts in his mind, circulated his energy, and sorted out his True Qi, barely avoiding a true cultivation deviation.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 赵旭河来不及多想，拼命压制下心中暴走的念头，调息运功，梳理真气，好险才没有真正走火入魔。

0017.en: Just then, a voice came from outside his cave.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 就在这时，洞府外突然传来了声音。

0017.en: "Senior Brother Zhao, Lv Yang is here to visit."
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: “赵师兄，吕阳前来拜访。”

0017.en: "Lv Yang?"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “吕阳？”

0017.en: Zhao Xuhe was stunned for a long time before he remembered his junior brother. Thinking about how the other party had left the market early and paid off his loan, while he himself was now completely ruined...
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 赵旭河愣了半晌，才想起自己这位师弟，再想到对方早早离场还清了贷款，自己如今却是血本无归

0017.en: "Pfft!"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河

0017.en: Wiping the blood from the corner of his mouth, Zhao Xuhe staggered out of the door and saw Lv Yang standing there, looking refreshed and waving at him enthusiastically:
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 擦掉嘴角的血迹，赵旭河颤巍巍地走出门，却见吕阳正一副神清气爽地站在门前，热情地朝他挥手：

0017.en: "Senior Brother, how much money did you make today?"
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: “师兄，今天又赚了多少钱啊？”

0017.en: Bang!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 砰！

0017.en: With a loud noise, Zhao Xuhe gritted his teeth, and his whole body showed signs of rampaging True Qi, with cracks appearing on his skin and trickles of blood seeping out.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 一声炸响，只见赵旭河钢牙紧咬，全身上下都出现了真气暴走，冲击皮肉后的裂纹，渗出丝丝血迹。

0017.en: Lv Yang immediately looked horrified: "Senior Brother!? Are you alright?"
0017.speaker: 吕阳
0017.cn: 吕阳顿时一脸惊恐：“师兄！？您没事吧？”

0017.en: "...I'm fine."
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: “.我没事。”

0017.en: Zhao Xuhe forced a smile: "By the way, Junior Brother Lv, I recently discovered a predecessor's cave. It seems to have a lot of good things inside."
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: 赵旭河勉强挤出一点笑容：“对了，吕师弟，我最近发现了一处前人洞府，里面似乎有不少好东西。”

0017.en: As his voice fell, a fierce light appeared in Zhao Xuhe's eyes, and he squeezed out the words through his teeth: "I wonder if Junior Brother is interested?"
0017.speaker: 赵旭河
0017.cn: 话音落下，赵旭河眼中顿时浮现出了一缕凶光，从牙缝里挤出声音：“不知道师弟你有没有兴趣？”

0018.en: Chapter 18: The Correct Way to Use a Cheat
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第18章 外挂的正确用法

0018.en: "A predecessor's cave residence?"
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “前人洞府？”

0018.en: After hearing Zhao Xuhe's proposal, Lv Yang shook his head. "Thank you for the kind invitation, Senior Brother, but my skills are poor. For now, I just want to focus on my training."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 听完赵旭河的提议，吕阳摇了摇头：“师兄热情相邀，但小弟神通不精，如今只想要一心一意修炼。”

0018.en: Zhao Xuhe narrowed his eyes. "Oh? Junior Brother, is it that you don't trust me?"
0018.speaker: 赵旭河
0018.cn: “哦？”赵旭河闻言眯起双眼：“师弟莫非不放心我？”

0018.en: "You're overthinking it, Senior Brother. I haven't learned any combat techniques yet, so I would only hold you back if I went with you."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “师兄多虑了，只是小弟如今还没有习得神通，毫无斗法之能，就算和师兄出去也只是拖后腿罢了。”

0018.en: Lv Yang's reason was perfectly logical.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 吕阳的理由合情合理。

0018.en: After all, not long after joining the sect, he had started speculating on the Death-Substitution Yin Puppets and had even mortgaged his loan for techniques from the Library Pavilion. Zhao Xuhe knew this.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 毕竟他入门没多久就开始炒替死阴傀，连藏书阁的功法贷都拿出去当抵押了，这一点赵旭河也清楚。

0018.en: "...Then forget it."
0018.speaker: 赵旭河
0018.cn: “.那就算了。”

0018.en: Zhao Xuhe shook his head, his expression turning cold.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 赵旭河摇了摇头，神色冷淡了下来。

0018.en: At this moment, killing intent rose in his heart. After all, he had lost everything, down to his last pair of pants, while Lv Yang had managed to make a profit and exit early.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 此时此刻，他的心中已然生出了杀意，毕竟他可是连裤子都亏光了，吕阳却还可以赚到钱提前离场。

0018.en: How could he accept that?
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 这让他如何能接受？

0018.en: More importantly, the contribution points Lv Yang earned were from a principal borrowed from him. Basically, that money should have been his!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 更重要的是吕阳赚到的贡献点，本金可都是从他这边借来的，四舍五入，那些钱都应该是他的才对！

0018.en: "Fine, I'll let you hold onto it for now."
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: “也罢，且先寄存在你那里”

0018.en: Zhao Xuhe sneered inwardly. "He only knows how to cultivate and doesn't learn combat techniques. Does he think he's in some righteous sect where he can train in peace? Once I'm done with Panlong Island, I'll find a chance to sneak into his cave residence at night and kill him. Those contribution points will be mine anyway!"
0018.speaker: 赵旭河
0018.cn: 赵旭河心中冷笑：“只知道修炼，不习斗法神通，还以为自己是在那些正道名门，可以安心修炼吗？等我解决了盘龙岛的事情，找个机会深夜潜入其洞府，将其干掉，那些贡献点照样是我的！”

0018.en: "If nothing unexpected happens, that guy Zhao is probably already thinking about how to deal with me."
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: “不出意外，姓赵的应该已经在想怎么对付我了。”

0018.en: Leaving Zhao Xuhe's cave residence, Lv Yang walked confidently towards the Library Pavilion, having already guessed Zhao Xuhe's thoughts without the slightest worry.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 离开赵旭河洞府，吕阳大摇大摆地朝着藏书阁走去，心中已然猜到了赵旭河的想法，却是丝毫不慌。

0018.en: After all, he had not been idle these past few days.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 毕竟他这几天可不是白过的。

0018.en: While others were frantically speculating on the Death-Substitution Yin Puppets, he paid no attention to the outside world. He bought a large number of spiritual pills and went directly into seclusion to cultivate.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 就在别人炒替死阴傀炒的热火朝天时，他却是两耳不闻窗外事，买了大批灵丹就直接开始闭关修炼。

0018.en: The fourth to sixth levels of Qi Refining were considered the middle stage, with no bottlenecks. Breakthroughs could be achieved simply by spending money on pills.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 炼气四层到六层都属于中期，没有瓶颈，只要花钱嗑药就能突破。

0018.en: Having made a huge profit of ten thousand contribution points, Lv Yang was certainly not stingy. He had already broken through to the sixth level of Qi Refining, reaching the peak of the middle stage.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 而血赚了一万贡献点的吕阳自然不会吝啬，因此此刻的他早已突破达到炼气六层，位列中期巅峰了。

0018.en: Incidentally, he had also used contribution points to exchange for a Cleansing Pill to cure the venereal disease his original body had.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 顺带一提，原身自带的花柳病也被他用贡献点换来一枚洗尘丹给治好了。

0018.en: This proved that the most incurable disease in life is poverty.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 事实上证明，人一生最大的不治之症，那就是穷病。

0018.en: The reason Yu Suzhen died from her venereal disease in the first life was, in the end, due to a lack of money.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第一世的玉素真之所以会被自己的花柳病弄死，说到底还是因为没钱。

0018.en: As for the bottleneck to the late stage, he had wanted to try breaking through with the Innate True Qi, but perhaps because the amount was insufficient, the effect was negligible.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 至于中期瓶颈，本来他还想试试能不能用先天一炁突破，可惜不知道是不是量不够的原因，效果聊胜于无。

0018.en: This showed that he was probably not the only one who had been tricked by Liu Xin back then.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 由此可见，当初刘信坑死的人恐怕也不止他一个。

0018.en: As for not learning any techniques, that was naturally just a lie to deceive Zhao Xuhe.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 至于什么不习神通，自然也是忽悠赵旭河的。

0018.en: In his previous life, he had relied on setting up a formation to launch a sneak attack, barely managing to suppress Zhao Xuhe when his energy was depleted. This time, it wouldn't be so troublesome.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 前世他靠着布阵偷袭，这才勉强在赵旭河气衰力竭的情况下将其压制，这一世却是不用那么麻烦了。

0018.en: Even in a direct confrontation, he was confident he could escape!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 哪怕正面交手，他也有逃走的把握！

0018.en: "Senior Brother Wang, have you been well?"
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “王师兄，近来无恙？”

0018.en: Arriving at the Library Pavilion, Lv Yang skillfully took out a wine gourd and smiled. "This is top-quality Drunken Flower Brew, which I specially got for you."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 来到藏书阁，吕阳熟练地取出了一枚酒葫芦，笑道：“上好的醉花酿，这可是我特地为师兄弄来的。”

0018.en: "...It's you again, kid."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “.又是你小子。”

0018.en: At the entrance of the Library Pavilion, the old-looking Wang Borong's eye twitched slightly upon hearing this, and then he remarked, "A single gourd of Drunken Flower Brew costs 50 contribution points."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: 藏书阁门口，一脸老态的王柏荣闻言眼角微微一抽，旋即感慨道：“一葫芦就要50贡献点的醉花酿。”

0018.en: "You've really struck it rich, kid."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “你小子是真发财了啊。”

0018.en: In this life, Lv Yang had made a special effort to build a good relationship with Wang Borong. At first, Wang Borong had been indifferent to him, but ever since the Death-Substitution Yin Puppet market crashed, this senior from the Library Pavilion had a much better attitude towards him.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 这一世，吕阳着重和王柏荣打好了关系。一开始王柏荣对他还爱答不理，可自从替死阴傀暴雷以后，这位藏书阁的老师兄对他态度就好多了。

0018.en: The reason was simple.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 原因也很简单。

0018.en: Just before the market crashed, he had persuaded Wang Borong to sell a portion of his hoarded goods, allowing him to avoid financial ruin.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 因为就在替死阴傀暴雷之前，他劝说王柏荣卖掉了手里囤积的一部分货物，避开了倾家荡产的命运。

0018.en: Since then, Wang Borong had been incredibly grateful to him.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 自那以后，王柏荣就对他无比感激了。

0018.en: "To think I've lived for decades and still don't see things as clearly as a young man like you. If you hadn't warned me, I'd probably be suffering from cultivation deviation by now."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “可怜老夫空活了几十年，还没你一个小子看得通透，若非你点醒我，如今我恐怕已经走火入魔了。”

0018.en: "Not at all, Senior Brother. You shouldn't underestimate yourself."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “哪里的话，师兄切不可妄自菲薄。”

0018.en: Lv Yang shook his head. "As they say, good advice is lost on those who are doomed. I advised many people that day, but only you, Senior Brother, truly listened."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头：“所谓良言难劝该死的鬼，当日小弟我劝说过很多人，却只有师兄您真的听了进去。”

0018.en: "Your courage to pull back from the brink is also a form of wisdom."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “师兄敢于悬疑勒马，亦是一种智慧。”

0018.en: Wang Borong narrowed his eyes and stroked his beard. Although he knew Lv Yang was deliberately flattering him, the words were incredibly pleasing to his ears.
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: 王柏荣闻言眯起眼睛，抚了抚胡子，虽然知道吕阳这是在故意拍马屁，可这话他实在是越听越顺耳。

0018.en: Then, the two set up a table and chairs and began to drink together.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 紧接着，两人便摆开桌椅，对饮了起来。

0018.en: Wang Borong didn't hold back, pouring himself a full cup of Drunken Flower Brew and downing it in one go before slowly speaking, "Kid, what are you really after?"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: 王柏荣也不客气，直接倒了满满一杯的醉花酿，一饮而尽，随后才缓缓开口：“你小子，到底图什么？”

0018.en: This was the only question left in Wang Borong's mind.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 王柏荣此刻心中也只有这么一个疑惑了。

0018.en: "We're not related in any way. Surely you don't believe the rumors outside, that I'm some hidden master in the Library Pavilion waiting for a destined person, do you?"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “我和你无亲无故的，难道你还真信了外面的鬼话，认为老头子我是藏书阁的高人，在等有缘人吧？”

0018.en: "Of course not."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “怎么会。”

0018.en: Lv Yang poured more wine for Wang Borong and smiled. "As the saying goes, an elder in the family is like a treasure. I just think that for you to live to such an old age in the Chu Sheng Sect, you must be quite capable. And since you work in the Library Pavilion, perhaps you could give me some guidance on techniques and skills..."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 吕阳一边给王柏荣倒酒，一边笑道：“所谓家有一老，如有一宝。在下只是觉得师兄能在圣宗活到这么大岁数，肯定是有几分本事的，又是在藏书阁当差，或许能在功法神通上指点指点在下”

0018.en: Lv Yang spoke with great sincerity.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 吕阳话说得极为诚恳。

0018.en: Wang Borong listened without commenting, simply continuing to pour wine. As he drank, he began to complain about the sect's shamelessness in fleecing the disciples this time.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 王柏荣听完也不置可否，只是继续斟酒，喝着喝着就开始抱怨起了圣宗这次割弟子韭菜的无耻行径。

0018.en: "They are simply beasts!"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “简直就是畜生！”

0018.en: "It's too much of a coincidence that they suppressed the price right when it peaked. This must have been premeditated. There are villains among the sect's upper echelons!"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “好巧不巧，就在价格攀升到巅峰的时候突然出手打压，这绝对是早有预谋，圣宗高层里有坏人呐！”

0018.en: Lv Yang poured wine while casually agreeing.
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 吕阳一边倒酒，一边随口附和。

0018.en: Only when Wang Borong was drunk and swaying did he lower his voice and say, "Senior Brother, I came here this time to choose a technique."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 等到王柏荣喝得多了，已经开始摇头晃脑之后，他才低声道：“师兄，我此番来是想挑选功法神通。”

0018.en: "Do you have any recommendations? The more powerful the technique, the better!"
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “不知师兄可有推荐？神通威力越大越好！”

0018.en: "I knew you wanted something from me!" Wang Borong chuckled, then said proudly, "But you've asked the right person!"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “我就知道你小子有求于我！”王柏荣一边嘿嘿直笑，一边得意道：“不过你问我，也算是问对人了！”

0018.en: Lv Yang quickly cupped his hands. "Please enlighten me, Senior Brother."
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 吕阳赶忙拱手：“还请师兄教我。”

0018.en: "First of all, you can forget about the truly top-tier techniques. This Library Pavilion is just a branch of Sky Mending Peak, and the power of its techniques is limited."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “首先呢，真正的上乘神通你就不要想了，咱们这藏书阁只是补天峰的分阁，功法神通威能都有限。”

0018.en: "The truly powerful techniques are on the Sacred Fire Cliff, and only True Disciples can learn them!"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “真正厉害的神通都在圣火崖上呢，非真传不可学！”

0018.en: "But this is normal. Disciples like us in the early and middle stages of Qi Refining are just cattle and horses for the sect. How could we be taught powerful techniques?"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “不过这也是正常，我们这些炼气初期和中期的弟子，那就是圣宗的牛马，怎么可能得授厉害神通？”

0018.en: After all, what's the point of cattle and horses knowing so much? Knowing too much is bad for unity.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 毕竟牛马懂那么多干什么？懂得多了反而不利于团结。

0018.en: As for the True Disciples, they were officially part of the sect, elites who would inherit its legacy in the future. Naturally, they received different treatment.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 至于真传弟子，那可是真正入了圣宗的编制，未来要承袭宗门衣钵的精英，自然又是另一番待遇了。

0018.en: "Is there no middle ground?" Lv Yang asked in a low voice.
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “就没有折衷之法吗？”吕阳低声道。

0018.en: "Of course there is!"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “当然有！”

0018.en: Wang Borong smiled. He had worked in the Library Pavilion for over forty years. With his experience, there wasn't a single technique he didn't know about.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 王柏荣微微一笑，他在藏书阁干了四十多年，如此资历，藏书阁的所有功法神通就没有他不认识的。

0018.en: Although he didn't know the specific content, he was well aware of their effects after they were mastered.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 虽然不知道具体内容，但练成之后效果如何却是了然于心。

0018.en: "In our Library Pavilion, there are really only three techniques that are truly powerful after being mastered, and each one has serious side effects."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “咱们这座藏书阁啊，真要说练成后威能上乘的神通其实只有三种，而且每一种都有严重的副作用。”

0018.en: "Side effects?"
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “副作用？”

0018.en: At this point, Wang Borong's expression became extremely solemn as he said in a deep voice, "For example, I know of a technique called the 'Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light.' It greatly increases a magical treasure's power by sacrificing one's own body to it. But after mastering it, not only does it shorten your lifespan, but you can no longer continue to cultivate. It's a dead end for your cultivation path."
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: 说到这里，王柏荣的表情无比凝重，沉声道：“比如我就知道一门神通，名为《天魔化血神光》，通过以身祭宝让法宝威力大增，可功成之后不仅折寿，而且无法再继续修炼，可谓自绝仙途。”

0018.en: "Tell me, aren't those side effects severe?"
0018.speaker: 王柏荣
0018.cn: “你说说，副作用大不大？”

0018.en: Wang Borong's intention was to scare Lv Yang off, but he didn't expect that after hearing his warning, Lv Yang showed no disappointment and instead became even more excited.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 王柏荣本意是想要吓退吕阳，却没有想到吕阳听完他的劝解后非但没有丝毫失落，反而愈发激动了。

0018.en: "Such a technique is perfect for me!"
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: “如此神通，合该为我所用！”

0018.en: Although the side effects were indeed severe, they were limited to this life. And what did the side effects of this life have to do with him in the next one?
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 虽然副作用确实很大，但是再大那也仅限于这一世，而这一世的副作用和下一世的我又有什么关系？

0018.en: He seemed to have found the correct way to use the Hundred Lives Book!
0018.speaker: 吕阳
0018.cn: 他好像找到【百世书】的正确用法了！

0019.en: Chapter 19: Skinning
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 第19章 剥皮

0019.en: "Do you really want to learn these special techniques?"
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: “你真要学这些神通？”

0019.en: Seeing Lv Yang's interested expression, Wang Bairong was also a bit surprised. He couldn't help but say, "Junior Brother, in the path of cultivation, your realm always comes first. You must know what is most important."
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: 见吕阳一脸心动，王柏荣也有些意外，忍不住道：“师弟，仙道始终是境界为先，你要分清主次啊。”

0019.en: In his opinion, Lv Yang had earned so many contribution points at such a young age. Even if he couldn't reach Foundation Establishment, he had a good chance of mastering Qi Refining. Why would he practice special techniques with such huge side effects? Even if his fighting power was unmatched, what would it matter? When his life ended, he would just be a pile of dust.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 在他看来，吕阳年纪轻轻就赚到了那么多贡献点，未来不说筑基，至少炼气大圆满还是很有希望的，又何必去练那些副作用极大的神通，就算战力通天又如何？最后寿元到了不还是一捧土灰。

0019.en: "Life is short, don't waste it."
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: “人生苦短，莫要自误啊。”

0019.en: At this point, Wang Bairong had a sad expression on his face. "You are still young, so you don't understand this. A flower may bloom again, but a person cannot be young again."
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: 说到这里，王柏荣露出了一副哀容：“你还年轻，还不明白这个道理花有重开日，人无在少年啊。”

0019.en: "You are strong and full of energy now, but what about in ten years? Or twenty?"
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: “你现在是年富力强，可十年后呢？二十年后呢？”

0019.en: "The choice you make today might seem satisfying, but you might only see the bad effects decades later. By then, it will be too late for regrets."
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: “你今日做出这个选择，看上去快意了，实际上可能要数十年后才能看出弊端，届时可没有后悔药。”

0019.en: Before he finished speaking, Wang Bairong seemed to get lost in his memories. After a while, he said with emotion, "You don't know, but when I was young, I was quite famous in the sect. But I made one wrong step, and it wasted my whole life. Even now, it's incredibly painful to think about."
0019.speaker: 王柏荣
0019.cn: 话音未落，王柏荣似乎又陷入了回忆中，好一会儿过后才感慨道：“你是不知道，老头子我年轻的时候在圣宗可是很风光的，可就是一步踏错，结果蹉跎一生，至今每次想起都是痛不欲生啊.”

0019.en: As he spoke, Wang Bairong's eyes turned red.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 说着说着，王柏荣的眼睛都红了。

0019.en: Feeling the effects of the wine, he pulled Lv Yang over and began to talk about his glorious past.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 酒意上头之下，他干脆拉着吕阳讲起了自己的风光过往。

0019.en: It wasn't much, really. When he was young, he didn't understand how important the quality of his True Qi was. He happened to find a technique below the seventh grade and started practicing it.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 其实也没什么，无非是年轻时不懂得真气品阶的重要性，意外得到了一门七品以下的功法就修炼了。

0019.en: As a result, the quality of his True Qi was too low. He had no hope of reaching Foundation Establishment, and it was even hard to complete Qi Refining.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 结果真气品阶太低，终生无望筑基，炼气都难圆满。

0019.en: For decades, he felt like he was halfway in his grave, while his former junior brothers and the women he admired extended their lives one by one, remaining young even now.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 数十年来，他半截身子埋入黄土，曾经的师兄弟，仰慕的女子却都一个个延长寿命，至今青春年华

0019.en: How much regret and pain that must cause. But who can start life over again?
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 这得多让人后悔，多让人痛心，奈何人生谁又能重来？

0019.en: "What? I can start over? Then it's not a problem."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “什么？我能重来？那没事了.”

0019.en: Seeing that Wang Bairong had passed out drunk, Lv Yang stood up and, following Wang Bairong's description, found the book, "Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light."
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 眼见王柏荣就这样醉死了过去，吕阳这才站起身子，按照王柏荣的描述找到了那本《天魔化血神光》。

0019.en: It was undeniably a demonic technique.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 不可否认，这确实是一门魔功。

0019.en: Lv Yang exchanged his points for it with a serious expression. "Fast to learn, big side effects, very dangerous. It has almost all the features a demonic path should have."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: 吕阳将其兑换了出来，表情凝重：“速成，副作用大，危险性高，所有魔道该有的特点它几乎都有。”

0019.en: To master this special technique, one must first choose a magic artifact. Then, use the artifact to peel off one's own skin while still alive. The skin is then refined with a secret method for eighty-one days to create a ray of blood-transforming light. This light attaches to the artifact, and an ordinary cultivator would be injured by a scratch and killed by a touch.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 想要练成这门神通，必须先选定一件法宝，然后用法宝将自己的人皮活剥下来，再用秘法加以炼制，历经九九八十一日方能炼制出一道化血宝光，附着在法宝上，寻常修士擦着就伤碰着就亡。

0019.en: "At the same time, I will become a blood shadow that depends on the magic artifact to exist."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “同时我自身也会成为依托法宝而存的一道血影。”

0019.en: "If the artifact is not destroyed, the blood shadow will not die."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “法宝不损，血影不亡。”

0019.en: "The side effects are that my lifespan will be cut in half, and after I become a blood shadow, I will no longer have a human body, just a human form. Because of this, my cultivation level will not improve."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “副作用则是寿命减半，同时化为血影之后就不再是人身，而是空有人形，因此修为也不会再进步.”

0019.en: "Good, this is perfect for me!"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “好，果然适合我！”

0019.en: Lv Yang's eyes were bright, and he immediately decided to practice this special technique.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 吕阳目光明亮，当即决定习练这门神通。

0019.en: While studying it, he discovered that there was another version of this technique. It seemed that a powerful cultivator had edited and improved it.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 而在习练过程中，他发现这门神通居然还有另一个版本，似乎是某位大修士对其进行了删改和优化。

0019.en: "After all, this special technique is truly extraordinary."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “毕竟这门神通确实神妙非凡。”

0019.en: "The modified version doesn't require the cultivator to skin themselves for the blood sacrifice. Instead, it lets the cultivator sacrifice their own brother or their children and grandchildren."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “修改后的版本也不需要修炼者自己去剥皮血祭，而是让修炼者血祭自己的同胞兄弟或者儿孙后裔。”

0019.en: "This way, one can still master the technique. However, because the blood shadow created is not the cultivator's own, it's hard to control freely, and there's a risk of it backfiring. But I'm different. Whether it's in this life or the next, the blood shadow will only be me!"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “如此一来，同样可以炼成这门神通，不过由于这样炼制成的血影终究不是修炼者本人，难以运化自如，所以会有反噬之危.不过我不一样，不管是这一世还是下一世，血影都只会是我自己！”

0019.en: A few days later, Lv Yang left the Library Pavilion.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 数日过后，吕阳离开了藏书阁。

0019.en: He also bought the "Divine Empyrean True Sword Art" again at full price. After all, this was the only way he could use it openly in the future.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 除此之外，他又全款购买了一次《神霄御剑真决》，毕竟这样他以后才能光明正大地将其施展出来。

0019.en: The next day, the "technique" was delivered.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 翌日，“功法”送到了。

0019.en: "Demon!"
0019.speaker: 云妙清
0019.cn: “魔头！”

0019.en: Looking at Yun Miaoqing, who was gripping the magic sword at her neck with a defiant expression, Lv Yang suddenly felt as if a lifetime had passed.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 看着手里紧抓着脖颈间的法剑，一脸不屈看着自己的云妙清，吕阳突然生出了几分恍若隔世的感觉。

0019.en: But he quickly pushed the thought away.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 不过很快他就将其抛诸脑后了。

0019.en: "Sorry, I need the method and experience for refining a sword pellet."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “抱歉，我需要炼制剑丸的方法和经验。”

0019.en: "What? How did you know... Wait... you...!"
0019.speaker: 云妙清
0019.cn: “什么？你怎么会知道.唔.等等你.！”

0019.en: Practice makes perfect. Using his familiarity with Yun Miaoqing, Lv Yang went all out and quickly extracted the knowledge and experience he needed from her.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 一回生二回熟，凭借着对云妙清的熟悉，吕阳火力全开，很快就从她身上采补到了需要的知识经验。

0019.en: After pulling up his pants, Lv Yang turned and left.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 提起裤子，吕阳转身离开。

0019.en: This time, he went to "Ten Thousand Treasures Peak," the peak corresponding to the Outer Hall's Treasure Refining Hall and one of the four Inner Peaks. Most of the sect's magic artifacts came from here.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 这一次，他去的是“万宝峰”，外门炼宝殿对应的山峰，内门四峰之一，圣宗法宝大多都出自这里。

0019.en: "I want to rent an earth-fire furnace."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “我要租赁一座地火炉。”

0019.en: Arriving at the front desk, Lv Yang stated his request directly. After paying enough contribution points, he was shown into the highest-grade furnace room a quarter of an hour later.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 来到前台，吕阳直接提出了需求，在给足了贡献点的情况下，一刻钟后他就被请进了最高级的炉室。

0019.en: After preparing, he took out the materials.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 做足准备后，他便拿出了材料。

0019.en: Three ounces of gold essence, three ounces of jade marrow, two ounces of cinnabar, and two ounces of sword qi. Then, he formed a hand seal, drew fire from the earth's core, and threw everything into the furnace!
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 金精三两，玉髓三两，丹砂二两，剑气二两，接着掐动法决，从地心接引烈火，而后一同投入炉中！

0019.en: "Although most sword pellets from the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion are made by sect elders, that's in a righteous sect, where you don't have to worry about someone secretly sabotaging it. This is the Chu Sheng Sect. Rather than trusting the morals of an artifact refiner, I'd rather do it myself. If it fails, I'll just try a few more times."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “虽然玉枢剑阁的剑丸大多都是有门中长辈炼制，但那是在正道，不用担心有人会暗地里做手脚。这里可是初圣宗，与其寄希望于炼器之人的道德水平，还不如我自己来，大不了多尝试几遍.”

0019.en: One set of materials cost 2,000 contribution points.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 一套材料2000贡献点。

0019.en: Lv Yang had only earned a total of 10,000 contribution points. After buying the special technique, the cultivation art, and paying off his debt, he could only afford three sets of materials for the sword pellet.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 吕阳总共就赚了一万贡献点，除去购买神通功法，还贷，他的全部身家只能买三份炼制剑丸的材料。

0019.en: "If I fail three times, then I'll try again in the next life!"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “如果三次都失败，那就下一世再来！”

0019.en: With this thought, Lv Yang began to strictly follow the method and experience he had taken from Yun Miaoqing, carefully controlling the earth-fire to slowly refine all the materials.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 带着这个念头，吕阳开始严格按照从云妙清那里采补过来的方法经验，控制地火慢慢凝炼一应材料。

0019.en: Gold essence fused with jade marrow, cinnabar combined with sword qi...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 金精融玉髓，丹砂合剑气

0019.en: Gradually, a pellet appeared in Lv Yang's spiritual sense. However, before he could feel happy, the pellet suddenly trembled...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 渐渐的，一枚丹丸出现在了吕阳的灵识感应之中，然而还没等他欣喜，就见丹丸突然原地一个颤动

0019.en: "Boom!"
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: “轰隆！”

0019.en: It exploded.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 炸了。

0019.en: One set of materials was wasted. Lv Yang calmly waved his sleeve to clear away the debris and quietly analyzed the lessons learned. "...My steps should have been correct."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: 一套材料报废，吕阳淡定地挥动衣袖扫去残骸，默默总结经验教训：“.我的步骤应该是没问题的。”

0019.en: "The problem was the final step."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “问题在于最后一步。”

0019.en: Lv Yang reviewed Yun Miaoqing's memories, and understanding slowly appeared in his eyes:
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 吕阳回顾云妙清的记忆，眼中渐渐浮现明悟：

0019.en: "To refine a sword pellet, the sword and mind must be one. I haven't been practicing the Divine Empyrean True Sword Art for long, so my skill in the way of the sword is clearly lacking..."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “炼制剑丸，需要剑与心合，而我修炼神霄御剑真决的时间还不长，在剑道上的境界显然有所欠缺”

0019.en: Normally, this was a strict requirement that could only be met with time.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 按理来说这是硬性要求，只能慢慢磨。

0019.en: But that was from the perspective of a righteous path, which valued gradual progress and rarely used quick, heaven-defying methods.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 不过这是从正道的视角来看，毕竟正道讲究循序渐进，很少会使用一些急功近利，有伤天和的手段。

0019.en: The demonic path did not care about such things.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 而魔道可不讲这些。

0019.en: "Sword and mind as one is ultimately about controlling the sword pellet... In that case, if I practice the Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light at the same time, the effect should be the same!"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “剑与心合，说到底就是对剑丸的控制.既然如此，我同步修炼天魔化血神光，效果应该是一样的！”

0019.en: "The effect might even be better!"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “甚至效果更好！”

0019.en: After all, the Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light was a technique where one sacrificed their body to an artifact. Once mastered, the user would nearly become one with the artifact, a connection far stronger than the so-called "sword and mind as one."
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 毕竟天魔化血神光乃是以身祭宝，一旦练成几乎和法宝融为一体，契合度必然远超所谓的剑与心合。

0019.en: "But to do this, I can't use the anesthetic I prepared..."
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “不过想要做到这一点，事先准备好的麻沸散就不能用了”

0019.en: Refining a sword pellet was a delicate process. If he took a drug to suppress the pain and his reaction was even slightly delayed, he would likely fail.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 炼制剑丸是一个精细活，如果他服用药物压制痛觉，导致炼制时的反应慢了半拍，很有可能会失败。

0019.en: Therefore, he had to remain fully conscious the entire time.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 所以他必须全程保持清醒。

0019.en: "This is the demonic path. You have to be cruel to yourself... Otherwise, how can you be considered a true talent?"
0019.speaker: 吕阳
0019.cn: “魔道嘛，就要对自己狠一点.否则怎么称得上人材？”

0019.en: Thinking this, a ruthless look appeared in Lv Yang's eyes.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 想到这里，吕阳的眼中顿时浮现一缕狠色。

0019.en: A moment later, he sat before the earth-fire furnace, stuffed a piece of cloth into his mouth, and waited for the sword pellet to form again. Then, he directed the sword qi to strike his own body...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 片刻后，他端坐在地火炉前，往嘴里塞了一块破布，等到剑丸再度成形，便操纵剑气朝着自身落去

0020.en: Chapter 20: Xiao Shiye
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 第20章 萧石叶

0020.en: Nearly three months later, in the Earthfire Furnace Room.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 近三个月后，地火炉室。

0020.en: Lv Yang's body trembled as he slowly stood up.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳颤抖着身子，缓缓站了起来。

0020.en: No, to say he was standing was not quite right. "Floating" was perhaps a better word, because at this moment, he no longer had flesh, muscle, or bone. He was just a crimson blood shadow!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 不对与其说是站，用飘或许更加合适，因为此刻的他已经没有了皮肉筋骨，而是一道猩红的血影！

0020.en: "I succeeded!"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “我成了！”

0020.en: The blood shadow had no face. A slightly distorted voice came from the vibrations of the glowing light: "After eighty-one days, I have finally refined it!"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: 血影没有面孔，唯有华光缭绕间震动发出了一道略显失真的声音：“九九八十一日，终于是炼成了！”

0020.en: The next moment, the blood shadow gradually retracted. The skin that had been peeled off the floor flew up and was "worn" by the shadow. The pale skin was filled with blood, and the shriveled flesh became full again. Soon, a perfectly intact Lv Yang appeared in the furnace room.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 下一秒，只见血影渐渐收敛，地上被剥下的皮也凭空飞来，被血影“穿”在了身上，苍白的肌肤渐渐被血色充盈，干瘪的皮肉也慢慢饱满起来，不一会儿，完好无损的吕阳就出现在了炉室内。

0020.en: At first glance, he looked no different from an ordinary person.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 乍看之下，和常人无异。

0020.en: Compared to three months ago, Lv Yang's aura was even more powerful. His abundant true qi had even condensed into a Qi Seed.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 甚至和三个月前相比，此刻吕阳的气机还要更加庞大，一身雄浑真气隐约间甚至凝结成了一枚气种。

0020.en: Seventh level of Qi Refining! Late stage!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 炼气七层！后期！

0020.en: Perhaps the process of cultivating the divine ability was too painful, an unimaginable trial for his essence, qi, and spirit. This was what allowed him to unexpectedly break through his cultivation bottleneck.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 或许是修炼神通的过程太痛苦，对精气神都是一个难以想象的磨砺，这才让他意外突破了修为瓶颈。

0020.en: Even more fortunately, this happened before he had officially perfected the divine ability.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 更幸运的是，这还是在他正式练成神通之前。

0020.en: If it had happened after he perfected the ability, breaking through the bottleneck would have been useless. For example, now, his cultivation was permanently stuck at the seventh level of Qi Refining.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 如果是在练成神通之后，那即便他突破瓶颈也没用了，比如现在，他的修为就永久停在了炼气七层。

0020.en: "But this is enough."
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “不过也够用了.”

0020.en: Lv Yang murmured to himself. With the [Hundred Lives Book], he never focused on the achievements of one life. His goal was to use what he learned for the next life.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳低声喃喃，拥有【百世书】的他从来不会拘泥于一世的成就，如何活用于下一世才是他的目标。

0020.en: "Let's test its power!"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “且试试威力！”

0020.en: As the thought crossed Lv Yang's mind, a magnificent sword pellet appeared between his eyebrows. His figure then transformed into a streak of blood-red light and merged with the sword pellet.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳念头一起，眉心处顿时浮现出了一枚瑰丽剑丸，随后身影便化作一道血光和那剑丸合在了一处。

0020.en: "Boom!"
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: “轰隆！”

0020.en: Outside Ten Thousand Treasures Peak, the ground shook violently. The bustling crowd swayed, and several people fell to the ground.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 万宝峰外，随着地面的一阵剧烈晃动，原本熙熙攘攘的人群陡然歪斜，好几个人直接栽倒在了地上。

0020.en: "What's going on?"
0020.speaker: 陌生男1
0020.cn: “怎么回事？”

0020.en: "An earthquake... Impossible. With the Masters suppressing the earth veins, how could there be an earthquake?"
0020.speaker: 陌生男2
0020.cn: “地龙翻身.不可能，有诸位真人镇压地脉，怎么可能会有地龙翻身？”

0020.en: The disciples looked at each other. Those with higher cultivation levels suddenly sensed something and looked in a certain direction, their eyes filling with surprise.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 一众弟子面面相觑，其中修为较高的弟子突然心有所感，下意识看向某个方向，眼中渐渐浮现讶然。

0020.en: "Look!"
0020.speaker: 陌生女1
0020.cn: “快看！”

0020.en: "That is..."
0020.speaker: 陌生男1
0020.cn: “那个是”

0020.en: Everyone's eyes followed the voice.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 众人的视线应声而动。

0020.en: Then, everyone saw a rainbow of light shoot out from a furnace room, piercing the sun. In the blink of an eye, it leaped into the sky, causing the sea of clouds to churn wherever it passed.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 紧接着，所有人都看到了一道贯日长虹从一间炉室中冲出，一眨眼便跃入穹天，所过之处云海翻涌。

0020.en: Clang! Clang!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 锵锵！

0020.en: The clear sound of a sword echoed through the heavens. A dense red light dyed Ten Thousand Treasures Peak the color of blood, stirring the spiritual energy of heaven and earth into a monstrous wave!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 清脆的剑鸣声传遍九霄，浓烈的红光将万宝峰都染成了血色，引动天地灵气甚至化作了滔天的浪潮！

0020.en: In the midst of such a tide of spiritual energy, most disciples could not even breathe, nearly suffocating.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 身处如此灵气大潮之中，大部分弟子甚至无法吐纳，几近窒息！

0020.en: "Such power... Is this the late stage of Qi Refining?"
0020.speaker: 陌生男1
0020.cn: “如此声势，炼气后期？”

0020.en: A disciple showed a look of envy: "He has already formed a Qi Seed. With just one final step of nurturing it, he can reach completion. After that, Foundation Establishment will be within reach."
0020.speaker: 陌生男2
0020.cn: 有弟子面露羡慕之色：“这是已经结成了气种，只待最后一步蕴化，就能成就圆满，从此筑基在望.”

0020.en: "I wonder which Senior Brother has broken through?"
0020.speaker: 陌生女1
0020.cn: “不知道是哪一位师兄突破了？”

0020.en: "I've seen Senior Brothers in the late stage of Qi Refining before, but none had such spiritual pressure. That rainbow-like sword light must be an extraordinary magic treasure..."
0020.speaker: 陌生男3
0020.cn: “炼气后期的师兄我以前也见过，可没一位有这般灵压，那长虹般的剑光恐怕也是一件不俗的法宝”

0020.en: Meanwhile, above the sea of clouds.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 与此同时，云海之上。

0020.en: Lv Yang, as a blood shadow merged with the sword light, spread his spiritual sense in all directions. Everything within a radius of over ten miles was perfectly clear, as if he were looking at the lines on his own palm.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳身化血影，气合剑光，一身灵识向着四面八方扩散开，方圆十余里纤毫毕现，观之如掌上观纹。

0020.en: "Late-stage Qi Refining. True qi sinks into the dantian and forms a Qi Seed, causing a transformation of essence, qi, and spirit. If I still had a body, my physical form would have taken a great leap. I would be immune to blades and spears, and my true qi would be dozens of times stronger. It's a pity that only my spiritual sense is left."
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “炼气后期，真气沉入丹田，化为气种，引发精气神蜕变。如果我还有身体，那此刻我的体魄应该会有一个质的飞跃，刀枪不入都是等闲，真气应该也会翻上数十倍，可惜现在只剩下灵识了”

0020.en: Lv Yang was feeling emotional when his eyebrows suddenly raised.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳正在感慨，突然眉毛一扬。

0020.en: "Who's there?"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “什么人？”

0020.en: Before Lv Yang's voice faded, his sword followed his thought. The blood-red rainbow of sword light tore through the sea of clouds, revealing a young, handsome figure.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳话音未落，顷刻间剑随心至，血色长虹一般的剑光直接撕裂云海，露出了一道年轻俊朗的身影。

0020.en: "Senior Brother, don't attack! Don't attack!"
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: “师兄莫要动手！莫要动手！”

0020.en: The person shouted loudly, but Lv Yang paid no attention. The sword light charged forward. Seeing this, the person quickly took out a small flag and held it up in the air.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 只见那人高声大喝，吕阳却是全然不在意，剑光扑击而上，那人见状赶忙取出一面小旗往空中一伫。

0020.en: The next second, the flag unfurled, transforming into a pair of gates.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 下一秒，就见旗幡招展，化作一对旗门。

0020.en: The person hid behind one gate. After Lv Yang's sword light followed him in, he came out from the other gate and then waved his hand.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 那人躲入其中一侧旗门，等到吕阳分出的剑光也追进去后，才从另一座旗门掏出，紧接着伸手一招。

0020.en: The gates disappeared, turning back into a small flag.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 旗门消失，重新化作一面小旗。

0020.en: Lv Yang's eyebrows raised. He realized his sword light had been trapped in a strange place, allowing the person to escape.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 而吕阳则是眉毛一扬，发现自己分出的剑光居然就这样被困在了一处莫名之地，被对方躲避了过去。

0020.en: "Interesting."
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “有意思.”

0020.en: Lv Yang grinned, and the sword pellet between his eyebrows shook violently, like rolling thunder. In an instant, it split into dozens, even hundreds, of sword lights, like a peacock spreading its tail.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳咧嘴一笑，眉心剑丸剧震，好似闷雷滚空，转瞬间就如孔雀开屏一般分化出了数十上百道剑光。

0020.en: Seeing this, the young man, who had been feeling a bit proud, turned pale. He quickly took out the small flag to protect himself and shouted, "Senior Brother, my name is Xiao Shiye. I came here only to make your acquaintance, with no ill intentions. Please, withdraw your divine ability."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: 见到这一幕，本来还有些得意的年轻人顿时面色大变，赶忙再度取出小旗法宝护持己身，同时大声道：“这位师兄，在下萧石叶，此番前来只是想要结识一番，绝无恶意，还请师兄收了神通吧”

0020.en: "Xiao Shiye?"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “萧石叶？”

0020.en: Lv Yang was stunned. The sword lights that were about to erupt suddenly stopped in mid-air, reflecting a face covered in cold sweat.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳闻言一愣，随后原本即将爆发的剑光陡然一滞，停在了半空之中，映照出一张冷汗淋漓的脸庞。

0020.en: That pre-selected lucky guy?
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 那个内定的狗托？

0020.en: The next second, Lv Yang withdrew the sword light and transformed into his human form, landing in front of Xiao Shiye. He laughed heartily, "Junior Brother, don't misunderstand. I was just playing with you!"
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: 下一秒，吕阳便收了剑光，化作人形落在了萧石叶面前，爽朗大笑道：“师弟莫要误会，适才相戏尔！”

0020.en: Xiao Shiye wiped the sweat from his forehead. He complained in his heart, thinking that Lv Yang had clearly intended to get serious. But on his face, he showed a brilliant smile and said eagerly, "Senior Brother, your divine abilities are vast, your power is boundless. I am truly impressed. This is just a small gift, please don't refuse it."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: 萧石叶闻言擦了擦额头汗水，心中腹诽，觉得吕阳刚刚显然是想要动真格的，面上却同样露出了灿烂的笑容，殷勤道：“师兄神通广大，法力无边，萧某佩服，些许薄礼，还请师兄莫要推辞。”

0020.en: After speaking, he handed over the small flag in his hand.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 说完，他便顺手将手里的小旗递了过来。

0020.en: "How can I accept this..."
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “这怎么好意思呢”

0020.en: Lv Yang shook his head while taking the small flag. Only then did he see two words on its surface, "Void-Evasion," embroidered with golden thread.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳一边摇头，一边接过了小旗，这才在旗面上看到了两个字，乃是“遁空”，竟是用金丝绣成的。

0020.en: "This treasure is called the Void-Evasion Flag."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: “此宝名为遁空旗。”

0020.en: Xiao Shiye took the initiative to explain: "I bought it from an antique shop before joining the sect. At first, it showed no special properties, but after joining, I discovered it was a wondrous treasure."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: 萧石叶主动介绍道：“小弟入门前在一处古玩店购得，初时不显神异，入门之后才发现是一门奇宝。”

0020.en: "The flag has two sides. When activated, it can transform into two gates of life and death."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: “旗分两面，催动后可以化作生死两座旗门。”

0020.en: "Among those at the same cultivation level, as long as you enter through the death gate and exit through the life gate, you can find a way to survive even the greatest danger, untouched by disaster."
0020.speaker: 萧石叶
0020.cn: “同境界内，只要从死门入，再从生门出，哪怕遇到再大的危险也可以走出一条活路，灾劫不沾身。”

0020.en: Lv Yang's face twitched as he listened.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 吕阳听完忍不住面皮一抽。

0020.en: Such a miraculous magic treasure was something this Xiao Shiye had casually bought from a mortal antique shop before he even started cultivating in the sect?
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 如此神妙的法宝，居然是这个萧石叶在还没有进入圣宗修行的时候，从一家凡间古玩店随手买到的？

0020.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's thoughts stirred, and he focused his spiritual sense into his eyes.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 想到这里，吕阳突然心念一动，将灵识聚于双目。

0020.en: In the late stage of Qi Refining, his spiritual sense had grown much stronger and naturally had many new uses. What Lv Yang was using now was a wondrous technique called "Qi-Gazing Art."
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 炼气后期，灵识大涨之后自然也有了许多妙用，吕阳此刻用的就是一门名为“望气术”的神妙手段。

0020.en: The result of his looking was startling. Lv Yang's eyes nearly bulged out of their sockets.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 结果不看不要紧，这一看，吕阳差点瞪圆了双眼。

0020.en: In his eyes, Xiao Shiye's entire body—his Daoist robe, boots, clothes, cap, and even the belt around his waist—was glowing with the light of treasures!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 因为在他的眼中，萧石叶全身上下，鹤氅，靴子，衣袍，头冠，甚至就连束腰的带子都绽放着宝光！

0020.en: In terms of quality, they were probably no worse than his own sword pellet!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 论品质，恐怕都不比他的剑丸差！

0020.en: Even with Lv Yang's current state of mind, he couldn't help but feel a sense of unfairness.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 哪怕以吕阳如今的心性，也难免生出了几分不平衡。

0020.en: After all, the magic treasure he had spent months and a fortune to refine was as common as cabbage on Xiao Shiye's body. It was hard not to feel jealous.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 毕竟他耗费数个月，斥巨资才炼就的法宝，在萧石叶这边却跟不要钱似的随处可见，难免让人眼红。

0020.en: "This person has such great luck..."
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: “这人好大的气运”

0020.en: If Lv Yang had previously thought that Xiao Shiye winning the grand prize in the merit pool was due to some secret manipulation, he now changed his mind.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 如果说之前吕阳还觉得萧石叶能抽中功德池大奖是因为有黑幕暗箱操作，那么现在他又改变了想法。

0020.en: Could it really be that he's just that lucky?
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: 该不会真是他运气好吧？

0020.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's expression gradually became strange.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 想到这里，吕阳的表情又渐渐变得古怪了起来。

0020.en: With such great luck, it meant that by following him, one could surely get a lot of opportunities. And his cultivation level wasn't high, making it very easy to rob him...
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 有这么高的气运，可以说只要跟着他就肯定能蹭到不少机缘，偏偏他修为还不高，抢起来特别容易

0020.en: This Xiao Shiye... he seems like a great asset!
0020.speaker: 吕阳
0020.cn: 这个萧石叶，好像是个人材啊！

0021.en: Chapter 21: Unexpected Disaster
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 第21章 无妄之灾

0021.en: "Junior Brother Xiao is indeed a handsome and talented person."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “萧师弟果然是一表人才啊。”

0021.en: Lv Yang laughed and patted Xiao Shiye's shoulder. "I'm Lv Yang. We probably joined at the same time, so I'm not really your senior brother."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: 吕阳一边大小，一边拍了拍萧石叶的肩膀：“在下吕阳，和你应该是同一批入门的，算不上是师兄。”

0021.en: "The same group?"
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: “同一批？”

0021.en: Xiao Shiye was surprised to hear this, and then his face showed admiration. "In that case, Brother Lv's talent must be excellent, or you wouldn't have reached this level of cultivation."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: 萧石叶闻言一脸惊讶，旋即面露敬佩之色：“如此说来，吕兄的天赋定然极佳，否则难有这般修为。”

0021.en: "I don't deserve such praise."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “当不得如此赞誉。”

0021.en: Lv Yang waved his hand. He knew his own limits. His talent was definitely not good. He relied on taking pills for his usual cultivation and on evil techniques to break through bottlenecks.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 吕阳摆了摆手，他有自知之明，自己的天赋绝对说不上好，平时修行全靠嗑药，突破瓶颈全靠邪功。

0021.en: If he had cultivated step by step, he would probably still be stuck at the third level of Qi Refining.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 如果按部就班修炼，他估计还卡在炼气三层呢。

0021.en: After learning that Lv Yang was his peer, Xiao Shiye was no longer as reserved as before and quickly became friendly with him. After they chatted for a while, Lv Yang tentatively said, "I just had a breakthrough and was planning to go back to my cave to stabilize my cultivation. Where are you heading next, Brother Xiao?"
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: 得知吕阳和自己是同辈后，萧石叶也不复最初的拘谨，很快就和吕阳熟络了起来，两人交谈一阵后，吕阳才试探性地说道：“我刚刚突破，正打算回洞府稳固修为，萧兄接下来打算去何处啊？”

0021.en: "To be honest, Brother Lv, I plan to visit the Merit Pool."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: “不瞒吕兄，我打算去一趟功德池。”

0021.en: Xiao Shiye smiled and said, "I heard that the Merit Pool is the ultimate test of luck. It just so happens that I've been quite lucky recently, so I want to take this chance to try my luck."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: 萧石叶笑道：“我听人说那功德池最考验运气，正好我最近突然有些走运，所以想趁机去试试手气。”

0021.en: "The Merit Pool."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “功德池”

0021.en: Lv Yang's interest was piqued, and on a sudden whim, he said, "In that case, why don't we go together?"
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: 吕阳心中微动，突然心血来潮道：“既然如此，不如同去？”

0021.en: He had already tried the number Xiao Shiye had won with in his past life, so he was very curious about what Xiao Shiye would choose this time and whether there was truly some foul play involved.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 上一世萧石叶中奖的数字他已经试过了，所以他很好奇这一世萧石叶会怎么选，是不是真的有黑幕。

0021.en: Meanwhile, in a sea of clouds outside Wanbao Peak.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 与此同时，万宝峰外的一处云海。

0021.en: More than ten figures stood silently. The one in the lead was a handsome young man in a white robe who looked dashing, surrounded by clouds and mist.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 十余道身影默默伫立，为首者赫然是一位身穿白衣，看上去风流倜傥的俊朗青年，周身被云雾缭绕。

0021.en: Just then, one of them suddenly showed a happy expression:
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 就在这时，其中一人突然面露喜色：

0021.en: "Senior Brother Liu, that person with the surname Xiao has come out."
0021.speaker: 陌生男1
0021.cn: “刘师兄，那个姓萧的出来了。”

0021.en: Before he finished speaking, the handsome young man seemed to awaken from his meditation. The clouds dispersed, revealing a face that Lv Yang would never forget.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 话音未落，俊朗青年似乎也从入定中清醒了过来，云雾散去，露出了一张吕阳绝对不会忘记的面孔。

0021.en: It was Liu Xin!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 赫然是刘信！

0021.en: At this time, Liu Xin had also broken through to the late stage of Qi Refining. As a cultivator of the "Innate Dao Scripture," he had an air of immortal grace that ordinary cultivators lacked.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 此时的刘信同样突破了炼气后期，而且主修《先天道书》的他比起寻常修士还多出了几分道骨仙风。

0021.en: "He's finally out..." Liu Xin smiled. On the surface, he showed none of the fierceness of a demonic cultivator. Instead, he had a friendly and approachable aura. However, when he activated his true qi and used a looking technique to gaze in Xiao Shiye's direction, his smile suddenly froze.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: “终于出来了”刘信嘴角含笑，外表乍看之下全然没有魔道修士的凶戾，反而给人一种如沐春风的亲和气质，然而当他催动真气，施展望气术朝着萧石叶的方向看去时，笑容却是陡然一凝。

0021.en: "...Late-stage Qi Refining?"
0021.speaker: 刘信
0021.cn: “.炼气后期？”

0021.en: Liu Xin frowned slightly. He had not expected a late-stage Qi Refining cultivator to be with Xiao Shiye. This was a variable that could make him change his plan.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 刘信眉头微蹙，显然没有想到萧石叶身边会跟着一个炼气后期，这是一个足以让他改变计划的变数。

0021.en: Just then, a soft sound of surprise came from beside Liu Xin.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 就在这时，刘信身边却突然传来了一声轻咦。

0021.en: Liu Xin turned his head and smiled gently, "What is it, Qingchen? Do you know that late-stage Qi Refining cultivator?"
0021.speaker: 刘信
0021.cn: 刘信应声回头，温柔一笑：“怎么了清尘，莫非你认得那炼气后期？”

0021.en: Hearing this, the charming woman standing behind Liu Xin pursed her red lips, "To be honest, Senior Brother Liu, I do know that late-stage Qi Refining cultivator."
0021.speaker: 清尘
0021.cn: 此言一出，站在刘信身后的娇媚女子顿时抿起了红唇：“不瞒刘师兄，妾身还真认识那位炼气后期。”

0021.en: Then, the woman said with a hateful tone, "That person's name is Lv Yang. He is a disciple who joined a few months ago. In the Death-Substitution Yin Puppet incident, he left early and made a fortune, at least ten thousand contribution points! He must have used that huge sum to break through to the late stage of Qi Refining."
0021.speaker: 清尘
0021.cn: 紧接着，女子便语气嫉恨地说道“那人名叫吕阳，乃是数个月前入门的弟子，之前的替死阴傀事件，他早早离场大赚了一笔，至少有上万贡献点！想来他就是靠着这笔巨款才突破了炼气后期”

0021.en: The charming woman was the same Fairy Qingchen who had been with Zhao Xuhe in the previous life.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 娇媚女子赫然是上一世跟在赵旭河身边的清尘仙子。

0021.en: But unlike the last life, this Qingchen had broken up with Zhao Xuhe early on and was now Liu Xin's lover.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 不过和上一世不同的是，这一世的清尘仙子早早就和赵旭河闹掰了，如今早已经和刘信成为了姘头。

0021.en: The reason for the breakup was simple: Zhao Xuhe had pulled her into speculating on the Death-Substitution Yin Puppets.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 闹掰的理由也很简单：赵旭河拉她一起炒替死阴傀。

0021.en: Zhao Xuhe went bankrupt, and so did Fairy Qingchen.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 赵旭河破产，清尘仙子自然也不例外。

0021.en: Incidentally, Liu Xin had also speculated.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 顺带一提，刘信也炒了。

0021.en: Because the impact of the Death-Substitution Yin Puppets was much greater in this life, their losses were far greater than in the previous life when the bubble burst.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而因为这一世替死阴傀的影响比上一世大的多，所以在它暴雷之后两人的损失也要远远超过上一世。

0021.en: Not only were they on the verge of bankruptcy, but they also had a large amount of external debt.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 不仅濒临破产，还多了大量外债。

0021.en: Because of this, they had to resort to robbing fellow disciples—something they hadn't done in the previous life—to cover the losses from the puppet speculation.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 拜此所赐，两人才不得不做起上一世没做过的洗劫同门的勾当，以此来填补炒替死阴傀带来的损失。

0021.en: Over time, they even formed a team. Its members were disciples who had some background in the sect but had gone bankrupt from the puppet speculation. Their targets were the ordinary disciples who had made a lot of money by starting with little capital and getting out early.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 久而久之，他们甚至拉起了一支队伍，成员都是在门中有一定背景势力，却因为炒替死阴傀而破产的弟子，至于他们的目标，则是集中在了那些因为本钱少，离场早，赚了一大笔的普通弟子。

0021.en: Xiao Shiye was their most recent target.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 萧石叶就是他们最近盯上的目标。

0021.en: And now, after hearing about Lv Yang's deeds from Fairy Qingchen, Liu Xin's eyes grew brighter. He had clearly made Lv Yang a target as well.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而现在，从清尘仙子口中听完吕阳的事迹之后，刘信的目光更加明亮了，显然将吕阳也视作了目标。

0021.en: "There's no time to lose. Let's move!"
0021.speaker: 刘信
0021.cn: “事不宜迟，动手！”

0021.en: With Liu Xin's command, everyone present let out a cold laugh. Then, they each mounted their light rays and flew towards Lv Yang and Xiao Shiye.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 随着刘信一声令下，在场众人纷纷桀桀冷笑，随后各自驾起遁光，便朝着吕阳和萧石叶的方向飞去。

0021.en: Just after leaving Wanbao Peak and flying for some distance in the sea of clouds, Lv Yang suddenly frowned. The sword core between his eyebrows throbbed as a warning.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 刚离开万宝峰，在云海内遁行了一段距离，吕阳就猛然皱起了眉头，眉心的剑丸示警般跳动了起来。

0021.en: Looking in the direction of the warning, Lv Yang's frown deepened.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 顺着剑丸示警的方向看去，吕阳眉头皱得更深了。

0021.en: He saw rays of light flying towards them from all directions, with him and Xiao Shiye at the center, like a large net closing in on their position.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 只见以他和萧石叶为中心，四周居然都有遁光飞纵而来，仿佛一张正在朝着他们的位置收拢的大网。

0021.en: Before long, a voice came from behind.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 没过多久，一道声音就从身后传来。

0021.en: "Fellow Daoist, please wait!"
0021.speaker: 陌生男1
0021.cn: “道友请留步！”

0021.en: Lv Yang's face darkened when he heard this.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 吕阳闻言顿时脸色一黑。

0021.en: To say something like that, they clearly had bad intentions!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 连这种话都说出来了，来者不善！

0021.en: Lv Yang didn't look back. He ignored the voice behind him and frantically pushed his magic power, wrapping Xiao Shiye in his sword light and fleeing towards the Merit Pool.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 吕阳头也不回，无视了身后的声音，只顾狂催法力，剑光裹住萧石叶便朝着功德池的方向飞速逃遁，

0021.en: However, the other party was clearly prepared. Lv Yang stopped after flying only a short distance. He looked around and saw that the surrounding sea of clouds had thinned out at some point. In its place was a vast mirage, strange and colorful, trapping him and Xiao Shiye in the center!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 然而对方显然是有备而来，吕阳刚遁出不远就停下了脚步，抬目四望，却见周围云海不知何时竟是变得稀薄了起来，取而代之的则是一片浩瀚蜃景，光怪陆离，将他和萧石叶牢牢扣在了正中！

0021.en: "Such an unexpected disaster."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “如此无妄之灾.”

0021.en: Lv Yang looked grim. He used his looking technique to observe from a distance and gritted his teeth, "One late-stage Qi Refining, seven mid-stage Qi Refining... the chance of winning is at most thirty percent."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: 吕阳神色难看，用望气术远远观望，顿时一咬牙：“一个炼气后期，七个炼气中期，胜算最多三成.”

0021.en: What should I do?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 怎么办？

0021.en: As Lv Yang was thinking about a plan, Xiao Shiye, who was beside him, suddenly spoke up, "Brother Lv, if I'm not mistaken, these people should all be after me."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: 就在吕阳思索对策之时，身旁的萧石叶突然开口了：“吕兄，若无意外，这些人应该都是冲我来的。”

0021.en: At this point, Xiao Shiye had a regretful look on his face. "I was careless. These people must be after my magic treasures and contribution points. I thought they had given up after several months, but I didn't expect them to be so persistent. Now, let's split up and escape."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: 说到这里，只见萧石叶一脸悔色：“是我疏忽了，这些人应该是为了我这一身的法宝和贡献点，我本以为数个月过去后，对方已经放弃了，没想到他们如此执着事到如今，你我分头逃跑吧。”

0021.en: "Split up and escape?"
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “分头逃跑？”

0021.en: Lv Yang shook his head. "The enemy has already sealed this area of clouds, seemingly with a powerful magic treasure. I'm afraid we can't escape."
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头：“对方已经罩定了这一片的云海，似乎是用了某件厉害法宝，恐怕已经逃不出去了。”

0021.en: "Don't worry, I have a way to deal with it."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: “无妨，我有应对之法。”

0021.en: Xiao Shiye whispered, "I have two 'Treasure-Breaking Awls.' As long as I use them, I can open a path to escape. I'm willing to give one to you, Brother Lv."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: 萧石叶低声道：“我有两枚‘破宝锥’，只要祭出就能打开一条生路，我愿意将其中一枚赠送给吕兄。”

0021.en: "Brother Lv, you go first. I'll cover the rear."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: “吕兄先走，我来断后。”

0021.en: After saying that, he directly handed an awl to Lv Yang.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 说完，他便直接将一枚宝锥递给了吕阳。

0021.en: Lv Yang weighed it in his hand. Circulating his magic power, he immediately understood that Xiao Shiye was not lying. This magic treasure indeed had a high chance of breaking the surrounding mirage.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 吕阳将其掂在手中，法力运化，立刻明白萧石叶所言不虚，这法宝确实有很大希望破开周围的蜃景。

0021.en: "...Are you sure you want me to go first?" Lv Yang's expression was strange.
0021.speaker: 吕阳
0021.cn: “.你确定要让我先走？”吕阳神色莫名。

0021.en: "Brother Lv, the road ahead is long. We will meet again someday."
0021.speaker: 萧石叶
0021.cn: “吕兄，山高路远，你我后会有期。”

0021.en: Xiao Shiye cupped his hands, a smile of relief on his face. Then he turned around to face the enemy, clearly prepared to die.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 萧石叶拱了拱手，脸上露出了释然的笑容，随后竟直接转身迎向来敌，显然已经做好了赴死的准备。

0021.en: Lv Yang fell into deep thought when he saw this.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 吕阳见状陷入了沉思。

0021.en: He had been in seclusion for three months and had never made any enemies. It was impossible that these people were targeting him. Besides, compared to him, Xiao Shiye was obviously the bigger prize.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他闭关三个月，从未结过仇家，来人不可能是针对他的，何况比起他，萧石叶明显才是更大的肥羊。

0021.en: So, what Xiao Shiye said was correct.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 所以萧石叶所言不差。

0021.en: If he abandoned him, he would most likely be able to escape.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 只要抛弃了他，自己大概率能脱困。

0021.en: So, should he do it?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 那么要这么做吗？

0021.en: Above the sea of clouds, watching Xiao Shiye press forward, seemingly indifferent to life and death, Lv Yang's sword core between his eyebrows pulsed with warning, and his expression was uncertain.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 云海之上，看着萧石叶一往无前，俨然将生死置之度外的身影，吕阳眉心剑丸示警，脸色阴晴不定。

0022.en: Chapter 22: The Might of the Divine Light
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 第22章 神光之威

0022.en: Finally, Lu Yang figured it out.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 最后，吕阳想通了。

0022.en: "I can't leave!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “我不能走！”

0022.en: This wasn't because he was moved by Xiao Shiye's final performance, but because he suddenly realized something that made his blood run cold.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 这不是因为被萧石叶最后的那一番表现所打动，而是他突然意识到了一个让他有些毛骨悚然的事情。

0022.en: "In the end, why did I follow Xiao Shiye out here?"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “说到底，我为何要跟着萧石叶出来？”

0022.en: "I should have gone to find Zhao Xuhe immediately to get the other half of that third-grade true technique from my past life, the 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art'."
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “我本来应该第一时间去找赵旭河，将上一世那本三品真功的另一半，《九变化龙决》拿到手才对”

0022.en: But what happened instead?
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 可结果呢？

0022.en: He followed Xiao Shiye to the Merit Pool, just out of curiosity?
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 跟着萧石叶去功德池，就因为心中好奇？

0022.en: The grand prize at the Merit Pool could only be drawn once a year, and he had already used his chance. There was no benefit in going with Xiao Shiye.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 要知道功德池大奖一年限抽一次，而自己今年的次数早就用掉了，和萧石叶去功德池根本毫无好处。

0022.en: "I actually did something with no benefit?"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 没有好处的事，我居然会做？

0022.en: "This isn't logical!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 这不合理！

0022.en: In an instant, Lu Yang felt as if a basin of cold water had been poured over his head, his hands and feet turning ice-cold. "Who is influencing me? Interfering with my thoughts?"
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 霎时间，吕阳只觉得仿佛被一盆冷水当头浇下，手脚冰冷到了极致：“谁在影响我？干扰我的想法？”

0022.en: "No, that's not right."
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “不对.”

0022.en: After figuring this out, Lu Yang had a sudden epiphany.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 想通了这一点后，吕阳瞬间茅塞顿开。

0022.en: Why did he accompany Xiao Shiye to the Merit Pool? Because Xiao Shiye needed him! Otherwise, Xiao Shiye would be the one being hunted by a powerful enemy alone right now!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 为何自己会陪着萧石叶去功德池？因为萧石叶需要自己！否则现在就会变成他一个人被强敌追杀了！

0022.en: And now, he had an external helper!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 而现在，他多了自己这么一个外援！

0022.en: If Xiao Shiye was the heaven-defying Son of Destiny, then he was the unlucky fool in the stories who serves as a shield when the hero is in danger!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 如果说萧石叶是气运滔天的天命之子，那自己就是话本里专门在天命之子遇险时做挡箭牌的倒霉蛋！

0022.en: Splitting up to escape in this situation? That would just attract all the fire!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 这种情况下分头逃跑？根本就是吸引火力！

0022.en: Lu Yang was one hundred percent certain that if they split up, he would be the one caught and killed, while Xiao Shiye would escape unharmed!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 吕阳有百分之百的把握，一旦分头逃跑，最后被追上干掉的人一定是自己，萧石叶反而会化险为夷！

0022.en: "How sinister..."
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “太阴险了啊”

0022.en: Lu Yang let out a long breath. A Son of Destiny like Xiao Shiye playing the trick of diverting trouble would fool any disciple of the Chu Sheng Sect.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 吕阳深深吐出一口浊气，萧石叶这种天命之子玩祸水东引，只要是圣宗弟子就必然会中计。

0022.en: Because among the disciples of the Chu Sheng Sect, there are no good people.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 因为圣宗弟子，没有好人。

0022.en: If someone offered to cover the rear, any other disciple would be overjoyed, shed a few crocodile tears, and run without hesitation.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 有人主动殿后，换成其他圣宗弟子还不欢天喜地，流下几滴鳄鱼的眼泪就果断跑路，都不带犹豫的。

0022.en: But as soon as they did that, they would likely become Xiao Shiye's shield.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 然而只要这么做了，就很有可能成为萧石叶的挡箭牌。

0022.en: Unfortunately for Xiao Shiye, he met Lu Yang. Xiao Shiye was certain that there were no good people in the sect, which is why he made this plan. However, Lu Yang thought the same way.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 可惜萧石叶遇到了吕阳，萧石叶笃定圣宗无好人，所以才定下了这个计划，奈何吕阳也是这个想法。

0022.en: "No good people in the sect, so you, Xiao Shiye, are the only good one?"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 圣宗无好人，就你萧石叶是好人？

0022.en: "I don't believe it!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 我不信！

0022.en: "So, no matter how nice your words are, or how bravely you act, I'll first assume you're not a good person, and then figure out what evil things you're planning!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 所以，任凭你说得天花乱坠，表演的多么视死如归，我先假定你不是好人，再推导你想做什么坏事！

0022.en: That's right, Lu Yang reached his conclusion first!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 没错，吕阳先下结论！

0022.en: Because of this, he wasn't fooled. He examined himself in time and discovered what was truly wrong. Otherwise, he would have been in deep trouble!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 正因如此，他才没有被一叶障目，及时审视自身，最后发现真正的不对劲之处，否则就要被坑惨了！

0022.en: Meanwhile, Liu Xin, who had been in hot pursuit, saw Xiao Shiye charging towards him and Lu Yang standing motionless in the distance. He thought, "To catch the bandits, first catch the king. Xiao Shiye's cultivation is low, so he's easy to deal with. It's safer to take care of that Lu Yang first."
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: 与此同时，一路追杀而来的刘信也看到了朝着自己杀来的萧石叶，以及在不远处始终没有动作的吕阳，心中思忖：“擒贼先擒王，这萧石叶毕竟修为低，好对付，还是先解决那个吕阳更稳妥.”

0022.en: Before Liu Xin could finish his thought, a loud noise suddenly echoed.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 还没等刘信思考完，一声大响陡然传来。

0022.en: BOOM!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: “轰隆！”

0022.en: The next second, a magnificent sword light tore through the sea of clouds. It didn't flee, but instead arrived beside Xiao Shiye under his stunned gaze.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 下一秒，就见一道恢弘剑光撕裂云海，却没有逃跑，而是在萧石叶愕然的注视下一路来到了他身边。

0022.en: "Brother Xiao, we hit it off right away. How could I, Lu, abandon you?"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “萧兄，你我一见如故，吕某岂会将你弃之不顾？”

0022.en: "They are just petty thieves. If we join forces, what is there to fear?"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “区区毛贼，你我携手，又有何惧？”

0022.en: Lu Yang spoke with heroic spirit.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 吕阳说得豪气干云。

0022.en: Xiao Shiye was dumbfounded.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 萧石叶听得目瞪口呆。

0022.en: Could he have miscalculated? Had he really met a good person in the sect?
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: 莫非自己失算了，真在圣宗遇到了一个好人

0022.en: "Impossible!"
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: “不可能！”

0022.en: Xiao Shiye instantly came to his senses. He noticed that while Lu Yang seemed to be facing the enemy alongside him, he was actually positioning Xiao Shiye as a human shield. His face immediately darkened.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 萧石叶瞬间回神，察觉到了吕阳看似和他并肩迎敌，实则将他牢牢护在身前的动作，顿时面色一黑。

0022.en: What good person? This is a bad person!
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: 什么好人，这是坏人呐！

0022.en: "Brother Lu, that was all a misunderstanding."
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: “吕兄，刚刚都是误会。”

0022.en: Xiao Shiye gave a wry smile, knowing that Lu Yang had seen through his scheme. He said softly, "Since it has come to this, why don't we truly join forces?"
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: 萧石叶一脸苦笑，知道吕阳已经识破了他的谋划，忍不住轻声道：“事到如今，你我不如真正联手？”

0022.en: "Join forces? Alright."
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “联手？好啊。”

0022.en: Lu Yang sneered, then threw Xiao Shiye directly at the other enemies. Xiao Shiye immediately started cursing, "You shameless bastard, Lu!"
0022.speaker: 萧石叶
0022.cn: 吕阳冷笑一声，随后直接将萧石叶扔向了刘信之外的其他人，萧石叶顿时破口大骂：“姓吕的你无耻.”

0022.en: Seeing this from a distance, Liu Xin burst out laughing. He didn't know what had happened between them, but it was clear they were fighting. This was perfect for him. He was happy to take advantage of their misfortune!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 远处的刘信见状顿时大笑，虽然他不知道吕阳和萧石叶之间发生了什么，但是看样子显然是起了争执，不过这正合他意，毕竟他可没有义务去迁就敌人，敌人自己出了问题，他正好落井下石！

0022.en: With that in mind, Liu Xin changed his plan and shouted to the others:
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 想到这里，刘信当即改变了计划，对着其他人大声道：

0022.en: "You all trap Xiao Shiye. I'll deal with Lu Yang."
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: “你们困住萧石叶，吕阳我来对付。”

0022.en: After giving his orders, Liu Xin flew towards Lu Yang. But just then, he saw Lu Yang give a slight smile.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 刘信吩咐完便驾起一道遁光朝着吕阳迎了上去，然而就在这时，他却看到吕阳突然露出了一丝微笑。

0022.en: Something is wrong!
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: 不对！

0022.en: The next second, Lu Yang's figure vanished.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 下一秒，吕阳的身影消失了。

0022.en: Almost at the same time, a sword light erupted from Xiao Shiye, who was already surrounded. Lu Yang's figure stepped out of the light!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 几乎同时，已经被其他人包围的萧石叶身上陡然绽放出了一道剑光，吕阳的身影从剑光里踱步走出！

0022.en: Divine Firmament Sword Control True Art!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 神霄御剑真决！

0022.en: Where the sword light is, he can arrive in an instant!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 剑光所在，念动即至！

0022.en: Liu Xin instantly recalled their conversation. The talk of "joining forces" wasn't a joke, but a secret agreement!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 刘信瞬间回想起了刚刚吕阳和萧石叶的对话，所谓的联手之言居然不是嘲讽，而是心照不宣的默契！

0022.en: The two of them had understood each other perfectly and even acted out a scene to trick him. They created the perfect opportunity: throwing a fully prepared Lu Yang into a group of unprepared cultivators whose highest level was only the middle stage of Qi Refining!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 两人精准地领悟了彼此的意思，还十分默契地现场飙戏，结果成功瞒过自己，制造出了一个完美的战机：将蓄势待发的吕阳，扔到了一群毫无心理准备，境界最高也只有炼气中期的修士之中！

0022.en: Liu Xin's expression changed dramatically. He shouted, "Spread out!"
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: 刘信瞬间神色剧变，大声道：“快散开”

0022.en: "Too late!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “晚了！”

0022.en: Lu Yang grinned fiercely. His sword core bloomed like a peacock's tail, but this time, the sword light was stained with a deep bloody color.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 吕阳狞笑一声，剑丸如孔雀开屏般绽放，然而和先前相比，这一次爆发的剑光竟染上了浓烈的血色。

0022.en: In an instant, Lu Yang let out a shout, his body becoming a blood shadow that merged with the sword core. A crimson screen of light, like fire and blood, erupted. The divine light, with Lu Yang at its center, swept out in all directions, like a wildfire consuming a prairie, and instantly engulfed everyone!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 霎时间，只见吕阳吐气开声，身化血影，与剑丸相合，随后便腾起了一道如焰似血的猩红光幕。神光以吕阳为中心，向着四面八方一扫，恰如烈火燎原，血染江山，眨眼就将所有人尽数淹没！

0022.en: Heavenly Demon Blood Transformation Divine Light!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 天魔化血神光！

0022.en: Though it was broad daylight, the cultivators hit by the blood light felt an icy chill sweep through their bodies, and then they lost consciousness.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 明明是青天白日，被血光扫中的修士却只感觉一股如坠冰窟的森寒之气席卷全身，随后便没了意识。

0022.en: When the divine light faded, only the shaken Xiao Shiye and empty human skins drifting in the air remained.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 等到神光散尽，四周除了惊魂未定的萧石叶就只剩下了漫天飘落的空荡人皮。

0022.en: Their flesh and blood had been completely devoured by the Heavenly Demon Blood Transformation Divine Light, making the red glow on Lu Yang's sword core look even more sinister.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 至于他们的血肉则是被天魔化血神光吃了个干干净净，也让吕阳剑丸上的红光显得愈发邪异了起来。

0022.en: The next second, the sword core trembled slightly, and a blood shadow emerged, taking the form of Lu Yang.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 下一秒，剑丸微微一震，一道血影化生而出，现出了吕阳的模样。

0022.en: He looked and saw Liu Xin standing in the distance, stunned as if in a dream. Lu Yang laughed loudly, "Well, if it isn't Senior Brother Liu."
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 他定睛一看，见刘信呆愣愣地站在远处，如在梦中，顿时大笑一声：“我道是谁，原来是刘师兄啊。”

0022.en: Before he finished speaking, he flew forward with his sword light!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 话音未落，他便驾剑光飞斩了过去！

0022.en: He still hadn't forgotten the grudge from being refined like a resource in his previous-previous life. He would take revenge for his past self!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 上上世被当作人材顷刻炼化的仇，他可还没有忘记呢，为上上世的自己报仇雪恨！

0022.en: Yesterday's grudge is a thorn in my back!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 昨日之仇，如芒在背！

0022.en: "Don't blame me for this today!"
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: 今天，你可别怪我！

0022.en: Lu Yang charged with his sword. Liu Xin, having just witnessed the power of the Heavenly Demon Blood Transformation Divine Light, his face darkened, and he immediately tried to retreat.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 吕阳纵剑飞斩，而刚刚才亲眼目睹了天魔化血神光厉害的刘信顿时面色阴沉，当即就试图抽身后退。

0022.en: "Trying to run?" Lu Yang pursued without hesitation.
0022.speaker: 吕阳
0022.cn: “想走？”吕阳毫不犹豫，御剑追杀。

0022.en: Seeing this, Liu Xin quickly shouted, "Qingchen, release the barrier!"
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: 刘信见状赶忙高声道：“清尘，解开禁制！”

0022.en: As soon as he spoke, the illusion that had sealed the area shattered. A graceful figure slowly appeared; it was Fairy Qingchen.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 话音刚落，就见此前将四周封锁的虚幻蜃景突然破散，紧接着一道倩影缓缓浮现，赫然是清尘仙子。

0022.en: The magic treasure that had covered this sea of clouds was her "Nine Palaces Dust Scarf." The scarf contained a grand formation that could trap and seal an area. It was meant to stop the target from escaping, but instead, it had blocked Liu Xin's escape route.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 刚刚罩住这一片云海的法宝就是她的“九宫弥尘帕”，帕中藏有一座九宫大阵，可以藏须弥纳芥子，困锁天地，禁制一方，本意是用来阻止目标逃离，没想到弄巧成拙反而拦住了刘信的生路。

0022.en: Liu Xin breathed a sigh of relief when he saw Fairy Qingchen appear.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 眼见清尘仙子现身，刘信这才松了一口气。

0022.en: The next second, he flew to her side, and they stood together, looking grimly at the approaching Lu Yang and Xiao Shiye.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 下一秒，他便驾遁光来到清尘仙子的身边，和她并肩而立，神色凝重地看向了追来的吕阳和萧石叶。

0022.en: Both sides stared at each other.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 双方面面相觑。

0022.en: After a moment, Liu Xin spoke in a low voice, "Hey, can we talk about this?"
0022.speaker: 刘信
0022.cn: 片刻过后，刘信才低声开口：“唏，可以和解吗？”

0023.en: Chapter 23: The Innate Qi Myriad Spirit Banner
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第23章 先天一炁万灵幡

0023.en: Above the sea of clouds, Liu Xin took the initiative to soften his stance: "If you two junior brothers are willing to make peace, I am willing to offer a high-quality Daoist scripture as a gift."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: 云海之上，刘信主动服软：“两位师弟若是能与刘某化干戈为玉帛，刘某愿意用一本上乘道书相赠。”

0023.en: "At this point? You must be joking."
0023.speaker: 吕阳
0023.cn: “事到如今？你不是在说笑吧。”

0023.en: Lv Yang laughed when he heard this: "Senior Brother Liu, we are all disciples of the Chu Sheng Sect, so why pretend? You are already in a life-or-death situation with us."
0023.speaker: 吕阳
0023.cn: 吕阳闻言却笑了：“刘师兄，大家都是圣宗弟子，何必装模做样？你如今已经是和我们不死不休了。”

0023.en: Liu Xin did not answer, his face just suddenly darkened.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信没有回答，只是陡然沉下了脸色。

0023.en: Because Lv Yang was right. At this moment, the ones who truly didn't want to make peace were not Lv Yang and Xiao Shiye, but Liu Xin and Fairy Qingchen.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 因为吕阳说得没错，此时此刻，真正不愿意和解的已经不是吕阳和萧石叶了，而是刘信和清尘仙子。

0023.en: The reason was simple: the sect's rules.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 原因也很简单，圣宗门规。

0023.en: "Although the sect's rules are meaningless as long as you're not caught, once you are discovered, the rules become very real."
0023.speaker: 吕阳
0023.cn: “虽然只要不被发现，圣宗门规就形同虚设，但换句话说，一旦被发现，圣宗门规可就名副其实了。”

0023.en: Lv Yang sneered, "This is surely not the first time your group has ambushed and robbed fellow disciples. It's just that no one found out before. But now, if I report this to the Law Enforcement Hall after I leave, the truth will come out, and you, Senior Brother Liu, will almost certainly die."
0023.speaker: 吕阳
0023.cn: 吕阳冷笑道：“你们这些人肯定不是第一次私自设伏，洗劫同门师兄弟，只是之前没人发现而已。然而现在，只要我离开之后去执法堂告上一状，到时候真相大白，刘师兄你几乎是必死无疑。”

0023.en: "You must be joking, Junior Brother."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “师弟说笑了。”

0023.en: Liu Xin's face twitched slightly. "We can sign a magical contract, agreeing that today's events will not be spoken of. That way, I can naturally rest easy."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: 刘信面皮微微一抽：“你我大可签订法契，约定今日之事不传六耳，如此一来师兄我自然就放心了”

0023.en: "Really?" Lv Yang asked back.
0023.speaker: 吕阳
0023.cn: “真的吗？”吕阳反问。

0023.en: Of course, it was a lie.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 当然是假的。

0023.en: Only the dead can truly be trusted!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只有死人才最让人放心！

0023.en: "Qingchen!"
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “清尘！”

0023.en: Following Liu Xin's low shout, Fairy Qingchen, who had been silent by his side, finally spoke. She parted her red lips and slowly said a single word:
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信一声低喝，身旁始终保持沉默的清尘仙子才终于开口，只见她朱唇轻启，徐徐吐出了一个音节：

0023.en: "Open!"
0023.speaker: 清尘仙子

0023.en: Before the word faded, the surrounding sea of clouds changed again. In an instant, huge mountain peaks appeared, trapping Lv Yang and Xiao Shiye in the center.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 话音未落，四周的云海再起变化，顷刻间显化出一座座巍然雄峰，将吕阳和萧石叶围困在了正中间。

0023.en: It was clearly another formation!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 显然又是一座阵法！

0023.en: "Do you really think I'm afraid of your Heavenly Demon's Blood-Melting Divine Light?" Liu Xin sneered, surprisingly recognizing Lv Yang's special ability. A banner appeared in his hand, fluttering in the wind. "It just so happens that my 'Innate Qi Myriad Spirit Banner' is missing a main soul. Today, I'll use you to consecrate the banner."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “真以为我是怕你的天魔化血神光吗？”刘信居然认得吕阳的神通，冷笑一声，随后手中便多出了一面迎风招展的旗幡：“正好我这‘先天一炁万灵幡’还没有主魂坐镇，今日就拿你来祭旗.”

0023.en: "Go!"
0023.speaker: 刘信

0023.en: Before Liu Xin could finish speaking, Lv Yang had already merged with his sword pellet and flew over to attack. The overwhelming smell of blood made Liu Xin swallow the rest of his taunt.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信话音未落，吕阳已经身合剑丸飞斩了过来，铺天盖地的血腥气顿时让刘信咽回了没说完的嘲讽。

0023.en: "Souls, return!"
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “魂归来兮！”

0023.en: Liu Xin formed a hand seal and shook the Myriad Spirit Banner forcefully. He released two wisps of white Qi that gradually formed into human shapes.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只见刘信掐动法决，将手里的万灵幡用力摇动，顿时放出了两道氤氲白炁，蒸腾间渐渐显化出人影。

0023.en: Lv Yang didn't stop and slashed down with his sword.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 吕阳动作不停，一剑斩下。

0023.en: Driven by Liu Xin, the two figures channeled their True Qi and met the attack head-on. With a loud bang, both were shattered by the sword's energy.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 而两道人影在刘信的趋势下同样运起一身真气，悍然迎击，随后就听轰的一声，二者便被剑气斩碎。

0023.en: Liu Xin had just been about to join the two banner spirits he had summoned, but seeing this, he quickly pulled back.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信刚想出去和自己召唤出的两道幡灵联手对敌，见状顿时又缩了回去。

0023.en: "Qingchen, attack now!"
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “清尘，快出手！”

0023.en: Hearing this, Fairy Qingchen's pretty face turned serious. She took a phoenix-tail hairpin from her hair and threw it. The hairpin instantly turned into a golden light and shot towards the spot between Lv Yang's eyebrows.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 清尘仙子闻言俏脸凝重，摘下秀发间的一枚凤尾簪掷出，簪子顿时化作一道金光朝着吕阳眉心刺去。

0023.en: However, before the hairpin could get close to Lv Yang, another flash of treasure light appeared and blocked it. It was Xiao Shiye, the boy of many treasures.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 然而不等那凤尾簪靠近吕阳，另一道宝光就凭空出现，将其拦了下来，赫然是萧石叶这位多宝童子。
