0023.en: Not only that, Xiao Shiye then flicked his sleeve and threw out more than ten magical treasures at once. Although their quality varied, they all shone brightly. But after he threw them out, they exploded in mid-air!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不仅如此，只见萧石叶此刻袖袍一展，竟是一口气甩出了十多枚法宝，虽然品质参差不齐有好有坏，但无一例外都散发着浓烈的宝光，偏偏这些法宝被他祭出之后，竟直接在半空中轰然炸开！

0023.en: BOOM!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: “轰隆隆！”

0023.en: The exploding light was like a series of small suns. It blocked the killing formation set up by Fairy Qingchen and almost blasted it apart from the inside!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 炸裂的宝光像是一枚枚小太阳，竟直接挡住了清尘仙子布下的杀阵，甚至差点就将阵法从内部炸开！

0023.en: This extravagant scene made the other three's eyes twitch.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 如此豪奢的一幕，看得其他三人都是眼角抽搐。

0023.en: Xiao Shiye was different from Lv Yang. He didn't have any powerful magical arts, but he clearly didn't need those fancy things to fight.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 萧石叶固然和吕阳不同，没有什么厉害的法术神通，可他和人斗法显然也不用那些花里胡哨的东西。

0023.en: He just had to throw out his magical treasures and make them self-destruct. That was enough.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只要将法宝往外一甩，然后自爆，就足够了。

0023.en: This tactic made Liu Xin's already dark face even uglier. He waved the Myriad Spirit Banner and instantly summoned dozens of banner spirits.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 如此战术，让刘信本就阴沉的脸色愈发难看，干脆将手中万灵幡一挥，顷刻间就唤出了数十道幡灵。

0023.en: These were all from his previous ambushes on fellow disciples.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这些全都是刘信这段时间伏杀同门的收获。

0023.en: "You all, go and support the formation."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “你们，都去压阵。”

0023.en: Following Liu Xin's command, the banner spirits immediately moved. They positioned themselves around Fairy Qingchen's formation, strengthening its power.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 得了刘信命令，一众幡灵立刻应声而动，分别落在了清尘仙子的阵法四处，替她加持提升阵法之威。

0023.en: Fairy Qingchen felt more confident seeing this. A small flag appeared in her hand, and she waved it. The mountains created by the formation immediately moved, locking down the area. This protected her and Liu Xin, blocking Lv Yang's sword light.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 清尘仙子见状也是心中大定，手中也出现了一面小旗，随后用力晃动，四周由阵法显化出来的巍峨山峰立刻应声而动，困锁天地，封禁四方，同时也将她和刘信牢牢护住，挡下了吕阳的剑光。

0023.en: Liu Xin smiled with satisfaction and shook the Myriad Spirit Banner again.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信见状这才满意一笑，随后再度晃动万灵幡。

0023.en: He had found this strange treasure along with the "Innate Dao Scripture" during a lucky encounter. It was his greatest asset in battle.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这件奇宝乃是他当年奇遇的时候和《先天道书》一同获得的，乃是他修行至今与人斗法的最大依仗。

0023.en: The banner was said to have one main soul, two guardians, and three corpse gods.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 幡上由一主魂，二护法，三尸神之说。

0023.en: It was said that the Dao creates one, one creates two, two create three, and three create all things. Only by filling these six positions and adding ten thousand souls would the treasure be complete.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 所谓道生一，一生二，二生三，三生万物，唯有凑齐这六个位置，再搭配上万魂魄，此宝才算圆满。

0023.en: It sounded simple, but Liu Xin had worked hard for over ten years without success. Ten thousand souls were easy to get; he could just go to the mortal world and destroy a city. However, he could never find the right souls for the six key positions. He hadn't even found the three corpse gods, let alone the two guardians.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 听上去简单，可刘信苦心祭炼了十余年都没能成功。上万魂魄还好说，他抽空去凡间屠座城也就解决了，然而最重要的六个位置却始终没有着落，别说是二护法了，就连三尸神他都没有凑齐。

0023.en: Even so, the treasure was still very powerful.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不过饶是如此，此宝的威力依旧可观。

0023.en: "Kill them!"
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “杀了他们！”

0023.en: Liu Xin shook the banner, and thousands of souls flew out. Unlike the banner spirits, which were cultivators, these souls were resentful ghosts of ordinary people.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信晃动旗幡，上万魂魄陆续飞出，不同于那些有修为的幡灵，这些魂魄都是凡人含怨化成的厉鬼。

0023.en: Although their quality was poor, there were many of them.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 虽然质量很差，但数量极多。

0023.en: When Liu Xin summoned them, they swarmed like a huge wave, instantly covering Lv Yang.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 此刻被刘信呼唤出来，当真是如同滔天巨浪，乌泱泱一片覆盖下来，瞬间就将吕阳的身影淹没其中。

0023.en: More importantly, these were ghosts without flesh and blood, so they were not afraid of Lv Yang's Blood-Melting Divine Light!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 更重要的是这些都是没有血肉的厉鬼，根本不怕吕阳的化血神光！

0023.en: However, Lv Yang was not afraid either.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 然而吕阳见状，却也浑然不惧。

0023.en: The Blood-Melting Divine Light was his strongest technique, but not his only one. After refining his sword pellet, his Divine Empyrean Sword Control Art was also very powerful!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 化血神光是他最厉害的手段，却不是他唯一的手段，炼成剑丸后，他的神霄御剑真决同样威力不俗！

0023.en: With a thought from Lv Yang, his sword pellet split into hundreds of sword lights. His figure began to teleport between the lights. He didn't fight the ghosts and banner spirits directly. He retreated when they advanced and attacked when they were tired, playing a guerrilla war with them.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只见吕阳心念一动，剑丸迅速分化出数十上百道剑光，而后他的身影便开始在剑光之中瞬移腾挪了起来，也不和那些厉鬼幡灵正面交手，敌进我退，敌疲我打，竟然和一众幡灵打起了游击战。

0023.en: This was the true advantage of a sword cultivator.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这才是剑修真正的优势所在。

0023.en: Attack with one strike, then retreat a thousand miles. Then attack from another direction, making the enemy tired and revealing a weakness, then deliver the final blow.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 一剑斩出就远遁千里，然后从另一个方向继续攻击，打得对手疲于应对，露出破绽，最后一剑枭首。

0023.en: Soon, Lv Yang had killed most of the ten thousand resentful ghosts, and their army was scattered.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 不一会儿，上万厉鬼就被吕阳杀得七零八落，溃不成军。

0023.en: On the other side, Xiao Shiye also got serious. He threw out several high-quality magical treasures and made them self-destruct, shaking the formation that had just been stabilized.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 另一边萧石叶也发了狠，几件上乘法宝扔出去悍然自爆，将好不容易稳固的大阵再度炸得动荡不已。

0023.en: Seeing the situation turning against them, Fairy Qingchen couldn't help but look at Liu Xin: "Senior Brother..."
0023.speaker: 清尘仙子
0023.cn: 眼见局势渐渐不利，清尘仙子忍不住看向刘信：“师兄.”

0023.en: "Don't worry. I'm not worried, so why are you?"
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “别急，我都不急，你急什么？”

0023.en: Liu Xin was still calm. He wasn't worried about Xiao Shiye, and he didn't believe Lv Yang could keep using his sword teleportation technique without using up his True Qi.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刘信倒是依旧淡定，萧石叶也就罢了，他就不信吕阳施展剑遁之术大杀特杀，真气法力能毫无损耗。

0023.en: This was also part of his battle strategy.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这也是他的斗法战术。

0023.en: First, he would send out the unimportant banner spirits to wear down the enemy. When their True Qi was low, he would use his trump card to win the battle.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 先放出那些不重要的幡灵消耗对手，等到对手的真气消耗得差不多了，再拿出杀手锏一举奠定胜局。

0023.en: He didn't want to use his trump card unless he had to. That banner spirit was too precious, and its identity was very sensitive. If anyone saw it, he would have to kill them. If even a small rumor got out, he would be doomed.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 其实如果不是万不得已，他并不想动用自己的杀手锏，毕竟那个幡灵实在太贵重了，生前的身份更是无比敏感。一旦被人看到，就决不能留活口，否则哪怕传出去一星半点都能让他万劫不复。

0023.en: "Oh well, you can't make an omelet without breaking eggs."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: “也罢，舍不得孩子套不着狼。”

0023.en: After thinking for a moment, Liu Xin finally raised the banner in his hand and bowed respectfully. "A strong enemy is here. To solve this problem, I must ask you for your help, Senior Brother."
0023.speaker: 刘信
0023.cn: 刘信斟酌片刻，最后还是举起了手中的幡旗，恭敬一拜：“强敌杀至，为解此困局，还请师兄出手。”

0024.en: Chapter 24: Self-Destruction!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 第24章 自爆！

0024.en: Liu Xin was once just an ordinary disciple in the Chu Sheng Sect. He lived a grueling life of completing missions, cultivating, and paying off debts.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 曾经的刘信，也只是初圣宗随处可见的一位普通弟子，每天过着做任务，修炼，还贷款的牛马生活。

0024.en: Until a fortunate encounter completely changed his destiny.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 直到一次奇遇，彻底改变了他的命运。

0024.en: It began with a bounty mission from a True Inheritor, who wanted to explore an ancient cave dwelling and needed some cannon fodder to scout the way.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 起因是一桩由真传弟子发布的悬赏任务，他想要探索一座前人洞府，刚好手下正缺几个探路的炮灰。

0024.en: Unaware of the circumstances, Liu Xin was lured by the mission's reward and joined the exploration team. By the time he realized he was just cannon fodder, it was too late. He was forced into the cave by the True Inheritor, where he discovered that all the restrictive spells inside were surprisingly ineffective against him.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 刘信不知前因后果，被任务的奖励所吸引，加入了探索队伍，等到发现自己其实是炮灰之后却为时已晚，只能被真传弟子逼着进入了洞府，然而他却发现，洞府里所有的禁制居然都对他无效。

0024.en: He proceeded without any obstacles and obtained the great opportunity.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 他一路畅通无阻地拿到了机缘。

0024.en: It was a golden casket containing the "Innate Dao Scripture" and the Innate-Qi Myriad-Spirit Banner. Beside it was a note left by the cave's master.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 那是一块金匣，匣中放着《先天道书》和先天一炁万灵幡，旁边还有一张洞府之主生前留下的书帖。

0024.en: In the note, the cave master called himself the "Innate Wanderer."
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 书帖中，洞府之主号称“先天散人”。

0024.en: The scripture and treasure in the casket were meant for a fated person. He had calculated that this person would be a True Inheritor of the Saint Sect, with the character "Xin" in their name.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 匣中的道书法宝是他留给一位有缘人的，他算出那位有缘人乃是圣宗真传，名字里有一个“信”字。

0024.en: However, he was not resigned to this.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 然而他不服。

0024.en: In the note, the Innate Wanderer cursed the Chu Sheng Sect for its shamelessness. He wrote that they had forcibly tied his legacy to their True Inheritor, claiming it was destiny when it was not.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 先天散人在书贴里痛骂了初圣宗的无耻，无缘硬说有缘，强行将自己的传承因果绑定给了圣宗真传。

0024.en: So, he deliberately tangled the threads of fate and gave the inheritance to Liu Xin instead.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 于是他才故意混淆因果，将传承送给了刘信。

0024.en: The note also warned that Liu Xin would face a life-or-death crisis after getting the treasure, so the master had left him a way to overcome it in the cave.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 除此之外，书帖还言明了刘信拿到法宝后将面临生死大劫，所以还在洞府内给他留下了破局的手段。

0024.en: In the original destiny, the false "Xin" was not the true "Xin," so Liu Xin was fated to be cannon fodder, a mere delivery boy for the treasure. But thanks to the Innate Wanderer's careful plan, Liu Xin got the opportunity, turned the tables, and killed the True Inheritor.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 在原本的因果之中，假“信”不是真“信”，所以刘信才会充当别人的炮灰，给人做个送宝童子。然而在先天散人的刻意安排下，结果反而是刘信得了机缘，甚至鸠占鹊巢，反杀了那位真传。

0024.en: It was a heart-pounding night.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 那是一个惊心动魄的夜晚。

0024.en: By sunrise, only Liu Xin walked out of the Innate Wanderer's cave, completely transformed. The True Inheritor of the Saint Sect had vanished.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 等到日出时分，只有刘信一人走出了先天散人的洞府，从此脱胎换骨，那位圣宗真传则是就此失踪。

0024.en: However, Liu Xin had not completely killed him.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不过刘信并没有彻底杀了对方。

0024.en: With the help left behind by the Innate Wanderer, he had refined the living True Inheritor, turning him into the strongest Banner Spirit in his possession.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而是在先天散人遗留后手的帮助下，将那位圣宗真传活生生炼化，让他成为了自己手中最强的幡灵。

0024.en: As the banner waved, a figure in a black robe emerged. It did not look at Lv Yang at first, but instead gazed around with a nostalgic expression.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 只见幡旗招展，一尊黑袍猎猎的身影走出，却没有第一时间看向吕阳，而是一脸怀念地环顾了四周。

0024.en: "The strong eat the weak, and disciples kill each other... The Saint Sect is still the same as I remember."
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: “弱肉强食，弟子相残圣宗果然还是那个熟悉的圣宗。”

0024.en: "Senior Brother, I trust you've been well?" Liu Xin said with a slight bow.
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “师兄，别来无恙？”刘信拱了拱手。

0024.en: "You useless fool. Have you run into a strong enemy you can't handle again?" the black-robed figure sneered with contempt. "The Innate Dao Scripture was truly wasted on you."
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: “无能之辈，又遇到难以对付的强敌了？”黑袍身影不屑冷笑：“先天道书给了你，当真是浪费了。”

0024.en: "I can't compare to you, Senior Brother."
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “比不得师兄。”

0024.en: Liu Xin did not get angry and remained respectful. "This person is a sword cultivator and has also mastered the Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light. I am indeed no match for him."
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: 刘信也不生气，依旧恭敬有礼：“此人乃是剑修，又修炼了天魔化血神光，师弟确实不是他的对手。”

0024.en: "Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light?" The black-robed figure was surprised to hear this, and his expression turned more serious. Then he shook his head. "To master such a divine ability, he must be quite a character. It's a pity his efforts were in the wrong direction, a complete waste of time. According to our agreement, this is the third time I will act."
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: “天魔化血神光？”黑袍身影闻言一愣，神色倒是郑重了几分，随后又摇了摇头：“能练成那门神通，倒也是个人物，可惜努力错了方向，空做无用功.按照约定，这已经是第三次出手了。”

0024.en: "You have a clear view of things, Senior Brother."
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “师兄明鉴。”

0024.en: Liu Xin nodded. "After this, I will release you to be reincarnated. With your merits and foundation, I believe you will be able to walk the path of the Dao again in your next life."
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: 刘信点了点头：“此事过后我便放师兄去轮回，以师兄的功德和底蕴，相信转世之后必能再入道途。”

0024.en: "Good."
0024.speaker: 陈信安

0024.en: The black-robed figure finally turned to look at Lv Yang.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 黑袍身影这才转过身子，看向吕阳。

0024.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang and Xiao Shiye had little reaction, but Fairy Qingchen's eyes widened as she stared intently at the black-robed figure.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 见到这一幕，吕阳和萧石叶倒是没什么反应，反而是清尘仙子瞪大了双眼，直勾勾地看着黑袍身影。

0024.en: She was no longer a new disciple.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 她可不是新入门的弟子了。

0024.en: At first, she only found the figure vaguely familiar. But when he unleashed his aura, she was suddenly shocked and recognized him.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一开始只是觉得黑袍身影有些眼熟，然而当其真正爆发出气机之后，她才猛然惊醒，将其认了出来。

0024.en: "It's Chen Xinan... Senior Brother Chen!?"
0024.speaker: 清尘仙子
0024.cn: “是陈信安，陈师兄！？”

0024.en: The son of the Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak, one of the Four Inner Peaks! The missing True Inheritor!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 内门四峰之一，补天峰峰主的儿子！失踪的真传！

0024.en: When Chen Xinan went missing back then, the Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak was furious. He personally tried to divine the karmic threads but found nothing, causing a great disturbance.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 当年陈信安失踪后，补天峰主勃然大怒，亲自动手推演因果却一无所获，可是掀起了好大一番波澜。

0024.en: To think he was in Senior Brother Liu's hands?
0024.speaker: 清尘仙子
0024.cn: 没有想到他居然在刘师兄手里？

0024.en: For a moment, Fairy Qingchen's expression changed as if she had realized something. She then subconsciously took a few steps back to create distance from Liu Xin.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一时间，清尘仙子神色微变，似乎想到了什么，随后下意识地后退了几步，就要和刘信拉开了距离

0024.en: Puchi!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 噗嗤！

0024.en: A hand pierced through her. Fairy Qingchen's pretty face was blank, her eyes staring vacantly at the hand buried in her stomach. Then her head tilted to one side, and she breathed her last.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 刀入刀出，清尘仙子俏脸茫然，目光呆滞地看着没入自己小腹的手掌，随后头一歪，便失去了声息。

0024.en: She was dead again.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 她又死了。

0024.en: "A pity. Since you saw, I cannot let you live."
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “可惜，既然你看到了，就留不得你。”

0024.en: With Fairy Qingchen's death, the surrounding formation immediately shook. However, as Liu Xin activated the Myriad-Spirit Banner, her body was instantly absorbed into it.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 清尘仙子身死，四周阵法立刻晃动，然而随着刘信催动万灵幡，清尘仙子的尸体登时落入了幡旗中。

0024.en: In a few moments, a perfectly intact Fairy Qingchen walked out of the banner, having become a Banner Spirit.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不消片刻，完好无损的清尘仙子从幡中走出，竟是成为了幡灵。

0024.en: Although becoming a Banner Spirit came with many more limitations than when she was alive, she could still maintain the formation. She quickly stabilized the shaking array.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 虽然成为幡灵之后，比生前多出了许多限制，但依旧可以主持阵法，很快就将晃动的阵法稳定下来。

0024.en: At the same time, the black-robed True Inheritor, Chen Xinan, arrived in front of Lv Yang.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 与此同时，黑袍真传陈信安也来到了吕阳面前。

0024.en: "Hm?"
0024.speaker: 吕阳

0024.en: Looking at Chen Xinan, Lv Yang's gaze sharpened. The man's cultivation level was not high, only at the seventh layer of Qi Refining, the same as him. But the feeling he gave off was different.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 看着陈信安，吕阳顿时目光微凝，对方的修为不高，和他一样只有炼气七层，但给人的感觉却不同。

0024.en: Chen Xinan glanced at Lv Yang and shook his head. "The Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra is a dual cultivation technique that relies on coupling with three thousand women. But your true qi is impure and chaotic; it's obvious it wasn't gained through dual cultivation. The originally fifth-grade Yin-Yang Dragon-Tiger Qi is at most sixth-grade in your hands."
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: 陈信安也瞥了一眼吕阳，摇头道：“阴阳大乐赋乃是双修功法，讲究的是御女三千，可你的真气却是驳杂不堪，一看就不是双修得来的，本来五品的阴阳龙虎炁落在你身上，最多也就六品了。”

0024.en: This assessment sent alarm bells ringing in Lv Yang's mind.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一番点评，听得吕阳心中警铃大作。

0024.en: "May I ask who you are?"
0024.speaker: 吕阳
0024.cn: “敢问阁下是？”

0024.en: "My name is Chen Xinan. My hand is forced in this matter. But if you can escape and bring news of me back to Sky Mending Peak, my father will surely reward you greatly."
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: “我叫陈信安，此番身不由己，不过你若能逃走，将我的消息带回补天峰，届时我父亲必重赏于你。”

0024.en: Before his words had faded, Chen Xinan attacked!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 话音未落，陈信安便出手了！

0024.en: He pushed his hand forward, and his aura instantly merged with the heavens and the earth. A powerful surge of true qi roared out, stirring the surrounding world's spiritual energy to respond!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 只见他抬手一按，气机顷刻间和天地交融，磅礴真气呼啸而出，竟引动了周围的天地灵气与之呼应！

0024.en: In that instant, Lv Yang's pupils shrank.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这一刻，吕阳瞳孔骤缩。

0024.en: It was not because of the power Chen Xinan displayed, but because as Chen Xinan made his move, he could clearly feel the flaws and incompleteness of his own true qi.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不是因为陈信安展现出的实力，而是因为随着陈信安动手，他清楚感觉到了自身真气的残缺和破绽。

0024.en: In a flash, Lv Yang understood.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一瞬间，吕阳明白了。

0024.en: "My Dragon-Tiger Union Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra is not the ultimate version. Sky Mending Peak has a superior technique! This person must be a True Inheritor from Sky Mending Peak!"
0024.speaker: 吕阳
0024.cn: “我的龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋并不是极限，补天峰还有更上乘的功法！此人应该是补天峰的真传弟子！”

0024.en: Lv Yang's guess was correct.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 吕阳的猜测很正确。

0024.en: As the son of the Sky Mending Peak Master, Chen Xinan cultivated a technique called the "Sky Mending True Scripture," which was an upgraded version of the Dragon-Tiger Union Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 作为补天峰主的儿子，陈信安修炼的功法名为《补天真经》，乃是龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋的升级版本。

0024.en: Ordinary dual cultivation is done with people, focusing on the union of yin and yang.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 寻常双修乃是与人双修，讲究阴阳相合。

0024.en: However, the dual cultivation of the "Sky Mending True Scripture" was with the heavens and the earth, a union with the cosmos itself. The Sky Mending True Qi refined this way was ranked third-grade.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 然而《补天真经》的双修，却是与天地双修，讲究和乾坤交媾，借此炼就的补天真气更是位列三品。

0024.en: Therefore, when Chen Xinan struck with his palm, even without using any special abilities, the sheer power of his third-grade true qi was enough to make it difficult for Lv Yang to defend.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 因此当陈信安一掌拍落，哪怕没有动用什么神通，凭借三品真气的浑厚底蕴也足以让吕阳难以招架。

0024.en: Seeing this, Liu Xin revealed a confident smile.
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: 刘信见状顿时露出了自信的微笑。

0024.en: After all, no one knew Chen Xinan's strength better than him. In his eyes, even if Lv Yang were ten times stronger, he would be no match for Chen Xinan.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 毕竟没有人比他更清楚陈信安的实力，在他看来，吕阳哪怕再厉害十倍，也不可能是陈信安的对手。

0024.en: "He will win!"
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “会赢的！”

0024.en: Liu Xin made his judgment with certainty, failing to notice that Xiao Shiye, in the distance, was now watching him with a dark expression, seemingly deep in thought.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 刘信果断下了判断，却没有注意到远处的萧石叶此刻正神色阴沉地打量着自己，似乎在思索着什么。

0024.en: With Xiao Shiye's intelligence, he could naturally see that the situation was not in his favor.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 以萧石叶的聪慧，自然能看出局势对自己不利。

0024.en: "I didn't want to use this... you forced me."
0024.speaker: 萧石叶
0024.cn: “本来我不想动用，是你们逼我的.”

0024.en: Xiao Shiye knew very well that he was the weakest. He relied entirely on his collection of magic treasures to hold his ground, but now it seemed that even those were not enough.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 萧石叶很清楚，自己的实力是最弱的，全靠这一身的法宝撑场面，可现在看来，光靠法宝也不行了。

0024.en: With this thought, Xiao Shiye took a deep breath and opened his storage pouch. Instantly, a massive aura of spiritual energy and treasured light burst forth from the opening, drawing Liu Xin's attention. Even Chen Xinan and Lv Yang, who were in the middle of a fierce battle, paused and looked over.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一念至此，萧石叶当即深吸一口气，随后打开了储物袋，霎时间磅礴的灵气宝光便从袋口喷薄而出，将刘信的注意力吸引了过来，就连原本还在激战中的陈信安和吕阳都停下动作，投来了视线。

0024.en: Then, a small pagoda flew out of Xiao Shiye's storage pouch.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 紧接着，就见一座小塔从萧石叶的储物袋飞出。

0024.en: The small pagoda seemed to be cast from gold and had nine levels. At its top, a spiritual light manifested in a human-like shape, with lively and intelligent features.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 小塔似是用黄金浇筑而成，分有九层，塔顶还有一道灵光显化，模样酷似人形，眉宇间充满了灵动。

0024.en: "That's... a Spirit Treasure!?"
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: “这是.灵宝！？”

0024.en: The moment they saw this, before the less-experienced Lv Yang could speak, both Liu Xin and Chen Xinan cried out in shock, their faces filled with horror.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 看到这一幕的瞬间，没啥见识的吕阳还未开口，刘信和陈信安就双双惊呼，脸上流露出了惊骇之色。

0024.en: When a cultivator refines an item and it produces a treasured light, it is a Magic Treasure. When a treasure gives birth to spiritual intelligence, only then is it a Spirit Treasure!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 修士炼器，器生宝光，便是法宝，宝生灵慧，方为灵宝！

0024.en: Magic Treasures are divided into lower, middle, and upper grades and have wondrous uses. However, no matter how powerful a Magic Treasure is, it needs a master to wield it to unleash its power.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 法宝有下，中，上，三品之分，妙用无穷，然而再厉害的法宝，都需要有主人驱使才能发挥出威力。

0024.en: But a Spirit Treasure is different.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 可是灵宝却不同。

0024.en: A Spirit Treasure has its own consciousness and can unleash its power even without a master. More importantly, a Spirit Treasure can cultivate on its own and continuously grow stronger!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 灵宝拥有自己的意识，哪怕没有御主也可以发挥威力，更重要的是灵宝还能自己修炼，不断地变强！

0024.en: In the next second, Xiao Shiye formed a hand seal, and the Spirit Treasure pagoda instantly began to expand.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 下一秒，却见萧石叶一掐法决，灵宝小塔登时开始膨胀

0024.en: "Bastard!"
0024.speaker: 陈信安
0024.cn: “混蛋！”

0024.en: Chen Xinan was the first to curse, his earlier composure completely gone. He could see that Xiao Shiye intended to make the Spirit Treasure self-destruct!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 陈信安第一个破口大骂，全然没有了刚刚的从容，因为他看出来了，萧石叶居然想要让那灵宝自爆！

0024.en: On the other side, Liu Xin nearly coughed up blood.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 另一边，刘信更是差点吐血。

0024.en: This kind of treasure, a masterpiece of creation, was something that typically only Foundation Establishment cultivators could possess. You, Xiao Shiye, not only have one but you're using it to self-destruct?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这种夺天地之造化的宝物，一般也只有筑基真人才能拥有，你萧石叶有也就算了，居然拿出来自爆？

0024.en: What a complete waste of a heavenly treasure!
0024.speaker: 刘信
0024.cn: 简直就是暴殄天物！

0024.en: What was even more absurd was that the Spirit Treasure pagoda showed no signs of resistance. Instead, it actively cooperated, moving so quickly that he had no time to stop it.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 更离谱的是那灵宝小塔居然完全没有反抗的意思，反而主动配合，速度之快让自己根本来不及阻止

0024.en: "BOOM!"
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: “轰隆！”

0024.en: In the next moment, an explosive flash of fire consumed everything.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 下一秒，炸裂的火光吞没了一切。

0025.en: Chapter 25: A Shock from Great Luck
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 第25章 鸿运惊魂

0025.en: The exploding treasure light was like a monstrous wave. It instantly tore apart the formation set up by Fairy Qingchen, then drowned Lv Yang, Liu Xin, and Chen Xin'an.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 炸裂的宝光如同滔天巨浪，瞬间撕裂了清尘仙子布下的阵法，紧接着淹没了吕阳，刘信以及陈信安。

0025.en: Liu Xin was the first to scream. To deal with Lv Yang, he had summoned the banner spirit and then Chen Xin'an, which used up most of his true qi. Now he couldn't resist the explosion's impact. His body was instantly set on fire and turned to ash. The Ten Thousand Spirits Banner in his hand fell powerlessly from the air.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 刘信第一个惨叫，为了对付吕阳他先后召唤幡灵，最后请出陈信安更是消耗了他大半的真气，此刻根本无力抵挡爆炸的冲击，身躯瞬间被点燃，随后化为灰烬，手中的万灵幡无力坠落在空中。

0025.en: "As expected of a disciple from our sacred sect."
0025.speaker: 陈信安
0025.cn: “不愧是我圣宗弟子.”

0025.en: Once Liu Xin died, Chen Xin'an could no longer exist, even though he had some power left. He could only sigh and then scatter with the wind.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 刘信一死，尽管陈信安还有余力支撑，但也难以继续维系自身存在，只能长叹一声，接着随风飘散。

0025.en: As for Lv Yang, he was directly swallowed by the treasure light and vanished.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 至于吕阳，更是直接被宝光吞没，化为无形。

0025.en: After a while, the raging treasure light slowly calmed down, revealing Xiao Shiye's figure. His face was filled with intense joy.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 就这样过了好一会儿，沸腾的宝光才渐渐平息下去，显露出了萧石叶的身影，脸上带着浓烈的狂喜。

0025.en: "I won!"
0025.speaker: 萧石叶
0025.cn: “是我赢了！”

0025.en: Xiao Shiye laughed excitedly. Detonating a spiritual treasure was his ultimate move, but it had many limitations and was easy for others to dodge.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 萧石叶兴奋大笑，毕竟自爆灵宝虽然是他的杀手锏，但用起来其实有很多限制，非常容易被人躲开。

0025.en: To kill an enemy with this move, you first needed to limit the area to ensure it would hit.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 想要用这一招杀敌，首先就需要限制场地，确保命中。

0025.en: Second, the explosion's power was not concentrated. It covered a large area but was too scattered. So, the enemy had to be weakened to a certain point to ensure a one-hit kill.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 其次，爆炸威力无法集中，范围大却过于分散，所以必须将敌人消耗到一定程度才能确保一击制敌。

0025.en: Finally, the spiritual treasure had its own consciousness and might not cooperate with the self-detonation.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 最后，灵宝有自我意识，可能会不配合自爆。

0025.en: "Fortunately, luck is still on my side!"
0025.speaker: 萧石叶
0025.cn: “还好，运气依旧站在我这边！”

0025.en: Xiao Shiye felt that since joining the Chu Sheng Sect, his luck had completely changed. He got everything he wanted, and whatever he did seemed to have divine help.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 萧石叶觉得自从拜入初圣宗，自己简直就像是转运了一样，要什么有什么，不管做什么都有如神助。

0025.en: When trading the Death-Substituting Yin Puppets, he was lucky enough to sell at the highest point, making hundreds of thousands of contribution points.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 炒替死阴傀，他运气好到在最高点卖出，血赚数十万贡献点。

0025.en: He took a casual trip to the mortal world and easily found a magic treasure left behind by someone from the past.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 随便去一趟凡间，就轻轻松松捡到了前人遗留下来的法宝。

0025.en: When he was being hunted, he happened to find Lv Yang to use as a shield.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 被人追杀，刚好遇到了吕阳这么一个挡箭牌。

0025.en: No matter what crisis he faced, he always came out of it safely. Through a series of coincidences, he would end up unharmed and with the greatest benefits.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 无论遇到什么样的危机，结果都是他有惊无险，经过一系列巧合，最后毫发无伤地拿到最多的好处。

0025.en: "What a fine Ten Thousand Spirits Banner. From now on, it's mine."
0025.speaker: 萧石叶
0025.cn: “好一杆万灵幡，从此以后就是我的了”

0025.en: Just as Xiao Shiye was about to step forward and take the treasure, a figure surrounded by blood-red light appeared beside him and also reached for the banner.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 萧石叶正想上前取宝，可几乎同时，一道血光缭绕的身影出现在了他的身旁，同样伸手抓住了旗幡。

0025.en: Seeing this, Xiao Shiye froze for a moment, and then his whole body began to tremble.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 见到这一幕，萧石叶瞬间愣住，随后全身都开始颤抖了起来。

0025.en: "What, Brother Xiao wants this magic treasure too?"
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “怎么，萧兄也想要这个法宝？”

0025.en: The blood shadow flickered, then slowly revealed Lv Yang's face. He turned and grinned at Xiao Shiye, which made him tremble in fear.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 血影一阵波动，随后缓缓显化出了吕阳的面孔，转过身对着萧石叶咧嘴一笑，吓得他瞬间虎躯剧震。

0025.en: "Are you a man or a ghost?"
0025.speaker: 萧石叶
0025.cn: 你是人是鬼？

0025.en: Xiao Shiye's face turned pale. He looked at the Blood-Transforming Divine Light surrounding Lv Yang, and the images of those he had sucked dry flashed through his mind.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 萧石叶脸色煞白，看着吕阳周身缭绕的化血神光，先前被他吸成人干的一众身影迅速在心底间闪过。

0025.en: The next moment, he quickly let go of the Ten Thousand Spirits Banner and bowed respectfully.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 下一秒，他赶忙松开握住万灵幡的手，恭敬行礼。

0025.en: "Congratulations, Senior Brother. This junior brother was keeping the Ten Thousand Spirits Banner for you. Now it is returned to its rightful owner!"
0025.speaker: 萧石叶
0025.cn: “恭喜师兄，这是师弟替您保管的万灵幡，现在物归原主！”

0025.en: "How thoughtful of you."
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “有心了。”

0025.en: Lv Yang smilingly took the "Innate One Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner." He examined it for a moment, then injected his spiritual power into it and poured out two storage bags.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 吕阳笑吟吟地接过“先天一炁万灵幡”，端详了片刻，随后注入法力，又从其中倒出了两个储物袋。

0025.en: These were the storage bags of Liu Xin and Fairy Qingchen.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这是刘信和清尘仙子的储物袋。

0025.en: He opened the storage bags. A copy of the "Innate Dao Scripture" was inside, along with a book called "Secret Manual of Array Treasures," which clearly belonged to Fairy Qingchen.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 打开储物袋，一本《先天道书》赫然在目，除此之外还有一本《阵宝秘解》，显然是清尘仙子所有。

0025.en: "These are all good things."
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “都是好东西啊.”

0025.en: Lv Yang sighed with emotion. He memorized the contents of the two Dao books, then looked at Xiao Shiye, who was backing away step by step, trying to create distance between them.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 吕阳一阵感慨，将两本道书的内容牢牢记下，随后看向正一步步后退，想要和他拉开距离的萧石叶。

0025.en: To be honest, Xiao Shiye's killing move was truly unexpected.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 平心而论，萧石叶的杀招确实出人意料。

0025.en: A spiritual treasure self-destructing could kill even someone at the peak of Qi Refining. In theory, it should have been a fatal blow, but Lv Yang was an exception.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 灵宝自爆，哪怕是炼气大圆满来了都有可能被炸死，理论上这是绝杀，偏偏吕阳却是例外中的例外。

0025.en: Because he cultivated the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 因为他修炼了天魔化血神光。

0025.en: He was now a blood shadow that only looked human. He had form but no substance. His true spirit was completely tied to the sword core. As long as the sword core was not destroyed, he would not die.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 化为血影的他现在只是空具人形而已，有形无质，真灵完全寄托在剑丸之上，剑丸不毁他就不会死。

0025.en: Facing Xiao Shiye's self-destructing spiritual treasure, the sword core made of Gold Essence and Jade Marrow was much tougher than a mere physical body. Although it was not completely unharmed, it was not destroyed. So after the explosion passed, Lv Yang reformed and gained the most from the situation.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而面对萧石叶的灵宝自爆，金精玉髓打造出来的剑丸可比区区肉身要坚固的多，虽然不至于毫发无伤，但终究没有灰飞烟灭，所以等到爆炸过去后，吕阳也就重新化形而出，占了最大的便宜。

0025.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang looked at Xiao Shiye with great fondness.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 想到这里，吕阳看萧石叶那叫一个顺眼。

0025.en: He had not been wrong about him. This Xiao Shiye was a real talent! Without him, how could he have gained so much?
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 自己先前果然没有看错人，这位萧石叶还真是个人材！如果没有他，自己怎么可能有如此丰厚收获？

0025.en: "Thank you very much for this, Junior Brother Xiao."
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “此番真是多谢萧师弟了。”

0025.en: "To show my gratitude, I will send you on your way."
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “为表谢意，师兄这就送你上路。”

0025.en: Lv Yang chuckled, then waved his hand. A ray of blood-red light fell upon Xiao Shiye. Before he could even speak, he was sucked dry.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 吕阳轻笑一声，随后大手一挥，一道血光就落在了萧石叶身上，还不等他开口，就将其吸成了人干。

0025.en: Keeping this person alive was too great a risk.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 此人，留着祸患还是太大了。

0025.en: With such great luck, what if he rose to power later and came back for revenge? It was better to end it now and remove the problem completely.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 如此高的运气，万一后面有起势了，回来报复自己怎么办？所以还是一了百了，斩草除根比较方便。

0025.en: "But he died just like that?" Lv Yang looked at Xiao Shiye's body and touched his chin, a little surprised. "With his heaven-defying luck, shouldn't a powerful person have appeared to stop me? I was even prepared for it, but it was so easy."
0025.speaker: 吕阳
0025.cn: “不过居然就这样死了？”吕阳看着萧石叶的尸体，有些意外地摸着下巴：“以他天命之子般的运气，不应该在这个时候出现一个贵人来阻止我么？亏我还做好了应对准备，没想到这么容易.”

0025.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang suddenly had a thought and used his Qi-Observing Technique on Xiao Shiye again.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 想到这里，吕阳突然心中微动，再度施展望气术看向萧石叶。

0025.en: A strange scene appeared.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 诡异的一幕出现了。

0025.en: Before, when he looked at Xiao Shiye, he saw a sky-high treasure light, a sign of immense luck. But now, all the treasure light had vanished into thin air.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 之前他看萧石叶，那叫一个宝光冲天，简直是鸿运当头，可如今再看，却见所有宝光都凭空消散了。

0025.en: Looking at this, a thought appeared in Lv Yang's mind for no reason:
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 看着这一幕，吕阳心中没来由地生出一个念头：

0025.en: This person's luck has run out.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 此人，气运尽了。

0025.en: "Sigh."
0025.speaker: 旁白

0025.en: The next second, a sigh suddenly sounded.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 下一秒，一声叹息突然响起。

0025.en: Lv Yang looked up at the sky, his expression frozen in a moment of shock. All his thoughts were frozen in that instant.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 吕阳抬起头，看向天空，表情凝固在了即将浮现惊愕的刹那，所有思绪念头都被冻结在了这一刹那。

0025.en: A figure had appeared in front of Xiao Shiye's body at some point.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不知何时，萧石叶的尸体前出现了一道人影。

0025.en: The man wore a crane-feather cloak and had a smile on his face. He gently waved a feather fan and looked handsome and charming. At first glance, he looked like a handsome scholar on an outing.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 那人披着鹤氅，嘴角含笑，羽扇轻摇，模样风流倜傥，乍看之下仿佛只是一位外出踏青的俊朗书生。

0025.en: But with his appearance, the whole world seemed to lose its color. Only the place where he stood became the center of everything, gathering all the blessings, wealth, and luck of the world. He was the favorite of the heavens, making people feel jealous and hateful.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 然而随着他的出现，整片天地似乎都失去了色彩，唯有他所在的地方成为了万事万物的中心，集中了天地间所有的福气，财气，乃至运气，是老天爷的宠儿，让人情不自禁地生出嫉妒和愤恨。

0025.en: "Is this all you got?"
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “只有这么点收获吗？”

0025.en: The newcomer reached out his hand. The "Innate Dao Scripture" and the Innate One Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner that Lv Yang had just put away flew out of his storage bag and into his hand.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 来人伸手一招，刚刚被吕阳收起的《先天道书》还有先天一炁万灵幡就飞出储物袋，落到了他手里。

0025.en: Just then, a voice suddenly came from nowhere: "Hong Yun, you've come out of seclusion?"
0025.speaker: 陌生男1
0025.cn: 就在这时，一道声音突兀传来：“鸿运，你出关了？”

0025.en: The Daoist called "Hong Yun" looked up, as if meeting someone's gaze, and chuckled, "I had no choice. The person I chose suddenly died."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: 名为“鸿运”的道人闻言抬起头，似乎在和某人对视，轻笑道：“没办法，谁叫我选的人突然死了。”

0025.en: The voice sounded a little surprised too: "Died? Your person can die? What happened?"
0025.speaker: 陌生男1
0025.cn: 声音闻言也有些意外：“死了？你的人还能死？怎么回事？”

0025.en: "It's funny you ask. It was because of bad luck."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “说来可笑，因为时运不济。”

0025.en: "I gave him so much luck so he could fish for that Rainbow Fish in the Merit Pool. But there were too many variables, and his luck was used up ahead of time."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “我给他这么多气运，本意是让他去功德池钓那只彩鱼，可变数太多，导致他的气运被提前耗尽了。”

0025.en: "When his luck ran out, death was of course imminent."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “气运耗尽，自然死到临头。”

0025.en: After speaking, the Daoist Hong Yun weighed the "Innate Dao Scripture" in his hand, shook his head, and put it away. Then he looked at Lv Yang.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 说完，鸿运道人掂了掂手里的《先天道书》，摇了摇头，随手收了起来，接着又看向了旁边的吕阳。

0025.en: "This person, on the other hand, is a bit interesting."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “倒是此人，有点意思.”

0025.en: The Daoist Hong Yun pinched his fingers to calculate, and the smile on his face grew wider. "This person is a huge variable. It seems the recent trouble with the Death-Substituting Yin Puppets is related to him."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: 鸿运道人掐指一算，嘴角笑意越来越大：“此人好大的变数，最近替死阴傀的风波似乎就和他有关。”

0025.en: "Hmm, his background is clean. But why would a mortal have the cultivation of a fourth-level Qi Refining disciple right after joining? He's hiding it on purpose. It seems he's a rogue cultivator who brought his skills with him, which is fine... wait, that's not right. He learned the Divine Empyrean Sword-Riding True Art before joining? Is he a spy from the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion?"
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “嗯，身世清白无误，可凡人为何会在入门之初就有炼气四层的修为？刻意隐藏，看来是散修带师学艺，倒也无妨等等，不对，入门前就学会了神霄御剑真决？难道他还是玉枢剑阁的奸细？”

0025.en: The more the Daoist Hong Yun calculated, the more interested he became.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 鸿运道人越是推算，眼中的兴趣就越大。

0025.en: Except for the Hundred Lives Book, all of Lv Yang's secrets were revealed by the Daoist Hong Yun as he deduced the cause and effect, peeling back the layers. Finally, he frowned:
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 除了百世书，吕阳所有的秘密都被鸿运道人推算因果，抽丝剥茧般说出，直到最后，他才眉头一皱：

0025.en: "...He cultivated the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light?"
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “.修炼了天魔化血神光？”

0025.en: The next second, the interest in the Daoist Hong Yun's eyes quickly faded, replaced by a look of disgust.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 下一秒，鸿运道人眼中的兴趣飞速消散，露出了一副“晦气”的表情。

0025.en: By turning into a blood shadow, his path to immortality was cut off. Such a cultivator was not worth his energy, and certainly not fit to be the next "Child of Destiny."
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 身化血影，仙途已绝。这样的修士自然不值得他再耗费精力，更当不起下一个“天命之子”的身份。

0025.en: "What a pity about the Rainbow Fish in the Merit Pool. I didn't get it this time. I'll have to wait for the next."
0025.speaker: 鸿运
0025.cn: “可惜了功德池的那条彩鱼，这次没有钓到，看来只能等下次了。”

0025.en: The Daoist Hong Yun looked away. He took a step and disappeared, like a fisherman who had run out of bait and had to leave empty-handed.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 鸿运道人收回视线，旋即一步踏出，仿佛一个鱼饵用尽，只好空手离开的钓鱼客，很快不见了踪影。

0025.en: Only Lv Yang was left standing there.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 只留下吕阳一人站在原地。

0025.en: Sweat poured down like rain.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 汗如雨下。

0026.en: Chapter 26: As Expected of the Saint Sect
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第26章 不愧是圣宗

0026.en: The landscape was like a painting, the setting sun like blood.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 江山如画，残阳如血，

0026.en: Lv Yang stood on the sea of clouds. After waiting for a long time without a palm from the sky smashing him to dust, he finally breathed a sigh of relief.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 吕阳站在云海上，过了好一会儿都没有等到一发从天而降的掌法把自己拍成齑粉，这才松了一口气。

0026.en: "Was that... a Foundation Establishment master?"
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “刚刚那是.筑基真人？”

0026.en: Lv Yang didn't even dare to mutter to himself and could only ponder it in his heart. His expression turned grim; after all, the gap between them was simply too vast.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 吕阳甚至不敢自言自语，只能在心中思忖，脸色更是难看到了极致，毕竟两者间的差距实在太大了。

0026.en: Not only his body, but even his mind was frozen. He only reacted after Daoist Hongyun left. The feeling was like a mouse in a cat's paw. It was no longer a matter of a gap in strength, but a difference in their level of existence. All the pride in Lv Yang's heart was instantly shattered.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 不仅是身体，连思维都被冻结，直到鸿运道人离开才反应过来，那种感觉仿佛被猫抓在手里的耗子一样，已经不是所谓力量上的差距了，而是层次上的区别，瞬间打灭了吕阳心中所有的傲气。

0026.en: "I'm still too weak, I have no power."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “我还是太弱了，没有力量”

0026.en: After defeating Liu Xin and his group against the odds, Lv Yang had swept away the gloom of his past life and felt on top of the world. But now, he had calmed down again.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 原本以寡敌众，击败刘信等人之后，吕阳一扫前世阴霾，只觉得意气风发，如今却再度放平了心态。

0026.en: The immortal path was long, and he still had a long way to go.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 仙路漫长，尚需砥砺前行。

0026.en: Lv Yang sighed, then he recalled what happened with Xiao Shiye, and fear filled his eyes again. "Luck... can it actually be given by someone else?"
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: 吕阳一阵感慨，随后又回想起了萧石叶的事情，眼中再度浮现惊惧：“气运，居然是别人赋予的吗？”

0026.en: Now, he remembered.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 事到如今他也想起来了。

0026.en: Before going to the Merit Pool, Xiao Shiye had said, "It just so happens I've been quite lucky recently, so I want to take the opportunity to try my luck."
0026.speaker: 萧石叶
0026.cn: 萧石叶在前往功德池之前曾经说过一句话：“正好我最近突然有些走运，所以想要趁机去试试手气。”

0026.en: 'Lucky recently.'
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 最近有些走运。

0026.en: At the time, Lv Yang had thought it was just the child of destiny being humble. But now it seemed that it might have been the truth—he really had only become lucky recently.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 当时吕阳只以为是天命之子的谦虚，可是现在看来，或许那才是实话，他真的是最近才走运起来的。

0026.en: Because of that Daoist Hongyun!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 因为那个鸿运道人！

0026.en: "The 'colored fish' in the Merit Pool must be the Rainbow Merit Fish. Does Daoist Hongyun want to use Xiao Shiye to fish it out of the Merit Pool?"
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “功德池里的彩鱼说的应该是彩色功德鱼吧，鸿运道人想要借萧石叶之手将它从功德池里钓出来？”

0026.en: "If that's true, then he succeeded in the last life. However, after Xiao Shiye fished out the Rainbow Merit Fish in the last life, he announced he was entering seclusion and was never heard from again." Lv Yang's blood ran cold as he thought about it. Fishing, fishing... once the fish is caught, is the bait no longer needed?
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “如果真是这样，那上一世他就成功了。然而话说回来，上一世萧石叶在钓出彩色功德鱼后就对外宣布闭关，从此渺无音训.”吕阳细思极恐，钓鱼，钓鱼，鱼钓到了，饵自然也就没用了？

0026.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang suddenly raised his head.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想到这里，吕阳突然抬起头。

0026.en: The Chu Sheng Sect, a sea of clouds touching the sky.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 初圣宗，接天云海。

0026.en: Perhaps to the elusive leaders of the Saint Sect, these so-called disciples were nothing more than a school of fish being raised in a pond.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 或许对那些神龙见首不见尾的圣宗高层来说，他们这些所谓弟子，都只是被养在鱼塘里的一群鱼儿？

0026.en: "As expected of the Saint Sect..."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “不愧是圣宗啊.”

0026.en: Lv Yang took a deep breath, beginning to understand why no one had killed him.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 吕阳深吸一口气，有些明白为何没人拍死自己了。

0026.en: So what if a fish jumped around a little more actively and had some secrets? Maybe they would even think you were talented!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 一只鱼儿，就算蹦跶得欢了一点，有一些不可告人的秘密又如何？人家说不定还觉得你是个人材呢！

0026.en: "In any case, at least the secret of The Hundred Lives Book was not exposed." Lv Yang felt lucky. Moreover, the karma related to The Hundred Lives Book seemed to have been hidden from Daoist Hongyun, so he didn't suspect why Lv Yang had reached the fourth level of Qi Refining before even joining the sect.
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “无论如何，起码【百世书】的秘密没有暴露。”吕阳在心中庆幸，不仅如此，和百世书相关的因果似乎也瞒过了鸿运真人，以至于对方完全没有怀疑他为何未入门就拥有了炼气四层的修为。

0026.en: "No time to waste. I should go back and eat first."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “事不宜迟，先回去吃饭吧。”

0026.en: Fortunately, although Daoist Hongyun had taken away the Innate Dao Scripture, Lv Yang had already memorized all of its contents.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 值得庆幸的是，虽然《先天道书》被鸿运道人带走了，但在那之前吕阳就将功法内容全都记了下来。

0026.en: This was a good habit Lv Yang had developed because of The Hundred Lives Book.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 这是吕阳因为【百世书】才养成的好习惯。

0026.en: Whenever he encountered a good technique or ability, he would immediately memorize it. That way, he could use it in his next life without having to spend Contribution Points to get it again.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 只要是遇到不错的功法神通，就立刻背下，这样才能活用于下一世，不需要再耗费贡献点去兑换了。

0026.en: Besides, Daoist Hongyun had taken the Innate Dao Scripture, but he hadn't taken Fairy Qingchen's Secret Manual of Array Treasures.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而且鸿运道人带走了《先天道书》，却没有带走清尘仙子的《阵宝秘解》。

0026.en: "Of course, the two can't be compared. What Fairy Qingchen made is obviously not worthy of that person's attention... but it's very useful to me."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “诚然，两者没有丝毫可比性，清尘仙子的东西显然还不入那位的眼但是对我而言却有大用啊。”

0026.en: In fact, Lv Yang didn't care much about the Innate Dao Scripture. He had already set his sights on Zhao Xuhe's third-grade true technique. The Innate Dao Scripture was not essential, but he was very interested in cultivation skills like the Secret Manual of Array Treasures, which involved setting up formations and refining treasures.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 其实对于《先天道书》吕阳并不是很看重，因为他已经将目标放在了赵旭河的那本三品真功上，《先天道书》可有可无，反而是《阵宝秘解》这种涉及到布阵和炼宝的修仙技艺让他很感兴趣。

0026.en: As for the Innate True Qi Myriad Souls Banner...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 至于先天一炁万灵幡

0026.en: "There will always be a chance. Let's worry about it in the next life."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “总有机会的，下辈子再说吧。”

0026.en: Returning to his cave residence, Lv Yang patiently focused on his cultivation. He studied the Secret Manual of Array Treasures while slowly repairing the damage to his sword core.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 返回洞府，吕阳先是耐住性子，安心修炼，一边揣摩《阵宝秘解》，一边慢慢修复剑丸受到的损伤。

0026.en: He didn't come out of seclusion until half a month later.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 直到半个月后，他才再度出关。

0026.en: This time, he went to find Zhao Xuhe.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 这一次，他找上了赵旭河。

0026.en: When he arrived at Zhao Xuhe's cave residence, he saw Zhao Xuhe arguing with a stern-looking young man wearing the uniform of the Hall of Enforcement.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而当他来到赵旭河的洞府时，却见赵旭河正在和一位身穿执法堂服饰，相貌威严的青年辩解着什么。

0026.en: "Senior Brother, you have to believe me! Don't you know my reputation? It's been great for over ten years! It's just 1000 Contribution Points, I'll definitely pay it back... What? Interest!? You... fine. Senior Brother, just give me a few more days, and I'll definitely pay back the principal and the interest."
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “师兄你相信我，我赵旭河的信誉你还不明白吗？十几年下来都很不错的，不就是1000贡献点么，我肯定会还的.什么？利息！？你.好，问题，师兄你再宽限我几天，一定连本带利还上.”

0026.en: After a moment of argument, the disciple from the Hall of Enforcement left with a cold smile.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 两人纠葛片刻后，那位执法堂弟子才冷笑着离去。

0026.en: Zhao Xuhe stood there with a gloomy face, his qi fluctuating around him. Seeing it was a good time, Lv Yang appeared and walked over.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而赵旭河则是面目阴沉地站在原地，周身气机一阵起伏波动，吕阳见时机不错，当即现身走了过去。

0026.en: "Senior Brother Zhao, long time no see."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “赵师兄，许久不见啊。”

0026.en: Zhao Xuhe looked up and immediately noticed Lv Yang's unconcealed qi. His pupils shrank. "Junior Brother Lv, you've broken through to the late stage of Qi Refining!?"
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: 赵旭河应声抬头，顿时察觉到了吕阳毫不掩饰的气机，瞳孔骤缩：“吕师弟你突破炼气后期了！？”

0026.en: "Just lucky, just lucky."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “侥幸，侥幸。”

0026.en: Lv Yang smiled slightly and said, "I am not very talented. I spent several months in seclusion and used a lot of Contribution Points to make this lucky breakthrough. I've made a fool of myself in front of you, Senior Brother."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: 吕阳微微一笑道：“在下资质愚钝，闭关数个月，耗费了不少贡献点才侥幸突破，让师兄看笑话了。”

0026.en: Hearing this, Zhao Xuhe's expression became even more rigid, almost distorted. After all, they had both speculated on the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets. He had lost everything, and even his lover had left him for someone else. But Lv Yang had made a fortune and even used the Contribution Points he earned to break through to the late stage of Qi Refining.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 赵旭河闻言神情愈发僵硬，甚至隐约有点扭曲，毕竟同样是炒替死阴傀，他炒的倾家荡产血本无归，连姘头都跑去跟了别人，吕阳却赚得盆满钵满，甚至还靠着赚到的贡献点突破了炼气后期。

0026.en: What made him even angrier was that he was probably no match for Lv Yang now!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 更气的是他现在可能都不是吕阳对手了！

0026.en: "I received Master Panlong's opportunity, but because I didn't have enough luck or merit, I only got half of the third-grade true technique."
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “我虽然得到了盘龙真人的机缘，但却因为气运不够，功德不足，结果那本三品真功只拿到了一半.”

0026.en: He had even specially asked his master about this.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 为此他还特地询问了一次师尊。

0026.en: His master had deduced the karma and concluded that it was because he had speculated on the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets, using up three lifetimes of accumulated merit in advance, which led to his failure.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 师尊推演因果，得出结论是因为自己炒替死阴傀，提前耗掉了三世积攒的功德，这才导致功亏一篑。

0026.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe nearly ground his teeth to dust.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河牙都快咬碎了。

0026.en: Half of a third-grade true technique, with only the Qi Refining section, the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art," and missing the Foundation Establishment part. It was completely useless to him!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 半本三品真功，只有一部炼气境的《九变化龙决》，却少了筑基境的功法，对他而言根本就没有用！

0026.en: Not to mention he was now in debt. He didn't even dare to disperse his cultivation to switch techniques, afraid that debt collectors would show up while he was weak. If they saw he was powerless after dispersing his cultivation, they might just turn into robbers, steal everything from him, and then kill him to silence him. Then he would truly have no one to complain to.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 更别说他如今还欠了外债，甚至连散功转修都不敢，生怕转修期间有催债的找上门，见他散功之后无力抵抗，直接摇身一变，客串强盗，将自己抢个精光再杀人灭口，那才真是有苦说不出了。

0026.en: "Junior Brother, is there something you need from me?"
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “师弟找我，是有什么事吗？”

0026.en: "It's a long story." Lv Yang sighed. "To be honest, Senior Brother, I came to ask for your guidance. I've run into some trouble recently."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “说来话长。”吕阳叹了口气：“不瞒师兄，在下是来找师兄指点迷津的，师弟最近可是遇到了麻烦。”

0026.en: "Trouble?" Zhao Xuhe's eyes lit up.
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “麻烦？”赵旭河双眼一亮。

0026.en: Lv Yang sighed and said, "I was so focused on cultivating that I only learned about the issue of True Qi quality after breaking through to the late stage of Qi Refining. I regret it so much."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: 吕阳闻言叹息道：“在下此前一心修炼，直到突破了炼气后期才得知了真气品阶的问题，心中痛悔啊”

0026.en: Hearing Lv Yang say this, Zhao Xuhe suddenly felt much better.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 听到吕阳这么说，赵旭河突然感觉好受了不少。

0026.en: "So it's about the quality of your True Qi."
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “原来是真气品阶。”

0026.en: Zhao Xuhe offered some fake comfort, "Most disciples in the Saint Sect don't realize this, so it's normal that you didn't know."
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: 赵旭河假惺惺地安慰了几句：“圣宗大多弟子其实都没有意识到这一点，所以师弟不知道也很正常”

0026.en: "Sigh, life is unpredictable." Lv Yang shook his head helplessly. "That's why I came to you, Senior Brother, to ask if there's a way to improve the quality of my True Qi. It would be even better if there was a high-grade technique. Don't worry about the price; I can afford one or two thousand Contribution Points."
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “哎，世事难料啊。”吕阳无奈地摇了摇头：“所以我此番来找师兄，就是想问问有什么办法能提升真气品阶，如果有上乘功法更好价格方面师兄不用担心，一两千贡献点我还是出得起的。”

0026.en: Hearing this, Zhao Xuhe's mind started working. One or two thousand Contribution Points—that was exactly the amount of money he urgently needed right now.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 听到吕阳这么说，赵旭河的心思顿时活泛了起来，一两千贡献点，他现在正好缺这么一笔钱急用啊。

0026.en: In a flash, Zhao Xuhe's thoughts raced, and he suddenly said:
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 电光石火间，赵旭河思绪急转，随后突然道：

0026.en: "Junior Brother Lv, if you put it that way... I do have a technique that's perfect for you. As long as you cultivate it, you can definitely improve the quality of your True Qi."
0026.speaker: 赵旭河
0026.cn: “吕师弟你要这么说.我手里还真有一门适合你的功法，只要你修炼了，绝对可以提升真气品阶。”

0026.en: "Really?" Lv Yang's face filled with anticipation. "What technique is it?"
0026.speaker: 吕阳
0026.cn: “真的吗？”吕阳闻言顿时面露期待之色：“是何功法？”

0026.en: Zhao Xuhe hesitated, feeling that something was strange, but then he thought again. This technique was only half a book, it was already useless.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 赵旭河闻言有些犹豫，不知为何总有一种古怪感觉，不过转念一想，这功法只有半部，已经是废了。

0026.en: Instead of keeping it, it was better to make use of this waste and use it to pay off his debt.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 与其留着，不如废物利用，拿来给自己还债。

0026.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe gritted his teeth and took out the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art" that he had obtained from Panlong Island, handing it to Lv Yang.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河顿时一咬牙，直接从怀里取出自己从盘龙岛里得到的《九变化龙决》递给了吕阳。

0027.en: Chapter 27: Understanding Formations
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 第27章 悟阵

0027.en: As Lv Yang had predicted, Zhao Xuhe finally sold the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art" to him for the low price of 1500 contribution points.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 事情的发展一如吕阳的预料，最后赵旭河还是以1500贡献点的价格将《九变化龙决》贱卖给了他。

0027.en: People are always like that when they're in debt.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 人嘛，欠债的时候都这样。

0027.en: After obtaining the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art," Lv Yang immediately returned to his cave residence, memorized the technique word for word, and then put it away.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 拿到了《九变化龙决》后，吕阳立刻返回了洞府，将功法内容逐字逐句牢牢记下，随后才重新收起。

0027.en: "It's a pity I can't cultivate now."
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “可惜我现在不能修炼”

0027.en: Transformed into a blood shadow, his cultivation level didn't change, permanently stuck in the late stage of Qi Refining. He couldn't even disperse his cultivation, so he could only wait for the next life.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 身化血影，修为不增不减，永远停留在了炼气后期，哪怕想要散功都不可能，所以只能等下辈子了。

0027.en: Even so, Lv Yang was not in a hurry to kill himself.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 话虽如此，吕阳却没有着急自杀。

0027.en: After all, time was precious. Even with The Hundred Lives Book, he wouldn't waste it. Even if he couldn't cultivate, he could still make progress in other areas.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 毕竟时间宝贵，哪怕有【百世书】他也不会轻易浪费，即便不能修炼，他也有其他地方能继续进步。

0027.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang took out Fairy Qingchen's "Secret Manual of Array Treasures" from his storage bag.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 想到这里，吕阳又从储物袋里取出了清尘仙子的那本《阵宝秘解》。

0027.en: That's right, he was going to learn formations!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 没错，他要学阵法！

0027.en: Among the four arts of cultivation—formations, artifacts, pills, and talismans—mastering any one of them would make you a high-level talent in the cultivation world, welcome anywhere.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 修真四艺，阵器丹符，但凡有一门技艺傍身，立刻就是修仙界的高级人才，放在哪里都可以吃得开。

0027.en: For example, Fairy Qingchen. Lv Yang thought she was truly talented. Not only did she know formations, but she could also integrate them into magic treasures. Unfortunately, she had poor taste in men, falling for scumbags who turned their backs on her, causing her to die with regret in both of her lives.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 例如清尘仙子，吕阳就觉得这位其实真的是一个人材，不仅会阵法，还能将阵法炼入法宝之中，可惜就是看男人的眼光不太行，先后都看上了翻脸不认人的渣男，所以两世结局都是含恨而死。

0027.en: Opening the "Secret Manual of Array Treasures," the first page made Lv Yang sigh.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 打开《阵宝秘解》，开篇第一页就让吕阳忍不住感慨。

0027.en: [The so-called array treasures use formations as treasures and treasures as formations. The two complement each other. The techniques within are the result of my own painstaking research.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【所谓阵宝，便是以阵为宝，以宝为阵，二者相辅相成，其中技艺乃是本人呕心沥血方才钻研而出】

0027.en: [To learn this path, both talent and hard work are essential. You cannot lack either.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【欲学此道，天赋努力，缺一不可。】

0027.en: After the preface, the second page was filled with dense patterns. Each pattern had a note explaining its meaning.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 开篇序言过后，第二页就是密密麻麻的纹路，每一个纹路都写着注释，解释了这个纹路是什么意思。

0027.en: [The art of formations is based on array patterns. By outlining these patterns, you can map the world and borrow its power. However, the world's secrets are endless and hard to understand, let alone turn into array patterns. This requires extraordinary insight. Only by mastering array patterns can you learn formations.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【阵法之道，以阵纹为主，勾勒阵纹，描摹天地，方可借天地之妙，然而天地数穷尽世间奥秘，难以参悟，更别说转化为阵纹了，其中需要非同凡俗的悟性，唯有掌握好阵纹，才有能力学阵。】

0027.en: [Very good. You now have a basic understanding of the principles of formations.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【很好，现在你已经对阵法的基本原理有了一定了解。】

0027.en: [Next, turn to the third page. Let's look at a simple example below to apply what we've just learned.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【接下来翻到第三页，让我们看一看下面这个简单的例子，把我们刚刚学到的知识运用到实践中吧。】

0027.en: On the third page, an extremely complex and intricate diagram appeared before Lv Yang's eyes.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 第三页，一个复杂繁琐到了极致的图案映入了吕阳眼帘。

0027.en: "This is a formation diagram?"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: 这就是阵法图？

0027.en: Lv Yang rubbed his chin. To solve a formation diagram, you had to identify its array patterns and figure out the formation's function.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳摸了摸下巴，所谓解开阵法图其实就是分辨出阵法中阵纹的组成，从而推算出这个阵法的功能。

0027.en: Array patterns are the foundation of all formations.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 阵纹，是所有阵法的基础。

0027.en: Whether a formation works depends on if the patterns are combined correctly, without conflicts, forming a complete circuit.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 一个阵法能否生效，主要就看阵纹的搭配是否合理，有没有冲突，能不能形成完整的链路运行起来。

0027.en: "Interesting."
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “有意思。”

0027.en: Lv Yang smiled confidently, thinking it didn't seem too hard. "With my talent and hard work, I am determined to master this simple formation diagram!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: 吕阳自信一笑，觉得这好像也不是特别难：“以我的天赋和努力，区区一个简易阵法图，我志在必得！”

0027.en: One month later.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 一个月后。

0027.en: Lv Yang sat blankly on his cushion, surrounded by piles of manuscripts filled with his calculations. He looked completely dejected.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳呆呆地坐在蒲团上，身旁堆积着大量的手稿，上面全都是他演算的结果，整个人颓废到了极致。

0027.en: In his hand was a series of combined array patterns.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而在他的手中，则是一道道组合起来的阵纹。

0027.en: After a long time, a spiritual light suddenly glowed from Lv Yang's fingertip.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不知道过了多久，吕阳的指尖才陡然亮起了一道灵光。

0027.en: "It worked!?"
0027.speaker: 吕阳

0027.en: Lv Yang instantly stood up, overjoyed. He carefully looked at the array patterns he had assembled, made a quick calculation, and then looked confused.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳瞬间站起，面露狂喜，仔细看着自己拼接出来的阵纹，掐指默算了片刻，随后露出了疑惑之色：

0027.en: "That's not right. How did it work?"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “不对啊，怎么就成了？”

0027.en: "How is this thing even running?"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “这玩意儿是怎么运行起来的？”

0027.en: It was the result of a month of his hard work, but he didn't understand why it worked. The feeling was driving him crazy.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 明明是自己呕心沥血一个月的成果，结果自己都不明白为什么它能用，这种感觉简直是让吕阳抓狂。

0027.en: After a month of hard study, he now had a deeper understanding of formations.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 苦修一月，如今的他对阵法已经有了一个更加深刻的理解。

0027.en: In short, formations were a lot like programming.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 简而言之，阵法和编程很相似。

0027.en: Understanding array paths was like digging through the terrible code written by heaven to find usable parts for your own code.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 所谓的参悟阵路，就是从天地这个老天爷写下的屎山代码里抓取出可以用的部分，组成自己的代码。

0027.en: However, with formations, you either know it or you don't.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 然而阵法这个东西，不会就是不会。

0027.en: It was like searching for gold in a mountain of dirt. A person without talent, like the current Lv Yang, would only find a pile of dirt instead of any gold.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 就像在屎山里面淘金，没有天赋的人只会和现在的吕阳一样，金没淘到半点，反而淘出了一堆的屎

0027.en: "No matter what, I managed to find something."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: “不管如何，总归是淘出了点东西。”

0027.en: Lv Yang sighed and continued his research, forgetting to eat or sleep. Another month passed, and he finally solved the diagram in his hand.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳叹息一声，继续废寝忘食地研究了起来，就这样又过了一个多月，他才终于解开了手里的图案。

0027.en: "This is an illumination formation!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “这是一个照明阵！”

0027.en: "Within the range of the formation, it provides bright light, making most hiding techniques useless. It has no offensive or defensive power."
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “阵法笼罩范围内光明普照，大部分隐匿行踪的手段都会失效，除此之外没有任何攻击力和防御力.”

0027.en: Lv Yang looked exhausted, his eyes bloodshot, but his face was full of excitement. With a great sense of accomplishment, he turned to the third page of the "Secret Manual of Array Treasures."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳神色憔悴，眼底布满了血丝，脸上却洋溢着激动之色，带着十足的成就感翻开了《阵宝秘解》的第三页。

0027.en: [It's normal if you can't solve it.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【其实解不开是正常的。】

0027.en: [The main purpose of the problem on the third page is to make you understand how difficult formations are, so you approach them with humility and don't get ahead of yourself.]
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 【第三页的题目主要是想让你明白阵法有多难，怀着一颗谦虚的心来参悟阵法，不要总是好高骛远。】

0027.en: Lv Yang: "..."
0027.speaker: 旁白

0027.en: "You monster! You absolute monster!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “畜生啊！畜生！”

0027.en: Lv Yang jumped up and threw the book on the ground. He was now one hundred percent sure that this formation manual was written by a formation master from the Chu Sheng Sect!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 吕阳猛然起身，将手里的书册一把摔在地上，他现在百分百确定，这绝对是圣宗阵法师写的阵法书！

0027.en: After a while, Lv Yang picked the book up again.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 好一会儿过后，吕阳又将书捡了起来。

0027.en: He had no choice. Some things you have to do to survive, whether you like them, understand them, or want to do them.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 没办法，有些事情可不会管你喜不喜欢，懂不懂，想不想做，为了生活还是得硬着头皮做下去才行。

0027.en: However, after studying further, Lv Yang realized his talent wasn't as bad as he thought.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过在进一步学习之后，吕阳发现自己的天赋并没有想象中那么差。

0027.en: As the book said, the complicated diagram on the third page was not meant for beginners, which was why he had been stuck on it for two months.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 诚如书中所说，第三页那个繁琐图案根本就不是给初学者解的，所以吕阳才会在那上面卡了两个月。

0027.en: But there was an upside. Now, when he studied simpler, easier-to-understand formations, his learning speed was visibly faster. When he got stuck, he could figure it out after a few days of research. This helped him regain the confidence he had lost.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过好处也是有的，那就是如今换了一些浅显易懂的阵法后，吕阳的学习速度肉眼可见快了不少，偶尔遇到卡壳的地方，钻研个几天也就过去了，也让之前被打击不轻的吕阳重新找回了自信。

0027.en: Time flew by in the cave, unnoticed.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 洞中不知年岁，时光飞逝。

0027.en: In the blink of an eye, twenty years had passed.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 一眨眼，就是二十年。

0027.en: During this time, Lv Yang ignored the outside world and focused solely on studying formations. He didn't even bother to pay the rent for his cave residence and moved to the outer sect.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 期间吕阳可谓是两耳不闻窗外事，一心只读阵法书，甚至连洞府房租也懒得交了，直接住到了外门。

0027.en: After all, he couldn't cultivate now, so he had no urgent needs and stopped working.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 毕竟他现在又无法修炼，没有了硬需求，自然也就摆烂不工作了。

0027.en: In those twenty years, every few years, a child of destiny with great luck, like Xiao Shiye, would suddenly rise in the outer sect.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而在二十年里，几乎每过个几年，外门就会有一位和昔日萧石叶那样鸿运齐天的天命之子突然崛起。

0027.en: However, after that child of destiny obtained a great opportunity known to everyone in the Chu Sheng Sect, they would suddenly disappear.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 然而等到那位天命之子获得某个圣宗人人皆知的大机缘后，又会突然消失。

0027.en: Along with them, a large group of unlucky people who had noticed the child's luck and tried to get close to them would also disappear.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 跟着一起消失的，还有一大批在发现了天命之子的气运之后，心怀不轨想要抱大腿蹭气运的倒霉蛋。

0027.en: "That senior is fishing again."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: “这是那位前辈又在钓鱼了啊.”

0027.en: Every time he heard similar news, Lv Yang felt a wave of fear. With the example of Xiao Shiye, he would only stay far away from any child of destiny.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 每次听到类似的消息，吕阳都是一阵心慌，毕竟有了萧石叶珠玉在前，他只会对天命之子敬而远之。

0027.en: He couldn't afford to provoke them, so he could only hide.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 他惹不起，只能躲着了。

0027.en: As for Zhao Xuhe, after twenty years, he had reached the peak of Qi Refining and become a famous true disciple of the sect. Unfortunately, he failed to break through to the Foundation Establishment realm a few years ago and died.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 还有赵旭河，二十年后的他已经炼气大圆满，成为了圣宗有名的真传，奈何几年前冲击筑基境失败，坐化了。

0027.en: Lv Yang just sighed at this and didn't pay it any more mind.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 对此，吕阳也只是感叹一声便不再关心。

0027.en: What truly made Lv Yang happy was that after twenty years of hard study, he had finally mastered all the knowledge in the "Secret Manual of Array Treasures."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 真正让吕阳感到喜悦的，还是经过二十年来的努力学习，他终于彻底钻研透了《阵宝秘解》的知识。

0027.en: Inside the cave residence, Lv Yang's entire focus was on the sword core in front of him. He was now so weak that he couldn't even maintain his human form, and his blood shadow was incredibly faint.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 洞府内，吕阳的全副心神都集中在了眼前的剑丸上，此刻的他甚至无力维持人形，血影也无比黯淡。

0027.en: This was a sign that his end was near.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这是大限将至的征兆。

0027.en: The side effects of cultivating the Heavenly Demon's Blood Shadow Transformation had finally caught up to him. He was only forty years old, but his life was already over.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 昔日修炼天魔化血神光的副作用终究还是找上了门，导致他才四十岁就已经寿元耗尽，油尽灯枯了。

0027.en: However, Lv Yang didn't care about this at all. He continued to focus on inscribing the formation. Even as he was about to die, he didn't get up or try to do anything to save himself, because that would only interrupt his inspiration, and he didn't want to waste it.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过吕阳对此却毫不在意，依旧在全神贯注地铭刻阵法，哪怕到了即将坐化的地步，他依旧没有起身，更没有试图做出什么挽回的行动，因为那样只会打断他的灵感，他不想浪费宝贵的灵感。

0027.en: "I understand! Wait... no, that's wrong."
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “我明白了！等等不对，是错的”

0027.en: "Oh, it's right! It's right... no, wait, it's still not right... oh, it's right, it's right!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “哦对的！对的.不对，哎还是不对哦对的对的！”

0027.en: After a long time, just as Lv Yang's blood shadow was about to disappear, at the very moment between life and death, Lv Yang's eyes suddenly flew open—
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 就这样过了许久，终于，就在吕阳的血影几乎消散，生死交界的那一瞬间，吕阳才猛然睁大了双眼——

0027.en: "Hahaha! I succeeded!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “哈哈哈！我成功了！”

0027.en: Watching the array patterns he had painstakingly drawn connect around the sword core and finally start working, Lv Yang burst out laughing, his laughter echoing in the cave.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 看着自己苦心描摹的阵纹在剑丸四周拼接，最后成功运行，吕阳顿时放声大笑，笑声在洞府内回荡。

0027.en: He lost his breath in the middle of his laughter.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 他就这样在笑声中失去了声息。

0027.en: "The Hundred Lives Book!"
0027.speaker: 吕阳
0027.cn: “百世书！”

0028.en: Chapter 28: Nine Transformations Dragon Art
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 第28章 九变化龙决

0028.en: [You were determined to forge the formation treasure, unmoved even as your life was ending. You finally succeeded, but you passed away in the process.]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 【你为了炼就阵宝，即便大限将至亦不为所动，终是功成，却也因此坐化。】

0028.en: [Current remaining pages of the Hundred Lives Book: 96]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：96】

0028.en: [Starting a new life, you can choose one of the following rewards from your previous life:]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 【重开一世，你可以从前世的以下收获中选择一项：

0028.en: [One: Treasures.]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 一：宝物。

0028.en: [Two: Cultivation.]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 二：修为。

0028.en: [Three: Lifespan.]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 三：寿命。

0028.en: [Four: Give up all rewards and awaken a random talent based on your past experience.]
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 四：放弃所有收获，根据前世经历随机觉醒一门天赋】

0028.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0028.speaker: 刘信
0028.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0028.en: Lv Yang opened his eyes. After a long moment, he let out a deep breath, waking from the dream of his past and present lives. "I choose the treasure."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: 吕阳睁开双眼，许久过后才深深吐出一口气，从前世今生的幻梦之中清醒了过来：“我选择法宝。”

0028.en: The next second, there was a movement in his Dantian.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 下一秒，丹田异动。

0028.en: A scarlet sword pill, covered in complex formation patterns and as brilliant as the stars, appeared in his Dantian, letting out a clear sword cry.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 一枚布满了繁复的阵纹，璀璨如天上群星的猩红剑丸就出现在了他的丹田之中，发出了清澈的剑鸣。

0028.en: Lv Yang looked satisfied. This sword pill was the fruit of more than twenty years of hard work in his previous life. Not only were the materials top-quality, but it was also enhanced by the Sky Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light. More importantly, he had successfully embedded a superior formation into the sword pill before he died, turning it into a formation treasure.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳一脸满意，这枚剑丸可是他前世二十多年的心血，不仅用料上乘，而且得到了天魔化血神光的加成，更重要的是，他临死前成功将一门上乘阵法嵌入了剑丸之中，将其转化为了一枚阵宝。

0028.en: This way, when Lv Yang fought with others, he could pull his enemies into the formation diagram.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 如此一来，吕阳再与人斗法，就能将敌人拉入阵图之中。

0028.en: The advantage of this was obvious. After all, no matter how powerful a cultivator was, it was impossible to single-handedly fight against a formation set up by a cultivator of the same realm.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 这么做的优势显而易见，毕竟无论多么厉害的修士，都不可能以一己之力对抗同境修士布下的阵法。

0028.en: The reason Fairy Qingchen was not strong was that she was only at the middle stage of Qi Refining.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 清尘仙子之所以实力不强，是因为她才炼气中期。

0028.en: And from Lv Yang's current perspective, she hadn't studied formations for long enough, certainly not as long as his own twenty years of hard study.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而且以吕阳如今的眼光来看，她研究阵法的时间也不够长，至少绝对比不过苦心钻研二十年的自己。

0028.en: "It's time to give you a name."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “也该给你取个名字了。”

0028.en: With a thought from Lv Yang, a chilling blood shadow with his exact appearance emerged from the sword pill. The two were of one mind, and it let out a soft chuckle.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳心念一动，剑丸上立刻浮现出了一道森然血影，容貌和他一模一样，二体同心，当即轻笑一声：

0028.en: "You were forged from the sacrifice of my previous life and enhanced by the Blood-Transforming Divine Light. From now on, your name will be Blood Sun."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “你是我前世舍身祭炼而成，又有化血神光加持，以后就叫你血阳吧。”

0028.en: The sword pill buzzed as if in agreement.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 剑丸闻声鸣动，似乎是在应和。

0028.en: Putting aside his distracting thoughts, Lv Yang glanced at Liu Xin, who was still talking on the stage, then looked away. There was no rush for the Innate True Qi Myriad Souls Banner.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 收起杂念，吕阳看了一眼台上还在侃侃而谈的刘信，旋即收回目光，先天一炁万灵幡暂时还不急。

0028.en: Then, Lv Yang began to act, following the same path as his previous life.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 紧接着，吕阳便照着前世依葫芦画瓢，开始行动。

0028.en: Go on stage, get assigned, Joyful Union Hall.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 上台，分配，合欢殿。

0028.en: Outlive Yu Suzhen.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 超死玉素真。

0028.en: Instead of borrowing from Zhao Xuhe, he directly sold the White Bone Flying Sword and other benefits given to new disciples, then began to quietly purchase Yin Death-Substitution Puppets.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不再向赵旭河借款，而是直接贩卖新人入门得来的白骨飞剑等福利，然后就开始默默购入替死阴傀。

0028.en: Soon, the price of Yin Death-Substitution Puppets skyrocketed.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 很快，替死阴傀价格爆发。

0028.en: Lv Yang secretly fueled the trend, buying low and selling high, constantly expanding his capital, and then hoarding more.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳暗中推波助澜，低买高卖，不断扩张本金，然后大肆扫货加仓。

0028.en: However, to avoid making others jealous, he chose not to sell at the highest point like in his past life, but exited the market when the price reached 3,000 points.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不过为了避免别人眼红，他并没有选择在前世的最高点卖出，而是在价格抵达3000点的时候离场。

0028.en: By then, he had accumulated a total of 20 Yin Death-Substitution Puppets.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而当时，他的手里攒了足足20具替死阴傀。

0028.en: A massive profit of 60,000 contribution points.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 血赚60000贡献点。

0028.en: After all this, Lv Yang bought a large number of spirit pills, sealed his cave residence, and took out the greatest reward from his four reincarnations.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 做完这一切后，吕阳又购买了大量灵丹，随后直接封锁洞府，拿出了自己四世轮回下来的最大收获。

0028.en: "Nine Transformations Dragon Art".
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 《九变化龙决》。

0028.en: "Myriad Vehicles Dragon-Riding Ascension Treasure Scroll".
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 《万乘御龙飞升宝卷》

0028.en: The former was for Qi Refining, the latter for Foundation Establishment. Together, they formed a cultivation method that could cultivate third-grade True Qi and lead directly to the Golden Core path, perfectly matching Lv Yang's expectations.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 前者炼气，后者筑基，加起来就是可以炼就三品真气，直指金丹大道的功法，完美符合吕阳的预期。

0028.en: "The Nine Transformations Dragon Art has ten layers, corresponding to the ten layers of Qi Refining. As the name suggests, each layer can trigger a transformation of True Qi, including Heavenly Snake, Divine Eagle, Green Ox, and Brocade Tiger... After nine transformations, it becomes a dragon, increasing the chance of breaking through to Foundation Establishment by thirty percent."
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: “九变化龙决，功法一共有十层，对应炼气十层，顾名思义每一层都可以引发一次真气蜕变，包括天蛇变，神鹰变，青牛变，锦虎变.九变之后，化而为龙，可以增加三成突破筑基的几率。”

0028.en: Lv Yang was captivated and immediately decided to dissipate his cultivation to practice it.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳看得心驰神往，立刻决定散功修行。

0028.en: "Bang!"
0028.speaker: 旁白

0028.en: As the True Qi in his Dantian rapidly dissipated, Lv Yang's realm also began to fall quickly. In a short while, he went from the fourth layer of Qi Refining back to being a mortal.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 伴随着丹田真气的快速消散，吕阳的境界也开始飞速跌落，不一会儿就从炼气四层重新变回了凡人。

0028.en: However, he didn't waste the dispersed True Qi, instead feeding it all to his "Innate True Qi".
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不过溃散的真气他也没有浪费，而是全部喂给了“先天一炁”。

0028.en: This external Qi, refined from the sacrifice of his second life, was now nourished by the cultivation of his current life, becoming like an avatar to him.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 这道由吕阳第二世舍身祭炼而成的外炁，如今又得到了吕阳这一世修为的滋养，已然形同他的化身。

0028.en: With it protecting him during his seclusion, he wouldn't be completely defenseless.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 闭关时有它护持，也不至于毫无自保之力。

0028.en: In the blink of an eye, three years passed.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 一眨眼，就是三年过去。

0028.en: Inside the cave residence, Lv Yang sat on a cushion, circulating the profound technique. His Dantian, once empty after dissipating his cultivation, was now occupied by an even more formidable True Qi.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 洞府内，吕阳端坐蒲团，默运玄功，昔日散功后空荡荡的丹田如今已然被一道更庞大的真气所占据。

0028.en: His Qi moved with his will, changing and transforming. One moment it was a nimble rabbit leaping through his meridians, the next a python hibernating in his Dantian, then a colorful tiger roaring at the sky, and then a graceful eagle soaring freely. The variations were endless.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只见他气随意走，腾挪变化，一会儿化作一只脱兔在奇经八脉间飞跃，一会儿化作一条蟒蛇蛰伏丹田，一会儿又化作斑斓锦虎，仰天咆哮，一会儿又化作俊逸飞鹰，纵横捭阖，堪称变化无穷。

0028.en: After a long time, Lv Yang let out a deep breath.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 就这样过了许久，吕阳才深深吐出一口气。

0028.en: The breath was like a white arrow. It did not disperse after leaving his body, but instead transformed into a sturdy green ox, walking slowly as if carrying a majestic mountain.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 气如白矢，离体之后没有散开，而是化作一头雄壮青牛，步履徐徐，仿佛驮着一头巍峨神山在行走。

0028.en: "Success!"
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “成了！”

0028.en: Lv Yang's face lit up with joy. His cultivation in these three years had been much smoother than in his previous three lives. After all, he had plenty of contribution points and no shortage of external medicines.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳面露喜色，这三年苦修可比前三世要顺利得多，毕竟这一世他贡献点充足，各种外药一应不缺。

0028.en: Therefore, in just three years, he had returned to the sixth layer of Qi Refining, the peak of the middle stage.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 因此短短三年，他就重回炼气六层，中期巅峰。

0028.en: Although he was stuck at the middle-stage bottleneck, Lv Yang was confident that in three to five years, he would break through again and return to the late stage of Qi Refining!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 虽然卡在了中期瓶颈，但是吕阳很有自信，长则五年，短则三年，他必然再破瓶颈，回归炼气后期！

0028.en: And even though he was still at the sixth layer of Qi Refining, his combat power was likely not much different from his previous life, because his True Qi in this life was on a completely different level.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而且别看他如今还在炼气六层，战力对比前世恐怕也相差不大，只因这一世他的真气已然今非昔比。

0028.en: "Nine Transformations into a Dragon, each transformation has a corresponding magical art. The Brocade Tiger transformation increases True Qi's destructive power, the Green Ox transformation enhances physical strength, the Divine Eagle transformation grants clairvoyance, the Heavenly Snake transformation can conceal one's aura, the Jade Rabbit transformation increases speed, and the Mountain Camel transformation increases True Qi recovery speed..."
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: “九变化龙，每一种变化都有一门对应的法术神通，锦虎变增加真气破坏力，青牛变加持肉身神力，神鹰变获得千里眼，天蛇变能收敛气息，玉兔变能提升速度，山驼变能提升真气恢复速度”

0028.en: The six transformations almost closed the gap between the middle and late stages of Qi Refining!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 六种变化，几乎填平了炼气中期和后期的差距！

0028.en: But what excited Lv Yang the most was the "Flying Fish Transformation" among the nine transformations, because its effect was simple: breaking through bottlenecks!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不过最让吕阳动心的还是九变之中的“飞鱼变”，因为这一层变化的效果很简单，那就是突破瓶颈！

0028.en: "If I cultivate the sixth transformation now, I could probably break through to the late stage in an instant."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “如果我现在修炼第六变，恐怕须臾间就能突破后期。”

0028.en: "But that would be too much of a waste."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “不过那样就太浪费了。”

0028.en: Lv Yang was ambitious and would not use this precious breakthrough opportunity on the late stage of Qi Refining. He planned to use it when breaking through to the peak of Qi Refining.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳心有壮志，自然不可能将宝贵的突破机会放在炼气后期，他打算将其用在突破炼气圆满的时候。

0028.en: Lv Yang's plan for this life was simple: cultivate.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳对这一世的规划很简单，就是修炼。

0028.en: "I will cultivate silently, and after reaching the peak of Qi Refining, I will seamlessly transition to the Myriad Vehicles Dragon-Riding Ascension Treasure Scroll. I will remain in seclusion until I reach the Foundation Establishment realm and amaze everyone!"
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “我要默默修炼，炼气大圆满之后再无缝衔接万乘御龙飞升宝卷，一直闭关到筑基境，惊艳所有人！”

0028.en: Thinking this, Lv Yang casually took a spirit pill and entered a state of cultivation again.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 想到这里，吕阳随口给自己喂了一枚灵丹，便再度入定修行。

0028.en: Then, just a few days later.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 然后短短数日过后。

0028.en: "Boom!"
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: “轰隆！”

0028.en: Lv Yang was startled from his meditation by a tremor. He opened his eyes to find that his Innate True Qi avatar, which he had left on guard outside, had been dispersed.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳被一阵地动山摇从入定中惊醒，睁开双眼，却发现被他留守在外的先天一炁化身竟然被打散了。

0028.en: A powerful enemy has invaded?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 有强敌入侵？

0028.en: Lv Yang was puzzled. In this life, he had stayed in his cave, cultivating and minding his own business. How could someone suddenly attack him?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 吕阳百思不得其解，这一世自己宅在洞府里一心修炼，两耳不闻窗外事，怎么会有人突然杀上门呢？

0028.en: Confused, Lv Yang walked out of his cave, only to see an unexpected acquaintance.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 带着疑惑，吕阳走出洞府，结果却看到了意料之外的熟人。

0028.en: "It's you?"
0028.speaker: 赵旭河
0028.cn: “就是你？”

0028.en: Outside the cave, Zhao Xuhe's eyes were bloodshot. He was accompanied by several cultivators with powerful auras, all glaring at Lv Yang with rage.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只见洞府外，赵旭河双眼布满血丝，身旁还跟着好几个气机磅礴的修士，怒气冲天地朝着吕阳看来。

0028.en: "Senior Brother." Lv Yang cupped his hands. "I am Lv Yang, I don't know..."
0028.speaker: 吕阳
0028.cn: “这位师兄。”吕阳拱了拱手：“在下吕阳，不知”

0028.en: "It really is you!"
0028.speaker: 赵旭河
0028.cn: “果然是你！”

0028.en: Zhao Xuhe interrupted Lv Yang, saying hatefully, "Coiling Dragon Island has mysteriously disappeared. The opportunity I earned through three lifetimes of merit is suddenly gone. It cost me a great deal to ask my master to divine the cause, and he told me that the opportunity was taken by a disciple of the Holy Sect with the surname Lv from this place!"
0028.speaker: 赵旭河
0028.cn: 赵旭河直接打断了吕阳的话，恨恨道：“盘龙岛离奇消失，我苦修三世功德才换来的机缘突然没了，耗费了大代价才请来师尊推算因果，师尊和我说是机缘被此地一个姓吕的圣宗弟子夺走了！”

0028.en: "Speak! Is the inheritance of the Perfected Person Panlong in your hands!"
0028.speaker: 赵旭河
0028.cn: “说！盘龙真人的传承是不是在你手上！”

0028.en: As Zhao Xuhe's words fell, Lv Yang was first stunned, then, as if he had realized something, his expression darkened visibly.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 赵旭河话音落下，吕阳先是一愣，紧接着仿佛想到了什么，神色顿时以肉眼可见的速度阴沉了下来。

0029.en: Chapter 29: Karma Attracts Trouble
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 第29章 因果招是非

0029.en: Zhao Xuhe's words made Lv Yang feel as if he had been plunged into an icy cavern.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 赵旭河的话，让吕阳一瞬间如坠冰窟。

0029.en: In this life, he hadn't even been to Coiling Dragon Island. He had memorized the cultivation technique from his past two lives. So how could the island have just disappeared on its own?
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 要知道，这一世他甚至都没有去过盘龙岛，功法也是前两世背下来的，结果盘龙岛居然自己消失了？

0029.en: Was it because of so-called karma?
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 由于所谓的因果？

0029.en: Because he had practiced the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art" early, he had intercepted the karma between it and Zhao Xuhe, so Coiling Dragon Island disappeared as well?
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 因为自己提前修炼了《九变化龙决》，截胡了它和赵旭河之间的因果，所以盘龙岛也就跟着消失了？
