0029.en: The karma of a cultivation technique, a predetermined opportunity.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 功法因果，机缘早定。

0029.en: So this was Zhao Xuhe's destined opportunity. He couldn't take it or practice it, or else someone would immediately deduce the karma and follow the trail to his door?
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 合着这是赵旭河的命定机缘，自己不能抢也不能练，否则立刻就会被人推演因果，顺藤摸瓜找上门？

0029.en: After figuring this out, Lv Yang was so angry that he laughed instead.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 想通这一点后，吕阳顿时气极反笑

0029.en: This world is so damn disgusting!
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 这世道，好特么恶心！

0029.en: Powerful True Masters calculate destinies in advance for their disciples' benefit. If something goes wrong, they can find out who caused it and force the derailed karma back on track.
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 真人大能提前算定机缘，给自家弟子谋利，出了意外还能算出是谁的原因，将偏离的因果扳回正轨。

0029.en: In a situation like this, how could an ordinary person ever get ahead?
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 这种情况下，怎有普通人出头之日？

0029.en: They can only bow their heads and work like beasts of burden!
0029.speaker: 吕陽
0029.cn: 只能俯首做牛马了！

0029.en: Just like now. On the surface, only Zhao Xuhe has appeared, but the one truly making a move is probably his so-called "Master"!
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 就比如现在，表面上看只有赵旭河一人出现，可实际上真正出手的恐怕是赵旭河背后那所谓的“师尊”！

0029.en: Lv Yang was one hundred percent sure it had to be a Foundation Establishment True Master!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 吕阳百分百肯定，那定然是一位筑基真人！

0029.en: Lifting his head, Lv Yang once again recalled Daoist Hong Yun from his previous life, as if seeing a pair of eyes looking down from the vast sky above.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 抬起头，吕阳再度想起了上一世的鸿运道人，仿佛在头顶这万丈穹天上看到了一双俯瞰而下的眼眸。

0029.en: "...Why are you forcing me?"
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: “.为什么要逼我？”

0029.en: At this thought, anger surged in Lv Yang's heart, and malice grew. He looked at Zhao Xuhe, a mocking smile on his lips.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 想到这里，吕阳一时间怒从心头起，恶向胆边生，随后便看向了赵旭河，嘴唇挑起一抹嘲讽的弧度。

0029.en: Almost at the same time, a person next to Zhao Xuhe suddenly stepped forward.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 几乎同时，赵旭河身旁，一人突然迈步走出。

0029.en: "Junior Brother, be careful!"
0029.speaker: 陌生男1
0029.cn: “师弟小心！”

0029.en: Swoosh!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 唰！

0029.en: A flash of sword light, and Zhao Xuhe's vision blurred. When he could see clearly again, the rage that filled him was instantly extinguished by a chilling cold.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 剑光一闪，赵旭河只觉得眼前一花，等到他看清眼前景象后，原本满腔怒火瞬间就被一股凉意浇灭。

0029.en: The person who had just stepped forward was a disciple of the same "Master," having joined three years earlier than him. He had cultivated the Dragon-Tiger Intercourse Yin-Yang Great Joy Sutra to the sixth level of Qi Refining, the peak of the middle stage. His true qi was polished to the fifth-grade limit, and in terms of strength, he was much stronger than Zhao Xuhe.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 刚刚站出来的人乃是和他一样拜入了“师尊”门下的弟子，比他早入门三年，修炼龙虎交媾阴阳大乐赋到了炼气六层，中期巅峰，一身真气更是打磨到了五品极限，论实力比他还要强上许多。

0029.en: But now, that Senior Brother was gone.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 然而现在，那位师兄消失了。

0029.en: His flesh, blood, and bones had been completely consumed by a crimson divine light. In the blink of an eye, only an empty human skin was left, slowly falling to the ground.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 皮肉骨血都被一道猩红神光吃干抹尽，赵旭河一个眨眼，原地就只剩下一道空荡荡的人皮缓缓落下。

0029.en: The next moment, a spiritual light flew out from the human skin.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 下一秒，一道灵光从人皮中飞出。

0029.en: "Thank you, fellow Daoist, for freeing me."
0029.speaker: 陌生男1
0029.cn: “多谢道友替我解脱。”

0029.en: Within the spiritual light, a faint figure appeared. There was no anger at being killed by Lv Yang's sword; instead, there was a sense of joyful release.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 灵光之中，一道虚幻身影浮现，居然丝毫没有被吕阳一剑斩杀的愤怒，甚至还带着几分解脱的快意。

0029.en: Then, he looked at Zhao Xuhe.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 紧接着他又看向了赵旭河。

0029.en: "Junior Brother, before we came, Master commented that my foundation was not deep and my merits were few. He said it would be difficult for me to reach the peak of Qi Refining, and that Foundation Establishment was hopeless."
0029.speaker: 陌生男1
0029.cn: “师弟，此番来之前，师尊曾点评我底蕴不深，功德尚浅，一生炼气圆满难求，筑基更是毫无希望。”

0029.en: "I asked Master for guidance, and he ordered me to come with you and save your life at a critical moment. You have accumulated three lifetimes of merit and have a thirty percent chance of achieving Foundation Establishment in the future. Now that I have saved you, our karma is set. If you achieve Foundation Establishment, you must help my reincarnated self in my cultivation."
0029.speaker: 陌生男1
0029.cn: “我求师尊指点，师尊这才命我与你一同前来，关键时刻救你一命。你积三世功德，未来当有三成希望成就筑基，如今我救你一命，因果已定，日后你若成就筑基，当助我转世之身修行得道。”

0029.en: As his voice fell, the spiritual light soared into the sky.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 话音落下，灵光便一个纵身飞入穹天。

0029.en: Below, Lv Yang's expression grew colder as he watched.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 下方，吕阳见状眼神愈发冷冽。

0029.en: "...Using my hand to create a karmic bond for his own disciple, to allow him to reincarnate? Is he so sure that I can't cause any trouble, and he wants to squeeze every last bit of value out of me?"
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: “.借我之手给自己的弟子定下因果，转世重来？这是笃定我翻不起大浪，想要榨干我最后的价值？”

0029.en: Lv Yang's gaze shifted, and he saw Chu Sheng Sect disciples stepping out from beside Zhao Xuhe, one after another. All of them were at the sixth level of Qi Refining, the peak of the middle stage.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 吕阳目光一转，却见赵旭河身旁，一个个圣宗弟子踱步而出，竟然全都是炼气六层，中期巅峰修为。

0029.en: At the same time, Zhao Xuhe finally reacted, his face full of excitement as he shouted, "Senior Brothers, if you help me capture this thief today and reclaim my opportunity, I will do my best to repay you when I achieve Foundation Establishment. I will help you all reincarnate and achieve the perfection of Qi Refining!"
0029.speaker: 赵旭河
0029.cn: 与此同时，赵旭河也终于反应了过来，面露兴奋之色，高声道：“诸位师兄，只要今日能助我拿下此贼，夺回机缘，来日我若成就筑基，必竭力报答，助师兄们转世归来，得个炼气圆满功果！”

0029.en: Hearing this, the others all nodded.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 此言一出，众人这才纷纷点头。

0029.en: "Rest assured, Junior Brother."
0029.speaker: 陌生男2
0029.cn: “师弟且放心。”

0029.en: "Opportunities belong to those who are fated for them. This thief stole your opportunity without reason; his crime is unforgivable. With Master watching over us, we will certainly help you capture him!"
0029.speaker: 陌生男2
0029.cn: “机缘者，有缘者得之，此贼无故夺你机缘，罪无可恕，有师尊在上，此番我等定然助你擒拿此贼！”

0029.en: Lv Yang laughed loudly when he heard this. "After all is said and done, isn't this just robbery?"
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 吕阳闻言顿时大笑：“说一千道一万，还不是要强抢？”

0029.en: "You're hopelessly stubborn."
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: “冥顽不化。”

0029.en: The leading Chu Sheng Sect disciple shook his head and sneered, "My name is Lu Yuanchun. Since you refuse to be captured, don't blame me for being merciless."
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: 为首的圣宗弟子摇了摇头，冷笑一声：“我名为陆元淳，既然你不愿束手就擒，那就休怪我无情了。”

0029.en: As his voice fell, the man named Lu Yuanchun formed a hand seal. His aura was at the seventh level of Qi Refining, the late stage. He then summoned a golden mirror that hung high in the air, replacing the sun. It instantly cast down thousands of golden rays, sharper than any blade, engulfing Lv Yang like a torrential downpour.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 话音落下，名为陆元淳的男子便掐动法决，一身气机赫然在炼气七层，后期修为，随后更是祭起一面金光宝镜高悬空中，取代天日，霎时间垂落万千金霞，犹胜刀兵，如倾盆暴雨将吕阳吞没。

0029.en: Lv Yang's brow furrowed at the sight, and his figure vanished in an instant.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 吕阳见状眉毛一拧，身影瞬间消失。

0029.en: Immediately after, a sword light soared into the sky, splitting into thousands of copies. It darted left and right but couldn't escape the golden rays, forced to endure the attack head-on.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 紧接着，就见一道剑光腾空而起，分化万千，左冲右突却始终逃不出金霞笼罩之地，只能硬抗金霞。

0029.en: "Master already knew this thief was skilled with a sword. How could he not provide a way to counter it?"
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: “师尊早已算出此贼擅长剑术，岂会不赐下解法。”

0029.en: Lu Yuanchun smiled smugly, then looked at Zhao Xuhe. "Junior Brother Zhao, I have trapped this thief, making it difficult for him to use his sword arts to escape."
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: 陆元淳见状得意一笑，随后看向赵旭河：“赵师弟，我已经困住此贼，令其难以施展剑术遁空之妙。”

0029.en: "Please use your treasure seal to capture his flying sword, and this matter will be settled!"
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: “还请师弟催动宝印，拿下此贼飞剑，则大事已定！”

0029.en: "Thank you, Senior Brother!"
0029.speaker: 赵旭河
0029.cn: “多谢师兄！”

0029.en: Zhao Xuhe cupped his hands and, without delay, took out a glittering golden seal. He cast it into the air, and it descended upon Lv Yang's sword light.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 赵旭河拱了拱手，随后不敢怠慢，立刻取出了一枚金光熠熠的宝印祭在空中，朝着吕阳的剑光落下。

0029.en: "This thing again..."
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: “又是这东西”

0029.en: Lv Yang's eyes narrowed slightly. He recognized it as the "Primal Magnetism Gold Seal" that Zhao Xuhe had used in his second life, a treasure specifically designed to counter flying swords.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 吕阳目光微动，认出这是第二世的时候赵旭河曾经用过的“元磁金印”，乃是一件克制飞剑的法宝。

0029.en: Having learned his lesson from his past life, Lv Yang wouldn't let Zhao Xuhe use it freely. With a thought, the Blood Sun Sword Pellet moved as he willed it. It avoided contact with the Primal Magnetism Gold Seal, then turned its sword light into a sky-full of Blood-Devouring Divine Light, sweeping towards Zhao Xuhe.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 有了前世教训，吕阳自然不会任由赵旭河施展，当即心念一动，血阳剑丸随心而动，竟不与元磁金印接触，而是避让开来，紧接着将剑光一转，化作漫天的化血神光，朝着赵旭河的方向刷落。

0029.en: Zhao Xuhe was shocked and retreated in a panic, crying out, "Senior Brother!"
0029.speaker: 赵旭河
0029.cn: 赵旭河见状顿时大惊，仓皇后退，口中叫道：“师兄！”

0029.en: "Don't panic. It's just the struggle of a cornered beast."
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: “莫慌，困兽之斗罢了。”

0029.en: On the other side, Lu Yuanchun remained calm and said loudly, "Junior Brothers, please act now."
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: 另一边，陆元淳依旧镇定，朗声道：“诸位师弟，还请出手。”

0029.en: As soon as he finished speaking, several more Chu Sheng Sect disciples stepped forward with strange smiles on their faces. They committed suicide before the divine light even reached them.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 话音刚落，又有几个圣宗弟子踱步走出，脸上带着诡谲的笑意，竟是不等神光落下便纷纷主动自杀。

0029.en: Instantly, rays of blood-red light burst from their corpses.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 霎时间，一道道血光从他们的尸体上绽放。

0029.en: These blood-red lights acted like chains, temporarily trapping Lv Yang's Blood-Devouring Divine Light, making it difficult to retract and control.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这些血光仿佛一道道锁链，竟是将吕阳的化血神光暂时困在了其中，难以收回，心念运转顿感生涩。

0029.en: Zhao Xuhe and Lu Yuanchun had clearly come prepared.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 赵旭河和陆元淳两人显然是有备而来。

0029.en: Especially Lu Yuanchun, who had been secretly instructed by their Master and knew many of Lv Yang's secrets. Thus, he had prepared many countermeasures.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 尤其是陆元淳，来之前更是得到了师尊秘授，得知了吕阳的诸多底细，因此准备了许多应对的手段。

0029.en: So, before the fight, he had set a strategy: first, limit Lv Yang's speed to prevent his escape; then, have Zhao Xuhe suppress the sword pellet; finally, have the other junior brothers work together to suppress the Blood-Devouring Divine Light. No matter how powerful Lv Yang's abilities were, he would be like a lamb to the slaughter.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 所以他在斗法之前就定下了策略，先限制吕阳的速度，确保其无法逃跑，然后由赵旭河出手压制剑丸，最后由一同前来的师弟们联手压制化血神光，任凭吕阳的神通再高，都如同待宰的羔羊。

0029.en: "You're at the end of your rope. The outcome is decided!"
0029.speaker: 陆元淳
0029.cn: “黔驴技穷，大局已定！”

0029.en: Lu Yuanchun sneered, feeling that his victory was assured. He shook the golden mirror, and thousands of golden rays rained down, intending to refine Lv Yang to death.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 陆元淳冷笑一声，自觉胜算大增，当即晃动金光宝镜，万千金霞接踵而至，就要将吕阳活生生炼死。

0029.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang could only sigh.
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: 吕阳见状，也只能叹息一声。

0029.en: "So this is the advantage of having a powerful backer..."
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: “这就是有背景的好处啊.”

0029.en: With his current strength, even against multiple opponents, Lu Yuanchun and Zhao Xuhe were no match for him. However, their preparations were just too thorough.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 以他现在的实力，哪怕以一敌多，陆元淳赵旭河之流也不是他的对手，奈何对方的准备实在太充分。

0029.en: Every move struck at his weakness.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 招招都打在了他的软肋上。

0029.en: And all of this was because of Zhao Xuhe's mysterious "Master," who had deduced the karma and calculated his fate, leading to such a targeted plan.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 而这一切，都是因为赵旭河的那位神秘“师尊”，推演因果，算定命数，这才有了如此针对的布置。

0029.en: Normally, at this point, he would indeed be powerless to turn the tide.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 一般来说，到这一步他确实回天无力了。

0029.en: "Fortunately... I have a cheat!"
0029.speaker: 吕阳
0029.cn: “还好.我有挂！”

0029.en: The Blood Sun Sword Pellet was brought from his previous life by the [Hundred Lives Book]. It was not bound by karma and naturally immune to any divination.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 血阳剑丸乃是【百世书】从他前世带来的，不入因果，自然也不惧任何推算。

0029.en: Even if Zhao Xuhe's mysterious "Master" could predict his skill with a sword and the Blood-Devouring Divine Light, he could never have predicted the true nature of the Blood Sun Sword Pellet!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 就算赵旭河的神秘“师尊”能算到他精通剑术，算到化血神光，也绝对不可能算到血阳剑丸的底细！

0029.en: The next moment, with a thought, Lv Yang channeled his true qi again.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 下一秒，吕阳心念一动，真气再催。

0029.en: Clang clang—!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 锵锵——！

0029.en: The Blood Sun Sword Pellet let out a long cry. Then, the array patterns on the pellet suddenly burst open, sealing the heavens and the earth, instantly enveloping everyone within!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 血阳剑丸应声长啸，随后剑丸上的阵纹就陡然炸开，禁锁天地，封闭乾坤，瞬间将所有人囊括入内！

0029.en: In the blink of an eye, Lv Yang had deployed the grand array he had spent twenty years of his past life studying and perfecting!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 前后不过一眨眼，吕阳已然将前世二十年钻研炼就的大阵铺排开来！

0030.en: Chapter 30: The Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 第30章 补天峰主

0030.en: In his previous life, Lv Yang had painstakingly studied array formations. The grand formation he finally inscribed on the Blood Sun Sword Pellet was a sword formation called the "Bloodwash Heavenly River Sword Formation Diagram."
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 吕阳前世苦心钻研阵法，最后铭刻在血阳剑丸上的大阵，乃是一座剑阵，名为“血洗天河剑阵图”。

0030.en: The formation was complex. Its main power came from a river of sword qi from the Blood Sun Sword Pellet, supported by the Heaven Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light. Lv Yang had also designed 360 key points in the formation. He planned to place 360 cultivators in these points to unleash the formation's full power.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 阵分三才九宫，以血阳剑丸催发的剑气长河为主，天魔化血神光为辅，吕阳还特地设计了三百六十座阵眼，按照他的设想，只要找到三百六十个修士入主其中，就能将阵法的威力发挥到极致。

0030.en: He already had a plan for this.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 关于这一点他也想好了。

0030.en: Once he took back his Primordial Qi Myriad Spirits Banner from Liu Xin, he would let the banner spirits control the formation's key points. This would be easier and portable.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 等他从刘信手里夺回自己的先天一炁万灵幡后，就让幡灵入主阵眼，不仅省力方便还可以随身携带。

0030.en: But for now, he had to control the formation himself.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 不过现在，只能由他亲自主阵了。

0030.en: "Open!" Lv Yang performed a hand seal. The Blood Sun Sword Pellet hummed, and a celestial river surged from south to north, covering the sky and stretching beyond sight.
0030.speaker: 吕阳
0030.cn: “开！”吕阳掐动法决，血阳剑丸鸣动，阵内一道天河自南向北涌来，涵盖天宇，一望而不见边际。

0030.en: Lu Yuanchun, Zhao Xuhe, and all the others were now trapped in the celestial river. The rushing water was like countless sword strikes attacking them every second. A few weaker cultivators only had time to scream before they turned into blossoms of blood in the river.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 而陆元淳，赵旭河，乃至其余众人此刻全都落在了天河之中，河水涛涛，相当于每分每秒都有无穷剑气劈斩而来，几个修为稍弱的修士只来得及发出一声惨叫，就化作了天河之中的一朵血花。

0030.en: Seeing this, Lu Yuanchun's expression changed drastically.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 陆元淳见状顿时面色剧变。

0030.en: "This is impossible! Master said he knew formations, but I didn't give him any time to set one up. How did we still get trapped in it?"
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: “这不可能！师尊先前虽然交代过此人懂得阵法，可我根本没有给他布阵时间，为何还会落入阵中？”

0030.en: Lu Yuanchun could not understand.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 陆元淳自然无法理解。

0030.en: The Blood Sun Sword Pellet was not an ordinary magic treasure, but a formation treasure. It used the formation as the treasure itself. The formation appeared with a single thought, requiring no setup time.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 因为血阳剑丸并非寻常法宝，而是阵宝，所谓的阵宝就是以阵为宝，念动即阵成，根本不需要布阵！

0030.en: Being trapped in the formation was beyond Lu Yuanchun's expectations.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 而此刻落入阵中，已然超出了陆元淳的预料。

0030.en: After all, formations borrowed the power of heaven and earth and were said to be unbeatable against those at the same cultivation level. Although he was confident in his own strength, being trapped in a formation shook his confidence.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 毕竟阵法假天地之奇，借天地之力，号称同境界无敌，他虽然自诩实力不俗，但是落入阵中也失了底气。

0030.en: Could he really fail so miserably today?
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: 莫非今日真要在阴沟里翻了船？

0030.en: At this thought, Lu Yuanchun's expression grew uglier, losing its earlier confidence. Even Zhao Xuhe beside him became anxious.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 想到这里，陆元淳的表情愈发难看，不复先前的胜券在握，连带着旁边的赵旭河都惴惴不安了起来：

0030.en: "Senior Brother, this formation..."
0030.speaker: 赵旭河
0030.cn: “师兄，这阵法.”

0030.en: "Be careful, Junior Brother. Things might not go as planned today," Lu Yuanchun whispered as he summoned a golden mirror to protect himself.
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: “师弟当心，今日之事恐怕另有变数。”陆元淳一边低声吩咐，一边将金光宝镜祭在空中护持己身。

0030.en: Lu Yuanchun still held onto a sliver of hope. He thought Lv Yang was just a lucky disciple. Although he knew many things, he was still new. Even if he knew formations, how well could he master them? This formation might be something he inherited.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 此刻陆元淳心中仍存侥幸，在他看来吕阳不过是个得了机缘的普通弟子，虽然会的东西有不少，但毕竟入门时日尚短，就算懂得阵法，又能掌握多少？至于眼前的阵法，说不定是前人遗泽呢？

0030.en: However, in the next second, Lv Yang shattered his illusion.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 然而下一秒，吕阳就打碎了他的幻想。

0030.en: With a cold expression, Lv Yang pointed a finger. The clear river of sword qi instantly turned a piercing scarlet color.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 只见吕阳神色冷然，心念一动，伸手一指，原本澄澈的剑气天河顿时便泛起了一抹刺人的猩红之色。

0030.en: The Heaven Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 天魔化血神光！

0030.en: This divine ability was incredibly powerful, said to "injure on a graze, and kill on a touch," but that also meant it was only effective if it hit its target.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 这门神通虽然威力奇大，号称“擦着就伤，碰着就亡”，但是另一方面也说明了唯有命中才能显威。

0030.en: If it missed, it was useless.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 打不中，那就毫无建树。

0030.en: But inside the "Bloodwash Heavenly River Sword Formation Diagram," Lv Yang had solved this problem. Being inside the formation was like being soaked in the divine light!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 然而在“血洗天河剑阵图”中，吕阳却解决了这个缺陷，只要身处阵内，就相当于浸泡在了神光中！

0030.en: In other words, as soon as he used it, it was a guaranteed hit!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 换而言之，只需要施展出来，就必定命中！

0030.en: Instantly, Lu Yuanchun felt the world shake. The remaining junior brothers screamed one after another, and in a moment, they were turned into nothing but human skins!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 霎时间，陆元淳只觉得一阵地动山摇，剩余的师弟们一个接着一个惨叫，随后竟顷刻间化作了人皮！

0030.en: "Not good!"
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: “不好！”

0030.en: Lu Yuanchun's face changed dramatically. He gritted his teeth, changed his hand seal, and the energy from the golden mirror above his head became chaotic and violent.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 陆元淳瞬间面色大变，旋即一咬牙，手中法决变换，头顶的金光宝镜气机瞬间变得混乱狂暴了起来。

0030.en: Lv Yang understood immediately with just a glance.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 吕阳只看一眼就瞬间反应了过来。

0030.en: "Self-destructing your magic treasure? Naive!"
0030.speaker: 吕阳
0030.cn: “自爆法宝？天真！”

0030.en: The Golden Light Treasure Mirror was clearly a high-quality magic treasure. If Lu Yuanchun blew it up, he might be able to tear open the formation and create an escape path.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 金光宝镜显然是一件上乘法宝，陆元淳若是将其引爆，确实有希望撕裂阵图，从而打出一条活路来。

0030.en: But that was only if Lv Yang didn't understand formations.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 不过前提是，吕阳不懂阵法。

0030.en: A normal formation, even with someone controlling it, can only run by its fixed rules. It is a dead formation. However, a formation with a formation master is completely different.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 寻常阵法，哪怕有人主持也只能按照既定的规则运转，乃是死阵，然而有阵法师坐镇就截然不同了。

0030.en: A qualified formation master can adjust the formation in real-time based on the battle, turning a dead formation into a living one. Its power is on a different level. Furthermore, Lv Yang himself created the "Bloodwash Heavenly River Sword Formation Diagram," so he could use it as easily as moving his own limbs.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 因为一位合格的阵法师完全可以根据战局的变化来临时调整阵法，如此以来，死阵就变成了活阵，威力自然也不可同日而语，更别说“血洗天河剑阵图”还是吕阳亲手创立，用起来如臂使指。

0030.en: Therefore, the moment Lu Yuanchun began to detonate his treasure, Lv Yang made his move.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 因此就在陆元淳引爆法宝的瞬间，吕阳动了。

0030.en: With one hand, he made calculations. With the other, he manipulated the formation's patterns, instantly spreading the blast's focused power to all corners of the formation.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 只见他一只手掐指推算，另一只手拨弄阵纹，瞬间就将原本作用一点的爆炸之威疏散到了阵法四处。

0030.en: Once the explosion was scattered, its power was reduced several times.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 爆炸一分散，威力陡减数倍。

0030.en: The formation, which should have been broken, remained unharmed. It even used the moment the mirror shattered to swallow Lu Yuanchun and Zhao Xuhe.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 原本会被破开的阵法自然也安然无恙，甚至抓住金光宝镜破碎的空隙，一举吞没了陆元淳和赵旭河。

0030.en: Zhao Xuhe was turned into a dried corpse before he could even scream.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 赵旭河甚至都来不及惨叫，瞬间就化作了干尸。

0030.en: "Impossible! This thief is a formation master!?"
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: “不可能！此贼居然是阵法师！？”

0030.en: Lu Yuanchun's face was pale. He felt his flesh and blood pouring out like a flood from a broken dam. He was about to die just like Zhao Xuhe.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 陆元淳脸色惨白，只觉得一身血肉如同决堤洪水一般倾泻而出，眼看就要步赵旭河的后尘死于非命。

0030.en: "Blood-Transforming Divine Light..."
0030.speaker: 陆元淳
0030.cn: “化血神光”

0030.en: In this life-or-death moment, intense fear extinguished his anger. Lu Yuanchun stared with furious eyes but was helpless. Finally, as if accepting his fate, he lowered his head.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 生死攸关，强烈的恐惧迅速浇灭了怒火，陆元淳目眦欲裂却又无可奈何，终于还是认命般低下了头。

0030.en: Boom!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: “轰隆！”

0030.en: The next second, a jade pendant on Lu Yuanchun's waist shattered, releasing a brilliant light that instantly broke through Lv Yang's formation!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 下一秒，陆元淳腰间的一枚玉佩悄然破碎，旋即迸发出无穷华光，竟在一瞬间就破开了吕阳的大阵！

0030.en: Lv Yang's pupils shrank at the sight, and he looked up at the sky.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 吕阳见状瞳孔一缩，抬头望天。

0030.en: Where he looked, the brilliant light formed a giant, calm, and majestic face in the sky, tens of thousands of feet above him!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 目光所至，只见华光勾勒，竟在他的头顶，万丈高穹上化作了一张沉静肃穆，不怒自威的巨大面孔！

0030.en: The face showed no emotion. Its eyes were as bright as the sun and moon. Just one glance made Lv Yang's eyes sting and water. His true qi was reduced by seventy to eighty percent, and he almost fell from the sky.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 那张面孔看不出丝毫情绪，一双眼眸皓如日月，吕阳哪怕只是和他对视了一瞬，双眼就因刺痛而留下了泪水，全身真气更是被凭空削弱了七八成，差点维持不住遁光，让吕阳从空中跌落下去。

0030.en: The face looked down, its voice like thunder from a mountain:
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 面孔俯瞰而下，声音如雷出山中：

0030.en: "Insolent!"
0030.speaker: 补天峰主
0030.cn: “放肆！”

0030.en: The voice was not loud, but it sounded like a divine law, making Lv Yang a being hated by the world. The surrounding spiritual energy even seemed to flee from him.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 声音不大，却仿佛口含天宪，让吕阳成为了天地都厌恶的存在，周围的灵气甚至都避之不及般远离。

0030.en: The invisible gaze seemed to press down on Lv Yang with the weight of a mountain.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 无形的视线，竟仿佛真的有泰山之重般压在了吕阳的身上。

0030.en: The ground around him began to crack.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 周围的地面甚至都因此寸寸开裂。

0030.en: Such a scene naturally alarmed the entire Sky Mending Peak.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 如此场面，自然是惊动了整个补天峰。

0030.en: Disciples in seclusion all over Sky Mending Peak were awakened. They walked out of their cave residences and looked at the giant face in the sky with fear.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 一时间，补天峰上下，无数闭关的弟子纷纷惊醒，走出洞府，看着天上的巨大面孔，面露惊恐之色。

0030.en: "Greetings, Peak Master!"
0030.speaker: 陌生人
0030.cn: “见过峰主！”

0030.en: "Greetings, Peak Master!"
0030.speaker: 陌生人
0030.cn: “见过峰主！”

0030.en: Some of the older disciples of Sky Mending Peak recognized the face. Their scalps tingled, and they immediately knelt on the ground, kowtowing repeatedly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 有补天峰的老弟子认出了面孔的容貌，顿时感觉头皮发麻，二话不说便跪伏在地，不断地叩首行礼。

0030.en: The Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 补天峰主！

0030.en: Lv Yang finally knew the identity of Zhao Xuhe's mysterious master: the Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak, a Foundation Establishment Perfected Being who controlled one of the Four Inner Peaks of the Chu Sheng Sect!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 吕阳总算知道了赵旭河背后那位神秘师尊的身份，补天峰主，初圣宗执掌内门四峰之一的筑基真人！

0030.en: Rumble!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: “轰隆隆！”

0030.en: As the voice fell, the formation diagram that Lv Yang had painstakingly created in his previous life began to crumble. Large sections of the formation patterns exploded on the spot.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 话音落下，吕阳上一世苦心炼就的阵图顿时开始土崩瓦解，大片的阵纹甚至直接原地炸开。

0030.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang couldn't help but show a helpless expression.
0030.speaker: 吕阳
0030.cn: 见到这一幕，吕阳不禁露出一抹无奈。

0030.en: The gap between Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment was far beyond his imagination. The result of his twenty years of hard work could not even withstand two words from a Foundation Establishment Perfected Being!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 炼气和筑基之间的差距完全超出了他的想象，他二十年的心血成果，竟然还不敌筑基真人的两个字！

0030.en: A single soft rebuke could be so devastating?
0030.speaker: 吕阳
0030.cn: 一声轻斥，竟至于斯？

0031.en: Chapter 31: A Single Sword Strike to Cleave the Sky
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 第31章 一剑斩长空

0031.en: A short time ago, at the summit mansion of Sky Mending Peak.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 不久前，补天峰，峰顶洞府。

0031.en: Unlike the rest of Sky Mending Peak, which was full of people, the summit was quiet. Only clouds moved here, far above the noisy world.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 迥异于补天峰中的人来人往，红尘百态，峰顶处唯有云起云落，超然物外，仿佛跳出了这纷扰人间。

0031.en: On a cliff, two figures were looking down at the sea of clouds below.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 而在一处崖前，有两道身影正在俯瞰着下方的云海。

0031.en: One of them had white hair but a youthful face. He wore a black and white Daoist robe and held a horsetail whisk, looking just like the kind old immortal from mortal stories.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 其中一人鹤发童颜，身穿黑白道袍，手里握着一柄拂尘，恰如凡间话本中常见的慈眉善目的老神仙。

0031.en: The other man, who looked middle-aged, said with a teasing expression:
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 另一人却是中年模样，正一脸促狭地说道：

0031.en: "Sky Mender, I heard you've been looking for a husband for your daughter recently?"
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “补天，听说你最近在为你那女儿选婿？”

0031.en: "What? Are you interested?" The Sky Mending Peak Master turned to the middle-aged man. "If it were one of your disciples, he would be a good match for my Qian'er."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “怎么？你有兴趣？”补天峰主侧身看向中年男子：“如果是你门下的弟子，倒也算是倩儿的良配。”

0031.en: "Better not."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “还是算了。”

0031.en: The middle-aged man shook his head. "I know my disciples. They are all for show and no substance. They couldn't handle your daughter. You should look for someone else."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: 中年男子摇了摇头：“我的弟子我知道，都是银样镴枪头，可受不了你那位女儿，还是另请高明吧。”

0031.en: "Forget it then." The Sky Mending Peak Master shook his head. "I already have someone in mind. He has trained hard for three lifetimes and has a strong foundation. He has a 30% chance of reaching the Foundation Establishment realm. Also, after learning Panlong Zhenren's 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art,' he is very powerful... in bed."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “那就算了。”补天峰主摇了摇头：“反正我早已有了相中之人，此人苦修三世，功德底蕴俱佳，未来有三成机会炼就道基不说，而且学会了盘龙真人的《九变化龙决》后，床上亦有真龙之威.”

0031.en: "Panlong Zhenren? That doesn't sound right."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “盘龙真人？不对吧。”

0031.en: The middle-aged man did a quick calculation with his fingers, then shook his head. "Panlong Island has disappeared. Someone else has already taken the opportunity, and it wasn't one of your disciples."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: 中年男子闻言掐指一算，随后摇头道：“盘龙岛不翼而飞，机缘已经被人所得，却不是你家的弟子。”

0031.en: "He will be soon."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “很快就是了。”

0031.en: The Sky Mending Peak Master said calmly, "I have already figured out who stole the opportunity. I've sent Yuan Chun with some men to handle it. Things will be back to normal soon."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: 补天峰主淡淡道：“我已经算出是何人强夺机缘，让元淳带人前去处理了，不用多久就会重归正轨。”

0031.en: "Tsk, tsk. You really show no mercy." The middle-aged man shook his head. "The path to immortality is hard. Why be so harsh on the younger generation?"
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “啧啧啧，你还真是不给活路。”中年男子闻言摇了摇头：“仙道难求，又何必对一些小辈过于苛刻？”

0031.en: "You should give them a little hope now and then. After all, the Holy Sect needs new blood."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “偶尔还是要给他们一点希望的，毕竟圣宗也需要新鲜血液。”

0031.en: "I don't need you to teach me."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “用不着你教我。”

0031.en: The Sky Mending Peak Master sneered. "If it were just that, I might not have acted. But I've calculated that the person who took Panlong Zhenren's opportunity is unusual."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: 补天峰主冷笑一声：“若只是如此，我未必会出手，可我算出那夺走盘龙真人机缘的人有些不一般。”

0031.en: As he spoke, the Peak Master's tone became more surprised. "This person has only been in the sect for a few years. He made a fortune from the substitute puppet incident, cultivated the Blood-Transforming Divine Light, forged a Sword Pellet, and mastered the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion's techniques. And he's at the sixth level of Qi Refining."
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: 说到这里，补天峰主的语气也多出了几分惊异：“此人入门不过数年，不仅在前几年的替死阴傀风波中大赚了一笔，还修炼了化血神光，炼就了剑丸，掌握了玉枢剑阁的剑诀，炼气六层修为.”

0031.en: "Oh? That impressive?"
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “哦？如此了得？”

0031.en: The middle-aged man was surprised. He also made some calculations and then said, "I didn't expect our Holy Sect to have such a talent."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: 中年男子听完一脸意外，随后也默默掐算了片刻，这才感叹道：“没有想到我圣宗还出了如此人材。”

0031.en: After saying that, the middle-aged man was clearly interested.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 说完，中年男子显然来了兴趣。

0031.en: "Come, show me where he is. Let's see what kind of talent he is. If he is good quality, maybe he can be refined into a top-grade treasure pill."
0031.speaker: 中年男子
0031.cn: “来来来，你替我指点方位，且看看是何等根骨，若是品质不错，或许可以炼制出一枚上好的宝丹。”

0031.en: "That's easy, he's right there... huh?"
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “这个简单，就在那里嗯？”

0031.en: The Sky Mending Peak Master was smiling, but as he pointed and looked into the distance, his smile slowly disappeared.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 补天峰主原本脸上还带着笑容，然而就在他点出方位，举目远眺之后，他的笑容却渐渐收敛了起来。

0031.en: "BOOM!"
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: “轰隆！”

0031.en: As the Peak Master's gaze fell, the entire Sky Mending Peak began to shake as if an earth dragon was turning over. Rocks even rolled off the edges into the sea of clouds.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 随着补天峰主的视线落下，偌大的补天峰仿佛在经历地龙翻身一般，边缘地区甚至有山石滚落云海。

0031.en: In a mansion on Sky Mending Peak, Liu Xin lay on the ground, so scared he didn't dare to breathe, afraid of attracting the Peak Master's attention.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 补天峰内的某一座洞府里，刘信匍匐在地上，惊恐到连大气都不敢喘一下，生怕引来补天峰主注意。

0031.en: "He's not looking for me, not for me..."
0031.speaker: 刘信
0031.cn: “不是找我的，不是找我的”

0031.en: Liu Xin desperately repeated this in his mind, trying to suppress his guilt and fear.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 刘信拼命在心中自语，压制心虚和恐惧。

0031.en: After all, that was a Foundation Establishment master. Even a glance could kill a Qi Refining cultivator, and his Myriad Souls Banner contained the master's son.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 毕竟那可是一位筑基真人，哪怕是一道视线都足以镇杀炼气境，而自己的万灵幡内就藏着他的儿子。

0031.en: If discovered, he would be doomed forever!
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 一旦被发现，必然是万劫不复！

0031.en: "Don't be afraid. I have a divine talisman protecting me. He can't find me..."
0031.speaker: 刘信
0031.cn: “不用怕，我有神符庇佑，他算不到我的.”

0031.en: Liu Xin trembled as he clutched a talisman he carried.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 刘信颤抖着身子，用力握住了随身携带的一枚符咒。

0031.en: "Yuan Chun pays his respects to Master."
0031.speaker: 陆元淳
0031.cn: “元淳拜见师尊。”

0031.en: Lu Yuanchun coughed up blood and bowed to the face in the sky to ask for forgiveness. He felt no joy at surviving, only a cold feeling in his heart.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 陆元淳一边咳血，一边对着天上的面孔叩首请罪，却没有半点劫后余生的喜悦，反而心中一片冰凉。

0031.en: The jade pendant that broke Lv Yang's formation at the last moment contained a sliver of the Peak Master's divine sense. It was the greatest protection for a Foundation Establishment disciple like him. Because it was hard to make, once used, it was nearly impossible to replace. It was like one of his lives.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 最后关头破开吕阳大阵的的玉佩，其中封存的乃是补天峰主的一道神识，乃是他这种筑基弟子最大的依仗，因为制作不易，所以一旦用掉，几乎不可能再补回来，可以说等同于他的一条性命。

0031.en: And now, it was gone.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 结果现在，没了。

0031.en: Furthermore, not only had he failed to help Junior Brother Zhao get the opportunity back, but he also failed to protect him from an accidental death. It was a total failure.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 再加上此番自己非但没有帮助赵师弟夺回机缘，甚至还没有护住他，让他意外身死，可谓大败亏输。

0031.en: With all these failures, his path to immortality was now hopeless.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 数罪并罚，今生已然仙途无望。

0031.en: "This disciple was incompetent."
0031.speaker: 陆元淳
0031.cn: “弟子无能。”

0031.en: Lu Yuanchun dared not speak or even explain. He could only bow to the ground and wait for his master to decide his fate after killing Lv Yang.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 陆元淳不敢言语，甚至不敢解释，只能选择叩首伏地，等师尊杀了那吕阳之后再来决定自己的命运。

0031.en: Zing—!
0031.speaker: 旁白

0031.en: Just then, Lu Yuanchun suddenly heard the sound of a sword. It was not loud, but it was clear and refreshing, impossible to ignore.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 就在这时，陆元淳却突然听到了一声剑鸣，声音不大，却格外清澈，沁人心脾，让人无法将之忽略。

0031.en: At first, the sound was like a gentle stream. But as time passed, the stream became a rushing river, and the sound grew louder until it was a deafening roar that echoed through the heavens and earth.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 最初，那声音就仿佛清泉流水一般，叮咚作响，然而随着时间流逝，水流变得越来越湍急激烈，声音也变得越来越振聋发聩，到最后赫然变成了江河咆哮般的巨响，在这天地间轰然回荡开来。

0031.en: Lu Yuanchun subconsciously raised his head.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 陆元淳下意识地抬起了头。

0031.en: Then he saw a figure in mid-air, standing tall under the master's gaze. His back was straight, and he stared back without fear.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 然后他就看到了半空中，一道身影在真人的注视下昂首而立，腰背挺得笔直，毫不畏惧地与之对视。

0031.en: Beneath his feet was a flowing river of sword energy.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他的脚下，是一条奔涌的剑气长河。

0031.en: The river was blood-red and filled with a monstrous killing aura. But it did not spread. Instead, it shrank, flowing back into a small, exquisite Sword Pellet.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 河水猩红，动荡间带着滔天煞气，却没有扩散，而是不断缩小，回流，最后落入一枚玲珑剑丸之中。

0031.en: "What is he trying to do?"
0031.speaker: 陆元淳
0031.cn: “他想做什么？”

0031.en: Lu Yuanchun swallowed. He had already guessed, but he couldn't believe it. How could there be someone so bold, so ignorant of his own limits?
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 陆元淳咽了咽口水，他其实已经猜到了，可他却不敢去相信，世间岂会有那般大胆，不识天数之人？

0031.en: At the same time, the face in the sky seemed to realize something, and it frowned:
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 与此同时，天上的面孔似乎也意识到了什么，眉头一皱：

0031.en: "You want to attack me?"
0031.speaker: 补天峰主
0031.cn: “你想要对我出手？”

0031.en: Lv Yang's expression was indifferent. The Sword Pellet swallowed the river of blood, its sharp edge pointing at the sky.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 吕阳神色漠然，剑丸吞尽血河，锋芒直指穹天：

0031.en: "Please enlighten me, Senior."
0031.speaker: 吕阳
0031.cn: “请前辈赐教。”

0031.en: The face said nothing, as if it was not worth a reply.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 面孔没有言语，似乎不屑回答。

0031.en: The next moment, Lv Yang saw a black dot appear in the sky. It quickly grew larger, descending upon him with the force of the heavens.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 下一秒，吕阳就看到穹天之上，一道黑点陡然浮现，随后迅速扩张，以倾天之势朝着自己缓缓落下。

0031.en: When the black dot got closer, Lv Yang could finally see it clearly. It was a finger, with visible skin texture, falling from an unknown height.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 直到黑点近了，吕阳才勉强看清全貌，赫然是一根不知从何其高处落下，肌肤纹路清晰可见的手指。

0031.en: Lv Yang understood instantly. This was the answer:
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 吕阳顿时福至心灵，这就是对方的回答：

0031.en: An ant cannot know the height of the heavens.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 蝼蚁，岂知天高？

0031.en: In an instant, an intense sense of crisis swept over him, almost freezing his thoughts, like an ant that had just crawled out of its hole and suddenly saw the bright sky.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 霎时间，剧烈的危机感席卷全身，几乎冻结吕阳的思考，仿佛爬出洞穴的蝼蚁陡然见到了青天白日。

0031.en: "You want to crush me with one finger???"
0031.speaker: 吕阳
0031.cn: “想要一指按死我？？？”

0031.en: Lv Yang took a deep breath, and all the true qi in his body began to burn fiercely. He activated the Life-Killing Curse from his second life at full power.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 吕阳深深吐气，随后全身真气突然开始剧烈燃烧了起来，第二世获得的杀生咒在此刻被他全力催动。

0031.en: At this moment, he forgot about life and death.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这一刻，生死抛诸脑后。

0031.en: Lv Yang's heart was filled with only rage.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 吕阳心中只剩下了满腔的愤怒。

0031.en: In this life, I did not compete or fight. I focused on cultivation. But you calculated my fate, sent people to steal my opportunity, and when they failed, you came to kill me yourself.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这一世我不争不抢，一心修行，却被你算定因果，派人来抢我机缘，抢夺不成居然还亲自出手杀我。

0031.en: You talk about the cause and effect of techniques, about predetermined destinies.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 说什么功法因果，讲什么机缘早定。

0031.en: Am I destined to be a workhorse, and you destined to be high above?
0031.speaker: 吕阳
0031.cn: 难道我就注定当一个牛马，你就注定高高在上？

0031.en: "Kill!"
0031.speaker: 吕阳

0031.en: Lv Yang opened his mouth, and the true qi in his chest turned into a long cry. His rage became a sword light that shot straight into the sky.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 吕阳张口，胸中真气化作了一声长啸，满腔怒火酿成了一道剑光，不偏不倚，直斩长空。

0031.en: A silent collision, like a candle flame flickering. After a brief moment of brilliance, darkness consumed Lv Yang's vision and his consciousness.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 一次无声的碰撞，宛若烛火明灭，短暂的灿烂过后，黑暗就淹没了吕阳的视线，也淹没了他的意识。

0032.en: Chapter 32: Target, Liu Xin!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 第32章 目标，刘信！

0032.en: [You were crushed to death by the Peak Master of Sky Mending Peak with a single finger.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【你被补天峰主一指按死了。】

0032.en: [Current remaining pages in The Hundred Lives Book: 95]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【当前百世书残留页数：95】

0032.en: [Starting a new life, you can choose one of the following rewards from your previous life:]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【重开一世，你可以从前世的以下收获中选择一项：

0032.en: One: Treasures.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 一：宝物。

0032.en: Two: Cultivation.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 二：修为。

0032.en: Three: Lifespan.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 三：寿命。

0032.en: Four: Forfeit all rewards and awaken a random talent based on your previous life's experience.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 四：放弃所有收获，根据前世经历随机觉醒一门天赋】

0032.en: "Those whose names are called, come before me."
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “被叫到名字的人走到我面前。”

0032.en: Liu Xin's voice came from the stage, but Lv Yang remained dazed for a long time, his mind still lingering on the furious sword strike from his past life.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 台上传来刘信的声音，吕阳这一次却久久没有回过神，心神似乎还停留在上一世那含怒而发的一剑。

0032.en: "An ant trying to shake a great tree... That's not wrong."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “蚍蜉撼大树，倒也没错”

0032.en: Lv Yang let out a long breath. Although he had witnessed the gap between himself and a Foundation Establishment Master, he was not discouraged. Instead, his fighting spirit grew stronger.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 吕阳深深吐出一口气，尽管亲眼目睹了和筑基真人之间的差距，他却依旧没有气馁，反而斗志愈盛。

0032.en: With The Hundred Lives Book, whatever doesn't kill him will only make him stronger.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 身怀【百世书】，打不倒自己的，只会让自己更加强大。

0032.en: It's just a matter of starting over.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 无非是从头再来罢了。

0032.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang looked at the interface of The Hundred Lives Book again. In his previous life, he had focused solely on bitter cultivation and had nothing to show for it except for reaching the sixth level of Qi Refining.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 想到这里，吕阳再度看向【百世书】的界面，前世他一意苦修，除了炼气六层的修为之外别无他物。

0032.en: However, he could not choose cultivation.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 然而他不能选择修为。

0032.en: After all, as long as the hidden danger of the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art" remained, he could not practice this technique, or it would be like carrying a ticking time bomb.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 毕竟只要《九变化龙决》的隐患还在，他就不能修炼这门功法，否则相当于随身背了一个定时炸弹。

0032.en: "I choose talent."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “我选择天赋。”

0032.en: [Calculating your experiences from the previous life...]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【正在为你结算前世经历.】

0032.en: [After your death, the story of how you drew your sword to strike a Foundation Establishment Master spread. Countless people mocked you for overestimating your abilities, but they did not know that your efforts were not entirely in vain.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【你身死后，拔剑斩筑基的事迹被人传播，无数人嘲讽你不自量力，却不知道你其实并非毫无建树。】

0032.en: [Although you still failed to harm the Foundation Establishment Master in the slightest, at the very moment you were about to be crushed, you miraculously broke through a bottleneck in your swordsmanship. This forced the Sky Mending Peak Master to use a bit more strength to kill you. Afterwards, he remarked that although you were just an ant, you had a few tricks up your sleeve.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【虽然你依旧没有伤到筑基真人分毫，但就在你即将被按死的刹那，你奇迹般地突破了剑术上的瓶颈，让补天峰主不得不加了一分力气才将你按死，事后感慨你虽然只是蝼蚁，但还有两下子。】

0032.en: [You have awakened the purple talent: A Few Tricks.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【你觉醒了紫色天赋·有两下子。】

0032.en: [A Few Tricks: No matter how terrifying the attack, as long as it is within the limits of your ability, you can handle it with ease for two exchanges.]
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 【有两下子：无论遇到多么可怕的攻击，只要在你的能力极限内，你都可以挥洒自如地应付两下子。】

0032.en: "What kind of talent is this?"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “这是什么天赋？”

0032.en: Lv Yang frowned. At first glance, it seemed like a divine skill of absolute defense, but the "within the limits of your ability" in the description made it less impressive.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 吕阳皱眉，乍看之下这好像是一个绝对防御的神技，但天赋描述中的“能力极限内”又有点打折扣。

0032.en: But he quickly stopped worrying about it. After all, he had chosen the talent only to avoid the hidden danger of practicing the "Nine Transformations Dragon Art" from his past life. A strong talent would be great, but a weak one didn't matter. More importantly, Lv Yang was concerned about finding a way to avoid the Sky Mending Peak Master's divination.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 不过很快他就不纠结了，毕竟之所以选择天赋也只是为了避开前世修炼《九变化龙决》的隐患，天赋强那自然最好，弱也无所谓。比起这个，吕阳更关心有没有办法可以避开补天峰主的推算。

0032.en: "If it really doesn't work, I'll have to give up on the 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art'."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “实在不行，就只能放弃《九变化龙决》.”

0032.en: "Lv Yang."
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “吕阳。”

0032.en: "...Here!"
0032.speaker: 吕阳

0032.en: Liu Xin's voice from the stage brought Lv Yang back to his senses. He hurried onto the high platform, and just as in his previous lives, Liu Xin assigned him to the Joyful Union Hall.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 台上刘信的声音让吕阳回过神来，赶忙快步走上高台，而刘信也和前几世一样将他分配到了合欢殿。

0032.en: The next second, Lv Yang was suddenly stunned.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 下一秒，吕阳突然一愣。

0032.en: "Wait a minute... I remember that Liu Xin refined a powerful figure into my Myriad Spirits Banner. It was very likely a true disciple of the Chu Sheng Sect."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “等等.我记得，我的万灵幡内好像被刘信炼化进了一个厉害角色，极有可能是圣宗的真传弟子。”

0032.en: "Something is not right."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: 这不对啊。

0032.en: I just practiced one technique and the Sky Mending Peak Master traced me through karma and came knocking. But Liu Xin killed a true disciple!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 自己只是修炼了一门功法，就被补天峰主推算因果，顺藤摸瓜找上了门，刘信可是弄死了一位真传！

0032.en: "How is he still alive?"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: 他怎么还能活着？

0032.en: At this thought, Lv Yang's eyes suddenly lit up, and he stared intently at Liu Xin on the stage.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 想到这里，吕阳的双眼陡然精光大放，直勾勾地看向了台上的刘信。

0032.en: "That's it! The only explanation is that he has a wondrous treasure that can obscure karma, making it impossible for a Foundation Establishment Master to divine any information about him!"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “是了，唯一的解释就是他的手里还有一件可以蒙蔽因果，让筑基真人推算不到他任何信息的奇宝！”

0032.en: In an instant, Lv Yang's mind raced with possibilities. He immediately changed his plan and replicated his actions from his first life, directly killing Yu Suzhen in public and successfully attracting Liu Xin's attention.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 一瞬间，吕阳的心思全活泛了起来。紧接着，他便改变方针，转而复刻了第一世的行动，直接当众超死玉素真，顺利引来了刘信的注意。

0032.en: He obtained half of the Innate Dao Scripture from Liu Xin.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 从刘信手里获得半本先天道书。

0032.en: He went into closed-door cultivation.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 闭关修炼。

0032.en: Then, just as he expected, on a dark and windy night, a well-prepared Liu Xin came to the entrance of his cave residence, humming a little tune.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 随后也不出他所料，在某一个月黑风高的深夜里，准备妥当的刘信哼着小曲，来到了他的洞府门前。

0032.en: "Junior Brother Lv, are you there?"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “吕师弟，在吗？”

0032.en: Lv Yang did not speak.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 吕阳没有说话。

0032.en: Seeing this, Liu Xin was not surprised. Instead, a cold smile appeared on his face. He patiently opened his storage bag and took out formation flags, setting them up in the surroundings.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘信见状也不例外，反而露出了一丝冷笑，旋即耐心地打开储物袋，取出一面面阵旗布置在了四周。

0032.en: These were formations used for soundproofing and creating illusions, ensuring that no matter what happened inside, no trace would be detected outside. Liu Xin had done similar things many times, and no one had ever connected them to him. Even if someone were to use karmic divination...
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这些都是隔音和制造幻象用的阵法，可以确保无论里面发生什么事情，外面都不会察觉到半点痕迹。类似的事情刘信做过很多遍了，至今没有人会联想到他的身上，甚至就算有人用因果推算

0032.en: Thinking of this, Liu Xin touched the pocket inside his robe and smiled confidently.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 想到这里，刘信摸了摸怀中的口袋，自信一笑。

0032.en: Even if someone used karmic divination, it would be useless!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 就算有人用因果推算，也没用！

0032.en: Soon, once the formation was set up, Liu Xin no longer hid his intentions. He unleashed his true qi and split open Lv Yang's cave residence with his sword, then strolled inside.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 很快，等到阵法布置完毕，刘信便不再隐藏，直接爆发真气，一剑劈开吕阳的洞府，而后踱步进入。

0032.en: "Junior Brother Lv, stop hiding. A talent like you is exactly what I need... !?"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “吕师弟，别躲了，师兄我就需要你这样的人材.！？”

0032.en: Liu Xin's voice stopped abruptly.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘信的声音戛然而止。

0032.en: Inside the cave residence, Lv Yang was sitting on a cushion, looking at him with a faint smile, not at all like someone who should have cultivated a partial Innate Dao Scripture!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 只见洞府内，吕阳正端坐在蒲团上，似笑非笑地看着他，全然没有修炼了半部先天道书应有的模样！

0032.en: "...Something's wrong!"
0032.speaker: 刘信

0032.en: In an instant, Liu Xin's pupils shrank, and a banner had already appeared in his hand.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 霎时间，刘信瞳孔骤缩，手中已然出现了一面旗幡。

0032.en: But it was too late.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 然而为时已晚。

0032.en: The next second, a red light flashed. Liu Xin felt most of his true qi and flesh-and-blood essence being instantly drained, and he stumbled and fell to the ground!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 下一秒，随着一道红光乍现，刘信只觉得全身真气血肉瞬间被抽空大半，一个踉跄竟摔倒在了地上！

0032.en: The Bloodbath Sky River Sword Formation Diagram!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 血洗天河剑阵图！

0032.en: Lv Yang had set up the formation diagram at the entrance of his cave long ago. By forcing his way in, Liu Xin had walked right into a trap and was easily captured.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 吕阳早早就将阵图布置在了洞府门口，所以刘信的强闯洞府无异于自投罗网，自然是被他轻松拿下。

0032.en: "Senior Brother, I have been waiting for you for a long time."
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “师兄，等候多时了。”

0032.en: Looking at the fallen Liu Xin, Lv Yang recalled how he had been tricked and killed by him in his first life. A cold sneer appeared on his face. You have finally fallen into my hands!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 看着倒地的刘信，回想起第一世被他骗得死去活来的自己，吕阳当即冷笑一声，终究是落我手里了！

0032.en: If we switched places, I would show you what cruelty is!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 如果我俩角色互换，我会让你知道什么叫残忍！

0032.en: "Who are you!?"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “你到底是谁！？”

0032.en: Liu Xin lay paralyzed on the ground, unable to muster any strength. He couldn't understand what was happening. He had been tricked? By a new disciple who had just joined?
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘信瘫在地上，提不起半分力气，却完全搞不明白现状，他被算计了？还是被一个刚入门的新弟子？

0032.en: Impossible! Absolutely impossible!
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 不可能！绝对不可能！

0032.en: "Are you a spy from a righteous sect? Wait, don't kill me, I can be useful to you... I have a superior Dao scripture that can help you reach Foundation Establishment!"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “你是正道门派的奸细？等等，别杀我，我对你有用.我有一门上乘道书，可助你成就筑基真人！”

0032.en: At this critical moment, Liu Xin threw caution to the wind and revealed his biggest secret.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 危急关头，刘信也顾不得什么，直接说出了自己最大的秘密。

0032.en: "I also have a magic treasure. Inside it is a true disciple of the Chu Sheng Sect. He knows many secrets of the... no, the Chu Sheng Demonic Sect."
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “除此之外我还有一件法宝，里面藏着一位圣宗真传，他知道很多圣宗.不对，初圣魔门的隐秘。”

0032.en: "If you let me go, all of this will be yours..."
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “只要你放了我，这些都是你的”

0032.en: Before Liu Xin could finish, Lv Yang activated the Blood-Transforming Divine Light, completely sucking him dry until only a human skin remained. "Fool. If I kill you, it's all mine anyway!"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: 刘信话音未落，吕阳就直接运转化血神光，将他彻底吸成了一张人皮：“糊涂，杀了你照样是我的！”

0032.en: "Even you are mine!"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “连你也是我的！”

0032.en: Then, Lv Yang reached out and grabbed the Innate Qi Myriad Spirits Banner. He shook the banner and swept it over Liu Xin's body.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 紧接着，吕阳便伸手一招，将先天一炁万灵幡抓了过来，而后晃动旗幡，对着刘信的尸身便是一扫。

0032.en: In a previous life, he had read the Innate Dao Scripture, so he naturally knew how to activate this treasure.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 上上世他读过先天道书，自然也知道如何催动此宝。

0032.en: Liu Xin's body fell into the banner and immediately evaporated into qi. It circulated within the banner for a long time before Lv Yang shook it again, making the body reappear.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘信尸身落入幡中，立刻蒸腾炁化，就这样在幡上运化了许久，才被吕阳一抖幡面，重新显化出来。

0032.en: However, the reappeared Liu Xin had become a banner spirit of the Myriad Spirits Banner. Lv Yang had deliberately preserved his memories, so when Liu Xin revived, he looked at Lv Yang in disbelief. "Junior Brother Lv... impossible! How could you know how to activate the Myriad Spirits Banner?"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: 然而再次显化出来的刘信已然变成了万灵幡上的幡灵，吕阳还特地保留了他的记忆，因此当刘信复苏之后，顿时难以置信地看向了吕阳：“吕师弟不可能！你怎么可能懂得如何催动万灵幡？”

0032.en: "What did you call me?"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: “你叫我什么？”

0032.en: Lv Yang sneered. "Do I need to teach you how a banner spirit should address its master? Or do you wish for your soul to be scattered?"
0032.speaker: 吕阳
0032.cn: 吕阳冷笑一声：“需要我来教教你身为幡灵，对幡主应该是什么态度吗？还是说你想要魂飞魄散了？”

0032.en: "My lord, spare me! Liu Xin pays his respects to the master!"
0032.speaker: 刘信
0032.cn: “大人饶命！刘信见过大人！”

0032.en: Liu Xin's knees instantly went weak, and he knelt on the ground. Although he had all his memories from before his death, he couldn't feel any hatred toward Lv Yang, who had killed him with his own hands.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘信瞬间双腿一软，跪倒在地，尽管还有生前一应记忆，却无法对亲手杀了他的吕阳生出半点恨意。

0032.en: In every thought, there was only absolute loyalty.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 每一个念头里，都只有绝对的忠诚。

0032.en: This was the tyrannical power of the Myriad Spirits Banner. At first glance, the banner spirits seemed no different from living people, but in reality, their minds had long been seized, and they had lost their true autonomy.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这便是万灵幡的霸道之处，幡灵乍看之下和生人无异，可实际上早已被夺取心志，难以真正自主了。

0033.en: Chapter 33: The Innate Primal-Unity Qi Divine Talisman
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 第33章 先天混元一炁神符

0033.en: After a long time, Lv Yang held a yellowed paper talisman in his hand, looking at it with great interest.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 许久过后，吕阳手里捏着一枚泛黄的符纸，饶有兴趣地打量着。

0033.en: After refining Liu Xin into a banner spirit, Lv Yang made him tell his life story, including how he trapped and killed Chen Xinan, and how he avoided the divination of the Foundation Establishment master.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 将刘信炼化为幡灵后，吕阳便让他将自己的生平详细说了一遍，包括他是如何坑杀成陈信安，又是如何避开筑基真人推算的。

0033.en: "The Innate Primal-Unity Qi Divine Talisman?"
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “先天混元一炁神符？”

0033.en: "That is the one." Liu Xin bowed his head to the ground and said respectfully, "This talisman was left by the Innate Daoist. As long as you carry it, you can avoid karmic divination."
0033.speaker: 刘信
0033.cn: “正是此符。”刘信伏地叩首，恭敬道：“此符乃是先天道人所留，只要随身携带就能避开因果推算。”

0033.en: Lv Yang nodded with satisfaction and gently shook the Myriad Spirits Banner. A handsome young man in a black robe came down from it. The man was startled to see Lv Yang, then his body trembled as he looked at Liu Xin, who had become a banner spirit.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 吕阳满意地点了点头，接着又轻抖万灵幡，这一次从幡上下来的，是一位身穿黑袍的俊朗青年，来人看到吕阳之后先是一愣，紧接着又看向了旁边已经变成幡灵的刘信，身子顿时颤抖了起来。

0033.en: "Haha... hahaha! You finally got what you deserve!"
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “哈哈.哈哈哈！你也有今天！”

0033.en: Chen Xinan looked up and laughed, then turned to Liu Xin. "I thought you were incompetent, but I never imagined you were this useless."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: 陈信安仰天大笑，随后看向刘信：“我本以为你已经很无能了，没想到你的无能还要超出我的想象。”

0033.en: "You were turned into a banner spirit by someone else?"
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “被人反炼化成了幡灵？”

0033.en: "How did you manage that?"
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “你是怎么做到的？”

0033.en: Faced with Chen Xinan's mockery, Liu Xin just lowered his head and did not answer. Only then did Chen Xinan turn to look at Lv Yang.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: “.”面对陈信安的嘲讽，刘信只是低着头，全然没有回答的意思，陈信安这才转身看向了吕阳。

0033.en: "You are truly a disciple of our Holy Sect." Chen Xinan praised, clapping his hands with a smile. "Junior Brother, I won't ask you to release me for reincarnation. Since you killed Liu Xin, you have avenged me... How about this? I will give you a hidden treasure as a reward."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “不愧是我圣宗弟子。”陈信安开口就是一声赞叹，抚掌笑道：“这位师弟，我也不求你放我离去转生，而且你能杀了刘信，就算是解了我的心头大恨.这样，我送你一座密藏，作为报答如何？”

0033.en: "I am a banner spirit now, so you can naturally see if I am telling the truth or not."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “我如今也是幡灵，是非真假你自然能看透。”

0033.en: "The treasure is on an island deep in the Sea of Clouds, called Gourd Island. Your cultivation is still low, so it's best to go after you reach the peak of Qi Refining..."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “那座密藏位于云海深处的一座岛屿内，名为葫芦岛，你现在修为尚低，最好是炼气大圆满后再去”

0033.en: "No need."
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “不用了。”

0033.en: Lv Yang showed no interest and shook his head indifferently. "Senior Brother Chen, we are both disciples of the Holy Sect. Why pretend?"
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: 吕阳闻言没有露出半点心动之色，漠然地摇了摇头：“陈师兄，大家都是圣宗弟子，何必装模做样？”

0033.en: "...Junior Brother, you have misunderstood me."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: “.师弟真是误会我了。”

0033.en: Chen Xinan sighed softly. "Although most disciples of our Holy Sect don't care about fellowship, we always repay our debts. We are not heartless villains."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: 陈信安幽幽一叹：“我们圣宗弟子虽然大多不讲同门情谊，但也是有恩必报，绝非无情无义的坏人.”

0033.en: "Stop trying to make yourself look good." Lv Yang interrupted him without hesitation, sneering, "Are there any good people among the Holy Sect disciples? Every single one who survives is a bad person! Senior Brother Chen, don't waste your energy. I will not go to your hidden treasure."
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “少特么给自己脸上贴金了。”吕阳毫不犹豫地打断了陈信安的话，冷笑道：“圣宗弟子里哪里有好人？能活下来的，有一个算一个都是坏人！陈师兄你不用白费力气，我是不会去你那密藏的。”

0033.en: Lv Yang was extremely wary of this true disciple.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 对于这位真传师兄，吕阳心中忌惮极深。

0033.en: If there was really a hidden treasure, why hadn't Liu Xin, who held the Myriad Spirits Banner for so many years, gone after it? He was most likely afraid that Chen Xinan would turn the tables on him!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 如果真有什么密藏，刘信手持万灵幡这么多年为什么没有去谋取？十有八九也是怕陈信安反客为主！

0033.en: This person had a deep background and unpredictable methods, completely different from someone like Liu Xin. Even as a banner spirit, he could not be fully trusted.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 此人背景太深，手段莫测，和刘信之辈截然不同，哪怕成了幡灵也不可尽信。

0033.en: Chen Xinan's expression changed slightly. "Then why did you summon me?"
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: 陈信安面色微变：“那你唤我出来，到底意欲何为？”

0033.en: "Just for an experiment."
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “做个实验罢了。”

0033.en: Lv Yang's tone was calm, but Chen Xinan sensed danger from it and quickly said, "Wait, wait... I also know where to find a Foundation Establishment opportunity..."
0033.speaker: 陈信安
0033.cn: 吕阳语气平淡，陈信安却从其中听出了危险，赶忙道：“等，等等.我还知道哪里有一个筑基机缘.”

0033.en: Boom!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 轰隆！

0033.en: The next moment, Lv Yang acted without hesitation, ignoring the so-called Foundation Establishment opportunity and directly shattering the true spirit of Chen Xinan that was refined in the Myriad Spirits Banner.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 下一秒，吕阳却毫不犹豫，不管不顾所谓的筑基机缘，直接拍散了陈信安被炼化在万灵幡上的真灵。

0033.en: "The master of Sky Mending Peak targeted me so much in my last life. This life, I'll beat his son to death to vent my anger. After a few more lives, when I reach Foundation Establishment, I'll go and kill him too!"
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: “补天峰主上一世那么针对我，这一世我就先打死他儿子出出气，过个几世等我筑基了再去打死他！”

0033.en: Lv Yang's face was calm.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 吕阳一脸平静。

0033.en: With the [Hundred Lives Book], his Dao heart was incredibly firm and unyielding. No matter how powerful his opponent was, he was confident he would win in the end.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 身怀【百世书】，他的道心无比坚定，可谓百折不挠，不管对手多么强大，他都有信心最后赢过他。

0033.en: As for the Foundation Establishment opportunity... what a coincidence, he knew of one too!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 至于筑基机缘巧了，他也知道一桩！

0033.en: Chen Xinan's presence completely vanished, his soul scattered. Then, Lv Yang put away the Myriad Spirits Banner, cleaned up the scene, and began to wait silently.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 陈信安的气机彻底消散，魂飞魄散，随后吕阳便收起万灵幡，整理好现场，开始默默地等待了起来。

0033.en: A short while later, Sky Mending Peak shook violently!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 不一会儿，补天峰剧震！

0033.en: A familiar pressure appeared, as if Mount Tai was falling on him. Lv Yang immediately put on a fearful expression. He knew exactly what it was.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 熟悉的压迫感浮现，仿佛有一座泰山落在身上，吕阳顿时做出了一副恐惧模样，他很清楚那是什么。

0033.en: It was the gaze of a Foundation Establishment master.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 那是筑基真人的目光。

0033.en: Clearly, by completely killing Chen Xinan, he had alerted the master of Sky Mending Peak, who was probably now trying to deduce the killer through karma.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 很显然，他彻底斩杀陈信安后已经惊动了补天峰主，对方现在估计已经开始通过因果来推演凶手了。

0033.en: Normally, he should be discovered in the next second.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 正常来讲，下一秒自己就应该被发现。

0033.en: Lv Yang waited in his cave for half an hour, but even after the pressure disappeared, the master of Sky Mending Peak did not appear before him.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 吕阳就这样在自己洞府内等待了半个时辰，可直到压迫感消失，补天峰主依旧没有出现在他的眼前。

0033.en: "...It really works!"
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “.果然有用！”

0033.en: He can't find me!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 他算不出来！

0033.en: Lv Yang's face remained calm, but he was laughing inside. With this confirmation, he could finally practice the Nine Transformations Dragon Art with peace of mind in this life.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 吕阳脸上不动神色，心中却是笑了起来，有了此番验证，这一世他终于能放心地修炼九变化龙决了。

0033.en: For his next actions, Lv Yang repeated what he did in his previous lives.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 之后的行动，吕阳复刻了前几世的操作。

0033.en: First, he hyped up the Substitute Death Yin Puppet to earn contribution points, then hyped up Yun Miaoqing to hide his sword art and sword pellet, and then bought a large number of spirit pills to begin closed-door cultivation.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 先炒替死阴傀，赚贡献点，再炒云妙清，掩饰自己的剑诀和剑丸，然后购买大量灵丹开始闭关修行。

0033.en: Ten years later.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 十年后。

0033.en: In the blink of an eye, generations of disciples rose and fell. The storms of the past had calmed down, and the Holy Sect continued to develop steadily.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 眨眼间，一代代弟子起起落落，昔日掀起的种种风波也重归平静，圣宗的发展趋势依旧是稳中向好。

0033.en: Only today seemed to be a little different.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 唯有今日，似乎多出了几分不同。

0033.en: Heaven and earth resonated, and the cave where Lv Yang was cultivating became a vortex, with vast spiritual energy pouring in from all directions like a flood.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 天地和鸣，吕阳闭关的洞府像是成为了一个漩涡，磅礴的灵气如决堤洪水一般从四面八方奔涌而来。

0033.en: "This is... a celestial phenomenon!?"
0033.speaker: 陌生男1
0033.cn: “这是.天地异象！？”

0033.en: "A Senior Brother has condensed his Qi seed and broken through to the late stage of Qi Refining!"
0033.speaker: 陌生男1
0033.cn: “有师兄凝结气种，突破炼气后期了！”

0033.en: Even in the Chu Sheng Sect, late-stage Qi Refining cultivators were considered high-level workers and would not be easily used as materials. They also had a certain degree of autonomy.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 即便在初圣宗，炼气后期也属于高级牛马，不会再被轻易当作人材了，也算是拥有了一定的自主权。

0033.en: Therefore, within Sky Mending Peak, the disciples who toiled for their daily survival saw the celestial phenomenon of Lv Yang's breakthrough. While they were amazed, hidden beneath was a stronger feeling of envy, jealousy, and even resentment of "why isn't it me".
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 因此补天峰内，那些为了每日生计而奔波忙碌的弟子们在看到吕阳突破时显化出的天地异象时，虽然难免惊叹，但在那之下隐藏的却是更加强烈的羡慕，嫉妒，乃至“为何不是自己”的愤恨

0033.en: At the same time, inside the cave, Lv Yang also opened his eyes.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 与此同时，洞府内，吕阳也睁开了双眼。

0033.en: In an instant, a flash of white light seemed to pass through the dark room, bright and piercing!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 霎时间，昏暗的静室内仿佛闪过了一道白电，明亮迫人！

0033.en: "The term 'bottleneck' is truly fitting."
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “瓶颈之说，名副其实。”

0033.en: Lv Yang's cultivation speed in this life was the same as in his previous one. He reached the sixth level of Qi Refining, the peak of the middle stage, in just three years, but was stuck at the bottleneck for seven years.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这一世吕阳的修炼速度和前世相同，短短三年就达到了炼气六层，中期巅峰，却在瓶颈蹉跎了七年。

0033.en: This was only because he had broken through to the late stage of Qi Refining once before and had the experience.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这还是因为他突破过一次炼气后期，有经验的缘故。

0033.en: Otherwise, this time would have been even longer. One can imagine why so many cultivators get stuck at this step, unable to advance in their entire lives.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 否则这个时间恐怕还要再拉长，可想而知为何会有那么多修士被卡在这一步，终其一生也不得寸进。

0033.en: After breaking through, Lv Yang did not rush out. Instead, he sat quietly for three more days until he had completely mastered the changes in his true qi, body, and spiritual sense before getting up.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 刚突破，吕阳没有着急出关，而是又静坐了三日，直到彻底掌握真气，体魄，灵识的变化后才起身。

0033.en: He opened the [Hundred Lives Book] panel:
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 打开【百世书】的面板：

0033.en: [Name: Lv Yang]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【姓名：吕阳】

0033.en: [Cultivation: Qi Refining Level 7 (Late Stage), 9th-Grade Array Master]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【修为：炼气七层（后期），九品阵法师】

0033.en: [Talents: Dual Cultivation Prodigy (White), Quite Skillful (Purple)]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【天赋：双修奇才（白色），有两下子（紫色）】

0033.en: [Technique: Nine Transformations Dragon Art (Level 7)]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【功法：九变化龙决（第七层）】

0033.en: [Abilities: Divine Thunder Sword Art (Adept), Secret Scroll of Array Treasures (Perfected), Life-Taking Curse (Perfected), Heavenly Demon Blood-Devouring Divine Light (Perfected), Qi-Concealing Art (Perfected)]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【神通：神霄御剑真决（小成），阵宝秘解（圆满），杀生咒（圆满，）天魔化血神光（圆满），敛气决（圆满）】

0033.en: [Treasures: Blood Sun Sword Pellet (High-Grade Magic Tool), Innate Primal-Unity Qi Myriad Spirits Banner (High-Grade Magic Tool)]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【宝物：血阳剑丸（上乘法宝），先天一炁万灵幡（上乘法宝）】

0033.en: [Hundred Lives Book Pages: 95]
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 【百世书页数：95】

0033.en: Although both were at the late stage of Qi Refining, the Lv Yang of this life was much stronger than in his previous life. Their true qi was not on the same level; a fight would be a complete victory for him.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 同为炼气后期，这一世的吕阳可比上上世要强多了，真气就不在一个档次，真要打起来堪称十零开。

0033.en: Especially after mastering the Heavenly Demon Blood-Devouring Divine Light, combined with the Blood River Sword Array Diagram, even if an opponent was also at the late stage of Qi Refining, once they were trapped in his array, they would surely die unless they knew about his abilities beforehand and had prepared a counter.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 尤其是掌握了天魔化血神光之后，再搭配血洗天河剑阵图，哪怕同为炼气后期，一旦被他用阵法笼罩，除非对他的信息非常了解，提前准备了破解天魔化血神光的手段，否则照样是死路一条。

0033.en: "But it's still not safe enough."
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “不过还是不保险。”

0033.en: The Heavenly Demon Blood-Devouring Divine Light was powerful, but it was an ability that ordinary disciples could find. Who knew what powerful abilities the true disciples had?
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 天魔化血神光威力是不错，但也只是普通弟子能找到的神通，天知道那些真传弟子有什么厉害神通？

0033.en: "True disciples... I wonder if I have a chance?"
0033.speaker: 吕阳
0033.cn: “真传弟子.也不知道我是否有机会？”

0033.en: Lv Yang looked expectant. With the divine talisman concealing his karma in this life, his identity was clean. Generally, he would be an easy target for recruitment.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 吕阳面露期待，这一世有神符蒙蔽因果，他的身份可谓清清白白，一般来说很容易成为招揽的对象。

0033.en: After all, even for a Foundation Establishment master, a late-stage Qi Refining cultivator was a good subordinate.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 毕竟即便是对筑基真人来说，炼气后期也是不错的下人了。

0033.en: Moreover, unlike his previous life, he had not turned into a blood shadow, and his path to immortality was not cut off. No matter how you looked at it, he should be worth investing in.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 何况他和上上世不同，并没有化身血影，仙途也没有断绝，不管怎么看应该都是有一定投资价值的。

0033.en: Therefore, Lv Yang had already made up his mind.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 因此吕阳早已决定好了。

0033.en: If a Foundation Establishment master really offered him a place, he would not refuse, even if it was the master of Sky Mending Peak. He would take the benefits first; the grudge could be settled in the next life.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 如果真有筑基门下投来橄榄枝，哪怕是补天峰主他也不会拒绝，先拿好处，仇怨可以下辈子再说嘛。

0033.en: A man's pride is worth gold, and today is the day to cash it in!
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 男儿膝下有黄金，今日正是提现时！

0034.en: Chapter 34: The Three Rivers Guild's Recruitment and a Foundation Establishment Opportunity
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 第34章 三河招揽，筑基机缘

0034.en: Outside the cave residence, following Lv Yang's breakthrough, information about him was placed on the desks of interested parties. His origins and background were quickly investigated.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 洞府外，随着吕阳的突破，有关他的情报信息也被摆到了有心人的桌前，来历跟脚迅速被查了个遍。

0034.en: Just as Lv Yang had predicted, his background could be described in four words.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 而一如吕阳之前的预料，他的来历只能用四个字来形容。

0034.en: Perfectly dark origins.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 根正苗黑。

0034.en: He joined the sect through the annual recruitment, formally entered the Joyful Union Hall, made a fortune selling Death-Substitute Yin Puppets, and then went into seclusion.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 圣宗每年招新进来的弟子，合欢殿超死师姐后正式入门，而后炒替死阴傀大赚一笔，从此闭关不出。

0034.en: "This is a true ascetic."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “这是一个苦修士啊。”

0034.en: Looking at the report, a female cultivator with a beautiful yet deadly face and sharp eyes couldn't help but praise him. She was also a late-stage Qi Refining cultivator. However, unlike Lv Yang who had just broken through, she was already at the ninth level, just one step away from completion.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 看着桌上的材料，一位粉面含煞，顾盼间锐意十足的女修忍不住赞叹，此人同样是炼气后期的修士，不过比起刚突破的吕阳，她一身修为赫然达到了炼气九层，距离十层圆满也只有一步之遥！

0034.en: The female cultivator's name was Feixia, and she was well-known in the sect.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 女修名为“飞霞”，在圣宗内的名声颇大。

0034.en: It wasn't just because of her beauty, but because she was a rare Talisman Cultivator. Her skills had even earned the respect of a sect elder.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 不仅因为她的容貌，更因为她还是圣宗少有的符修，凭借制符之术甚至得到了一位圣宗长老的赏识。

0034.en: "Being an ascetic alone isn't enough to reach the late stage of Qi Refining."
0034.speaker: 青年
0034.cn: “单单苦修士，可成不了炼气后期。”

0034.en: Beside Fairy Feixia, a young man with a feather fan smiled slightly, "He made a fortune from the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets, yet he kept a low profile."
0034.speaker: 青年
0034.cn: 飞霞仙子身旁，一位羽扇纶巾的青年微微一笑：“明明炒替死阴傀赚了一大笔钱，却不显山不露水。”

0034.en: "This shows he is a cautious and clever person."
0034.speaker: 青年
0034.cn: “由此可见，他还是一个谨慎的聪明人。”

0034.en: "That's normal. It makes sense."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “正常，这也在情理之中。”

0034.en: Fairy Feixia sighed. "For ordinary disciples like us to get ahead, talent, caution, intelligence, and courage are all essential."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 飞霞仙子闻言叹息一声：“我等普通弟子想要出头，天赋，谨慎，聪明，勇气.本就是缺一不可的。”

0034.en: "So, is it decided?"
0034.speaker: 青年
0034.cn: “这么说，定了？”

0034.en: Feixia nodded. "I will recommend him. He broke through to the late Qi Refining stage in just ten years. Our Three Rivers Guild needs someone like him."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 飞霞仙子点了点头，道：“我来举荐，此人短短十年就突破炼气后期，我三河会正需要这样的人材。”

0034.en: Inside his cave residence, Lv Yang sat on a meditation cushion.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 洞府内，吕阳端坐蒲团。

0034.en: In front of him were more than ten message talismans. Each was an offer from a faction, promising great rewards if he joined them. The rewards included cultivation partners, techniques, artifacts, and pills—anything he could want.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 而在他的面前，已经一字摆开了十多枚符书，每一张都是一根橄榄枝，声称只要他愿意加入它们的势力，立刻就有大礼奉上，包括且不限于鼎炉，功法，神通，宝物，丹药.可谓是应有尽有。

0034.en: "I didn't realize in my past life that there were so many factions in the sect..."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “上上世没注意，没想到圣宗内的派系这么多”

0034.en: Basically, any cultivator who reached the late stage of Qi Refining could form a sizable group, just like Liu Xin did in a previous life.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 基本上，只要有炼气后期的修为就可以在圣宗拉起一支不小的队伍了，比如上上世的刘信就是这般。

0034.en: Lv Yang wasn't surprised by this.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳对此倒也不意外。

0034.en: After all, it was strange for a sect to have no factions. The Chu Sheng Sect was huge, so it was impossible for everyone to be united. People would naturally form groups for their own benefit.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 毕竟宗内无派，千奇百怪，圣宗那么大，不可能所有人都一条心，总会因为各自的利益而抱团取暖。

0034.en: Of course, most of these factions were small and had no real foundation.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 当然，那些派系都是无根浮萍，没有根基。

0034.en: The ones with real power to recruit him were the factions established by sect elders or true disciples. Their offers were also more credible.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 真正有底气拉拢他的还得是圣宗一些长老，乃至真传建立的派系，许出的条件也相对比较真实可信。

0034.en: But that was all.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 但也仅此而已了。

0034.en: "I still overestimated myself." Lv Yang shook his head. The offers from the major factions were indeed good, often involving tens of thousands of contribution points.
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “还是我太高看自己了。”吕阳摇了摇头，那些大派系给出的条件确实不错，动辄就是上万贡献点。

0034.en: However, he didn't need money.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 然而偏偏他并不缺钱。

0034.en: He still hadn't spent all the contribution points he earned from the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 毕竟炒替死阴傀赚来的贡献点他还没花完呢。

0034.en: More than money, he needed "access"—the kind of access that would let him reach the middle-level of the sect and buy things that were normally unavailable.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 比起钱，他缺的是“权限”，是能真正接触到圣宗中层的权限，购买一些正常情况下买不到的东西。

0034.en: Just as Lv Yang was thinking, the array outside his door suddenly activated.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 就在吕阳思索之时，陡然间，门外阵法赫然一震。

0034.en: Lv Yang looked up and saw the illumination array he had set up flare brightly, revealing the elegant silhouette of a woman.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳应声抬头，却见他布置在洞府前的照明阵光明大放，煌煌阵光照出了一道凹凸有致的曼妙倩影。

0034.en: It was Fairy Feixia.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 正是飞霞仙子。

0034.en: "Junior Brother Lv, you also know array formations?" Fairy Feixia looked at the glowing array patterns around them, a pleasant surprise on her face.
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “吕师弟你还懂得阵法？”飞霞仙子讶异地看向四周浮现的阵纹，俏脸浮现出几分意料之外的惊喜。

0034.en: Lv Yang bowed. "Senior Sister, may I ask why you are here?"
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: 吕阳拱了拱手：“这位师姐，请问来此所为何事？”

0034.en: Fairy Feixia didn't act coy and returned the gesture gracefully. "I am Feixia, a deacon of the Three Rivers Guild. I have come for you, Junior Brother."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 飞霞仙子也不故作扭捏，落落大方地回了一礼：“在下飞霞，圣宗三河会执事，此番是为师弟而来。”

0034.en: "Oh? Please come in, Senior Sister."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “哦？师姐请”

0034.en: Lv Yang quickly welcomed her, his mind racing. The Three Rivers Guild? Wasn't that Zhao Xuhe's faction? Why would they come to recruit him?
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳赶忙招待，同时也迅速活泛起来，三河会，这不是赵旭河背后的派系么，居然会跑来招揽自己？

0034.en: Lv Yang didn't know much about the Three Rivers Guild, but he knew Zhao Xuhe was a member. More importantly, as a disciple of the Sky Mending Peak's master, Zhao Xuhe was only a low-to-mid-ranking member. This alone showed the guild's high standards.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 对于三河会，吕阳其实一直没有多少了解，不过他知道赵旭河就是其中一员，更重要的是作为补天峰主的弟子，赵旭河似乎也只是三河会的中底层，光从这一点就可以看出三河会的含金量了。

0034.en: "Please forgive my ignorance, Senior Sister, but what is the Three Rivers Guild?"
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “还望师姐恕罪，小弟孤陋寡闻，不知三河会是.？”

0034.en: Lv Yang asked cautiously. Feixia was not surprised and smiled. "The Three Rivers Guild was established by three true disciple senior brothers."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 吕阳很是小心地开口询问，飞霞仙子闻言也不意外，微笑道：“三河会，乃是三位真传师兄建立的。”

0034.en: "The eldest of them is already a Foundation Establishment cultivator and has his own peak in the sea of clouds."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “其中大师兄已是筑基真人，在云海内开辟一峰。”

0034.en: "Although the second and third brothers haven't reached Foundation Establishment yet, they have both cultivated third-grade true qi and are at the peak of Qi Refining. They could break through at any moment."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “二师兄和三师兄虽然还没有筑基，但也都炼就了三品真气，位列炼气大圆满，随时都有可能筑基。”

0034.en: "I heard that you also come from an ordinary background, Junior Brother. You should know how difficult life is for ordinary disciples. The three senior brothers came from humble beginnings like us, so after they became powerful, they established the Three Rivers Guild to help ordinary disciples through the early stages."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “我听闻吕师弟你也是普通弟子出身，应该清楚普通弟子前期的生活艰难，三位师兄和我们这些普通弟子一样出身贫寒，所以修为大成之后就建立了三河会，志在帮助普通弟子渡过前期难关。”

0034.en: "I see." Lv Yang looked respectful. "The three senior brothers are truly virtuous."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “原来如此。”吕阳一脸敬佩：“三位师兄功德无量啊。”

0034.en: What a joke!
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: 我呸！

0034.en: If I hadn't taken a loan from your Three Rivers Guild in a past life and seen your 36% annual interest rate with my own eyes, I might have believed that nonsense.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 如果不是前几世找你们三河会贷过款，亲眼见识过你们36%的年利率，我差点就相信了这一番鬼话。

0034.en: Lv Yang scoffed internally. He was never one to act without seeing a reward, so he wouldn't make a rash decision based on Feixia's words. He asked cautiously, "It is an honor to be invited. I just wonder what the benefits of joining are?"
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: 吕阳心中腹诽，他向来是不见兔子不撒鹰，自然不可能因为飞霞仙子这么一说就草率地做出决定，当即谨慎道：“能受邀成为三河会的一员，在下荣幸之至，只是不知道三河会的待遇如何？”

0034.en: "You don't have to worry about that, Junior Brother."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “这点师弟大可放心。”

0034.en: Feixia replied frankly, "If you are willing to join, I can immediately offer you a true disciple-level secret technique."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 飞霞仙子闻言坦然道：“只要师弟你愿意加入，我立刻就可以做主赠送你一门真传级别的神通秘术。”

0034.en: "After joining, you will receive an annual stipend of contribution points."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “入会后，每年都会有一笔贡献点供奉。”

0034.en: "And as long as you have the money, you can use the guild's true disciple-level access to buy items you want or even ask the three senior brothers for guidance."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “而且只要师弟你有钱，也可以借用会中的真传权限购买一些心仪之物，甚至请三位师兄指点修行。”

0034.en: "Of course, there are also requirements."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “当然，要求也是有的。”

0034.en: At this point, Feixia took out a jade slip and placed it before Lv Yang. "All who join must sign a contract and leave a drop of their blood essence."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 说到这里，飞霞仙子取出了一张玉简放在吕阳面前：“所有入会者都需要签订契书，留下一道精血”

0034.en: "That's simple."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “这个简单。”

0034.en: Lv Yang glanced at the contract. It contained the usual clauses for a faction, such as confidentiality. Some might feel they would lose their freedom, but Lv Yang didn't care at all. He signed his name with a wave of his hand.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳闻言看了一眼面前的契书，无非是一些派系都有的条款，保密义务等等，或许有的人会觉得这么做就失去了自由，很多事情身不由己，但是吕阳却浑不在意，大手一挥就签下了自己名字。

0034.en: It's just for one lifetime. It won't affect the next one.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 一辈子的事情罢了，又影响不到下辈子。

0034.en: In fact, Lv Yang wished the contract was even more binding. That would make it more likely for him to be treated as an insider and receive better resources.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 甚至吕阳还巴不得约束力能更大一点，那样才更有可能被当作是自己人，得到的资源肯定也会更好。

0034.en: Seeing Lv Yang act so decisively, Fairy Feixia nodded with satisfaction.
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: 见到吕阳如此爽快，飞霞仙子也满意地点了点头。

0034.en: "Next, just take out your disciple token, and I will place a restriction on it. From now on, the token can be used within the guild."
0034.speaker: 飞霞
0034.cn: “接下来只要师弟取出圣宗的弟子令牌，由我为你设下一道禁制，从此以后令牌便能在会内通用了。”

0034.en: "Thank you for your trouble, Senior Sister."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “让师姐费心了。”

0034.en: Lv Yang took out his token. Feixia formed a hand seal and sent a talismanic seal into it. A new section immediately appeared on the token.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳取出令牌，却见飞霞仙子单手掐诀，将一道符印打入其中后，上面立刻出现了一个全新的板块。

0034.en: "The art of talisman making..."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “制符之术.”

0034.en: Lv Yang's eyes lit up. He was now a ninth-grade array master. Though he didn't understand talismans, he could grasp some of the principles.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吕阳目光微亮，他如今也称得上是九品阵法师，触类旁通之下虽然不懂制符，但多少也能看懂一点。

0034.en: To him, a talisman was like a simple, temporary, small-scale array.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 在他看来，所谓的符就是一个简易的临时小阵法。

0034.en: This is good stuff. I want to learn it.
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: 好东西啊想学。

0034.en: The next moment, seeing this display of talisman art, Lv Yang finally remembered who Fairy Feixia was. He had heard of her in a previous life.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 下一秒，看着这一手制符之术，吕阳也终于想起来眼前这位飞霞仙子是谁了，他上上世听说过此人。

0034.en: "She is Zhao Xuhe's cultivation partner." Lv Yang thought to himself. "In a past life, while I was studying arrays, I heard she and Zhao Xuhe became partners. They were both at the peak of Qi Refining and shone on the battlefield between the righteous and demonic sects. They even attempted to reach Foundation Establishment together, but unfortunately, they failed and both died."
0034.speaker: 吕阳
0034.cn: “她是赵旭河的道侣.”吕阳心中思忖：“上上世，我钻研阵法的时候听说她和赵旭河结为道侣，两人都是炼气圆满，在正魔战场上大放异彩，甚至还一同冲击过筑基，可惜失败后双双坐化”

0034.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's eyes suddenly lit up.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 想到这里，吕阳顿时双眼放光。

0034.en: The key point wasn't their failure and death. It was that they had the chance to attempt Foundation Establishment in the first place. That meant there had to be an opportunity for Foundation Establishment involved!
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 重点不在于两人筑基失败后坐化，而在于他们居然有机会冲击筑基这背后必然是一桩筑基机缘！

0035.en: Chapter 35: Senior Brother Zhao and I Are Fated to Meet!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 第35章 赵师兄和我有缘啊！

0035.en: In the life before his last one, about twenty years from Lv Yang's current time, the Sect would launch a war to wipe out a righteous sect.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 上上世，从吕阳目前的时间点开始往后再过约二十年，圣宗就会发起一场针对正道宗门的灭门之战。

0035.en: The righteous sect that was destroyed was called the "Divine Martial Sect."
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 被灭的正道宗门，名为“神武门”。

0035.en: In that life, Zhao Xuhe eventually reached the peak of Qi Refining and, together with Fairy Feixia, became a steward of the Sect's marketplace in the outer world.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 而上上世，赵旭河最后还是修炼到了炼气大圆满，还和飞霞仙子一同成为了圣宗在外界坊市的管事。

0035.en: That marketplace was located at Skull Mountain, near the Divine Martial Sect.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 那座坊市位于骷髅山，濒临神武门。

0035.en: Before the war, the Sect used the marketplace as a cover to transport a large amount of supplies. It was said that the two of them found a Foundation Establishment item at that time.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 战前，圣宗将大量的物资都以坊市为掩护运送了过来，据说就是在那个时候被两人找到了筑基奇物。
