0035.en: After that, when the war began, the two of them distinguished themselves and earned great merit. They exchanged their points for another Foundation Establishment item from the Sect, then asked an alchemist to combine the two items into a "Foundation Establishment Pill," giving them a chance to break through to Foundation Establishment.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 在那之后，随着战争开始，两人大放异彩，立下了不小的功勋，又从圣宗内兑换到了一件筑基奇物，然后请丹师将两件筑基奇物合二为一，炼成了一枚“筑基丹”，这才有了冲击筑基的机会。

0035.en: Although they ultimately failed, the opportunity was real.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 虽然最后失败了，但机缘却是真的。

0035.en: "Zhao Xuhe and I both cultivate the Nine Transformations Dragon Art. If he could attempt Foundation Establishment, maybe I have a chance too. It's worth a try no matter what!"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “我和赵旭河一样都修炼了九变化龙决，他能冲击筑基，我或许也有机会，无论如何这都值得一试！”

0035.en: Three more days passed.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 又过了三天。

0035.en: Lv Yang was meditating in his cave residence when suddenly, a Human-Faced Owl flew to the entrance. Its beak opened and closed, releasing a clear and pleasant voice:
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳正在洞府静坐，陡然间，一只人面鸮飞到了他的洞府前，唇齿开合，吐出一道清脆悦耳的声音：

0035.en: "Junior Brother Lv, please come to my cave residence for a meeting."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: “吕师弟，还请来洞府一见。”

0035.en: It was Fairy Feixia.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 是飞霞仙子。

0035.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang's gaze shifted slightly. He immediately rode a beam of sword light toward Fairy Feixia's cave residence and was led to a tea pavilion with a beautiful landscape.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳见状目光微动，当即纵起一道剑光朝着飞霞仙子的洞府飞去，随后便被接引到了一处山水茶亭。

0035.en: Inside the pavilion, Fairy Feixia was brewing tea. Her movements were graceful as she poured spiritual water, heated it with true fire, and steeped the tea leaves. The process was a delight to watch. Arriving at just the right moment, Lv Yang smelled a delicate tea fragrance that refreshed his mind and even stimulated his spiritual sense.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 茶亭内，只见飞霞仙子正在泡茶，只见她素手轻弄，灵水浇灌，真火催发，润茶冲泡，动作赏心悦目，吕阳恰逢其会，更是感觉一股飘渺茶香扑鼻而来，令人心旷神怡，连灵识都活跃了不少。

0035.en: "Please have a seat, Junior Brother."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: “师弟请坐。”

0035.en: Fairy Feixia looked up. After Lv Yang sat down, she got straight to the point, "I've come to find you, Junior Brother, because the association has sent a reply."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: 飞霞仙子这才抬眉看来，等吕阳落座后更是直接开门见山道：“此番来找师弟，是会里的回复到了。”

0035.en: "Oh?" Lv Yang deliberately showed an excited expression. "Has my divine ability arrived?"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “哦？”吕阳故意露出了一副激动之色：“可是在下的神通到了？”

0035.en: "That's right." Fairy Feixia smiled faintly. "Second Senior Brother has sent the list of divine abilities. You may now choose one to cultivate."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: “不错。”飞霞仙子微微一笑：“二师兄已经送来了神通清单，师弟现在便可在清单里任选一门修行。”

0035.en: "Thank you, Senior Sister!"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “多谢师姐！”

0035.en: Lv Yang cupped his hands, took the jade slip with the list, and opened it. He was momentarily blinded by the dense list of divine abilities. After reading it carefully, he cursed inwardly.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳拱了拱手，接过清单玉简打开，顿时被密密麻麻的神通给晃到了眼，仔细翻看后更是心中痛骂。

0035.en: He had seen most of these divine abilities in the Library Pavilion on Sky Mending Peak. However, the versions in the library were incomplete, far less powerful than the complete versions on this list. They looked similar, but the difference was like heaven and earth. It showed just how tightly the Sect controlled its resources.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 因为这些神通大部分他都在补天峰的藏书阁里见过，只不过藏书阁里的都是阉割版，威力远远不如清单里的完整版，两者看似一样，实则却是天地之别，可见圣宗对资源的管控到了什么地步。

0035.en: It was simply outrageous.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 简直就是令人发指。

0035.en: If he hadn't joined the Three Rivers Association, signed an indenture contract, and gained the backing of a True Disciple, he probably would have never seen these complete techniques in his life.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 如果不是加入三河会还签了卖身契，上头有了真传背景，他恐怕一辈子都接触不到这些完整的神通。

0035.en: A moment later, Lv Yang's eyes suddenly lit up.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 片刻后，吕阳突然目光一亮。

0035.en: He had found a familiar name on the list: the Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light. Or rather, its complete version!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 因为他居然在清单里看到了熟悉的字眼，天魔化血神光或者准确地说，是天魔化血神光的完整版！

0035.en: The Great Yin Corpse-Shedding True Method!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 《太阴尸解蜕形真法》！

0035.en: "Refine the body with Great Yin, better than a nine-revolution pill. Your form becomes dignified and solemn, your face like a spiritual cloud. Ascend to the Great Ultimate Palace, receive the scripture, and become a True Person."
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: “太阴炼身形，胜服九转丹，形容端且严，面色似灵云，上登太极阙，受书为真人”

0035.en: This was a great divine ability!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 这是一门大神通！

0035.en: The Heavenly Demon's Blood-Transforming Divine Light was just the first step. Once fully mastered, one could transcend the five elements, become impervious to weapons, and even be known as a "Corpse-Liberated Immortal."
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 天魔化血神光甚至只是它的第一步，一旦彻底炼成，不入五行，刀兵难伤，甚至有“尸解仙”之称。

0035.en: "This is it!"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “就它了！”

0035.en: Lv Yang made his decision immediately. He copied the contents of the Great Yin Corpse-Shedding True Method and then turned to Fairy Feixia, cupping his hands respectfully.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳当即拍板，将《太阴尸解蜕形真法》的内容复刻一份，然后才看向飞霞仙子，郑重地拱了拱手：

0035.en: "Now that this is settled, is there anything else you need, Senior Sister?"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “此番事了，师姐可还有要事吩咐？”

0035.en: "To be honest, Junior Brother," Fairy Feixia said with a light laugh, "I'm planning to apply for an external assignment to oversee the Skull Mountain marketplace, and I'm short on capable assistants."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: “不瞒师弟。”飞霞仙子轻笑道：“我最近打算申请外调，前往骷髅山坊市坐镇，正缺几个称心助力”

0035.en: It's here!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 果然来了！

0035.en: Lv Yang wasn't surprised by Fairy Feixia's invitation. After giving him a reward, it was only natural for the Three Rivers Association to ask him to do something.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳对飞霞仙子的邀请并不意外，毕竟甜枣配大棒，三河会既然都给了好处又怎么可能不让他做事。

0035.en: "If you don't mind, Senior Sister, I am willing to go with you."
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “若是师姐不弃，我愿意随师姐同行。”

0035.en: Lv Yang agreed without any hesitation.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳毫不犹豫，直接点头。

0035.en: After all, this was about a Foundation Establishment opportunity. Even if Fairy Feixia hadn't invited him, Lv Yang was already planning to take a mission from the Hall of Meritorious Deeds to go to the Skull Mountain marketplace.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 毕竟事关筑基机缘，哪怕飞霞仙子没有主动邀请，吕阳也打算去善功楼接一桩任务前往骷髅山坊市。

0035.en: Seeing how decisive Lv Yang was, the look in Fairy Feixia's eyes grew more satisfied. "Junior Brother is just as I thought, a person with a firm heart for the Dao. Ordinary disciples like us have no future if we just stay in the Sect. Our only hope is to go out and seek opportunities."
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: 见到吕阳如此果断，飞霞仙子眼中神色也愈发满意：“师弟果然如我所想，是道心坚定之人，我等普通弟子若是自甘堕落，待在圣宗内是注定不可能出头的，唯有外出寻觅机缘方有一线生机。”

0035.en: "Only by burning our bridges and disregarding life and death can we hope to reach Foundation Establishment!"
0035.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0035.cn: “破釜沉舟，生死置之度外，方有筑基之望！”

0035.en: After their conversation, Lv Yang noticed that Fairy Feixia's gaze toward him had become warmer. She clearly saw him as a like-minded person.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 一番交谈过后，吕阳发现飞霞仙子看向他的目光都变得亲切起来，显然是将他当成了志同道合之人。

0035.en: She wasn't wrong about disregarding life and death.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 生死置之度外倒也没说错。

0035.en: But it wasn't because I've burned my bridges. It's because I have the Hundred Lives Book. I'm not afraid of failure. If I die, I'll just start over!
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: 不过不是因为破釜沉舟，而是因为我有【百世书】，根本不怕失败，死就死了，大不了重开再来啊！

0035.en: Ten days later, on the sky-soaring flying boat to Skull Mountain.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 十天之后，前往骷髅山的凌空飞舟上。

0035.en: Lv Yang descended in a flash of light, landing steadily on the deck of the flying boat. After greeting Fairy Feixia, he quietly blended into the crowd below.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 吕阳纵光而至，稳稳当当地落入飞舟甲板，和飞霞仙子打过招呼后便低调地混入了下方的人群之中。

0035.en: He didn't plan to be too conspicuous on this trip to Skull Mountain.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 此番前往骷髅山，他并不打算表现得太过显眼。

0035.en: He preferred to be an unremarkable face in the crowd rather than the center of attention. The best would be to frown and silently retreat behind everyone else.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 比起万众瞩目，他其实更喜欢泯然众人一点，最好是眉头一皱，就能悄无声息退至众人身后的那种。

0035.en: Soon, many cultivators had gathered on the flying boat.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 很快，飞舟上就聚集了不少修士。

0035.en: Besides Fairy Feixia, the leaders were two cultivators at the seventh layer of Qi Refining. He even recognized one of them: Lu Yuanchun, a disciple of the Sky Mending Peak Master.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 为首者除了飞霞仙子之外，还有两个炼气七层的修士，其中一个他甚至还认识：补天峰主门下，陆元淳。

0035.en: "Hmph. Sooner or later, I'll settle the score with him."
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “哼迟早拉他的清单。”

0035.en: A cold glint flashed in Lv Yang's eyes before disappearing. He looked around again. Since Lu Yuanchun was here, would Zhao Xuhe be here too?
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: 吕阳眼中闪过一抹寒光，旋即隐没，转而又看了看四周，陆元淳既然都来了，赵旭河是不是也会来？

0035.en: The Foundation Establishment opportunity of this life might fall to him after all!
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: 这一世的筑基机缘搞不好还要落在他身上呢！

0035.en: Sure enough, after a quick scan, Lv Yang spotted Zhao Xuhe in a remote corner of the boat, drinking spiritual wine by himself.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 果然，吕阳巡视一圈后，还真在人群角落，飞舟的一处偏僻地方看到了正在默默喝着灵酒的赵旭河。

0035.en: However, the current Zhao Xuhe looked several times more dejected than in previous lives. Lv Yang wasn't surprised. In this life, Zhao Xuhe couldn't find him, so his destined opportunity had vanished. He also went bankrupt from speculating on the death-substitute puppets, and his lover, Fairy Qingchen, had surely left him. He had lost both his love and his fortune.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 只不过如今的赵旭河比前几世还要颓废数倍，吕阳倒也不意外，毕竟这一世赵旭河找不到他，命定机缘凭空消失，炒替死阴傀又倾家荡产，姘头清尘仙子肯定也离他而去了，可谓是人财两空。

0035.en: Lv Yang was already impressed that he hadn't jumped off Sky Mending Peak yet.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 他现在还没有从补天峰上跳下去，吕阳就已经很佩服了。

0035.en: "Senior Brother Zhao? Is that you, Senior Brother Zhao?"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “赵师兄？是赵师兄吗？”

0035.en: Lv Yang approached him, putting on a look of pleasant surprise. "I can't believe I ran into you here, Senior Brother. We must be fated to meet!"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: 吕阳主动上前，故意露出了一副惊喜模样：“没想到居然还能在这里遇见赵师兄，师兄和我有缘啊！”

0035.en: "Huh? Who are you?"
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: “啊？你是.”

0035.en: Zhao Xuhe was stunned for a moment before his cultivator's memory finally recognized Lv Yang. He was dumbfounded. "Junior Brother... Lv? You're at the middle stage of Qi Refining?"
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: 赵旭河愣了好一会儿才凭借修士的记忆力认出了吕阳，顿时目瞪口呆：“.吕师弟？你炼气中期了？”

0035.en: Zhao Xuhe had truly fallen on hard times. He couldn't see through Lv Yang's Qi-concealing art, so he didn't know his true cultivation level. Even so, the middle stage of Qi Refining was enough to shock him. Ten years ago, Lv Yang had been an insignificant character in his eyes.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 赵旭河确实是落魄了，根本看不穿吕阳的敛气决，自然也无从知晓他的真实境界，可饶是如此，炼气中期也足以让他大感震惊了，毕竟十年之前的吕阳在他眼里还只是一个可有可无的小角色。

0035.en: Thinking of this, Zhao Xuhe felt even more depressed.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河顿时更玉玉了。

0035.en: "Hmph, are you here to laugh at me too? Get lost!"
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: “呵，你也是来嘲笑我的么，滚开！”

0035.en: "Why would you say that, Senior Brother?" Lv Yang looked puzzled and quickly added, "I have always remembered your kindness from the past. How could I possibly laugh at you?"
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “师兄何出此言？”吕阳一脸疑惑，随后赶紧道：“师兄昔日的恩情我一直谨记，怎会有嘲笑之心？”

0035.en: Kindness? What kindness?
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: 恩情，什么恩情？

0035.en: Zhao Xuhe was stunned again. Then he remembered that he had helped Lv Yang secure a loan a long time ago. That counts as kindness? Are there really such fools in the world?
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: 赵旭河又是一愣，随后才想起来他当年好像确实帮吕阳贷了一笔款，这也算是恩情？还有这种傻子？

0035.en: Just as Zhao Xuhe was about to say something sarcastic...
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 想到这里，赵旭河刚想开口嘲讽

0035.en: "I see your cultivation is still at the sixth layer of Qi Refining. If you don't mind, Senior Brother, I have a spiritual pill here that can help boost your cultivation."
0035.speaker: 吕阳
0035.cn: “我看师兄你的修为似乎还停在炼气六层，师兄您若是不嫌弃，我这里有一颗能够增益修为的灵丹。”

0035.en: "This isn't appropriate, is it?"
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: “这不合适吧？”

0035.en: Zhao Xuhe blankly accepted the spiritual pill that Lv Yang forced into his hand. For some reason, as he looked at Lv Yang, he actually felt a sense of closeness!
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: 赵旭河茫然地接过吕阳强行递来的灵丹，不知道为什么，再看吕阳，居然还真的生出了一股亲切感！

0035.en: It was as if the two had known each other in a past life.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 仿佛两人上辈子就打过交道一般。

0035.en: Could it be that we are truly fated?
0035.speaker: 赵旭河
0035.cn: 莫非咱们真的有缘？

0035.en: Happy New Year!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 新年快乐！

0036.en: Chapter 36: Skull Mountain Market
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 第36章 骷髅山坊市

0036.en: Relying on his knowledge of Zhao Xuhe from several lifetimes, Lv Yang quickly grew close to him, allowing Zhao Xuhe to feel a long-lost respect from an outsider.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 凭借对赵旭河几世的了解，吕阳很快就和他熟络起来，也让赵旭河久违地感觉到了来自外人的尊重。

0036.en: To be honest, he hadn't felt this way for many years.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 说实话，他已经很多年没有这种感觉了。

0036.en: Ever since the price of the Death-Substitute Yin Puppets crashed and Coiling Dragon Island mysteriously disappeared—a matter whose cause even his master, the lord of Sky Mending Peak, could not divine—his life had become increasingly difficult.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 自从替死阴傀价格暴雷，盘龙岛离奇失踪，因果连师尊补天峰主都算不出后，他的日子就越过越难。

0036.en: First, his master grew more and more disappointed in him. Second, his cultivation stalled. Ten years had passed, yet he remained at the middle stage of Qi Refining, unable to break through his bottleneck. If there was any good news, it was that his master, seeing his worsening situation, had canceled his marriage arrangement with his junior sister.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 首先是师尊对他越来越失望，其次是他的修为难以寸进，足足十年过去了居然还停留在炼气中层，难以突破瓶颈。非要说有什么好事的话，就是师尊看他每况愈下，就取消了他和师妹的婚约。

0036.en: In this world, things are always changing, and people can be warm one moment and cold the next. Zhao Xuhe had experienced this all too well over the past ten years.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 世事无常，人情冷暖，赵旭河这十年算是尝了个遍。

0036.en: Therefore, when he heard that Lv Yang had managed to get out at the peak of the Death-Substitute Yin Puppet prices and become financially free, Zhao Xuhe's eyes turned red with envy.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 因此当听到吕阳是在替死阴傀价格最高点及时离场，这才财富自由后，赵旭河更是羡慕的眼睛发红。

0036.en: "Ah, Junior Brother, your Dao heart is so firm, not swayed by wealth. Your future is limitless. It's a pity I didn't have a Dao heart like yours back then."
0036.speaker: 赵旭河
0036.cn: “哎，师弟你道心坚定，不为财富所祸，未来的成就不可限量啊，只可惜我当年没有你这样的道心.”

0036.en: "Senior Brother, you shouldn't belittle yourself."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “师兄且不可妄自菲薄。”

0036.en: Lv Yang comforted him in a low voice, "Fortune is not decided in a single moment. As long as you remain determined on the path of cultivation, what do temporary setbacks matter?"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 吕阳低声安慰道：“时运之说，不再一朝一时，只要师兄你矢志仙途，短暂的挫折又算得了什么呢？”

0036.en: "You're right."
0036.speaker: 赵旭河
0036.cn: “你说得对。”

0036.en: Zhao Xuhe nodded, seeming to have cheered up a little. Then, he glanced at Lv Yang hesitantly and opened his mouth, but said nothing.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 赵旭河点了点头，似乎振作了一点，随后又试探性地看了一眼吕阳，张了张嘴，却又没有说出话来。

0036.en: To Lv Yang, his intention was as clear as day.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 如此作态，心思在吕阳看来已是昭然若揭。

0036.en: He wants to borrow money.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 这是想借钱啊。

0036.en: Lv Yang smiled slightly. Since Zhao Xuhe didn't mention it, he wouldn't bring it up either. After all, if you get something too easily, you won't know how to cherish it.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 吕阳微微一笑，赵旭河不说，他自然也不会主动提，毕竟如果太容易就拿到手，是不会懂得珍惜的。

0036.en: Just then, a voice suddenly came from the flying boat:
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 就在这时，飞舟上突然传来了一道声音：

0036.en: "We have arrived at Skull Mountain!"
0036.speaker: 陌生男1
0036.cn: “骷髅山到了！”

0036.en: Northern Frontier, Skull Mountain.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 北疆，骷髅山。

0036.en: It was called a mountain, but it was actually a large mountain range stretching for hundreds of miles, with peaks clustered together like waves. Every inch of the land was overflowing with spiritual energy.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 名为山，实际上却是一座延绵数百里的大型山脉，峰峦如聚，波涛如怒，每一寸土地都洋溢着灵气。

0036.en: There was a good reason why the Chu Sheng Sect established a market here. Although it couldn't compare to the Sea of Clouds, for worldly rogue cultivators, Skull Mountain was already a treasure land. At the very center of the mountain range was a cave of white bones, where the sect's market was located.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 圣宗之所以在此地建立坊市也不是没有道理的，虽然远远比不上接天云海，但对于世俗散修来说，骷髅山已经称得上一块宝地了，而在山脉的最中心，有一座白骨洞，圣宗的坊市就坐落其中。

0036.en: "The feng shui of this place... it's a place of extreme yin."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “此地风水，乃是极阴之地啊。”

0036.en: On the deck of the flying boat, Lv Yang looked down at the lay of the land of Skull Mountain, somewhat surprised. "Any cultivator buried here would surely turn into a zombie within ten years."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 飞舟甲板上，吕阳俯瞰骷髅山地脉，有些意外：“只要是个修士埋在此地，十年之内必然蜕而成僵.”

0036.en: "Junior Brother has sharp eyes."
0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: “师弟慧眼如炬。”

0036.en: A rosy light flashed, and Fairy Feixia, her feathered cloak fluttering, walked out. "That is why the sect sent us to guard Skull Mountain and maintain order in the market."
0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: 霞光乍现，飞霞仙子羽氅飘飘，踱步走出：“所以圣宗才会派我们等来骷髅山驻守，维护坊市秩序。”

0036.en: "Just as you said, Junior Brother, due to the special feng shui, a large-scale corpse tide appears on Skull Mountain every thirty years. These zombies have no intelligence and only know how to devour the living. This is a risk, but also an opportunity. After all, these zombies are excellent materials for refining artifacts."
0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: “诚如师弟所说，由于风水特殊，骷髅山每隔三十年就会出现一次大规模的尸潮，这些僵尸没有神智，只懂吞食生人，这是骷髅山的风险，却也是机遇，毕竟这些僵尸可都是上好的炼器材料。”

0036.en: After explaining, Fairy Feixia continued:
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 解释完之后，飞霞仙子又继续道：

0036.en: "The market is protected by the 'Hundred Skeletons Restoration Array'. There are four array eyes. Fellow Daoist Lu and Fellow Daoist Chen are in charge of two. For the remaining two, how about you and I each take one, Junior Brother?"
0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: “坊市内布有‘百骸还真大阵’，四座阵眼陆道友和陈道友负责两个，剩下两个师弟和我各取其一？”

0036.en: "I will follow your arrangements, Senior Sister."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “听凭师姐吩咐。”

0036.en: Fairy Feixia nodded upon hearing this, then her brows furrowed slightly as she glanced at Zhao Xuhe, who stood beside Lv Yang with wide, unbelieving eyes.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 飞霞仙子闻言点了点头，紧接着绣眉微蹙，瞥了一眼吕阳身旁瞪大了双眼，满脸不可置信的赵旭河。

0036.en: "What is it?" Lv Yang asked curiously. "Do you know Senior Brother Zhao, Senior Sister?"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “怎么？”吕阳好奇道：“师姐认识赵师兄？”

0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: “.不认识。”

0036.en: Fairy Feixia coldly withdrew her gaze from Zhao Xuhe and turned to Lv Yang with a gentle smile. "I will be counting on your help in the future, Junior Brother."
0036.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0036.cn: 飞霞仙子漠然收回视线，不再去看赵旭河，而是对着吕阳温和一笑：“日后还要请师弟多多关照了。”

0036.en: With that, she flew away on a ray of rosy light.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 说完，她便驾起一道霞光飞纵离开。

0036.en: Zhao Xuhe remained where he was, his expression complicated. He had clearly guessed that since Lv Yang was assigned to guard the market, his true strength was definitely not the middle stage of Qi Refining that he had sensed.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 赵旭河则是留在原地，神情复杂，显然猜到了吕阳能坐镇坊市，实力肯定不是他感应到的炼气中期。

0036.en: "Senior Brother Zhao?"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “赵师兄？”

0036.en: Lv Yang's voice came, and Zhao Xuhe froze.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 吕阳的声音传来，赵旭河的动作僵住了。

0036.en: A mixed expression of joy and misery appeared on his face. His lips moved, but he made no sound. His posture finally became respectful as he called out clearly:
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 他脸上现出了欢喜和凄凉的表情，动着嘴唇，却没有作声，他的动作终于恭敬起来了，分明地叫道：

0036.en: "Sir."
0036.speaker: 赵旭河
0036.cn: “大人。”

0036.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang could only sigh helplessly. "Senior Brother Zhao, I have official business to attend to. If you have any difficulties in the future, feel free to contact me."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 吕阳见状也只能无奈地叹了口气：“赵师兄，我还有公务要处理，日后要有什么困难，随时联系我。”

0036.en: With that, he also flew away.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 言罢，他也纵光离开。

0036.en: Only Zhao Xuhe was left, his expression uncertain. The many emotions from before quickly vanished, replaced by a look of deep thought.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 只剩下赵旭河留在原地，神色阴晴不定，此前的诸多情绪飞快收敛，眼眸中流露出的却是思索之色。

0036.en: "He's wary of me. It seems I was too hasty."
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: “这是对我有戒心啊，看来还是太急了。”

0036.en: Entering the market, Lv Yang recalled Zhao Xuhe's reaction and couldn't help but chuckle. "Just as I expected, he has another purpose for coming to this market."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 进入坊市，吕阳回想起赵旭河刚刚的反应，不禁轻笑：“果然如我所料，他来这坊市其实另有目的。”

0036.en: "Good, very good!"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “好啊，好！”

0036.en: "In this life, I will make him my closest friend!"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “这一世，当引以为至交！”

0036.en: Lv Yang was not afraid of Zhao Xuhe's wariness because he had enough patience.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 吕阳不怕赵旭河有戒心，因为他有足够的耐心。

0036.en: If necessary, he was even willing to give up this life and genuinely be Zhao Xuhe's friend for a lifetime, just to gather information for the next one!
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 如果有必要，他甚至可以放弃这一世，真的和赵旭河当一辈子的好友，获取情报来为下一世做铺垫！

0036.en: As he thought, Lv Yang arrived in front of a pavilion.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 思索间，吕阳已经来到了一座阁楼前。

0036.en: This place was one of the four array eyes of the market, and also the area with the most spiritual energy on Skull Mountain, probably about thirty percent as good as a cave-dwelling in the Chu Sheng Sect.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 此地便是坊市的四大阵眼之一，同时也是骷髅山灵气最多的区域，估计都有圣宗洞府的三成水平了。

0036.en: "Blood-Washing Celestial River Sword Formation, rise!"
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “血洗天河剑阵图，起！”

0036.en: With a wave of his sleeve, Lv Yang sent the Blood Sun Sword Pellet flying into the pavilion to act as the core. Then, array patterns spread out, replacing the original ones.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 吕阳大袖一挥，血阳剑丸飞入阁楼，坐镇中枢，随后一道道阵纹便扩张开来，开始取代原有的阵纹。

0036.en: Although the market's "Hundred Skeletons Restoration Array" was more profound than his Blood-Washing Celestial River Sword Formation, Lv Yang only controlled one of the array eyes. Furthermore, as an array master, he disliked entrusting his life to an array set up by someone else.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 虽然坊市的“百骸还真大阵”的神妙程度还要超过血洗天河剑阵，但一来是吕阳只占据了其中一个阵眼，二来则是作为阵法师，吕阳并不喜欢将自己的身家性命寄托在一个外人布置的阵法上。

0036.en: "After all, I have quite a few secrets..."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “毕竟我的秘密可不少”

0036.en: "Besides, the Skull Mountain Market has been established for so long that the effects of this 'Hundred Skeletons Restoration Array' are common knowledge, no matter how clever it is."
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: “而且骷髅山坊市建立这么久了，这座‘百骸还真大阵’哪怕再高明，其效果也已经是人尽皆知了。”

0036.en: The more your secrets are exposed, the easier it is for others to target you.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 底细暴露得越多，就越容易被人针对。

0036.en: So, if a powerful figure were to attack the Skull Mountain Market, they would surely come prepared with ways to break the "Hundred Skeletons Restoration Array."
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 所以一旦真有什么厉害人物进攻骷髅山坊市，那必然是准备好了破解“百骸还真大阵”的神通手段。

0036.en: At that time, the array might not be of much use.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 所以到了那时候，这百骸还真大阵未必有什么用。

0036.en: That said, Lv Yang didn't abandon the array completely. Instead, he opened up a new area within the pavilion, hiding his own array within the larger one, which served as a hidden card.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 话虽如此，吕阳也没有直接抛弃阵法，而是在阁楼里新开了一片区域，阵中藏阵，也算是一张底牌。

0036.en: After doing all this, Lv Yang nodded with satisfaction.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 做完这一切后，吕阳这才满意地点了点头。

0036.en: Then, with another wave of his hand, he named the pavilion 'Blood-Robed Tower,' officially settling down in the Skull Mountain Market and giving himself a title.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 紧接着，他又大手一挥，将阁楼命名为‘血衣楼’，算是正式在骷髅山坊市定居，对外也有了称呼。

0036.en: Just then, more than a dozen streaks of light flew over.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 就在这时，只见十几道遁光飞纵而来。

0036.en: These were the Chu Sheng Sect disciples assigned to Lv Yang's area. Their cultivation levels were generally in the early and middle stages of Qi Refining, and they were also here at the market for missions.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 这些人都是被安排在吕阳区域内的圣宗弟子，修为普遍在炼气初期和中期，也都是来坊市做任务的。

0036.en: The lights faded after flying into the Blood-Robed Tower, revealing cultivators of all ages and appearances. They came to the balcony with awe on their faces and saw a handsome, blood-robed young man leaning against the railing, smiling as he looked down on them all.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 遁光飞入血衣楼后也陆续散去，现出了男女老少，模样各异的修士身影，一个个面带敬畏地来到了楼台上，却见楼台旁，一位丰神俊逸的血衣青年正倚栏而立，面带微笑着俯瞰着他们所有人。

0036.en: "Greetings, Tower Master!"
0036.speaker: 陌生男1
0036.cn: “参见楼主！”

0036.en: The disciples did not dare to be slow and bowed in unison. Although they could call each other senior and junior brother within the sect, they had to use official titles outside of it.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 一众弟子不敢怠慢，纷纷行礼，虽然在圣宗内大家能以师兄弟相称，但是在圣宗外还是要称职务的。

0036.en: Besides, this was a senior brother in the late stage of Qi Refining!
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 何况这可是一位炼气后期的师兄！

0036.en: Early stage, middle stage, late stage, and grand completion of the Qi Refining realm might seem like four small stages, but the gap between them was immense.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 炼气境初期，中期，后期，大圆满，看上去只是四个小境界，然而它们之间的差距完全称得上鸿沟。

0036.en: "At ease."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “免礼。”

0036.en: Looking at the row of figures below, Lv Yang nodded with satisfaction, thinking to himself, "Not bad. They all look like workhorses. No capable people among them."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 看着下方的一排人影，吕阳满意地点了点头，心中暗道：“不错，一眼看去都是牛马，没什么能人。”

0036.en: The Chu Sheng Sect had a top-tier cultivation environment. Generally, cultivators who chose to be stationed outside were either like Lv Yang and Fairy Feixia, aiming for Foundation Establishment, or like these people here—with poor talent, old age, and no money, unable to get by in the sect.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 圣宗别的不说，修行环境确实顶级，所以一般来说，选择外调的修士要么是吕阳和飞霞仙子这样，志在筑基，要么就是像眼前这些人这样，资质差，年龄大，还没什么钱，在圣宗混不下去了。

0036.en: "If I wanted to, I could kill them all with a single sword..."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “只要我想，一人一剑就能杀光所有人”

0036.en: Someone looking to build a force might be unhappy with this situation, but Lv Yang felt it was just right. The atmosphere of weakness made him feel very secure.
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: 有心组建势力的人或许会对这种情况有所不满，不过吕阳却感觉这样正好，弱者的氛围让他很安心

0036.en: "You are all dismissed. Make your own decisions on small matters; no need to come to me."
0036.speaker: 吕阳
0036.cn: “都散了吧，小事自己决定，不用来找我。”

0036.en: After giving his orders, Lv Yang sent them away and sealed the Blood-Robed Tower, preparing to cultivate peacefully in seclusion until the opportunity for Foundation Establishment appeared!
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 吕阳随口吩咐完便直接宣布送客，接着封锁血衣楼，准备就这样安稳修行，闭关直到筑基机缘出现！

0037.en: Chapter 37: The True Art of Supreme Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse Liberation
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 第37章 太阴蜕形尸解真法

0037.en: "This 'True Art of Supreme Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse Liberation' is a bit difficult."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “这门《太阴蜕形尸解真法》有点难啊.”

0037.en: After a night of seclusion, Lv Yang frowned at the secret manual of divine arts before him. "A great divine art... it cannot be performed without immense magical power. It is the pinnacle of divine arts."
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 一夜闭关，吕阳看着眼前的神通密册，眉头紧皱：“大神通，非大法力者不可为，乃是神通的顶点。”

0037.en: The so-called "great divine art" was not actually a rank of divine art, but a method of application.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 所谓大神通，其实并非一个神通品阶，而是一种运用方法。

0037.en: In short, combining several compatible high-level divine arts to unleash dozens of times their power was called a great divine art.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 简而言之，通过将数门彼此契合的上乘神通组合在一起，使其爆发出数十倍的威力，就叫做大神通。

0037.en: The 'True Art of Supreme Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse Liberation' was just like this. To master this great divine art, one had to first learn three high-level divine arts: the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light, the Profound Yin Form-Seizing Great Art, and the Taiwei Imperial Edict Treasure Talisman. Each of these three was extremely difficult to cultivate and could not be achieved without great fortune.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 《太阴蜕形尸解真法》就是如此，想要炼成这门大神通，必须先习得天魔化血神光，玄阴摄形大法，太微敕赦宝箓三道上乘神通，三门神通每一门修炼起来都极为困难，非天大机缘难以修成。

0037.en: This was a common characteristic of all great divine arts.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 这也是所有大神通的共性。

0037.en: It wasn't something you could master just by wanting to. It depended on one's comprehension, fortune, and merit. Lacking any of these would only lead to failure.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 不是你想修，想修就能修的，一要看悟性，二要看气运，三要看功德，少了哪一个都只会功败垂成。

0037.en: Take the first divine art, the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light, for example.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 就说这第一道神通，天魔化血神光。

0037.en: This divine art alone had stumped countless cultivators. After all, cultivating by skinning oneself was equivalent to cutting off one's own path to immortality. Even if mastered, it was meaningless.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 光是这一门神通就不知道卡死了多少修行者，毕竟剥皮修炼等于自斩仙途，就算练成了也毫无意义。

0037.en: As for the second divine art, the Profound Yin Form-Seizing Great Art, it didn't have such severe side effects. The difficulty was mainly due to an external item. To master it, one needed a 'Profound Female Supreme Yin Treasure Jade' as a medium. Without this wondrous treasure, one could not succeed, no matter how high their cultivation or comprehension was.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 至于第二道神通，玄阴摄形大法倒是没有那么大的副作用，难度主要是外物，想要修成这门神通，必须以一枚“玄牝太阴宝玉”为媒介，没有这个奇宝，就算你修为再高，悟性再好也修不成。

0037.en: Unfortunately, the 'Profound Female Supreme Yin Treasure Jade' was extremely rare.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 偏偏“玄牝太阴宝玉”又极为稀有。

0037.en: How rare? One sentence could describe it: it was not in the Chu Sheng Sect's exchange list. You couldn't buy it even with contribution points.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 有多稀有？用一句话就可以形容，圣宗的兑换名录里面没有这个东西.哪怕你用贡献点都买不到。

0037.en: Even with the vast resources of the Chu Sheng Sect, they did not possess such a wondrous item.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 以圣宗的地大物博程度，都没有这等奇物。

0037.en: It was clear that mastering this divine art depended entirely on a cultivator's fortune and luck. Without that luck, searching the entire world would be futile.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 可见想要修成这门神通，全看修士的机缘气运，没有那个气运，就算你寻遍天下也只会是徒劳无功。

0037.en: Therefore, Lv Yang only gave it a glance before decisively giving up on it and turning his attention to the third divine art, the Taiwei Imperial Edict Treasure Talisman.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 因此吕阳只是看了一眼，就果断将其放弃，转而琢磨第三道神通，太微敕赦宝箓。

0037.en: However, to his frustration, although this divine art required no precious external items and had no major side effects, it was incredibly difficult.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 然而让他无奈的是，虽然这道神通既不需要珍贵的外物，也没有巨大的副作用，但是它真的太难了。

0037.en: Lv Yang studied it for a whole night with little to show for it.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 吕阳看了一晚上，收获甚微。

0037.en: "It's a bit like a formation, and a bit like a talisman, yet it's classified as a divine art. Whether I can learn it depends entirely on comprehension. If I can't, I can't."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “有点像阵法，又有点像符箓，却被归入了神通的范畴，能不能学会全看悟性，学不会就是学不会”

0037.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang scratched his head again, feeling unconvinced.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 想到这里，吕阳又抓了抓头发，不服气。

0037.en: "I managed to overcome something as difficult as formations. How long can a mere divine art stop me? At worst, I'll spend another twenty years on it. I'll learn you sooner or later!"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “阵法那么难我都死磕过来了，区区一门神通还能拦我多久？大不了我再花个二十年，迟早学会你！”

0037.en: The reason the 'True Art of Supreme Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse Liberation' made Lv Yang so determined was that this great divine art was simply too tempting. He couldn't give it up.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 之所以《太阴蜕形尸解真法》能让吕阳如此死磕，主要是这门大神通实在太香了，他根本无法割舍。

0037.en: Not to mention how powerful the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light was, the Profound Yin Form-Seizing Great Art was equally domineering. By capturing a person's aura and using it to form a "soul shadow," one could kill them out of thin air just by destroying the shadow, even if they were a thousand miles apart.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 天魔化血神光有多厉害就不提了，玄阴摄形大法同样霸道，只要摄取一人气机，再用气机凝聚出“魂影”，就可以通过斩杀“魂影”，直接凭空将其击杀，哪怕双方相隔千里，也照样死路一条。

0037.en: The Taiwei Imperial Edict Treasure Talisman was even more ridiculous.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 太微敕赦宝箓更是离谱。

0037.en: Once the talisman was formed, it didn't harm the body or kill the soul. Instead, it specifically destroyed merit and fortune. Even a child of destiny, if hit by this divine art, would become an unlucky person.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 宝箓一成，不斩肉身，不杀魂魄，专破功德气运，就是天命之子被这门神通命中，也会变成倒霉蛋。

0037.en: Of course, the most powerful aspect was the combination of the three divine arts.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 当然，最厉害的还是三门神通合一。

0037.en: This was also the effect of the great divine art 'True Art of Supreme Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse Liberation' that most tempted Lv Yang: it increased a cultivator's chances of breaking through to the Foundation Establishment realm!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 同时也是《太阴蜕形尸解真法》这门大神通最让吕阳心动的功效，那就是提升修士突破筑基的几率！

0037.en: For this reason alone, Lv Yang was determined to obtain this great divine art!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 仅这一点，吕阳对这门大神通就势在必得！

0037.en: The years passed quickly, like a flowing river.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 岁月荏苒，光阴如梭。

0037.en: In the blink of an eye, five years had gone by.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 一眨眼，就是五个春秋过去。

0037.en: Inside the Blood-Clothed Tower, Lv Yang leaned against a railing, looking up at the sky. He silently circulated the 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art'. With each breath, he breathed in and out clouds and mist, transforming them into many strange and wonderful sights.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 血衣楼内，吕阳倚栏望天，默默运转“九变化龙决”，呼吸间吞吐云雾，变形幻化出诸多异象奇景。

0037.en: The eighth transformation, the Mirage Transformation!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 第八变，幻蜃变！

0037.en: Although the spiritual energy on Skull Mountain was poor, Lv Yang had a lot of money and had stored up a large amount of spirit stones in advance, so his cultivation did not slow down.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 虽然骷髅山的灵脉不行，但是吕阳钱多，事前早已囤积了大量灵石，因此修行并没有因此出现迟滞。

0037.en: And after five years of hard cultivation, although he had made no progress with the Taiwei Imperial Edict Treasure Talisman, he had a sudden inspiration while studying the divine art. His true qi broke through on its own. By the time he realized it, the qi seed in his dantian had transformed again, faintly taking the shape of a dragon.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 而五年苦修，尽管太微敕赦宝箓的修行依旧毫无进展，但他却在钻研神通的时候突然福至心灵，真气自发突破了关隘，等到他回过神来的时候，丹田内的气种已然再度蜕变，隐隐显化出龙形。

0037.en: Eighth level of Qi Refining!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 炼气八层！

0037.en: "Although the improvement from the seventh to the eighth level of Qi Refining is not as dramatic as from the sixth to the seventh, my true qi and magical power have still increased several times over."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “虽然从炼气七层到炼气八层的提升没有六层到七层那么夸张，但是真气法力也几乎翻了数倍之多。”

0037.en: "In the end, realm is the foundation!"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “说到底，境界才是根本！”

0037.en: "So what if I don't have a great divine art? With my current strength, I can even kill a true disciple in the middle stage of Qi Refining, fighting across realms!"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “没有大神通又如何？以我现在的实力，即便是炼气中期的真传弟子，我也可以跨境界将对方击杀！”

0037.en: "And there is still the ninth transformation..."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “何况还有第九变”

0037.en: Lv Yang's heart burned with excitement. The ninth transformation, the "Flying Fish Transformation," could break through bottlenecks. In other words, after he reached the ninth level of Qi Refining, he could immediately aim for the peak!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 吕阳心中火热，第九变“飞鱼变”可以突破瓶颈，换而言之，他突破炼气九层后立刻就能冲击圆满！

0037.en: "The path to immortality is in sight! This is worth celebrating!"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “仙途在望啊合该庆贺一番！”

0037.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang's mood greatly improved, and the gloom from failing to master the Taiwei Imperial Edict Treasure Talisman was swept away. He then cheerfully walked out of his quiet room.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 想到这里，吕阳顿时心情大好，没能修成太微敕赦宝箓的阴霾也一扫而空，随后乐呵呵走出了静室。

0037.en: But before that, Lv Yang first used a Qi-Condensing Art.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 不过在那之前，吕阳先施展了一次敛气决。

0037.en: In the next second, his newly advanced, powerful aura was completely concealed, returning to the seventh level of Qi Refining, just a little stronger than five years ago.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 下一秒，他刚突破的磅礴气机便尽数收敛，重新回到炼气七层，比五年前刚好强出了一点点的水平。

0037.en: "Attack with three parts, keep seven for yourself... you can never have too many hidden cards."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “攻敌三分，自留七分底牌这东西总是不嫌多的。”

0037.en: Not long after, the Chu Sheng Sect disciples under the command of the Blood-Clothed Tower quickly gathered. Seeing Lv Yang, they all bowed deeply without a word.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 没过多久，血衣楼治下的圣宗弟子们便立刻蜂拥而至，一个个看到吕阳之后二话不说就行大礼参拜。

0037.en: "Congratulations on coming out of seclusion, Tower Master!"
0037.speaker: 陌生男1
0037.cn: “恭喜楼主出关！”

0037.en: "Rise." Lv Yang waved his hand casually and then asked, "Have there been any troubles near Skull Mountain in the five years I was in seclusion?"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “起来吧。”吕阳随意地摆了摆手，接着问道：“我闭关的这五年里，骷髅山附近有出过什么乱子吗？”

0037.en: "Reporting to the Tower Master, there have been none."
0037.speaker: 陌生男1
0037.cn: “回楼主，并无。”

0037.en: An elderly-looking Chu Sheng Sect disciple took the initiative to speak: "Only once, a disciple from the Divine Martial Sect of the Northern Frontier came to provoke us, but was sent away by Fairy Feixia."
0037.speaker: 陌生男1
0037.cn: 一位年貌苍老的圣宗弟子主动道：“只有一次，北疆神武门有弟子上门挑衅，被飞霞仙子打发走了。”

0037.en: "What about the Profound Female Supreme Yin Treasure Jade? Any news?"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “那玄牝太阴宝玉呢？有消息了吗？”

0037.en: "Not yet..."
0037.speaker: 陌生男1
0037.cn: “暂无.”

0037.en: After learning about the changes over the past five years, Lv Yang dismissed the crowd, planning to enter seclusion again until the opportunity for Foundation Establishment appeared during the great war between the righteous and demonic sects.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 了解完五年来的变化后，吕阳便驱散了众人，打算再来一次闭关，直到正魔大战筑基机缘出现为止。

0037.en: However, at that moment, a rainbow-colored streak of light suddenly landed next to the Blood-Clothed Tower.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 然而就在这时，一道彩霞般的遁光突然落在了血衣楼旁。

0037.en: "Junior Brother Lv, please come out and meet me."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “吕师弟，还请一见。”

0037.en: Hearing this, Lv Yang scanned with his spiritual sense, then quickly got up to greet her with a smile, "I'm sorry to have Senior Sister come here personally. I should have been the one to visit you."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: 吕阳闻言灵识一扫，随后赶忙起身迎接，笑道：“劳驾师姐亲身前来，应该是我主动拜访师姐才是。”

0037.en: "Junior Brother, something has happened."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “师弟，出事了。”

0037.en: Fairy Feixia's expression was serious as she said solemnly, "Recently, the Earth-Gazing Instrument detected that the corpse tide, which was supposed to erupt in fifteen years, has arrived early."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: 只见飞霞仙子面色严肃，郑重道：“近日，观地仪发现原本应该在十五年后才会爆发的尸潮提前了。”

0037.en: "Right now, tens of thousands of zombies are heading towards the market city!"
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “此刻，上万僵尸正在往坊市而来！”

0037.en: "Such a change happened without any warning. There must be a mastermind behind it. I suspect it's those brutes from the Divine Martial Sect of the Northern Frontier."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “如此异变，事前没有任何征兆，背后定然有幕后主使，我怀疑很有可能是北疆神武门的那些蛮子。”

0037.en: "What?"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “什么？”

0037.en: Lv Yang frowned upon hearing this, and his frown deepened when he noticed Fairy Feixia staring straight at him. "Senior Sister needs my help?"
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: 吕阳闻言皱起了眉头，发现飞霞仙子正直勾勾地看着自己之后皱得更深了：“师姐需要我出手相助？”

0037.en: "That's right. Are you willing to brave the corpse tide with me, Junior Brother?"
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “不错，师弟可愿随我闯一闯尸潮？”

0037.en: Fairy Feixia smiled, "The corpse tide is a crisis, but also an opportunity. No matter who the mastermind is, they must have relied on a wondrous treasure to trigger it early."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: 飞霞仙子笑道：“尸潮是危机，但也是机遇，无论幕后主使是谁，能提前引爆尸潮必然是仰仗奇宝。”

0037.en: "If we join forces, we might be able to seize it and gain a great opportunity."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “你我携手，或许可以将其夺来，成就一番机缘。”

0037.en: "Even if something unexpected happens and we get trapped in the corpse tide, with our cultivation levels, the risk is not great!"
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “即便出了意外，身陷尸潮，以你我的修为，风险也不大！”

0037.en: As she spoke, Fairy Feixia's eyebrows danced, her face radiant and full of high spirits.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 说到这里，飞霞仙子眉宇飞扬，光彩照人，显得十分意气风发。

0037.en: However, Lv Yang shook his head.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 然而吕阳却摇了摇头。

0037.en: "I'm sorry, Senior Sister... I am not as strong as you. My strength is low, and I haven't learned any divine arts, only some formations. It's better for me to stay and guard the place."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: “抱歉师姐.小弟不比师姐，实力低微，也没学什么神通，只懂得些许阵法，还是留守坐镇为好。”

0037.en: No matter how small the risk, it was still a risk.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 风险再小，那也是风险。

0037.en: A wise man does not stand under a crumbling wall. All he had to do now was cultivate step-by-step, and he would definitely reach the peak of Qi Refining. Why risk his life?
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 君子不立危墙之下，他现在可是只要按部就班修炼，就肯定能够突破炼气大圆满，何必要冒险拼命？

0037.en: Not worth it!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 不值得！

0037.en: The main goal in this life was to reach the peak of Qi Refining. He could take risks after that, but before then, it was better to be cautious.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 这一世的首要目标就是突破炼气大圆满，要浪也是等突破后再浪，在那之前行事还是应该稳妥起见。

0037.en: "Junior Brother, you're not going?" Seeing Lv Yang refuse, Fairy Feixia's beautiful eyebrows furrowed slightly. Her usually cold expression showing such distress made her look pitiful. "The path of immortality is short. To achieve something, one must be willing to risk everything... I thought you understood this."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “师弟你不打算去？”见吕阳拒绝，飞霞仙子顿时秀眉微蹙，素来清冷的她露出如此为难之色，顿时让人感觉我见犹怜：“仙道苦短，想有所成就，唯有破釜沉舟.我本以为你懂得这个道理。”

0037.en: Lv Yang's Daoist heart was like iron, completely unmoved. "Times are different now. Please understand, Senior Sister."
0037.speaker: 吕阳
0037.cn: 吕阳道心似铁，毫不动摇：“今时不同往日，还请师姐理解。”

0037.en: "Junior Brother, you've changed."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: “师弟，你变了。”

0037.en: Fairy Feixia shook her head in disappointment, "In that case, you can stay and guard the market city. But you won't get any share of the opportunities."
0037.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0037.cn: 飞霞仙子失望地摇了摇头：“既然如此，你便留在坊市坐镇吧，只不过到时候机缘也没有你的份了。”

0037.en: Lv Yang just smiled and didn't reply.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 吕阳闻言笑了笑，没有回答。

0037.en: To be honest, he felt that Fairy Feixia wasn't like a typical Chu Sheng Sect disciple... how to put it... she had a certain innocence, as if she had never been truly beaten down by the sect.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 说实话，他其实感觉飞霞仙子不太像圣宗弟子该怎么说呢，她有一种没有被圣宗毒打过的天真。

0037.en: With the corpse tide here, even if you get a huge opportunity, don't you still have to escape back to the market city I'm guarding?
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 有尸潮在，你就算得了天大机缘，最后不还是得逃回我坐镇的坊市？

0037.en: At that time, you say the opportunity is not for me? Then don't blame me for saying you fought bravely and sacrificed yourselves on the front lines against the corpse tide...
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 到了那时，你说机缘没有我的份？那就不要怪我说你们英勇奋战，最后牺牲在抗击尸潮的第一线了

0038.en: Chapter 38: Shenwu Gate
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 第38章 神武门

0038.en: At dusk, inside the Blood-Robed Tower.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 黄昏时分，血衣楼内。

0038.en: The setting sun was like blood. As another cycle of cultivation ended, Lv Yang slowly refined the spiritual energy of heaven and earth into his Dantian, then transformed it into True Qi that flowed to his limbs and bones.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 残阳如血，随着又一个周天的运功结束，吕阳缓缓将天地灵气炼入丹田，再化为真气走向四肢百骸。

0038.en: The Qi moved through his meridians like a dragon returning to the sea.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 气走经脉，犹如龙归大海。

0038.en: "Soon. Once I master the final Flying Fish Transformation and combine the nine transformations, I will have completely refined the third-grade True Qi of the 'Nine Transformations Dragon Art'—the 'True Dragon Sha'."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “快了，只要修出最后的飞鱼变，再将九变合一，就能彻底炼就《九变化龙决》的三品真气‘真龙煞’。”

0038.en: "When I master the 'True Dragon Sha,' it will be about time for the great war between the righteous and demonic sects to begin. It will be perfect timing, allowing me to compete for the Foundation Establishment opportunity at Skull Mountain in my strongest state. Only the Foundation Establishment opportunity is worth the risk and the fight. Everything else is meaningless."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “等我修成‘真龙煞’，也差不多到了正魔大战开启的时候，正好可以完美衔接，让我以最强的状态去争夺骷髅山的筑基机缘也只有筑基机缘，才值得我去冒险，拼命，其他的都是虚妄.”

0038.en: After finishing his cultivation for the day, Lv Yang walked out of the quiet room.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 结束了今日的修炼，吕阳走出静室。

0038.en: Outside the quiet room, a woman with a proud posture and sharp eyes had been waiting for a long time. Upon seeing Lv Yang, she immediately came forward and handed him a jade slip.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 而在静室外，一位身姿傲人，眉宇锐利的女子早已等候多时，看到吕阳之后立刻上前递上一块玉简。

0038.en: "Dao Brother, the movements of the corpse tide for today have arrived."
0038.speaker: 云妙清
0038.cn: “道兄，尸潮今日的动向已经送来了。”

0038.en: Lv Yang took the jade slip and smiled slightly, "Thank you, Fellow Daoist Yun."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: 吕阳接过玉简，微微一笑：“多谢云道友。”

0038.en: This woman was, in fact, Yun Miaoqing.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 此女，赫然是云妙清。

0038.en: She was originally a disciple of the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion. Although Lv Yang had already learned the Divine Firmament Sword Art, he still bought her because of their connection in a past life.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她本是玉枢剑阁的弟子，虽然吕阳早已学会了神霄御剑真决，但看在前世的缘分还是把她买了下来。

0038.en: To be fair, he originally felt that since they had actually practiced dual cultivation in a past life, he didn't mind doing a good deed and helping Yun Miaoqing, as long as it didn't hinder him. Following him was better than being bought by other Chu Sheng Sect disciples and used as a cauldron until she was drained into a husk.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 平心而论，他本意是觉得前世两人毕竟有过双修之实，所以在不妨碍到自己的情况下，他也不介意做点好事，帮云妙清一把，跟着自己总比被其他圣宗弟子买走，作为鼎炉被采补成人渣要好。

0038.en: However, he didn't expect this decision to bring him a pleasant surprise.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 然而没想到这个决定，反而给了他意外惊喜。

0038.en: Perhaps because he hadn't practiced dual cultivation with Yun Miaoqing in this life and instead treated her with respect like a guest, focusing only on his hard training, her favorability towards him had greatly increased.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 或许是因为这一世他没有和云妙清双修过，反而相敬如宾，只想着苦修，云妙清居然对他好感大增。

0038.en: "Dao Brother, you are a good person. Why must you stay in the Chu Sheng Sect?"
0038.speaker: 云妙清
0038.cn: “道兄，你是一个好人，何必留在初圣魔门？”

0038.en: Yun Miaoqing walked to Lv Yang's side and whispered, "Right now, the corpse tide is breaking out. Senior Brother, why don't you fake your death and come with me to the Sword Pavilion to join the righteous path..."
0038.speaker: 云妙清
0038.cn: 云妙清走到吕阳身旁，低声道：“此刻正值尸潮爆发，师兄不如假死，随我一同前往剑阁皈依正道”

0038.en: As she spoke, Yun Miaoqing looked at Lv Yang, her beautiful eyes filled with affection.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 说到这里，云妙清看着吕阳，美眸之中隐含情意。

0038.en: In her most desperate and helpless moments, it was the person before her who saved her from a sea of suffering. Not only did he not harm her in the slightest, but he also gave her a place to stay.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 在她最绝望，最无力的时候，是眼前之人将她救出了苦海，不仅对她秋毫无犯，还给了她容身之所。

0038.en: Although he came from a demonic sect, he was a perfect gentleman.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 虽出身魔门，却是谦谦君子。

0038.en: Not to mention, over ten years, she had watched him grow step by step. He had a high cultivation level, strong talent, and most importantly, he was very handsome.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 更别说十年下来，她是亲眼看着对方一步步成长至今的，修为高，天赋强，最重要的是长得还很帅。

0038.en: If he could join the Sword Pavilion, perhaps she could...
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 如果他能拜入剑阁，或许就能和自己

0038.en: As she thought about it, a blush suddenly appeared on Yun Miaoqing's pretty face. It was unclear what she was thinking about.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 想着想着，云妙清的俏脸陡然泛起一抹晕红，也不知道想到了什么。

0038.en: This behavior made Lv Yang recall how she had looked at him with an unyielding face and called him a demon lord in previous lives. For a moment, he found it quite interesting.
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: 这般姿态，让吕阳不禁想起了对方前几世还一脸不屈对着他喊魔头的样子，一时间只觉得颇有意思。

0038.en: Of course, he had no interest in romance.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 当然，他对男欢女爱并无兴趣。

0038.en: What he truly valued was that Yun Miaoqing's status in the Jade Pivot Sword Pavilion seemed to be quite high. She actually claimed that if she recommended him, the Sword Pavilion would surely accept him.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 真正让他看重的是云妙清在玉枢剑阁的身份似乎不低，居然声称只要有她举荐，剑阁必然会接纳他。

0038.en: "Cultivating in the Chu Sheng Sect is like walking on thin ice. If possible, I would rather go to a sect with a better culture."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “圣宗修行如履薄冰，可以的话我还是想去门风好一点的宗门”

0038.en: Yun Miaoqing might be his stepping stone to join the righteous path in the future.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 云妙清，或许就是未来自己转投正道的敲门砖。

0038.en: "How are Senior Sister Feixia and the others?"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “飞霞师姐她们如何了？”

0038.en: "Those few demonic cultivators broke through the corpse tide at Jueyin Ridge a few days ago. A mysterious expert also appeared, but they were repelled and chased away."
0038.speaker: 云妙清
0038.cn: “那几个魔修前几日还在厥阴岭大破尸潮，还有神秘强者出手，却被她们击退，而后追杀过去了。”

0038.en: Yun Miaoqing handed over another jade slip.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 云妙清又递上了一枚玉简。

0038.en: Lv Yang took the jade slip, and with a sweep of his spiritual sense, the scenes from that day immediately appeared in his mind.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳接过玉简，灵识一扫，事发当日种种景象立刻映照心头。

0038.en: "I see... It seems there really is a mastermind behind the early outbreak of the corpse tide. Disciples of the Shenwu Gate? And the strange treasure they used to accelerate the corpse tide is..."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “原来如此.看来尸潮提前爆发还真有幕后黑手，是神武门的弟子？而他们用来催化尸潮的奇宝”

0038.en: At this point, Lv Yang suddenly froze and then shot to his feet.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 看到这里，吕阳突然一愣，随后猛然起身。

0038.en: "Mysterious Female Grand Yin Treasure Jade!?"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “玄牝太阴宝玉！？”

0038.en: That's right, the intelligence clearly showed that the masterminds behind the corpse tide outbreak, the disciples of the Shenwu Gate, possessed a thumb-sized Mysterious Female Grand Yin Treasure Jade!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 不错，情报内赫然显示尸潮爆发的幕后黑手，神武门弟子手中赫然有一枚拇指大小的玄牝太阴宝玉！

0038.en: "If I can get this treasure jade, I can immediately master the Mysterious Yin Form-Grabbing Great Art. With time, even the 'Grand Yin Form-Shedding Corpse Liberation True Art' would not be a dream. Considering the rarity of the treasure jade, this is probably my only chance in this life. If I give up, I will likely miss it forever."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “如果能得到这枚宝玉，我立刻就能修成玄阴摄形大法，假以时日，就是《太阴蜕形尸解真法》也不是梦，考虑到宝玉的稀有性，这恐怕是我此生唯一的机会，一旦放弃，很有可能就此错过。”

0038.en: "But... if not in this life, then in the next. If I miss it, I miss it!"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “不过.此生不行，来生再说，错过就错过了！”

0038.en: Lv Yang's expression turned grim, and he sat back down. Despite unexpectedly discovering the Grand Yin Treasure Jade he had dreamed of, he felt no joy at all.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳神色阴沉，重新坐了回去，尽管意外发现了梦寐以求的太阴宝玉，可他却没有感觉到丝毫喜悦。

0038.en: He only felt a bone-chilling cold and his heart was filled with vigilance.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 他只觉得彻骨冰寒，心中充满了警惕。

0038.en: "Whatever I want, it just gets delivered to my door. How can there be such a lucky thing in the world? After all, I'm not a child of destiny like Xiao Shiye."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “我想要什么，什么就送上门来天底下岂有如此幸运之事，毕竟我又不是萧石叶那种天命之子。”

0038.en: Moreover, even Xiao Shiye's luck was granted by someone else!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 更何况，萧石叶的运气也是别人授予的！

0038.en: "Could it be that Hongyun Daoist again?"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “该不会又是那位鸿运道人吧？”

0038.en: The thought that this might all be the work of a Foundation Establishment expert manipulating fate and plotting in the shadows made Lv Yang decide immediately.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 一想到这一切可能又是有筑基真人在拨弄因果，暗中算计，吕阳当即打定了主意。

0038.en: "I'm not going out!"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “我就不出去！”

0038.en: The situation at Skull Mountain was treacherous. It was safest to stay in the marketplace and control the formation. As long as a Foundation Establishment expert didn't intervene, he was as solid as a mountain.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 如今的骷髅山局势诡谲，还是留在坊市内主持阵法最安全，只要筑基真人不出手，他都是稳如泰山。

0038.en: "Besides, just because I don't go out doesn't mean I have no chance of getting the treasure jade."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “况且，我不出去，也不是就没机会得到宝玉了。”

0038.en: Weren't Fairy Feixia and the others still out there?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 这不是还有飞霞仙子他们么。

0038.en: After all, the report said they had chased after them. If they could seize the treasure jade and escape back to the marketplace, wouldn't that be his chance?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 毕竟情报里说她们可是追杀过去了，只要她们能夺得宝玉，再逃回坊市，那自己的机会不就来了么。

0038.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang couldn't help but cheer for Fairy Feixia from the bottom of his heart.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 想到这里，吕阳不禁发自内心地为飞霞仙子加起油来

0038.en: Time flew by.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 时光飞逝。

0038.en: Another day, inside the Blood-Robed Tower.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 又一日，血衣楼内。

0038.en: Lv Yang was meditating and refining Qi when he suddenly felt something. He rode a streak of light out of the tower and gazed into the distance, looking towards the outskirts of the marketplace.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳正在打坐炼气，突然心有所感，驾起一道遁光就来到了楼外，极目远眺，朝着坊市的外围看去。

0038.en: "Boom! Boom! Boom!"
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: “轰隆隆！”

0038.en: In the distant sky, a series of thunderous explosions, accompanied by blooming mushroom clouds, rapidly spread from the horizon towards the marketplace. It was a chase scene. Leading the chase was Fairy Feixia's very distinctive rosy-cloud escape light.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 只见远方天空，一道道雷鸣般的炸响声伴随着一朵朵扩散的爆炸云，从地平线的尽头迅速朝着坊市蔓延而来，赫然是一场遁光追逐战，跑在最前头的则是飞霞仙子那特征极为明显的彩霞遁光。

0038.en: "One of them is missing?"
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “少了一个？”

0038.en: Lv Yang raised an eyebrow. The Skull Mountain marketplace had four late-stage Qi Refiners, including himself: Fairy Feixia, Lu Yanchun, and an unnamed senior brother.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳眉毛一扬，骷髅山坊市包括他自己共有四位炼气后期，飞霞仙子，陆元淳，还有一位无名师兄。

0038.en: But now, Lv Yang could only see the figures of Fairy Feixia and Lu Yanchun.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 然而此刻，吕阳却只看到了飞霞仙子和陆元淳的身影。

0038.en: "Activate the formation."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “起阵。”

0038.en: Lv Yang calmly gave the order. The Chu Sheng Sect disciples in the marketplace immediately took their positions, and formation flags flew, instantly raising a magnificent formation.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳不慌不忙，一声令下，坊市内的圣宗弟子立刻排布开来，阵旗飞扬，顷刻间撑起一道恢弘阵法。

0038.en: The Hundred Skeletons True Great Formation!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 百骸还真大阵！

0038.en: This was a seventh-grade formation, a top-tier formation at the Qi Refining level. With Lv Yang controlling it, he could even fight a cultivator at the Great Perfection of Qi Refining.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 这座阵法位列七品，乃是炼气层次的顶尖阵法，吕阳主持阵法，就算是炼气大圆满的修士也能一战。

0038.en: But in the next second, something unexpected happened!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 然而下一秒，异变突生！

0038.en: Lu Yanchun suddenly took out a token, activated it with a hand seal, and directly opened a gap in the originally closed formation.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 只见陆元淳突然取出了一块令牌，掐诀催动，竟然直接开启原本闭合的大阵，使其露出了一个缺口。

0038.en: "Now!"
0038.speaker: 陆元淳
0038.cn: “就是现在！”

0038.en: Almost at the same time, an excited shout came from outside the marketplace. Then, several streaks of spiritual light flew out, turning into formation flags and spreading out in all directions.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 几乎同时，坊市外也响起了一声兴奋至极的大呼，随后就见几道灵光飞掠而出，化作阵旗分布四方。

0038.en: Then, a small formation appeared at the gap Lu Yanchun had opened, fixing it in place so that even Lv Yang couldn't close it!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 紧接着，一道微型小阵就出现在了陆元淳开启的缺口上，将其固定了起来，以至于吕阳都无法关闭！

0038.en: "Shenwu Gate..."
0038.speaker: 吕阳
0038.cn: “神武门”

0038.en: Lv Yang frowned slightly, immediately recognizing the attackers. It was clear that the Shenwu Gate had been ambushing outside the marketplace for a long time, just waiting for such an opportunity.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 吕阳眉头微皱，立刻认出了出手一方，显然神武门已经在坊市外埋伏许久，就等着这么一个机会了。

0038.en: Now that the formation had been forced open, the Shenwu Gate could charge into the marketplace!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 如今阵法被强行撑开一个缺口，神武门完全可以借此杀入坊市！

0038.en: The culprit behind all this, Lu Yanchun, just gave the marketplace a cold look, then flew away in the opposite direction!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 而导致这一切的罪魁祸首，陆元淳却只是冷漠地看了一眼坊市，随后纵起遁光朝着相反的方向离去！

0038.en: He obviously knew what he had done, but he didn't care. In fact, he had done it on purpose, using the marketplace as a pawn so he could escape. For the Shenwu Gate, it was better to seize this great opportunity to destroy the Skull Mountain marketplace than to continue chasing him.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 他显然也明白自己做了什么，只不过他并不在意，甚至他本就是刻意为之，将坊市当成弃子，他好逃出生天，毕竟对神武门而言，比起继续追杀他，不如抓住这大好良机一举覆灭骷髅山坊市。

0038.en: As for the fellow disciples of the Chu Sheng Sect in the marketplace?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 至于坊市内的圣宗同门？

0038.en: It was just their bad luck!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 算他们倒霉！

0039.en: Chapter 39: Enemy Attack
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 第39章 敌袭

0039.en: "Lu Yuanchun! You bastard!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “陆元淳！混账！”

0039.en: Seeing the market's grand formation breached, Fairy Feixia was furious. But then, she did the exact opposite of what Lu Yuanchun did.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 见到坊市的大阵被洞开一个缺口，飞霞仙子目眦欲裂，紧接着却是做出了和陆元淳截然相反的动作。

0039.en: "Junior Brother, let's team up!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “师弟，你我联手！”

0039.en: In a flash of light, Fairy Feixia landed in the market. She then turned to defend the breach in the formation, saying, "We absolutely cannot let the Shenwu Sect get inside."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: 遁光一闪，飞霞仙子直接落入坊市，随后转身死守在了大阵缺口处：“绝对不能让神武门冲进坊市.”

0039.en: Lv Yang glanced at Fairy Feixia and his opinion of her changed. She had blood on her lips and her energy was weak, clearly she was badly injured. If she had run with Lu Yuanchun, she might have had a chance to escape. Yet, she chose to stay and defend the market.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 吕阳闻言瞥了一眼飞霞仙子，倒是对她颇为改观，毕竟看其模样，朱唇染血，气机萎靡，显然也受了不小的伤，如果跟着陆元淳一起跑，说不定还有希望逃出生天，偏偏她却选择留在了坊市内。

0039.en: Could she be a traitor?
0039.speaker: 吕阳
0039.cn: 不会是内鬼吧？

0039.en: Believing that there were no good people in the Chu Sheng Sect, Lv Yang immediately suspected Fairy Feixia. She also noticed his wary gaze.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 秉承着圣宗无好人的想法，吕阳第一时间就怀疑到了飞霞仙子身上，后者也注意到了他警惕的眼神。

0039.en: "We can't escape!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “逃不了的！”

0039.en: Fairy Feixia sighed, having guessed Lv Yang's thoughts. She said in a low voice, "The Shenwu Sect has been planning this for a long time. Trying to escape is a dead end."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子无奈地叹了口气，竟然猜出了吕阳的想法，低声道：“神武门谋划已久，逃反而死路一条。”

0039.en: "Our only chance of survival is to stay here, defend, and wait for reinforcements!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “留下来固守待援，才有一线生机！”

0039.en: Lv Yang was still doubtful. "Senior Sister, you understand this, so how could Senior Brother Lu not know? If so, why did he run?"
0039.speaker: 吕阳
0039.cn: 吕阳闻言依旧心有疑惑：“这道理师姐明白，那位陆师兄岂会不知？既然如此，他又是为什么要逃？”

0039.en: "Because he has the precious jade!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “因为宝玉在他那里！”

0039.en: At this point, Fairy Feixia became furious. "The Shenwu Sect used that Profound Yin Treasure Jade as bait to set an ambush. But Lu Yuanchun coveted the jade and took it by force. He not only dragged us into the trap with him, but he also ignored Senior Brother Chen's fate and abandoned us to escape by himself!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: 说到这里，飞霞仙子顿时气急败坏道：“神武门以那块玄牝太阴宝玉为诱饵，设下埋伏，偏偏陆元淳贪图宝玉，强行夺宝，不仅连累我等一同落入陷阱，还罔顾陈师兄死活，丢下我等自己逃走！”

0039.en: "So, he's fleeing to escape punishment?"
0039.speaker: 吕阳
0039.cn: “这么说，他是畏罪潜逃？”

0039.en: Lv Yang understood. Lu Yuanchun knew what he did was wrong. If he stayed in the market, Fairy Feixia would eventually make him pay.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 吕阳恍然大悟，显然陆元淳也知道他这事做的不地道，真要留在坊市，迟早要被飞霞仙子秋后算账。

0039.en: That's why he chose such an extreme measure.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这才选择了如此极端的手段。

0039.en: It also made sense why Fairy Feixia didn't run with Lu Yuanchun. If she had, he might have killed her to silence her.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 如此一来，飞霞仙子没有跟着陆元淳逃跑也是情理之中了，真要那么做了，难保不会被其杀人灭口。

0039.en: "Demons, today you will die!"
0039.speaker: 陌生男1
0039.cn: “魔头，今日就是你们的死期！”

0039.en: A brilliant aura of blood and energy lit up the sky, like fiery clouds rolling in. Finally, a muscular man in armor appeared, his expression fierce.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 煌煌气血映照天穹，仿佛一团团火烧云滚空而来，最后现出一位披坚执锐的壮汉，为首者神色凶戾。

0039.en: "It's 'Divine Fist' Wu Zhichong!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “是‘神拳’吴志冲！”

0039.en: Fairy Feixia's face was serious. She whispered, "He is at the ninth level of Qi Refining, only one step away from the Great Perfection stage. Junior Brother, be very careful."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子俏脸严肃，低声道：“此人已是炼气九层境界，距离大圆满只有一步之遥，师弟千万小心。”

0039.en: "Senior Brother Chen died because he was hit by his punch, his body was completely destroyed."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “陈师兄就是中了他一拳，这才法体崩毁而死”

0039.en: Before Fairy Feixia could finish, the man named Wu Zhichong was already speeding towards them. He raised his arm high above his head, pulling it back like a bow.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子话音未落，那位名为吴志冲的壮汉已经驾遁光飞驰而来，手臂高举过头，如挽弓般向后拉。

0039.en: "Die!"
0039.speaker: 吴志冲

0039.en: The next moment, he threw a punch!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 下一秒，一拳打出！

0039.en: A piercing sonic boom echoed in all directions. The square fist imprint shot forward, and for a moment, Lv Yang felt a mountain crushing down on him!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 刺耳的爆鸣声瞬间响彻四方，方正的拳印直捣黄龙，一瞬间，吕阳只感觉有一座山朝着他扑面压来！

0039.en: Boom!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 轰隆！

0039.en: At the critical moment, Fairy Feixia stepped forward. Her cloud-like sleeves fluttered, and she released clusters of glowing clouds surrounded by clear energy to block Wu Zhichong's punch.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 关键时刻，飞霞仙子一步站出，云袖飘扬，一团团清气缭绕的光云喷吐而出，接住了吴志冲这一拳。

0039.en: Instantly, the colorful misty clouds exploded, managing to stop Wu Zhichong outside the market. However, the clouds lost most of their treasured light.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 霎时间，只见彩霞烟云团团爆散，总算将吴志冲拦在了坊市之外，然而彩霞也因此失去了大半宝光。

0039.en: Seeing this, a flash of pain crossed Fairy Feixia's eyes.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 见到这一幕，飞霞仙子眼中顿时闪过一抹痛惜。

0039.en: This Rosy-Cloud Mist was one of her magic treasures, the "Rosy-Cloud Mist Shroud." She had spent many years refining it, but now it had been damaged repeatedly.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这彩霞烟云乃是她的一桩法宝，名为“栖霞烟罗罩”，是她苦心祭炼多年而成，此番却是连番受损。

0039.en: At the same time, another streak of light descended from the sky.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 与此同时，天空中又是一道遁光落下。

0039.en: When the figure appeared, it was Lu Yuanchun, who had just fled. His face was extremely pale, and another cultivator was following close behind him.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 现出身形后，赫然是刚刚逃走的陆元淳，只见他此时的脸色极为难看，同时身后竟还跟着一位修士。

0039.en: "'Mountain-Moving Daoist' Duanmu Yuan."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “‘搬山道人’端木元”

0039.en: Fairy Feixia frowned, recognizing the person blocking Lu Yuanchun. It was another late-stage Qi Refining expert from the Shenwu Sect, just as strong as her.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子眉头紧皱，认出了堵截陆元淳的人，正是另一位神武门的炼气后期，论实力丝毫不弱于她。

0039.en: "Lu Yuanchun, if you want to live, come back and fight with me!"
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: “陆元淳，还想活命就回来，你我联手！”

0039.en: Fairy Feixia said in a serious tone. Although the Shenwu Sect's attack was fierce, she felt they still had a chance with three late-stage Qi Refining cultivators on their side.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子沉声道，虽然神武门来势汹汹，但在她看来自己这边还有三位炼气后期，并不是毫无胜算。

0039.en: Even if Lv Yang was just an ordinary disciple, he could handle early and mid-stage cultivators. If she and Lu Yuanchun could hold off Wu Zhichong and the Mountain-Moving Daoist, Lv Yang could deal with the other Shenwu Sect disciples. They might have a chance to defend the market!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 就算吕阳乃是普通弟子出身，没什么神通，对付炼气初期和中期还是没问题的，只要自己和陆元淳能挡住吴志冲和搬山道人，让吕阳腾出手去对付其他神武门的弟子，或许还有机会守住坊市！

0039.en: "...Fine! Let's fight for our lives. Buy me some time!"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “.好！那就拼死一搏，为我争取时间！”

0039.en: As he spoke, Lu Yuanchun took a deep breath and burned his blood essence. A bloody light erupted from the top of his head, and his power instantly surged.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 话音落下，只见陆元淳深吸一口气，竟直接燃烧精血，天灵盖中喷出团团血光，气机瞬间暴涨数倍。

0039.en: Seeing this, Fairy Feixia finally felt a sense of relief.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 见到这一幕，飞霞仙子总算松了口气。

0039.en: 'He is a disciple of the Sky Mending Peak Master, after all. He must have some powerful techniques. With my help, we should be able to defend the market.'
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: ‘此人毕竟是补天峰主的弟子，筑基门下，或许还有什么厉害手段，再有我协力，应当能守住坊市.’

0039.en: With that thought, Fairy Feixia no longer held back. She once again summoned the "Rosy-Cloud Mist Shroud" to buy more time.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 想到这里，飞霞仙子也不藏私，再度祭起“栖霞烟罗罩”，试图争取时间。

0039.en: "Stop him!"
0039.speaker: 吴志冲
0039.cn: “打断他！”

0039.en: Although Wu Zhichong didn't know what Lu Yuanchun's technique was, he couldn't let him use it. He immediately flew towards Lu Yuanchun to attack.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 吴志冲虽然不知道陆元淳神通，但也不可能任由其发挥，当即纵起一道遁光朝着陆元淳的方向杀去。

0039.en: Seeing this, Fairy Feixia pushed her true qi to its limit to block the other late-stage expert, Duanmu Yuan. She shouted to Lv Yang, "Junior Brother Lv, now! If we can stop Wu Zhichong, we can still turn this around."
0039.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子见状一边强提真气，使出浑身解数拦住了神武门的另一位炼气后期，搬山道人端木元，一边对着身旁的吕阳高声道：“吕师弟，快出手！只要拦住吴志冲，此番我等还有翻盘之机.”

0039.en: "Lv Yang? An ordinary disciple... What good is he, even if he broke through to the late stage?"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “吕阳？一个普通弟子.就算突破炼气后期又有什么用？”

0039.en: Lu Yuanchun glanced at Lv Yang with a cold sneer in his heart.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 陆元淳瞥了一眼吕阳，心中冷笑。

0039.en: In his eyes, Lv Yang was just a nobody who got lucky. He couldn't compare to a Foundation Establishment disciple like himself.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 在他眼中，吕阳只不过是一个无名之辈，撞了大运才突破后期的小人物，和他这种筑基弟子没法比。

0039.en: This thought made him even more determined.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 想到这里，他更加坚定了心中想法。

0039.en: Fairy Feixia thought they had a chance, but Lu Yuanchun disagreed. He believed she was overlooking a decisive factor.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 飞霞仙子觉得还有胜算，陆元淳却不这么认为，因为在他看来飞霞仙子明显忽略了一个决定性因素。

0039.en: The corpse tide!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 那就是尸潮！

0039.en: Even if they could hold off the Shenwu Sect, as long as the breach in the formation was open, they would all be wiped out when the corpse tide arrived!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 即便他们真能挡下神武门众人，可是只要阵法的缺口还在，等到尸潮到来，依旧是全军覆没的下场！

0039.en: Therefore, in the next moment, Lu Yuanchun made his move.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 因此下一秒，陆元淳出手了。

0039.en: "Witness my divine power!"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “看我神威！”

0039.en: Hearing this, Fairy Feixia's spirits lifted. She watched as the blood-red light around Lu Yuanchun condensed, forming a ferocious and magnificent demonic shadow.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 话音落下，飞霞仙子顿时精神一振，看着陆元淳周身血光凝合，显化出了一尊凶神恶煞的恢弘魔影。

0039.en: She didn't expect Lu Yuanchun to kill Wu Zhichong, but if he could just injure him badly, there would be hope.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她也不求陆元淳能直接斩杀吴志冲，只要将其重创，就有希望

0039.en: "Blood Shadow Heaven Escape Technique!"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “血影遁天大法！”

0039.en: The demonic shadow flashed, and Lu Yuanchun's figure vanished. He reappeared as a streak of blood-red light hundreds of meters away, speeding out of Skeleton Mountain.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 只见魔影一闪，陆元淳的身影瞬间消失，化作一道血光出现在数百米开外，朝着骷髅山外疾驰而去。

0039.en: For a moment, Fairy Feixia was stunned.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 一时间，飞霞仙子都看傻了。

0039.en: She had clearly underestimated how shameless Lu Yuanchun was. She never imagined he would pretend to cooperate while actually using her as a shield.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她显然低估了陆元淳的无耻，全然没有想到陆元淳假意与她合作，实际上居然是将她当成了挡箭牌。

0039.en: But just then, the sky outside Skeleton Mountain suddenly darkened.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 然而就在这时，骷髅山外陡然天色一暗。

0039.en: "Trying to leave? You should stay!"
0039.speaker: 陌生男2
0039.cn: “想走？还是留下吧！”

0039.en: With a cold laugh, the streak of blood-red light that was Lu Yuanchun was cut off. He was forced back to Skeleton Mountain, letting out a terrified scream.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 一声冷笑，陆元淳所化的血色遁光竟被拦腰击断，被迫重返骷髅山，其中传出了陆元淳惊恐的叫声：

0039.en: "Great Perfection of Qi Refining!?"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “炼气大圆满！？”

0039.en: He had burned half his blood essence to use that escape technique. No one in the late Qi Refining stage could have stopped him. Only a Great Perfection expert could!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 他燃烧了大半精血才施展而出的血遁，炼气后期绝对没有人可以拦住，能拦住的，唯有炼气大圆满！

0039.en: "The heavens want me dead."
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “天要亡我.”

0039.en: Lu Yuanchun's heart was filled with bitterness. He had finally gotten the Profound Yin Treasure Jade. If he had escaped, the Sky Mending Peak Master would have surely valued him.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 陆元淳心中满是不甘，他好不容易抢到了玄牝太阴宝玉，只要逃出生天，必能得到补天峰主的看重。

0039.en: This was his great chance, especially since Zhao Xuhe had been abandoned by the Peak Master!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 尤其是在赵旭河被补天峰主放弃的当下，更是他的机会！

0039.en: But now, it was all for nothing.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 然而现在，一切成空。

0039.en: Just then, Lu Yuanchun suddenly heard Lv Yang's voice in his ear. "Senior Brother Lu, come back to the market first."
0039.speaker: 吕阳
0039.cn: 就在这时，陆元淳的耳边突然传来了吕阳的声音：“陆师兄，先回坊市.”

0039.en: "What's the point now?"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: “事到如今，又有何用？”

0039.en: Lu Yuanchun was in despair. He had no interest in replying to Lv Yang. As he saw it, the only difference between them now was who would die first.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 陆元淳万念俱灰，连回应吕阳的兴趣都没有，毕竟在他看来，此刻吕阳和他无非是早死晚死的区别

0039.en: The next moment, Lv Yang, who had been silent, suddenly stepped forward. With a wave of his large sleeves and a flick of his ten fingers, he instantly cast dozens of formation patterns around the market. These patterns broke the small array the Shenwu Sect had used to keep the formation's breach open. Then, he controlled the main formation and closed it.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 下一秒，却见此前一直沉默的吕阳突然向前一步，大袖飞扬，十指连弹，转瞬间就挥洒出了数十道阵纹落在坊市四周，破开了神武门固定大阵缺口的微型小阵，紧接着操纵阵法就是慕然一合。

0039.en: Boom!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 轰隆！

0039.en: In an instant, dense formation patterns appeared, forming a curtain of light that covered the inside and outside of the market. The grand formation was restored and complete again!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 霎时间，密密麻麻的阵纹浮现而出，化作光幕笼罩坊市内外，大阵竟就这样重新弥合，恢复完整了！

0039.en: Lu Yuanchun's eyes widened in shock. Then, with a jolt, he quickly flew his blood-red light back into the market, shouting, "Brother Lv, save me!!!"
0039.speaker: 陆元淳
0039.cn: 陆元淳见状瞬间瞪大了双眼，随后一个激灵，连忙操纵血光飞遁而回，高声大喊：“吕兄救我！！！”

0040.en: "Activate the array!"
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “阵起！”

0040.en: Above the Skull Mountain Market, the fully restored Hundred Skeletons True Array rumbled to life, startling Wu Zhichong and Duanmu Yuan into pulling away from each other.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 骷髅山坊市上空，恢复完整的百骸还真大阵轰隆隆转动，顿时就将吴志冲和端木元惊得拉开了距离。

0040.en: Seizing the opportunity, Lu Yuanchun transformed into a streak of blood-red light and flew past.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 抓住这个空当，陆元淳化身血光飞驰而过。

0040.en: The array's patterns on the outside split open, allowing Lu Yuanchun to pass through before quickly closing again, giving no opportunity for outsiders to exploit it.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 大阵外的阵纹应声分开，任由陆元淳通过，紧接着又重新闭合，动作之快没有给外人半点可乘之机。

0040.en: "Thank you for your help, Brother Lv."
0040.speaker: 陆元淳
0040.cn: “多谢吕兄相助.”

0040.en: Landing inside the array, the blood-red light dissipated, revealing Lu Yuanchun's sorry state. His pale face was filled with shock and uncertainty:
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 落入阵中，血光散去，显露出了陆元淳的狼狈模样，只见他那张煞白的脸庞上还带着几分惊疑不定：

0040.en: "Brother Lv, you're an array master?"
0040.speaker: 陆元淳
0040.cn: “吕兄居然是一位阵法师？”

0040.en: If he were not an array master, how could he have restored the array and resolved a situation of certain death?
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 若非阵法师，怎么可能重整阵法，化解原本必死的危局。

0040.en: "I'm flattered, Senior Brother. I'm merely a ninth-grade one." Lv Yang smiled faintly. "After several days of study, I can only unleash a small fraction of this array's power."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “让师兄见笑了，不过堪堪九品罢了。”吕阳淡淡一笑：“钻研数日，方能略微施展出这大阵的威力。”

0040.en: Lv Yang spoke modestly, but Lu Yuanchun's expression was solemn.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 吕阳说得简单，陆元淳却满脸郑重。

0040.en: Among the hundred arts of cultivation, the path of arrays is number one!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 修仙百艺，阵道第一！

0040.en: A late-stage Qi Refining cultivator and a late-stage Qi Refining array master were completely different in value. The latter could almost be considered equal to a cultivator at the peak of Qi Refining!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 一位炼气后期，和一位炼气后期的阵法师，两者的价值不可同日而语，后者几乎可以视作炼气圆满！

0040.en: "By the way, Senior Brother Lu, you seem to have made quite a gain this time."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “话说回来，陆师兄此番收获不小嘛。”

0040.en: Lv Yang looked at Lu Yuanchun with a faint smile, and under his gaze, Lu Yuanchun's expression stiffened as cold sweat trickled down.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 吕阳似笑非笑地看着陆元淳，而在他的注视下，陆元淳脸上的表情也渐渐僵硬，冷汗顿时流了下来。

0040.en: However, he regained his composure in the next moment.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 然而下一秒，他就恢复了镇定。

0040.en: "Brother Lv, I have been keeping the 'Profound Female Grand Yin Treasure Jade' for you for a long time. Today, it's time to return it to its rightful owner!"
0040.speaker: 陆元淳
0040.cn: “吕兄，‘玄牝太阴宝玉’我帮你保管许久，今日也该物归原主了！”

0040.en: After speaking, Lu Yuanchun took out a small box, opened the lid, and inside lay a white jade stone with seven apertures, closely resembling a human figure.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 说完，陆元淳便直接取出一块小盒，打开盒盖，里面赫然放着一枚生有七窍，酷似人形的白色玉石。

0040.en: As the saying goes, a wise person submits to circumstances.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 正所谓，识时务者为俊杰。

0040.en: Lu Yuanchun was an old disciple of the Chu Sheng Sect. He knew very well that if he did not hand over the treasure jade now, he would soon be sacrificed on the front lines of the righteous-demonic battlefield.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陆元淳也是圣宗的老弟子了，自然清楚这个时候再不交出宝玉，待会儿就要牺牲在正魔战场前线了。

0040.en: Besides, with the Shenwu Gate having sent a cultivator at the peak of Qi Refining, escape was impossible. Lu Yuanchun no longer held any illusions. Rather than keeping the treasure, it was better to hand it over publicly. On one hand, it was a way to avert disaster by giving up wealth; on the other, it would shift the Shenwu Gate's attention to Lv Yang.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 何况神武门出动了炼气大圆满，逃出生天已经不可能，陆元淳也就不再抱有幻想，与其留着宝物，不如当众交出去，一方面也算破财免灾，另一方面也能将神武门等人的视线转变到吕阳身上。

0040.en: "The Profound Female Grand Yin Treasure Jade."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “玄牝太阴宝玉.”

0040.en: Lv Yang nodded with satisfaction, put the small box into his storage bag, and turned to look calmly at the figure that had suddenly appeared outside the market.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 吕阳见状满意地点了点头，而后将小盒收入储物袋，转身一脸淡定地看向坊市之外突兀出现的人影。

0040.en: It was a handsome young man holding a spear.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 那是一个俊美的持枪青年。

0040.en: He wore a martial crown and scale armor, and his spear was engraved with dragon patterns. He looked less like a cultivator and more like a general from the mortal world.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 只见他头戴武冠，披着鳞甲，手中的长枪铭刻龙纹，与其说是一位修士，反而更像是凡俗中的将军。

0040.en: "A ninth-grade array master?"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “九品阵法师？”

0040.en: The young man's gaze was as sharp as a blade, seeming to pierce through the array's cover to see Lv Yang controlling it. "I did not expect such an unforeseen variable."
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: 青年的目光锐利如刀，仿佛能剖开大阵遮挡，直接看到主阵的吕阳：“没想到还有此等意外的变数。”

0040.en: At the same time, 'Divine Fist' Wu Zhichong and 'Mountain-Moving Daoist' Duanmu Yuan came over and bowed respectfully to the spear-wielding young man. "Senior Brother Ouyang, we have failed in our task and disappointed you."
0040.speaker: 吴志冲
0040.cn: 与此同时，‘神拳’吴志冲和‘搬山道人’端木元也凑了过来，各自对着持枪青年恭敬一礼：“欧阳师兄，我等办事不利，让师兄失望了。”

0040.en: "It's fine."
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “无妨。”

0040.en: Ouyang Haoze shook his head, his expression gentle. "The demonic cultivators are cunning. It's normal for you two junior brothers to be careless. You can make up for it later."
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽摇了摇头，面色温和：“魔头狡诈，两位师弟有所疏忽也是正常的，此后戴罪立功便是了。”

0040.en: After speaking, he turned his gaze back to the Skull Mountain Market, his eyes filled with killing intent.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 说完，他又看向了骷髅山坊市，眼中杀意横生。

0040.en: "Our sect has planned for many years, and we cannot afford any accidents. If possible, we should first remove the demonic sect's spy that they've left here to minimize any variables."
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “本宗谋划多年，容不得半点意外，可以的话还是先剪除魔宗留在此地的钉子，最大限度减少变数。”

0040.en: In the next moment, Ouyang Haoze's figure flashed as he fully unleashed his aura of the peak Qi Refining realm. Instantly, a pillar of vital energy shot up like wolf smoke, manifesting with earth-shaking battle cries. Vaguely, thousands of armored soldiers could be seen arrayed behind him, empowering his spirit.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 下一秒，欧阳昊泽便身形一闪，炼气大圆满的气机彻底释放，顷刻间，只见一道精气狼烟扶摇直上，显化出震天杀声，隐隐有万千兵甲战将排列布阵，站在欧阳昊泽的身后，加持他的精气神。

0040.en: "Break for me!"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “给我破！”

0040.en: Instantly, a thunderous sound rolled through the air and crashed into the Skull Mountain Market. A few cultivators with lower cultivation levels were immediately shaken to the point of vomiting blood by the furious shout.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 霎时间，只听雷音滚空，直接轰入了骷髅山坊市，少数修为较低的修士瞬间就被这声怒斥震得吐血。

0040.en: "Peak of Qi Refining..."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “炼气大圆满”

0040.en: Lv Yang controlled the array with a grave expression. The pinnacle of the Qi Refining realm symbolized not only cultivation level in major sects, but also status.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 吕阳主持阵法，神色凝重，炼气境的极致，这个层次在各大宗门象征的并不仅仅是修为，还包括地位。

0040.en: Anyone who reached the peak of Qi Refining was certain to be a true disciple of their sect!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 但凡炼气圆满，必是宗门真传！

0040.en: The Shenwu Gate was located in the Northern Frontier. Although it was much smaller than the Chu Sheng Sect, it possessed several world-shaking great divine abilities that only true disciples could cultivate.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 神武门位列北疆，虽然规模远远不如圣宗，但是也有几门惊世的大神通，唯有真传弟子才可以修炼。

0040.en: "If he has mastered a great divine ability, I'll abandon the array and run immediately."
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: “如果他掌握了大神通，我立刻弃阵跑路.”

0040.en: While preparing to escape, Lv Yang moved to the edge of the array and confronted Ouyang Haoze from across the barrier. "I am Lv Yang. May I know your name, fellow Daoist?"
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: 吕阳一边做好逃跑准备，一边来到了阵法边缘，和欧阳昊泽隔阵对峙：“在下吕阳，不知道友名姓？”

0040.en: "You are not worthy to know my name." Ouyang Haoze sneered. "If you know what's good for you, surrender at once. In that case, I might spare your lives, only crippling your demonic cultivation. If you choose to resist, the day the array breaks will be the day no one is left alive!"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “凭你，还不配知道本座名姓。”欧阳昊泽冷笑一声：“识相的就赶紧束手就擒，那样本座倒也不是不可以网开一面，只废除魔功，不取尔等性命，如果选择负隅顽抗，破阵之日便是鸡犬不留！”

0040.en: "When will this cycle of vengeance end?"
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “冤冤相报何时了。”

0040.en: Lv Yang's smile did not change, his tone gentle. "Although our two sides are righteous and demonic, we have always minded our own business. Why not give me some face?"
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: 吕阳笑容不变，语气温和：“你我两方虽然正魔有别，却向来井水不犯河水，不如给在下一个面子？”

0040.en: "Give you face?"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “给你面子？”
