0040.en: Ouyang Haoze burst out laughing, mocking him, "Such arrogance! You're just at the eighth layer of Qi Refining. What can you do if I don't give you face today?"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽顿时大笑，嘲讽道：“好大的口气！一个炼气八层，今日我就是不给你面子，你又能如何？”

0040.en: "Why must it be this way..."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “何必呢”

0040.en: Lv Yang shook his head. "In that case, please try to break the array, fellow Daoist."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头：“既然如此，那就请道友前来破阵吧。”

0040.en: "You're courting death!"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “找死！”

0040.en: A flash of killing intent crossed Ouyang Haoze's eyes. The wolf smoke formed by his vital energy retracted, and he threw a punch that, at first glance, looked like a mortal's martial art.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽眼中杀气一闪，周身气血所化的狼烟全部收敛，握拳一击，乍看之下仿佛只是凡人的武艺。

0040.en: However, seeing this, Lv Yang's expression tensed, not daring to be careless. He immediately summoned the Blood Sun Sword Pellet, merged with its sword light, and slashed at Ouyang Haoze. Instantly, fist and sword clashed. Unmatched sharpness and fist energy exploded outwards like fireworks in mid-air.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 然而吕阳见状却是面色微凝，不敢有丝毫懈怠，当即祭起血阳剑丸，而后身合剑光对着欧阳昊泽就是一斩，刹那间拳剑相交，无匹的锋锐之气和拳劲四处爆散，好似一朵朵火花在半空中绽放。

0040.en: Ouyang Haoze's movements were like lightning, throwing hundreds of punches in the blink of an eye.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽身形如电，眨眼间就是数百拳打出。

0040.en: Unlike other cultivation sects, the Shenwu Gate was dominated by body cultivators, and most of their divine abilities were based on fists and kicks. Their close-quarters combat speed was even faster than that of sword cultivators!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 神武门不同于其他修仙门派，体修当道，神通也大多以拳脚为主，近距离厮杀的速度甚至快过剑修！

0040.en: "Arrow Volley!"
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “乱箭打！”

0040.en: Ouyang Haoze spread his arms as if drawing a large bow. Then, fist shadows shot out like arrows, submerging Lv Yang's position in an instant.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 只见欧阳昊泽舒展双臂，像是拉开了一张大弓，随后拳影如箭，一眨眼就将吕阳所在的位置淹没了进去。

0040.en: Boom!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 轰隆隆！

0040.en: Amidst the explosions, Lv Yang felt as if the spiritual energy around him was being drained, replaced by endless fist shadows aiming to grind him to dust!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 爆响声中，吕阳只觉得周身灵气仿佛都被抽空了一般，取而代之的是无尽的拳影，要将他碾成齑粉！

0040.en: A thousand strikes in an instant, leaving no room for a counter-attack. This was clearly a high-level divine ability!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 一瞬千击，根本不给人反击的空隙，俨然是一门上乘神通！

0040.en: Although Ouyang Haoze spoke arrogantly and looked down on Lv Yang, he held nothing back when he attacked, using his full strength.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽虽然嘴上说得狂傲，不将吕阳放在眼里，但真动起手来却没有丝毫大意，完全是全力以赴。

0040.en: Instantly, explosive waves of energy rolled out.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 霎时间，爆裂的气浪滚滚翻腾。

0040.en: Under his barrage of fists, Lv Yang lasted less than ten seconds before being smashed to pieces. His sword light shattered, and he turned into a sky full of withered bones and remains.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 在他的拳影下，吕阳只坚持了不到十秒就被捶得粉碎，剑光破散，眨眼间就化作了满天的枯骨残骸。

0040.en: The barrage of fists stopped. Ouyang Haoze stood in the air, frowning slightly.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 拳势骤停，欧阳昊泽站在空中，眉头微皱。

0040.en: On the other side, above the market, the Hundred Skeletons True Array activated. A figure materialized from thin air and stepped out. It was the unharmed Lv Yang.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 而另一边，坊市上空，百骸还真大阵运转，一道身影就虚化实，踱步而出，赫然是完好无损的吕阳。

0040.en: "Fellow Daoist's fists are powerful. I am impressed."
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: “道友拳威无匹，在下佩服。”

0040.en: Ouyang Haoze did not respond and punched again, using the same Arrow Volley. Lv Yang resisted again, and was again smashed to pieces after about ten seconds.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽没有回应，再度出拳，依旧是乱箭打，吕阳依旧顽强抵抗，依旧坚持十余秒后被打得粉碎。

0040.en: However, in the next moment, Ouyang Haoze saw Lv Yang's body turn into withered bones, while an uninjured Lv Yang once again stepped out of the array. His sleeves fluttered, his style as elegant as before, without the slightest loss of true energy or magical power. He bowed to him and said, "Do you wish to fight again, fellow Daoist?"
0040.speaker: 吕阳
0040.cn: 然而一转眼，欧阳昊泽就看到吕阳的尸体化作枯骨残骸，而毫发无伤的吕阳又从阵法中踱步走出，大袖飘飘，风采依旧，甚至就连真气法力都没有损耗半点，对他拱手一礼：“道友可要再战？”

0040.en: "...The Hundred Skeletons True Array truly lives up to its name."
0040.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0040.cn: “.百骸还真大阵，果然名不虚传。”

0040.en: Ouyang Haoze's expression was grave.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 欧阳昊泽神色凝重。

0040.en: As far as he knew, this was a seventh-grade array that contained one hundred skeleton soldiers. A cultivator inside the array could use the bodies of the skeleton soldiers to manifest and fight with their full power.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 据他所知，此阵位列七品，内藏百具骸骨兵，修士身处阵中，可以借骸骨兵之身显化本体十成战力。

0040.en: This meant that the skeleton soldiers were fighting in place of the cultivator's real body.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如此一来，相当于是骸骨兵代替本体在战斗。

0040.en: If they won, everyone was happy. If they died, it had no effect on the main body. Moreover, as long as the array continued to operate, even consumed skeleton soldiers could be quickly restored.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 赢了皆大欢喜，死了对本体也毫无影响，而且只要阵法持续运转，骸骨兵哪怕消耗掉也能迅速恢复。

0040.en: Thus, no matter how fiercely he attacked, it was all in vain. This was only because he was outside the array and had not rushed in. Otherwise, if he had entered, Lv Yang could have summoned all the skeleton soldiers to swarm him. At that point, even a cultivator at the peak of Qi Refining would suffer greatly!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如此一来，任凭他怎么猛攻，也是徒劳，空做无用功。这还是因为他身处阵法之外，没有冒进，否则一旦入阵，吕阳就能召来所有骸骨兵，直接群殴，届时就算是炼气大圆满也照样要脱层皮！

0041.en: Chapter 41: A Fierce Battle
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 第41章 鏖战

0041.en: "Demon, do you really think you can be so fearless with just a seventh-grade grand array?"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “魔头，你真以为靠着一座七品大阵就能有恃无恐？”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze sneered at Lv Yang through the array's light screen, "An array is a dead thing. For cultivators like us, our cultivation level is what truly matters!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽隔着阵法光幕，冷哂地看着吕阳：“阵法终究是死物，我等修仙之辈，修为境界才是第一！”

0041.en: "In the end, only a real fight will decide things."
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “说到底，无非是手底下见真章。”

0041.en: Lv Yang was on high alert, but his face remained calm. "Fellow Daoist, if you are so confident, feel free to enter the array for a fight. Otherwise, you should just retreat."
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: 吕阳心中警声大作，面上却是不动声色：“道友若是有信心，大可入阵一战，否则还是乖乖退去吧。”

0041.en: "You are looking for death!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “找死！”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze gave a cold smile and actually took a step forward. He then let out a breath, and with a sound like thunder, a powerful voice burst from his throat.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽森然一笑，随后竟真向前一步，接着吐气开声，只听霹雳声响，陡然从喉中绽出一道洪音。

0041.en: This was a high-level divine ability from the Divine Martial Sect called the "Thousand-Mile Void-Shattering Divine Sound." It used a secret method to absorb spiritual energy, enhance it with the sect's special third-grade "Divine Martial True Qi," and then release it in a single roar. The sound wave would turn everything within a thousand miles to dust, friend or foe alike.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 此为神武门的一门上乘神通，名为“千里碎空神音”，乃是以秘法吞吐天地灵气，加持神武门特有的三品真气“神武真罡”，而后再一气吼出，音波所过，千里之内无分敌我，一并震为齑粉。

0041.en: In an instant, the powerful divine sound rushed into the array.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 霎时间，至烈神音冲入阵中。

0041.en: The array's patterns shattered, revealing skeleton soldiers of different shapes. A gap was forcefully blown into the massive array!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 只见一道道阵纹破碎，浮现出一具具形貌各异的骸骨兵，偌大的阵法竟是被硬生生轰出了一个豁口！

0041.en: Next, Ouyang Haoze took out a round mirror.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 紧接着，就见欧阳昊泽取出了一面圆镜。

0041.en: "Please, Master Taixiao, take action."
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “请太霄公出手。”

0041.en: He formed a hand seal and pointed, sending the mirror into the air. A magnificent beam of light shot down, freezing the space and holding the gap in the array open!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 只见他掐诀一指，将圆镜祭在空中，一道恢弘镜光投射而下，凝顿虚空，竟硬生生定住了阵法豁口！

0041.en: In that moment, the marketplace shook violently!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 霎时间，坊市巨震！

0041.en: Many cultivators quickly moved back, not daring to get close to the edge of the array, their faces filled with panic.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 大量修士纷纷向后，不敢再靠近阵法边缘，脸色惊慌。

0041.en: Fairy Feixia's face was pale. The next second, she suddenly looked at Lu Yuanchun, who had a strange expression, and shouted, "Stay here! Don't you go anywhere!"
0041.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0041.cn: 飞霞仙子脸色惨白，下一秒却猛然看向了神色古怪的陆元淳，厉声道：“留在这里，哪里都不许去！”

0041.en: After being tricked by him before, Fairy Feixia no longer trusted Lu Yuanchun. Her beautiful face now looked fierce, "If it weren't for Junior Brother Lv, you would already be dead outside the marketplace. If you dare to run away during this chaos, I will kill you first, no matter the cost!"
0041.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0041.cn: 有了之前被坑的经历，飞霞仙子自然不会再信任陆元淳，此刻那张姣好的脸庞甚至浮现出了些许狰狞：“若是没有吕师弟，你此刻已经死在坊市外面了，你再敢趁乱逃跑，我不顾一切先杀你！”

0041.en: "Junior Sister Feixia, you have misunderstood..."
0041.speaker: 陆元淳
0041.cn: “飞霞师妹误会了”

0041.en: Lu Yuanchun gave an awkward smile. Seeing Fairy Feixia's murderous look, he felt a bit scared and suppressed the treacherous thoughts that had just appeared in his mind.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 陆元淳讪讪一笑，见飞霞仙子那择人欲噬的模样也有些忌惮，只好压下了刚刚生出的许多阴诡念头。

0041.en: With the two late-stage Qi Refining cultivators keeping order, the chaos in the marketplace quickly calmed down.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 而两位炼气后期不乱，坊市内的乱象也很快平复了下来。

0041.en: Of course, everyone knew this was only temporary.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 当然，谁都知道这只是暂时的。

0041.en: The outcome of the fight between Lv Yang and Ouyang Haoze was the final straw. Therefore, Fairy Feixia could only put her trust in Lv Yang now.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吕阳和欧阳昊泽之间的胜负，才是压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草，因此飞霞仙子此刻也只能相信吕阳了。

0041.en: Believing he could create a miracle.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 相信他能创造奇迹。

0041.en: "Is this... a spiritual treasure?"
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: “这是.一件灵宝？”

0041.en: Lv Yang's face changed drastically as he looked at the mirror in the air, "And it's a supreme yang spiritual treasure that suppresses earthly demonic qi, specifically made to counter the 'Grand Array of a Hundred Skeletons'!?"
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: 吕阳看着空中的圆镜，脸色剧变：“还是克制地煞阴气，专门用来对付‘百骸还真大阵’的至阳灵宝！？”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze laughed loudly, looking very pleased with himself:
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽仰天大笑，志得意满：

0041.en: "The Grand Array of a Hundred Skeletons has stood on Skeleton Mountain for many years. Since my Divine Martial Sect dared to make a move, how could we not prepare a way to break it in advance?"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “百骸还真大阵在骷髅山伫立多年，我神武门既然敢出手谋算，又怎么会不提前准备好破阵的手段？”

0041.en: "With the 'Taixiao Mirror' here, you will definitely die today!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “有‘太霄镜’在，今日你必死无疑！”

0041.en: This spiritual treasure was not his. It was specially crafted by a Foundation Establishment master from the Divine Martial Sect to deal with the Grand Array of a Hundred Skeletons, so its power was obvious.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 这件灵宝非他所有，而是神武门的筑基真人特地炼制出来对付百骸还真大阵的，威力自然不言而喻。

0041.en: Above the marketplace, Lv Yang looked grim. Without a word, he turned and fled.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 坊市上空，吕阳神色难看，二话不说转身就跑。

0041.en: "Hmph! Trying to escape?"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “哼！想走？”

0041.en: Without thinking, Ouyang Haoze leaped up, unleashing his divine sound again to instantly shatter the surrounding skeleton soldiers, and then chased after Lv Yang.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽不假思索，直接纵身而上，同时再发神音，瞬间将四周的骸骨兵粉碎，随后朝着吕阳追去。

0041.en: But just then, something unexpected happened!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 然而就在这时，异变突生！

0041.en: The moment Ouyang Haoze stepped into the array, his expression changed. He subconsciously tried to retreat, but when he turned around, he only saw a screen of scarlet array patterns.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽前脚踏入阵法，后脚就神色一变，下意识想要退出去，回过头却只看到了一片猩红的阵纹。

0041.en: "I didn't expect you to actually dare to come in."
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: “没想到你居然真敢进来.”

0041.en: Lv Yang stopped running and turned to look at Ouyang Haoze. The panic from before was gone, replaced by a cold smile.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吕阳停下逃跑动作，回头看向欧阳昊泽，刚刚的惊慌模样仿佛从未出现过一般，露出了森然的笑容。

0041.en: "This is impossible!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “这不可能！”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze's eye twitched with disbelief, "The Grand Array of a Hundred Skeletons was clearly fixed in place by my Taixiao Mirror. Why is there another array appearing? Is there a second array in the marketplace? Where did it come from? Why didn't I notice any signs of it being set up beforehand?"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽眼角抽搐，惊疑不定：“百骸还真大阵分明已经被我用太霄镜定住了，为什么还会有阵法浮现坊市内还有第二套阵法？从哪里冒出来的？为什么我事前没有发现丝毫布阵的痕迹？”

0041.en: "Because I don't need to set up an array at all."
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: “因为我根本不需要布阵啊”

0041.en: Lv Yang sneered internally. His Blood River Sword Formation was completely dependent on the Blood Sun Sword Pellet, his formation treasure. The array formed with a single thought, so of course there would be no traces!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吕阳心中冷笑，他的血洗天河剑阵图完全依赖于血阳剑丸这枚阵宝，念动即成阵，自然不会有痕迹！

0041.en: The next moment, a large banner appeared in Lv Yang's hand, waving in the wind.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 下一秒，吕阳手中便多出了一面迎风招展的旗幡。

0041.en: The Innate Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 先天一炁万灵幡！

0041.en: As the banner waved, spirits flew out and landed on the key points of the Blood River Sword Formation, moving on their own.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 旗幡摇动，霎时间一道道幡灵飞掠而出，落在血洗天河剑阵图的各个阵眼，不由自主地行动了起来。

0041.en: When designing this formation, Lv Yang had already considered the Innate Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner. Now, the ten thousand souls in the banner spread out, occupying the formation's key points and revealing its power. In an instant, the sky turned red, and a massive river of blood flowed from south to north, crashing down on Ouyang Haoze!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 早在设计这座阵法的时候，吕阳就将先天一炁万灵幡考虑了进去，此刻幡中上万魂魄布列排开，站住阵眼，显化玄机，顷刻间天地一片赤色，滔滔血河自南向北，对着欧阳昊泽便是垂天而落！

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze grunted and staggered.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽顿时一声闷哼，身形踉跄。

0041.en: Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 天魔化血神光！

0041.en: Inside the array, Ouyang Haoze couldn't dodge the divine light's power. He felt his vast lifeblood rapidly draining from his body like a bursting dam.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 身处阵中，欧阳昊泽根本躲不开神光之威，只觉得原本磅礴的气血正如决堤洪水般飞快地泄出体外。

0041.en: The next second, he quickly shouted, "Lord Heavenly Light, save me!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: 下一秒，他赶忙大喝一声：“天光君，救我！”

0041.en: Golden light shone like the sun on armor scales. Layers of protective light covered Ouyang Haoze, and for a moment, it actually stopped the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light from consuming him.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 甲光向日金鳞开，只见一层层宝光将欧阳昊泽罩定，一时间，居然真的止住了天魔化血神光的吞噬。

0041.en: Spiritual treasure, Heavenly Light Armor!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 灵宝，天光胄！

0041.en: This treasure was made from "Demon-Subduing Heavenly Light," which directly countered the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light. When the two clashed, they canceled each other out.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 此宝乃是以“伏魔天光”炼制而成，和天魔化血神光性质相冲，二者碰撞的结果就是彼此互相僵持。

0041.en: Only then did Ouyang Haoze breathe a sigh of relief.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 直到这时，欧阳昊泽才勉强松了口气。

0041.en: After all, he never expected that even with his high cultivation level and two spiritual treasures, the Taixiao Mirror and the Heavenly Light Armor, he would still almost fail.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 毕竟他也没料到以他的修为配合太霄镜和天光胄两件灵宝，准备如此齐全的情况下竟还会差点翻车。

0041.en: "I can't run now."
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “事到如今，不能逃.”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze's eyes were bloodshot. Instead of trying to escape, he looked at Lv Yang deep within the array, his eyes filled with a suffocating killing intent.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽双眼血红，非但不打算逃跑，反而看向了阵法深处的吕阳，眼中浮现出了令人窒息的杀意。

0041.en: "...The only way is to counterattack!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “.唯有反攻！”

0041.en: As a true disciple of his sect, his will was strong. He knew that in a desperate situation, the brave one wins. If he tried to run, Lv Yang would slowly trap and kill him. To break the array, he had to find life in death and try to kill Lv Yang. If Lv Yang died, the array would break on its own!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 身为一门真传，他的心志绝对不弱，更清楚“狭路相逢勇者胜”的道理，知道此刻若是一心逃跑，反而会被吕阳活生生玩死，想要破阵，必须死中求活，设法杀了吕阳，吕阳一死，阵法自解！

0041.en: Boom!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 轰隆隆！

0041.en: The next moment, protected by the Heavenly Light Armor, Ouyang Haoze charged at Lv Yang, his spear aimed straight at the Innate Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner in Lv Yang's hand!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 下一秒，欧阳昊泽便在天光胄的保护下，朝着吕阳杀去，无匹枪锋直指吕阳手中的先天一炁万灵幡！

0041.en: "That banner seems to be the core of this array. If I can't kill Lv Yang, destroying it might be a way to survive."
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “那幡旗似乎就是此阵核心，杀不了吕阳，破坏了它或许也有生路.”

0041.en: "Well timed!"
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: “来的好！”

0041.en: Lv Yang waved his banner, and a figure appeared. It was Liu Xin. His face was full of confusion, as if he hadn't fully woken up yet.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吕阳幡旗一扬，一道身影浮现而出，赫然是刘信，只见他的脸上写满了茫然，似乎还没有清醒过来。

0041.en: The next second—
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 下一秒——

0041.en: "Explode!"
0041.speaker: 吕阳

0041.en: With a huge explosion, Liu Xin opened his mouth and shouted the word "kill." It was a death curse designed for mutual destruction!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 轰一声巨响！只见刘信不由自主地张开嘴，喊出了一个‘杀’字，竟是专门用来同归于尽的杀生咒！

0041.en: In Lv Yang's opinion, Liu Xin's use of the Innate Qi Ten Thousand Spirits Banner was too basic. The banner spirits were immortal. Even if they were destroyed, as long as their true spirit was not scattered, they could be summoned again by using magical power. So, why let them fight normally?
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 在吕阳看来，刘信对于先天一炁万灵幡的使用实在是太浅薄了，毕竟幡灵可是不死的，哪怕短时间被毁，只要真灵不散就可以消耗法力重新召唤出来，既然如此，何必让他们按部就班去战斗？

0041.en: They should learn suicide attacks!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 就应该让他们学同归于尽的杀招！

0041.en: Since they could be revived, letting them use powerful abilities that would kill a thousand enemies at the cost of eight hundred of their own, self-destructing to kill the enemy, was the right way to use them!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 反正能复苏，让它们一出来就施展那种杀敌一千，自损八百的神通，自爆杀敌，这才是正确的用法！

0041.en: In an instant, a wave of spiritual energy consumed everything.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 霎时间，灵潮席卷了一切。

0041.en: When the dust settled, Liu Xin was gone. Ouyang Haoze was stopped in mid-air, his expression extremely grim.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 等到尘埃落定，刘信已经不见了踪影，而欧阳昊泽则是被强行截停在了半空中，神色阴沉到了极致。

0041.en: So far, he had used many methods.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 迄今为止，他已经用了许多手段。

0041.en: Divine abilities, spiritual treasures, and his higher cultivation level should have made it easy to defeat a late-stage Qi Refining cultivator. But none of them had worked.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 神通，灵宝还有修为压制，对付一个炼气后期的修士本应该是手到擒来，谁曾想结果竟是无一建功。

0041.en: Instead, he had used up a huge amount of his magical power.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 反而是他的法力损耗巨大。

0041.en: "If this continues, I might really die here."
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “再这样下去，怕是真要死在此地”

0041.en: As Ouyang Haoze thought of this, a fierce look crossed his face. He formed a hand seal, and the Heavenly Light Armor on his body suddenly let out a sad cry.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽念及此处，脸上闪过一抹狠色，掐动法诀，紧接着他身上的天光胄便陡然发出了一声悲鸣。

0041.en: "This is... Not good!"
0041.speaker: 吕阳
0041.cn: “这是.不好！”

0041.en: Seeing this, Lv Yang's expression changed. He flashed away, instantly moving behind the Blood Sun Sword Pellet and summoning its blood-red shadow to protect him.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吕阳见状神色骤变，身形一闪，瞬间就挪移到了血阳剑丸背后，然后将剑丸血影召唤出来护至身前。

0041.en: BOOM!!!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 轰隆！！！

0041.en: The spiritual treasure, the Heavenly Light Armor, self-destructed!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 灵宝天光胄，自爆了！

0041.en: The exploding spiritual light was just like the scene Xiao Shiye had created before. It swept in all directions, instantly shattering Lv Yang's sword formation and revealing the clear blue sky.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 炸裂的灵光一如昔日萧石叶制造出的场景，席卷四方，瞬间就粉碎了吕阳的剑阵图，露出朗朗青天。

0041.en: Although Lv Yang reacted quickly and closed the formation, Ouyang Haoze was faster. He rushed out of the formation's encirclement at the last moment. Lv Yang only had time to use the Heavenly Demon Blood-Transforming Divine Light, which drained another thirty percent of his lifeblood, leaving him looking like a bag of bones.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 虽然吕阳反应极快，迅速合拢阵法，但欧阳昊泽速度更快，于千钧一发之际冲出了阵图的包围，吕阳只来得及施展天魔化血神光，从他身上又刷落了三成气血，让他看上去只剩下一具皮包骨。

0041.en: "You destroyed my treasure! I will not be satisfied until I have torn you to pieces!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “毁我法宝，不将你碎尸万端，难消此恨！”

0041.en: Ouyang Haoze stood outside the marketplace with a ferocious expression. He poured his remaining magical power into his other spiritual treasure, the Taixiao Mirror, causing it to also let out a cry of sorrow.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 欧阳昊泽站在坊市外，神色狰狞，竟是将残留法力注入另一件灵宝，太霄镜中，让其也发出了哀鸣。

0041.en: "At worst, I'll sacrifice all my spiritual treasures today! Let's see if you can pull out a third grand array!"
0041.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0041.cn: “大不了本座今日舍了全部灵宝，看你还能不能拿出第三座大阵！”

0042.en: Chapter 42: Profound Yin Form-Seizing, Nail-Head Life-Taking
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 第42章 玄阴摄形，钉头索命

0042.en: Rumble!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 轰隆隆！

0042.en: A loud cry of pain and increasingly strong waves of spiritual energy came from the sky. Ouyang Haoze's eyes were blood-red; he was clearly furious.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 剧烈的哀鸣声伴随着愈演愈烈的灵气波动从半空中动荡而来，欧阳昊泽双眼血红，显然已经发了狠。

0042.en: Seeing this, the other two late-stage Qi Refining cultivators from the Divine Martial Sect, Wu Zhichong and Duanmu Yuan, could no longer stand by.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 见到这一幕，神武门的另外两位炼气后期，吴志冲和端木元坐不住了。

0042.en: "Senior Brother Ouyang!"
0042.speaker: 吴志冲
0042.cn: “欧阳师兄！”

0042.en: Wu Zhichong stepped forward first. He looked at Ouyang Haoze's terrible state and said quietly, full of fear, "The Taixiao Mirror is extremely important..."
0042.speaker: 吴志冲
0042.cn: 吴志冲率先上前，看着欧阳昊泽如今的狼狈模样，有些胆战心惊，低声道：“太霄镜毕竟事关重大”

0042.en: "I understand."
0042.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0042.cn: “我明白。”

0042.en: Ouyang Haoze glanced back at Wu Zhichong, the anger in his red eyes calming down. He said calmly, "But the demon in this formation is more important! He is young, yet he is an expert in formations and his cultivation is strong. If he reaches the peak of Qi Refining, he could even try for Foundation Establishment."
0042.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0042.cn: 欧阳昊泽回头看了一眼吴志冲，血红双眼中的怒气迅速平复，冷静道：“但是这阵法中的那个魔头，更重要！年纪轻轻就精通阵法，修为也不弱，他日若是突破炼气圆满，未必不能冲击筑基。”

0042.en: "If I can kill a potential Foundation Establishment expert from a demonic sect, then sacrificing a Taixiao Mirror is worth it!"
0042.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0042.cn: “如果能杀了一位魔宗的筑基种子，一面太霄镜，舍了就舍了！”

0042.en: Buzz! Buzz!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 嗡嗡！

0042.en: In the sky, the Taixiao Mirror trembled strongly, as if it had a different opinion.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 半空中，太霄镜发出了剧烈的颤鸣，似乎有不同意见。

0042.en: But Ouyang Haoze ignored it. It was just a spiritual treasure. When it's useful, I'll call it 'Lord Taixiao.' When it's not, what is it worth?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 然而欧阳昊泽却充耳不闻，一件灵宝罢了，有用的时候叫你一声“太霄公”，没用的时候你算什么？

0042.en: Seeing that Ouyang Haoze had made up his mind, Wu Zhichong could only sigh and stop trying to change it. After all, Ouyang Haoze, at the perfection stage of Qi Refining, was their leader from the Divine Martial Sect. Since he had made the decision, he would be responsible for the result. It was enough that Wu Zhichong had tried to warn him.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 见欧阳昊泽一副心意已决的模样，吴志冲只能叹息一声，不再劝阻，毕竟炼气大圆满的欧阳昊泽才是此番神武门的主事人，他既然做出了决定，后果自然也由他承担，自己有劝说过就可以了。

0042.en: Meanwhile, inside the market.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 与此同时，坊市内。

0042.en: Lv Yang put away the heavily damaged Blood Sun Sword Pellet. Holding the Innate Qi Myriad Spirits Banner, he watched Ouyang Haoze outside the market with a strange expression.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 吕阳收起被炸得损毁大半的血阳剑丸，手持先天一炁万灵幡，神色莫名地眺望着坊市外的欧阳昊泽。

0042.en: "Junior Brother Lv, you're not dead?"
0042.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0042.cn: “吕师弟你没死？”

0042.en: Fairy Feixia and Lu Yuanchun approached him. One of them looked very happy and surprised, while the other was not only relieved to be alive but also felt wary of Lv Yang.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 飞霞仙子和陆元淳来到近前，一个脸上写满了惊喜，另一个则是在劫后余生之余也对吕阳充满忌惮。

0042.en: "Brother Lv, you really are full of secrets!"
0042.speaker: 陆元淳
0042.cn: “吕兄果真是深藏不露！”

0042.en: Lu Yuanchun praised him loudly, "We have defeated Ouyang Haoze! The market is safe now. We can wait until the Sect hears the news and sends help!"
0042.speaker: 陆元淳
0042.cn: 陆元淳大声赞叹道：“此番击退欧阳昊泽，坊市安枕无忧，足以坚持到圣宗得到消息，加派援手了！”

0042.en: "Defeated? It's too early for that."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “击退？还早着呢。”

0042.en: Lv Yang shook his head.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 吕阳摇了摇头。

0042.en: "That's right! Look at Ouyang Haoze. He's badly hurt. This is more than a simple defeat. It's a serious injury that will teach him a lesson!"
0042.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0042.cn: “不错，看那欧阳昊泽的模样，气血大亏，岂止是击退，分明是重伤，算是给了他一个深刻的教训！”

0042.en: Fairy Feixia clapped her hands and smiled.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 飞霞仙子抚掌而笑。

0042.en: Hearing this, Lu Yuanchun quickly agreed.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 陆元淳闻言也赶忙出声迎合。

0042.en: However, Lv Yang gave a cold smile and said something shocking, "Just pushing him back isn't enough to solve the problem for good. I don't like leaving loose ends."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: 然而吕阳见状却冷笑了一声，语出惊人道：“只是击退，如何能一劳永逸，在下向来不喜欢留后患。”

0042.en: "It's better to just kill him. Simple and clean."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “还是杀了，干脆简单！”

0042.en: "Kill... kill who?"
0042.speaker: 飞霞仙子
0042.cn: “杀杀谁？”

0042.en: Ouyang Haoze?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 欧阳昊泽？

0042.en: For a moment, Fairy Feixia and Lu Yuanchun stood frozen in shock. They had never imagined something like this, not even in their wildest dreams.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 一时间，飞霞仙子和陆元淳竟愣在了原地，只因哪怕在她们最乐观的想象里也没有出现过类似画面。

0042.en: He was a peak Qi Refining expert, a true disciple of a righteous sect!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 那可是一位炼气大圆满，正道真传！

0042.en: Who could kill him?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 谁能杀？

0042.en: How could he be killed?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 怎么杀？

0042.en: The next moment, Lv Yang took out the 'Profound Yin Precious Jade' that Lu Yuanchun had returned to him. He made a hand sign and began to channel his energy into the jade in his palm.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 下一秒，就见吕阳取出了之前陆元淳还给他的“玄牝太阴宝玉”，掐诀施法，将其放在掌心中运化。

0042.en: Then, the jade slowly melted under Lv Yang's control. It turned into a round light, like a clear, pale white mirror. In the light, Lv Yang could see figures appearing in his vision. Each figure was connected to the leftover energy of a person.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 紧接着，这块宝玉便在吕阳的操纵下渐渐融化，最后化作一道圆光，像是一面森白通透的宝镜，在圆光的照耀下，吕阳的眼中迅速浮现出了一道道人影，每一道人影都对应着一道残留的气机。

0042.en: Judging from the others' reactions, it seemed only he could see them.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 从他人的反应来看，似乎只有他能看到。

0042.en: Fairy Feixia, Lu Yuanchun, Ouyang Haoze, Wu Zhichong, Duanmu Yuan... The energy of everyone who had fought here remained.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 飞霞仙子，陆元淳，欧阳昊泽，吴志冲，端木元.所有在此地战斗过的人，此地都有他们的气机残留。

0042.en: "So this is the Profound Yin Form-Seizing Art..."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “这就是玄阴摄形大法”

0042.en: This was the second special power from the 'Grand Yin Form-Shedding and Corpse-Deliverance True Art'. The only hard part was needing a special item. So, after getting the jade, Lv Yang learned it almost instantly!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 《太阴蜕形尸解真法》中的第二门神通，难点只在于外物，因此吕阳得到宝玉后须臾便将其练成了！

0042.en: "Let's test its power."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “且试试威力。”

0042.en: Lv Yang looked down and quickly focused on a trace of energy. It was Ouyang Haoze's. He used the Profound Yin Form-Seizing Art to grab it.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 吕阳低垂眼睑，很快就锁定了一道残留气机，正是欧阳昊泽的，被他通过玄阴摄形大法抓取了过来。

0042.en: "Profound Yin Form-Seizing..."
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “玄阴摄形.”

0042.en: Lv Yang activated the power. The round light from the Profound Yin Precious Jade swallowed Ouyang Haoze's energy and then showed his image.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 吕阳运转神通，下一秒，玄牝太阴宝玉所化的圆光便吞噬欧阳昊泽的气机，而后映照出了他的身影。

0042.en: "...Nail-Head Life-Taking!"
0042.speaker: 吕阳
0042.cn: “.钉头索命！”

0042.en: Then, Lv Yang chopped down with his fingers.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 旋即，吕阳并指一斩。

0042.en: With a "crack," the round light split in two, and Ouyang Haoze's image was also split in half from head to toe.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 只听“咔擦！”一声，圆光一分为二，连带着欧阳昊泽的身影也被从头到脚，左右开弓分成了两半。

0042.en: To be safe, Lv Yang had cut him vertically.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 以防万一，吕阳是竖着斩的。

0042.en: At almost the same time.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 几乎同时。

0042.en: Outside the market, Ouyang Haoze had just finished talking to Wu Zhichong. He turned to look at the market and threw the Taixiao Mirror into the formation.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 坊市外，欧阳昊泽刚刚结束了和吴志冲的谈话，转过头看向坊市，一抬手便将太霄镜扔进了阵法内。

0042.en: Although the Taixiao Mirror struggled hard, he had made up his mind to make it explode.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 虽然太霄镜剧烈挣扎，但他心意已决，就要将其炸开。

0042.en: But in the next second, Ouyang Haoze's movement stopped suddenly.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 可下一秒，欧阳昊泽的动作戛然而止。

0042.en: Then, a strange cut appeared on the top of his head out of nowhere. It quickly spread downwards, ending in a spray of blood.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 紧接着，一道诡异的斩痕就凭空出现在了他的头顶，而后迅速向着下方蔓延，最后化作溅射的血花。

0042.en: He split apart.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 他裂开了。

0042.en: His body fell from the sky. The remaining half of his face still showed a look of shock, and his eyes moved slightly, as if he hadn't realized what had just happened.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 尸体跌落半空，只剩下半边的脸庞还残留着惊愕，眼珠微微转动，似乎还没有察觉究竟发生了什么。

0042.en: "What happened... Am I... dead?"
0042.speaker: 欧阳昊泽
0042.cn: “怎么回事我.死了？”

0042.en: His thoughts disappeared into confusion.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 意识就这样在茫然中消散。

0042.en: Without Ouyang Haoze to control it, the Taixiao Mirror that had fallen into the formation became calm. Lv Yang reached out his hand, and it flew over to him.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 而失去了欧阳昊泽的操作后，落入阵中的太霄镜也恢复了平静，吕阳伸手一招，它便主动飞了过去。

0042.en: In the Northern Frontier, at the main headquarters of the Divine Martial Sect.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 北疆，神武门总坛。

0042.en: Inside a brightly lit hall.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 一座明亮的大殿内。

0042.en: This place was called the 'Soul Lamp Hall.' As the name suggests, it held the soul lamps of many high-ranking members of the Divine Martial Sect, including the Sect Master, elders, and true disciples.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 此地名为“魂灯殿”，顾名思义摆放着神武门内诸多高层，包括宗主，长老，乃至真传弟子的魂灯。

0042.en: As an old power in the Northern Frontier, the Divine Martial Sect had ruled for over a thousand years. Its reputation was strong, and high-ranking members rarely died. Because of this, the disciples on duty here were mostly lazy. They saw the job as an easy way to get sect benefits.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 作为北疆的老牌势力，神武门统治北疆已逾千年，在北疆的威名更是深入人心，鲜少有高层身亡的情况出现，因此负责在此地值守的弟子也大多懒散，只把这个位置看作是混宗门补贴的肥差。

0042.en: Today was like any other day. The disciple on duty was checking the soul lamps as usual.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 今日也一如往常，值守弟子例行查看魂灯。

0042.en: He entered the hall and glanced around.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 进门，一眼扫去。

0042.en: Lit, lit, lit, lit, out, lit, lit...
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 亮着，亮着，亮着，亮着，灭了，亮着，亮着

0042.en: Huh?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 嗯？

0042.en: The disciple blinked his eyes and turned his head to look again. He rubbed his eyes, and his expression slowly changed from casual to horrified.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 值守弟子眨了眨眼，下意识转头看去，紧接着又揉了揉双眼，脸上的表情也渐渐从随意变成了惊恐。

0042.en: "It's out! It's out! Senior Brother Ouyang's soul lamp is out!?"
0042.speaker: 陌生男1
0042.cn: “灭了，灭了欧阳师兄的魂灯灭了！？”

0042.en: His voice spread instantly.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 声音瞬间传开。

0042.en: The next moment, a middle-aged Daoist appeared in the hall out of thin air. His eyes fell on the extinguished soul lamp, his face filled with shock and anger.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 下一秒，一位中年道士便凭空出现在了大殿内，目光落在已经熄灭的魂灯上，脸上的表情惊怒交加。

0042.en: How many years had it been? How many years since a true disciple of the Divine Martial Sect had died?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 多少年了，神武门有多少年没有真传弟子身陨了？

0042.en: "Ouyang... Skull Mountain!?"
0042.speaker: 中年道士
0042.cn: “欧阳.骷髅山！？”

0042.en: The middle-aged Daoist's face was dark. He suddenly reached out, took Ouyang Haoze's soul lamp, and forced his power into it, relighting the flame!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 中年道士脸色铁青，突然伸手一招，取来欧阳昊泽的魂灯，法力催动，竟然强行将灯火重新点燃了！

0042.en: Of course, the dead cannot be brought back to life.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 当然，人死不可复生。

0042.en: This relit flame could not save Ouyang Haoze's life. At most, it could show the last thing he saw before he died.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 这重新点燃的的灯火并不能救回欧阳昊泽的性命，最多就是将其生前最后看到的景象重新显化出来。

0042.en: Soon, the flame showed a scene.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 很快，灯火映照出了一副光景。

0042.en: The middle-aged Daoist immediately recognized it as the Chu Sheng Sect's market at Skull Mountain. Inside the market, a handsome young man was looking up at the sky.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 中年道士一眼就认出那是初圣宗在骷髅山的坊市，只见坊市内，一位丰神俊逸的青年正在远眺长空。

0042.en: It was him? He killed Ouyang Haoze?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 就是他？他杀了欧阳昊泽？

0042.en: A deep hatred appeared in the middle-aged Daoist's eyes.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 中年道士的眼中浮现出了深刻入骨的仇恨。

0042.en: Because Ouyang Haoze was not just a true disciple of the sect, but also the most talented young person of his Ouyang family. He was the junior that he had high hopes for!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 因为欧阳昊泽不仅仅是宗门的真传弟子，还是他欧阳家最优秀的年轻一代，是他寄予了厚望的后辈！

0042.en: This hatred would not end until death!
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 此恨此仇，不死不休！

0042.en: "Hmm?"
0042.speaker: 吕阳

0042.en: In the Skull Mountain market, Lv Yang, who had just collected the Taixiao Mirror, suddenly frowned. He looked up at the sky and felt a chill.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 骷髅山坊市内，刚刚收起主动投靠的太霄镜的吕阳突然眉头一皱，抬头望天，心中升起了一股寒意。

0042.en: He knew this feeling well.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 这种感觉他很熟悉。

0042.en: It was the feeling of his own fate being manipulated by an outside force. He had felt something similar in his past life when the Sky Mending Peak Master had calculated his destiny.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 这是自身因果被外力拨弄的感觉，上一世他被补天峰主推算因果的时候，也曾经生出过类似的感觉。

0042.en: Could it be that another Foundation Establishment expert was plotting against him!?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 莫非又有筑基真人在算计他！？

0043.en: Chapter 43: The Blood-Robed Lord
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 第43章 血衣楼主

0043.en: The Divine Martial Sect's invasion ended so abruptly.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 神武门的入侵，就这样突兀地结束了。

0043.en: Once Ouyang Haoze died, Wu Zhichong and Duanmu Yuan didn't even dare to stay. They turned and fled without a second thought, as if a great monster was chasing them.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 欧阳昊泽一死，吴志冲和端木元甚至都不敢停留，二话不说转身就跑，仿佛身后的是什么洪水猛兽。

0043.en: In contrast to the Divine Martial Sect's panicked retreat, the market city was filled with celebration.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 而和神武门的抱头鼠窜相反，坊市内则是一片欢欣鼓舞。

0043.en: After all, with this battle over, the Skull Mountain Market was as secure as a fortress. As long as a Foundation Establishment True Master didn't act, it would be difficult for the Divine Martial Sect to break this "turtle shell."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 毕竟此战过后，骷髅山坊市已然固若金汤，只要筑基真人不出手，神武门就难以撼动这个乌龟壳。

0043.en: As for the corpse tide, it was just a minor problem, not even worth mentioning.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 至于尸潮，那更是疥癞之疾，不值一提。

0043.en: In short, it was safe!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 简而言之，就是安全！

0043.en: A safe market city was bound to become a center for money. It was easy to imagine that future transactions here would be more frequent, with more opportunities to earn.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 一座安全的坊市，必然成为了金钱的中心，可想而知未来这里的交易会更加频繁，赚钱机会也更多。

0043.en: The good days were still to come!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 好日子还在后头呢！

0043.en: But the excitement belonged to others; Lv Yang only found them noisy.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 不过热闹都是别人的，吕阳只觉得他们吵闹。

0043.en: At this moment, he was still lost in the lingering fear he had just felt, unable to recover for a long time.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 此时的他还沉浸在刚刚的心悸之中，久久不曾回神。

0043.en: For a long time, or rather, ever since Xiao Shiye was lured away by that Daoist Hongyun, Foundation Establishment True Masters had become a lingering shadow in Lv Yang's heart.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 长久以来，或者说自从萧石叶被那鸿运道人钓走之后，筑基真人就成为了吕阳心中挥之不去的阴影。

0043.en: When he realized that another Foundation Establishment True Master might be plotting against him, the joy of killing Ouyang Haoze vanished instantly. He subconsciously gripped the "Innate Primal Unity Qi Divine Talisman" around his neck, and only after confirming it was still active did his anxious heart settle slightly.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 而当他意识到可能又有筑基真人在算计他时，刚刚斩杀欧阳昊泽的喜悦瞬间一扫而空，下意识地握住了脖颈间的“先天混元一炁神符”，确保它依旧还在运转之后，提起的心才算是稍稍安定。

0043.en: "The talisman is still working, which means the other party still can't track me."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “神符还在运转，说明对方还是算不到我”

0043.en: Even so, the Divine Talisman of Innate Primal Unity Qi had its limits.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 话虽如此，先天混元一炁神符的功效也是有极限。

0043.en: Strictly speaking, it didn't sever karmic ties but rather concealed them, placing a false karmic thread around Lv Yang for protection.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 因为严格来说它并非隔绝因果，而是蒙蔽，是将一层虚假的因果线套在吕阳的身上，以此达成保护。

0043.en: After all, completely severing karmic ties would be too conspicuous.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 毕竟完全隔绝因果的话，反而太过显眼了。

0043.en: So when a Foundation Establishment True Master tried to divine him, they wouldn't get nothing, but rather a flawless yet completely false result.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 所以当筑基真人推算他的时候，并不会毫无结果，而是会算出一个毫无破绽，却又完全虚假的结果。

0043.en: The advantage of this was that it was more subtle, but the disadvantage was that it couldn't completely block the influence of a Foundation Establishment True Master.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这么做的好处是更加隐蔽，坏处则是无法彻底屏蔽来自筑基真人的影响。

0043.en: Thinking of this, Lv Yang had an answer in his heart: "Does this mean the other party wasn't specifically targeting me, but I was accidentally drawn in?"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: 想到这里，吕阳心中已经有了答案：“这么说，对方并不是特地针对我，而是意外将我卷入了进去？”

0043.en: This would also explain the matter of the Profound Yin Treasure Jade.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 如此一来，玄牝太阴宝玉的事情也能解释了。

0043.en: It wasn't a stroke of incredible luck, but someone had intentionally delivered this item to him to achieve some ulterior motive.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 不是他鸿运当头，而是有人特地将此物送到了他手里，为的就是借他之手达成某个不可告人的目的。

0043.en: "What motive?"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “什么目的？”

0043.en: Lv Yang's gaze shifted to Ouyang Haoze's corpse. With a wave of his Myriad Souls Banner, he pulled the bisected body over.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳吗目光一转，看向了欧阳昊泽的尸体，旋即手中万灵幡一挥，将那被一分为二的尸体摄了过来。

0043.en: Perhaps he could find some clues from this man.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 或许能从此人身上得到些许线索。

0043.en: Besides, as a true disciple of the Divine Martial Sect, Ouyang Haoze's collection must be rich!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 何况作为神武门的真传，欧阳昊泽的收藏肯定也很丰厚！

0043.en: Soon, Ouyang Haoze's body was refined into the Myriad Souls Banner. Unfortunately, since the body was split in two, the extracted true spirit was incomplete.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 很快，欧阳昊泽的尸体便被万灵幡炼入其中，奈何尸体被分成了两半，所以提炼出的真灵并不完整。

0043.en: Whether the Myriad Souls Banner could preserve a banner spirit's former combat power, memories, and consciousness depended on the completeness of the corpse. The better preserved the body, the closer the banner spirit was to its living state, like Liu Xin. As for Ouyang Haoze, Lv Yang only managed to preserve about seventy percent of his former state.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 万灵幡收录幡灵，能否维持幡灵生前的战力，记忆和意识，一般是看尸体的完整度，尸体保存越完好，幡灵就越接近生前的状态，比如刘信。而欧阳昊泽，吕阳只勉强保住了生前的七成状态。

0043.en: But even so, he still learned many secrets.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 不过饶是如此，他依旧知道了很多隐秘。

0043.en: "So this was the Divine Martial Sect's true goal."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “原来这才是神武门的目的。”

0043.en: "There is a secret realm within Skull Mountain, a remnant of the ancient Witch-Ghost Path. The subterranean Yin Qi under Skull Mountain is leaking from that secret realm."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: “骷髅山内有一座秘境，乃是上古巫鬼道所留，骷髅山下的地脉阴气就是从那秘境之中泄露出来的”

0043.en: "The Divine Martial Sect wanted the secret realm for themselves, which is why they planned to remove the Saint Sect's market here."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: “神武门想要独占秘境，这才计划拔除圣宗在此地的坊市.”

0043.en: "This is good news. If I report it back to the Saint Sect, I'll definitely get a lot of contribution points as a reward, and the sect will send reinforcements."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “这倒是一个不错的消息，如果传回圣宗，必然能得到不少的贡献点奖励，圣宗也会派人过来支援”

0043.en: "Although keeping this information to myself would be more beneficial... why should I keep it to myself?"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “虽然独占这个消息的好处更大但，我为什么要独占？”

0043.en: "I'm not planning to venture into that Witch-Ghost secret realm anyway. I might as well hand it over to the Saint Sect for a stable sum of contribution points and watch others fight to the death!"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “反正我又不打算去闯那什么巫鬼秘境，还不如交给圣宗，稳定赚一笔贡献点，看别人打生打死呢！”

0043.en: Thinking this, Lv Yang relaxed.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 想到这里，吕阳也就放宽了心。

0043.en: Now that he knew a Foundation Establishment True Master was secretly plotting in Skull Mountain, he was even more determined to hide in the market and never go out.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 在已经知道如今的骷髅山是有筑基真人在暗中谋划之后，他更加坚定了躲在坊市，绝不出门的想法。

0043.en: Next, Lv Yang began to go through Ouyang Haoze's belongings.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 紧接着，吕阳又开始处理起欧阳昊泽的遗物。

0043.en: But just as he picked up Ouyang Haoze's storage bag, a round mirror trembled and floated over, affectionately rubbing against his hand.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 不过他刚将欧阳昊泽的储物袋拿起来，一枚圆镜就颤巍巍飘了过来，靠近后还亲昵地蹭了蹭他的手。

0043.en: It was the Taixiao Mirror.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 赫然是太霄镜。

0043.en: This spirit treasure acted like an eager puppy, circling Lv Yang and hopping a few times, its movements full of loyalty.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这件灵宝仿佛一只殷勤的小狗，绕着吕阳转圈圈的同时还不忘蹦跶两下，动作间充满了效忠的意思。

0043.en: "Are you abandoning the light for the darkness?"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “你这是要弃明投暗？”

0043.en: Lv Yang was a little surprised. Honestly, for a supreme Yang spirit treasure to submit to a demonic cultivator like him, it seemed Ouyang Haoze had truly hurt it deeply.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳有些意外，说实话，这么一件至阳灵宝居然会投靠自己一个魔道，看来欧阳昊泽真的伤它很深。

0043.en: Seeing that Lv Yang's attention was finally on it, the Taixiao Mirror first shone on the storage bag in his hand, then shook from side to side. A voice, somewhat childish like a newborn learning to speak, echoed in Lv Yang's mind:
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 见吕阳的注意力终于落在了自己身上，太霄镜先是照了照吕阳手里的储物袋，然后左右晃了晃，接着一道声音便在吕阳的脑海里响起，带着几分奶气，仿佛一个出生不久，刚学会说话的孩童：

0043.en: "They... are no good!"
0043.speaker: 太霄镜
0043.cn: “它们，不行！”

0043.en: Then, the Taixiao Mirror itself burst into brilliant light, bobbed up and down, and its voice changed, filled with innate pride:
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 随后，太霄镜自己又绽放出了强烈的光芒，又上下晃了晃，声音一变，带着与生俱来的骄傲和自豪：

0043.en: "I... am good!"
0043.speaker: 太霄镜

0043.en: It was recommending itself.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这是在毛遂自荐啊。

0043.en: Lv Yang's expression grew even more amazed. Although he knew spirit treasures had their own intelligence and were incredibly magical, this was the first time he had witnessed it.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳的眼神愈发惊异，虽然他早就知道灵宝拥有自己的灵智，神异无比，但这还是他第一次见识到。

0043.en: "Alright, I'll use you for now."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “也好，那就先用你吧。”

0043.en: Lv Yang beckoned with his hand, and the Taixiao Mirror immediately flew to him. With its cooperation, he quickly mastered every aspect of the spirit treasure.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳伸手一招，太霄镜立刻主动落下，而在它的迎合下，他很快就彻底掌握了这件灵宝的里里外外。

0043.en: "Good! What a good treasure!"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “好！果然是好宝贝！”

0043.en: Lv Yang's face was full of pleasant surprise. Spirit treasures truly live up to their name!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳的脸上满是惊喜，灵宝名不虚传！

0043.en: It was well-known that the so-called Great Perfection of Qi Refining was a state where a cultivator nurtured their internal Qi seed to its limit, transforming it into a "Perfected True Qi."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 众所周知，所谓的炼气大圆满就是将体内气种蕴育到极限，从而蜕变出了一道“圆满真气”的修士。

0043.en: For example, his "Nine Transformations Dragon Art," upon reaching the Great Perfection of Qi Refining, would produce a "True Dragon's Baleful Qi."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 例如他的《九变化龙决》，达到炼气大圆满后就会蜕变出一道“真龙煞”。

0043.en: In other words, Perfected True Qi was the hallmark of the Great Perfection of Qi Refining and the strongest tool used to suppress all cultivators below that level.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 换而言之，圆满真气就是炼气大圆满的标志，也是其仗之压制所有圆满之下的炼气修士的最强手段。

0043.en: However, the Taixiao Mirror, this spirit treasure, was naturally born with a stream of Perfected True Qi called "Taixiao Wind-Thunder Qi"!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 然而太霄镜，这件灵宝居然天生就有一道圆满真气，名为“太霄风雷气”！

0043.en: This meant that whoever wielded this spirit treasure, even with only the first level of Qi Refining, could rival a cultivator at the Great Perfection of Qi Refining while using it!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 换而言之，只要执掌这件灵宝，哪怕只有炼气一层的修为，在催动灵宝期间也可以媲美炼气大圆满！

0043.en: "But there seem to be many restrictions inside this spirit treasure."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “不过这灵宝内似乎还有不少禁制.”

0043.en: Lv Yang studied the Taixiao Mirror. Treasures are meant to be used by people, and this was true even in the righteous path. The Taixiao Mirror clearly contained many restrictions to limit its actions.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳端详着太霄镜，宝为人用，哪怕在正道也不例外，太霄镜内俨然存留着大量限制其行动的禁制。

0043.en: Therefore, if he used this spirit treasure in front of a Divine Martial Sect disciple, they might just perform a hand seal and the Taixiao Mirror would fly back to them.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 因此如果在神武门弟子的面前使用这件灵宝，说不定对方只要一掐法诀，太霄镜就会自己飞回去了。

0043.en: This had nothing to do with the Taixiao Mirror's will; it was a failsafe left by its creator.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这无关太霄镜的意志，完全是炼宝之人留下的后手。

0043.en: "It would be such a waste if I can't use a spirit treasure like this."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “如此灵宝，若是用不上那也太亏了”

0043.en: Lv Yang thought for a moment, and his eyes suddenly lit up. Although his skill in formations wasn't enough to break the restrictions in the mirror, there was a workaround.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳沉思片刻，突然双眼一亮。虽然以他的阵法水平还破不开镜中的禁制，但也不是没有折衷之法。

0043.en: The next moment, Lv Yang shook the Myriad Souls Banner, resummoned Ouyang Haoze, then refined him into a stream of "Innate Unity Qi" and injected it into the Taixiao Mirror. He would control Ouyang Haoze, and Ouyang Haoze would control the Taixiao Mirror, thus bypassing the restrictions.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 下一秒，吕阳便晃动万灵幡，将欧阳昊泽重新召唤了出来，紧接着将他炼成一道“先天一炁”，再将其打入太霄镜中.由他来操纵欧阳昊泽，欧阳昊泽再去操纵太霄镜，从而绕开镜中的禁制。

0043.en: Boom!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 轰隆！

0043.en: Instantly, the Taixiao Mirror in Lv Yang's hand erupted with a dazzling light, with faint sounds of wind and thunder within it. Its power had clearly reached the level of Qi Refining Perfection!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 霎时间，吕阳手中的太霄镜便爆发出了夺目的宝光，光中隐有风雷之声，威力俨然达到了炼气圆满！

0043.en: "...It really works!"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “.果然可以！”

0043.en: Lv Yang laughed freely, then hung the Taixiao Mirror behind his head. For a moment, even the light it emitted turned crimson, dyed with his color.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳畅快一笑，旋即将太霄镜悬在脑后，一时间，就连它散发的宝光都变得赤红，染上了他的颜色。

0043.en: "Excellent! Excellent!"
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “不错！不错！”

0043.en: Lv Yang laughed again, then put away the Taixiao Mirror and opened Ouyang Haoze's storage bag. A sudden burst of spiritual energy made him squint.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳畅快一笑，这才收起太霄镜，转而打开了欧阳昊泽的储物袋，瞬间，喷薄的灵气让他双眼微眯。

0043.en: Inside was a huge pile of spirit stones!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 里面赫然堆积着大量的灵石！

0043.en: Besides that, there were various precious pills, magical artifacts, and materials. Lv Yang estimated that selling them to the Saint Sect would be worth at least thirty thousand contribution points.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 除此之外，还有各种珍贵的丹药，法宝，材料吕阳粗略一算，转卖给圣宗至少价值三万贡献点。

0043.en: "What a huge haul. Unfortunately, there probably won't be another chance like this."
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: “当真是一波肥可惜，今后怕是没有机会了。”

0043.en: After all, with Ouyang Haoze as a precedent, no one below the Foundation Establishment realm would dare to challenge his formation again.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 毕竟有了欧阳昊泽的前车之鉴，筑基之下应该是没人敢再来闯阵了。

0043.en: 'When the news of the Witch-Ghost secret realm spreads, Skull Mountain will become a bloodbath again. A Foundation Establishment True Master must be plotting this from behind the scenes.'
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: ‘等到巫鬼秘境消息传开，骷髅山又是一场腥风血雨.这背后肯定有筑基真人在暗中谋划。’

0043.en: 'But as long as I don't go out and don't get involved... unless he acts personally, what can he do to me?'
0043.speaker: 吕阳
0043.cn: ‘不过只要我不出去，不卷入这场是非.他除非亲自出手，否则又能奈我何？“

0043.en: Having made up his mind, Lv Yang put everything away, deactivated the formation, and flew back to the market on a streak of light, landing on the balcony of the Blood-Robed Tower.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 吕阳打定主意，随后将东西都收起，拨开阵法，驾起一道遁光返回坊市，落在了血衣楼的楼台之上。

0043.en: From that day on, Skull Mountain fell into a strange calm.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 自这一天后，骷髅山便陷入了诡异的平静。

0043.en: The Divine Martial Sect continued to send more people, and reinforcements from the Chu Sheng Sect arrived one after another, but on the surface, there was no conflict, only a hidden undercurrent.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 神武门继续加派人手，初圣宗的援军也接踵而至，可明面上却没有半点波澜，唯有暗流在幕后涌动。

0043.en: In this situation, Lv Yang's story somehow spread and became widely known.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这种情况下，吕阳的事迹却莫名传开，广为人知。

0043.en: Joining the Saint Sect as a mortal ten years ago, making a fortune by speculating on Yin Death-Substitute Puppets, breaking through to the late stage of Qi Refining in a decade of seclusion, becoming a formation master and slaying a true disciple of the Divine Martial Sect at Qi Refining Perfection—such an inspiring story of a commoner's rise gave a strong dose of encouragement to all the ordinary disciples of the Saint Sect.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 十年前以凡人之身加入圣宗，炒替死阴傀大赚一笔，闭关十年突破炼气后期，成为阵法师后阵斩神武门真传，炼气大圆满如此励志的平民逆袭，几乎给所有圣宗普通弟子打了一剂强心针。

0043.en: Gradually, out of reverence, many people stopped mentioning Lv Yang's name.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 渐渐的，许多人出于敬畏，甚至不再提及吕阳的名字。

0043.en: Instead, they used another title:
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 取而代之的，则是另一个尊称：

0043.en: 'The Blood-Robed Lord'!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: ‘血衣楼主’！
